test.html.speaker: Loop
test.html.dialogue:
This is a test dialogue~
<del>
 adhjgkdsflhgkdfsghkjdfz
</del>

test.html.speaker: Loop
test.html.dialogue: Wouldn't you like to know, weather boy?

test.html.speaker: Loop
test.html.dialogue: My my, struck speechless, are you?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Oh...... Young ones......
Are you...... here to kill me......?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Oh...... Young lady......
You stand for Change Themselves, do you not......?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
I... I just want the world to stay the way it is now......
To be frozen in eternal beauty.......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: A world of everlasting peace and rest.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Young housemaiden......
In a way... Isn't my wish a form of Change?
Why aren't you on my side......?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Ah......
Can't you feel it, young lady......?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: The Universe yearns for everyone's hopes to be encased in limitless ice......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Won't you allow your fate to be ended......?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Corrupting and ending people's lives? You call this a form of Change?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You DARE compare your dreams of ice and stillness to Change themselves?!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: This is NOT true Change! This is just you, acting as a god would, for your own satisfaction!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: One would think keeping a whole country from changing and evolving is the farthest thing away from change.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Seems like a pretty pathetic way to appeal to a Housemaiden's good nature, huh?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Is this what you want, then? For us to peacefully let ourselves be frozen in time?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I will never be on your side, King.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Ha...... Spoken like a true Housemaiden of Change......
(Odile looks at you with an expression screaming "does he mean you or me?")

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: No...... That is not how it works, does it?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: AND WE SHALL SEE WHICH SIDE THE UNIVERSE FAVORS!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Despite what you may think......
I am......
A merciful King.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I will give you some time to come to terms with your end......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
A most beautiful end......
An eternal end......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Wow, he's really taking us for chumps, isn't he...?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: We've gotten this far! We will not back down!!!
(You see a vision of the future...)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh...... Oooooooh...... You're still here......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Good. Let us fight to the death, then.
(The King cries and cries and cries...)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Why......
Why won't you understand......
Why won't you understand!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Glad you're expressing your emotions and everything, very healthy, but learn to read the room.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Stop crying!!! JUST STOP CRYING!!! YOU CAN'T!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You hurt so many people!!! People who won't ever move again unless we beat you!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: They're all frozen in time, because of you!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: YOU DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT TO CRY!!!
(...Was it always this easy to fight the King?)
(Even the King feels easy to fight, now.)
(The King's Tears disappeared and healed the King!)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Please......
Please, all of you...... Tell me......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Why are you all fighting against me?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
But don't you see it?
Don't you want it?
This perfect ending?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Right now...
You are fighting me, a being close to divinity.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: The Universe Itself follows my will.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
And yet......
You are all facing me, without fear.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
You're all so powerful......
So united......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: And...... I can see it.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Oooooh......
You're all so stunningly......
So wholeheartedly......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Ah, aaaaaaaah, and that's why you should all understand!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Even now, don't you agree?
Don't you want it?!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Look at you all!!! You're all so powerful!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
You all managed to get this far!!!
Don't you want to be immortalized right now?
As winners?!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
DON'T YOU WANT IT ALL
TO END LIKE THIS!!!!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I do not want time to stop now.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I don't want to be stuck here, in what you deem a "perfect moment"!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Ooooh......
But...... Do you truly think your life will get more extraordinary than this?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Do you truly think you will become more powerful, more fulfilled than you are right now? Fighting me?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: ...Do I think something will fulfill me more than fighting you to save my country?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: "Life will never get better than this, so you should give up now"?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: The eternity you wish for... I want no part of it!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: WE WANT NO PART OF IT!!! WE WILL NOT GIVE IN!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Because your eternity means the end of change!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: And I believe in change, King! I believe in a life that goes on!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Things CANNOT stay the same! They can't! They won't!!! Or we as humans cannot change for the better!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: So I will NEVER let you have your way!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Yeah, what she said! Nice try, trying to manipulate us into being frozen!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: But we won't listen to you.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: This isn't the end of our story, King! Not by a long shot!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: How egocentric to think fighting you is the highlight of our lives.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Believe it or not, beating you isn't even worth writing on my resume.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Saying all those things to push us into being frozen... You're the worst, King!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You're nothing!!! You're not even a King, you're no one! No one!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You're just a dumb baby idiot who froze the country in time for dumb baby idiot reasons!!!!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
(Heh...)
                        "Sounds like there's nothing else for me to add, huh?"

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: "So all you need to do right now is disappear."

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
No......
No, no, no, NO!!!
(You attack the King with all you've got!!!)
(You all attacked the King and hit as hard as you could...)
(Mirabelle's attack brings the King to his knees.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: No, I can't...... I can't disappear......

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Not yet...... No t  w h e n...... I   s t i l l  c a n  ' t  s  a y i   t.. .. .. ..

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: King
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: o o  o  o o  o o o  h . .  .  .  .   .

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Everyone, we did it!!! He's gone!!! The King is gone!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: HOLY CRAB THAT WAS SCARY!!! WE DID IT?!??! WE DID IT!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Hahahahaha!!! Oh, it was close for a second there!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: The people around us, I can... I can feel them coming back to normal, all over Vaugarde!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Ah, I can feel her, she's okay, she's okay! She's okay!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: She's just ahead, come on!!! We have to tell her that everything's fine!!! Come on, let's go!!!
[When equipped, Memory of Victory automatically boosts everyone's ATTACK at the start of a battle.]
(You put yourself in front of Odile and hope your hat protects her from the view.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I-I'm fine... Siffrin protected me from the worst of it...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Look at the ground and take my hand, m'dame! I won't let you fall!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden is just ahead, come on!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: One step at a time, m'dame!  Let's go!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: She's so tall... She might have three heads on you, Isabeau.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I-The house, and when- The King--

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I'm so proud of you! Look at you! The savior of Vaugarde!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You saved the House, and the whole country of Vaugarde. We all owe you a great debt.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Of course. Don't worry, just another day saving a whole country, you know how it is.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh, I did not think the King would be so strong...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: When he attacked the House, everyone was counting on me... But there was nothing I could do.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Hearing young Mirabelle, who was so shy and reserved, was the one to save all of Vaugarde... You look much more confident in yourself now!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I'm so glad I managed to give you some power before the King's Curse took over me!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Ah, Head Housemaiden, just so you know, everyone thinks the Change God blessed me...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh! But why would everyone think that?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: People started saying it, and I... I couldn’t say otherwise...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh, well that’s a rather silly thing for them to think.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I thought we all knew that the Change God is a pretty lazy deity!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Isn't that a sacrilegious thing to say...?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh, my dear Mirabelle... Did you think people would lose hope if they thought the Change God wasn’t the one who blessed you?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I do not blame you, Mirabelle. You acted in a way you thought was right.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I knew I was right to bless you!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Well, I only had the strength to bless one person, and I was already toast, and you were almost out of the House when the King attacked...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: So, really, you were the only logical choice!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You have always been the most hardworking Housemaiden in the House. Always striving to learn new things. To better yourself.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Always meeting challenges head on, even if you didn't think you'd succeed.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You were the only logical choice, yes, but you were also the only RIGHT choice!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You are still so stinking cute, Mirabelle!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: And you, Mirabelle's companions... Thank you for helping her get this far.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You have my gratitude, and the entire country of Vaugarde's...!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: No problem at all, m'dame Head Housemaiden! It was an honor!
(You hide your blushing face under your hat.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: ...Soon, you'll be able to go back to your normal lives. Away from battle and strife.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Finally, you'll all be able to go home!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: If there's anything the House of Dormont can do to thank you... Please do not hesitate.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: But for now... Bask in the feeling of a job well done!!!
(You managed to defeat the King, and brought peace back to Vaugarde...)
(...Before your journey ends, you should talk to everyone!)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I... I'm not dreaming, am I?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: We won, didn't we? Are you sure? We really won?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I don't think I can believe it just yet, to be honest???

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: W-We fought the king, and, and the last attack I dealt did the trick and defeated him, but...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: It's been... It's been such a long journey, you know?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I... I can't believe it's over... I...
(Oh no, she's shaking!!! She's crying!!! Do something!!!)
(You both breathe slowly, in, and out.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Um!!! I know we haven't known each other for that long...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: B-But I hope you know I really treasure your company! I do! I really really do!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: And so...   Thank you! Thank you for accompanying me on this journey!
(You smile so hard, your cheeks start to hurt.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: ...I'm sure you're excited to go back to traveling on your own...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Come see me at Dormont anytime! I'd love to hang out!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: We did it, Sif, we did it! We did it! We stopped the King! We can finally go back to our normal lives! Isn't it great???

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I... Uh. I said. Do you remember what I said? At the Clocktower?
(He wanted to tell you something after you beat the King, didn't he...)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: ARE YOU GUYS DONE TALKING ALREADY?????? CRAB!!!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I wanna go so I can eat dinner!!! I'm super duper hungry!!!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: So are you done? Are you done talking?
(He didn't get to tell you what he wanted... That's too bad.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: But, Sif, I'm glad this is over!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I can't wait to go back to my old job, you know? Make sure to say hi when you're near Jouvente, 'kay?
(He doesn't seem to be able to meet your gaze for some reason...)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Woop woop, we did it, we won, etc.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: This was... quite a workout. My entire body is screaming.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Savior of Vaugarde, huh? That's something to add to my list of accomplishments.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: But now I can finally go back to traveling. I'd be curious to visit some more Vaugardian cities and hear what they have to say after an event like this.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: It'll be weird to travel alone now, but I'll get used to it again.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Or I could just go home to Ka Bue... Hm...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
(Maybe she'd tell you now...)
                        "To do your research?"

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Are you hoping I'll tell you now that our journey is over?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: You're a little strange, but you're a good kid. Maybe try letting down your walls every once in a while, huh?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: And come to Ka Bue anytime. Maybe we'll meet again during your travels.
(Back to looking around curiously, like always.)
(She sees you stare, and flashes you a smile.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Like, for real for real? It's over? The King is gone?

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: So I can go back to Bambouche and see my sister again? She'll be okay? She'll move around?
(Bonnie doesn't seem to believe it yet...)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: "If she's not moving when you go see her, you can punch me three times."

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Wait, that's such a long journey though!!! I'm not gonna go find you just so I can punch you if you're wrong!!! That's dumb!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: "Just as dumb as your sister not being okay when we just won!"

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Okay, then I'll believe you!!! Hopefully I won't have to walk forever to punch you!!!
(Bonnie stares at you without saying anything.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Are you done talking with your companions? Yes, wonderful,
                        wonderful!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
I'd like to thank you for accompanying young Mirabelle this far. I'm
                        very grateful.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
Siffrin, yes? If there's anything I can do to thank you, please
                        don't hesitate to let me know!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
I know you will go back on your travels soon, but I do hope you'll
                        keep in touch, if only for young Mirabelle...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
But no matter what, know that Dormont will always be open to you!
                        Please come back... any... time...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: Oh... Oh no. Oh no, no, no, no, no...

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I'm so sorry!   There's no way we can stop it now...!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I'm sorry! You'll be going back! Back when everything started!
(You taste burnt sugar in the back of your throat.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I know you thought your quest was over, but it can't be!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue:
I can't fix it on my own, not before it all ends... If only I had
                        noticed sooner!!!

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I should've seen it, prevented it!!!
(You feel a tug on your stomach.)

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: It's my fault that you have to suffer like this.

acts/act2/ending2.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act2/ending2.html.dialogue: I just hope that one day...

acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Huh?)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: --frin!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Siffrin?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Good morning!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like you... Only you could sleep peacefully at a time like this, hehe!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I guess that's smart... We better get some rest while we can! We have to be ready for tomorrow...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: So we can finally face against the King!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Huh?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...You're still half asleep, aren't you?
(You just look at her.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hm... Okay, then...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You can sleep for a little longer, but not too long! Come to the village when you're ready, okay?
(Huh?)
(HUH?)
(Hold on,
(DID YOU JUST DIE?)

(You DID, you think! You must have! You were in the House and then a big rock fell and now you're in the meadow, back in Dormont, and what Mirabelle just said to you, waking you up, that was, very, familiar???)
(But aaargh, the trap, the trap!!! You idiot! You stupid fool! It's your job to take care of traps and you got taken out IMMEDIATELY!!!!)

(You didn't even see a glimpse of the King!!! And it's your job, stupid!!! Your job to see ahead, to take care of traps!!! You couldn't even do your job and now you're DEAD because you did a SLOPPY AWFUL TERRIBLE JOB,)
(And you DIED!!! YOU DIED!!!! You felt your body being crushed and now you're laying on the grass, alive, and your skin itches and your stomach hurts and you DIED!!!!)
(You put your hands over your mouth and scream!!! Stars!!!! You’re so stupid and useless and dumb!!!!!!!!!)
(AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA)
(Okay you're over it now.)
(You take a deeeeeeep breath iiiiiiiiin, and ouuuuuuuuuut.)
(Pheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeew.)
(You put your shaking hands behind your back, pressing them hard between you and the grass.)
(Okay, you died, that's one thing.)
(And now, you're alive, and not a crêpe, that's another thing.)
(And it's apparently the day before, back when Mirabelle woke you up from your nap, that's the third thing.)
(You went   back in time?)
(Okay, that's normal. Totally normal.)
(Totally one hundred percent completely normal.)
(...Oh well, at least you were in the lead as always.)
(Judging by where you were when you died, you were probably the only one who got hit. The only one that...)
(In a way, you're REALLY glad you're forced to take the lead every time you and everyone else get somewhere dangerous.)
(But...   You're back. Back to the day before you went to the House.)
(And why?)
(And...   Can you make sure to not die this time?)
(Back to work, Siffrin. You have a country to save.)
(You got a MEMORY OF LOOPING!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[Memories are a type of item you can equip. Each Memory is specific to one character, and gives them special abilities.]
[For example, the Memory you just got can only be equipped by you. When Memory of Looping is equipped, it'll boost your MaxHP by +5 per loop.]
[You can equip Memories by opening your menu and going to the Equip section!]
(What is that voice you've been hearing this whole time...?)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Siffrin! You're up!
(Oops, you don't know how to act right now.)
(You've seen this once before, so you should maybe... Act the same??? Figure something out, quick.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Quick!) "Hey, uh, hey again, Mira."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Still half asleep, huh? How was your nap?
(Okay take two. Say something. Make normal words come out of your mouth.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Smart and normal words, GO!) "Yes. Correct. I was taking nap time."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...I know that? I was there?
(Oh stars.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Oh, wait! I had something I wanted to ask you!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Um, I have an idea for tonight... This will be the night before we go fight the King, so I felt like we could make it special somehow...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: So, I was thinking, how about a sleepover?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Let's all eat good food together! Sleep in the same room! Maybe tell stories!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: It would be nice, wouldn't it?
(Suddenly, you remember where this conversation is heading.)
(THIS IS THE MOMENT IN THE CONVERSATION WHERE YOU MADE MIRABELLE UPSET...!!!)
(Can you change it? Can you change fate?!? Only one way to find out...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Something like...) "That sounds like an AMAZING idea, Mira!"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Yeah? Oh, I'm so glad you think so!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I was thinking it was a little silly, but if you think it could be fun, then great!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Ah, I can't wait... This will be delightful! I'm smiling just thinking about it...
(...MISSION COMPLETE.)
(So you CAN change things.)
(This was a small change, but if your fate isn't set in stone... Then...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: --so, could you let everyone know? I would really appreciate it!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Sure!"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Okay! Let me think...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Madame Odile should be in the shop buying items, Bonnie should be near the fields to the east, and Isabeau is at the Favor Tree to the west!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: We're staying in the clocktower at the east of the town, right past the broken bridge, so you can just tell everyone to meet up there later!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...That was a lot of names and places. Will you remember?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (You think so, yes.) "I always remember things."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Well, unrelated to your memory...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Here's a note with everyone's location! Just in case! You! Forget!!!
(You got the REMINDER NOTE!)
(You put the note in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Okay, see you at the Clocktower later then! I'll be near the library if you need me, come talk to me whenever!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Oh, and don't forget to check the Change God's statue too! For good luck!
(You wave goodbye.)
(Okay, that was... slightly different from what you remembered, but still...)
(So it seems you really are... repeating the same day. With small differences.)
(And Mirabelle... doesn't seem to be aware of it.)
(Are you the only one repeating today?)
(What should you do...?)
[So.]
[You should come to the Favor Tree when you have a second, stardust.]
(What...?)
(Mirabelle is here, sitting on a bench and looking at papers.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hi Siffrin! Do you need anything?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions...) "Anything weird happen lately?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Something weird? U-um...
(She looks at the papers she's holding, as if you just accused her papers of being weird.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: N-Nothing! Nothing's weird! Definitely not my papers!!!
(Suspicious.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: D-DON'T LOOK AT THEM!!!
(You bring your index finger up.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: NO!
(You slowly move your finger closer to her papers...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: No no no no no no no...
(Closer...)
(Mirabelle is so worried at the idea of you seeing her papers that she froze.)
(Your finger gets closer...)
(...And pokes one of the papers.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Poke."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Stop poking my papers...
(You feel a little bad.)
(You stop poking the papers.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Apart from that, I haven't seen anything weird.
(You are still curious, but you'll let it go for now.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Phew.
(Odile is here, looking at what the shop has to offer.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Odile!"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You look rested. Glad to see you this laidback on the day before the end of the world.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Anyway. How can I help you?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue:
(Questions...)
                        "Anything weird happen lately?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Weird...? Like what?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I didn't see anything weird. Did YOU see anything weird?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue:
(Too perceptive...!)
                        "Nope! Nothing at all!"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Okay.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I'll keep an eye out. I do hope you'll also let me know if you see "something weird".
(Bonnie is here, looking morosely at the fields.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Bonnie...?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...heyfrin.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...What d'you want?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions...) "Anything weird happen lately?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Weird? Um...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Just a second ago, I saw, like, the BIGGEST bee.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (...Okay.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You asked...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Like, like, THIS big.
(Bonnie makes a fist, and points to it to show you that yeah, that's how big it was.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Wow.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Are you making a pun? Bee-ig?
(Bonnie sees your crestfallen face and snickers.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Heheheheh.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: What? Like a bee? This sucks. Your pun sucks.
(But, but... Ah, whatever.)
(Isabeau is here, probably pondering what favor to ask the Tree.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Hey, uh, Isa..."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hey, uh, Sif? Are you still half-asleep?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You should stop taking forever naps, Sif. Naps give you cotton brain.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Anyway, I was just looking at the Favor Tree! Isn't this tree cool???

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Oh, wait, you remember this!) "Yeah it is..."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Glad you agree!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "One could say it's a pretty..."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Uh huh???

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "...TREE-mendous tree."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: HAHAHA!!!!! YEAH!!!! YEAH!!!!!! YES!!!!!!!
(You both laugh.)
(Laughing uproariously, he raises his hand towards your shoulder...)
(...but stops, and brings it to his side.)
(Didn't he do this before? What a weird gesture.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Anyway! The tree feels weird somehow... Or maybe it's just me?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (What?) "The tree feels weird?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Yeah! Like, it feels... weird.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: But not mean! Like if a lion came towards you and offered you some candy, that'd be weird, right? That kinda weird!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (...What.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Aw, you always get me, Sif!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Last time...? What d'you mean? I just started feeling like this now!
(...The tree feels weird?)
(Maybe you should go take a look at it...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I'm gonna go soon so you can do your thing with the tree, but do you wanna talk before I go?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions for Isa...) "Anything weird happen lately?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Yeah! The tree!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I told you, something feels off.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...But I have other things to worry about, so who cares!
(The Favor Tree.)
(Isabeau said the tree felt "weird"...)
(And you heard someone telling you to come here, didn't you?)
(What was that voice...?)
(You walk towards the tree.)
(...The tree is so big, everything under it is dark as night, but...)
(You feel like someone is here, sitting at the foot of the tree.)
(Looking at you.)
(Cautiously, with a hand on your dagger, you walk towards the base of the tree.)
(Well, uh, you found someone alright.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Uh, hello, stranger."
...Hello, stranger.
My, struck speechless at the sight of me, aren't you?
You're so cute, stardust!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Stardust?!?) "Um--"
Aw, Siffrin, look at you. All lost and confused.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Huh? Wait...) "How do you know my--"
Why wouldn't I know? You're Sif! Siffrin!
No middle names, no last name! Just Siffrin!
I shouldn't wonder why you look like this, though. It makes sense that you'd feel overwhelmed!
Considering this is your first loop, and all.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (HUH!??!) "HOW DO YOU--"
Aw, of course I know, stardust!
I know about you, I know about your party, about the loops, about that funny silver coin you carry--

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Alright, that's it.) "CAN YOU STOP TALKING PLEASE"
Oh stars, no need to yell.
Let's take a deep breath in, and out, okay? Breathe with me, let's go. In...
(Your head hurts and your hands are shaking and your heart is beating like it's about to explode, so you probably should.)
(Slowly, following the astral being, you breathe in, and out.)
Pheeeeeeeeeee e e e ew.
Alright! Who I am, right?
Hm, well, let's see, let's go with...
Loop. Your ally Loop, here to help you with the loops. Easy to remember, right?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: And for pronouns, you may address me with the royal We.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Um.) "That doesn't make ANY sense."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Ah, yes, that's true, isn't it?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Then use they/them for me. I'm sure you'll think about me all the time, so you might as well know what pronouns to use!
(Yeah, better know this one's pronouns so you can think very clearly in your head that they're getting on your nerves.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Your turn, you guess.) "I use--"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: He/they, I know. It's in your profile.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I can read, you know!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "My what now--"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Anyway stardust, I'm here to help! Ask whatever questions your little heart desires!
(Yep, full blown headache now.)
(Urgh.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "You said I'm, uh, 'looping'?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Oh, getting right into it! I like it, stardust!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Are you sitting down? You better sit down, you're gonna get a lot of info at once!
(You sit down.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: So! You're stuck in a time loop! Fun, right?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Which means that every time you die, you'll loop back, and you'll get to try it all over again!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: No matter how horribly or stupidly you die, like, let's say, crushed by a giant rock, you will always come back!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (They saw that...?) "Did you see--"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Of course I saw, stardust! How can I help you if I don't know what you're doing?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Also, you've probably noticed a lot of things got reset, right?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Your party members are saying the same things, all the items you got while you were in the House disappeared...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Yeah, you noticed your pockets got emptier...) "Because I didn't pick anything up yet, right?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Stardust, you smart cookie, you got it!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: So you'll have to pick them up again. If you want! Which you probably should, since you got a long road ahead of you.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (So what about...) "I have to pick up keys again, too?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Yep! Every time! Well, until you learn.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Learn wh--"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Anyway, this is a lot of information, but don't worry! You'll pick things up as you go along!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Oh, but your weapons and equipment won't be reset though! So that's good news!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Isn't it nice that you get to keep your cool powerful equipment?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Especially since you, stardust, will keep whatever Experience you have, but the rest of your party won't. Compensate by having powerful weapons equipped!
(Your friends won't grow and get Experience like you?)
(You guess it makes sense, since they won't remember whatever enemies you face...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Speaking of your party, you can tell them about the loops, if you want! They might be able to help, and nothing is keeping you from telling them, so...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Uh, why?) "Why would I tell them?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Why wouldn't you? Don't you need help?
(Uh, you've just learned that you can start again as many times as you want and fix your mistakes.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Why would you need help? You're the one in a position to help your friends here...) "I don't really need their help."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Right, because you got me!
(NOT what you meant.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "What should I do now?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hm, let's see...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Have you tried Not Dying???

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I dunno! Just an idea!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Just go back to the House and try again! And maybe die again? Guess we'll see!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Remember: no death is wasted!
(Thanks, that was useless.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "Any advice?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Advice, yes. I have advice.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Don't eat pineapples! You're allergic.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hey, you ask for advice, I give you advice!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You REALLY are. Don't try it!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...Aw, you look so steamed! Okay, real advice, real advice...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: While you were talking to your party, didn't you see a weird symbol appear?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Two little triangles, maybe?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: It might happen with some conversations you've heard before. If you see it, you can zone out by pressing the [button] button.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: It makes you stop listening and makes conversations go faster. No point in staying aware for conversations you've already experienced, huh?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Let's try it with the next text box, so you know how it works.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I am talking now, so press [button] whenever! Nope, that's the wrong button, stardust. Wrong again. I said [button]! Come on now, this is getting silly.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: No, don't press that, silly, press [button]! Let's try again.
(Yeah, that's it.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You did it! It'll take some time for you to get used to it, but it'll save you time, for sure.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You might miss what your party is saying, but who cares, right? If you make them mad, you can always loop back and they'll have forgotten all about it!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: If you want me to say it another way...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: [If you see the icon during a conversation, press [button] to fast-forward through it!]
(Ow ow ow ow.)
(You don't know how they did that, but their voice resonated through your head...)
(You've heard that voice before, yesterday-- Well, in another version of today, really...)
(So they WERE the voice you've been hearing, giving you advice?)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: See, I'm useful. I'm very useful! That's why I'm here, helpful Loop.
(That IS useful, but...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (...) "Why are you helping me?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Because I think you should be helped.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I won't always have the answers, but... I think having someone on your side to talk to is better than dealing with this alone.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Right?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (...) "But I never asked for your help..."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Tough luck, stardust!!! I'll still help you out!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Alright! That's all I have for you right now, but don't forget to come to me when you feel stuck, okay?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I'll be right here under this tree! Don't forget! Bye!!!
(They wave at you excitedly.)
(You awkwardly wave back as you go...)
(Loop, huh...)
(They're a little annoying, but... If you do find yourself stuck at some point, or just need someone to talk to, they might be able to help...)
[Pst, stardust...]
(As you're about to take another samosa to munch on, you hear Loop's voice, and try not to jump.)
[Heh, sorry, sorry!]
[So, here again, huh? Don't worry, you'll get to zone out during this entire event if you want. But there is something...]
[You're able to zone through most conversations you've seen at least once, yes... But some of them might be slightly different!]

[Oh, don't stress out about it. Don't worry, if it was REALLY important, you'd stop zoning out immediately. But remember that just because you can zone out, doesn't mean the events will be exactly the same!]
[So... To zone out, and miss some small things, or to listen to it all again? What a dilemma!]
[That's all! Bye, stardust~!]
(You go back to your samosa.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Phew, Bonbon...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: That was DE-LI-CIOUS!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You keep getting better at cooking, Boniface. Those samosas were delicious.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Really? It wasn't bad? You liked it?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I-I MEAN, OF COURSE IT WAS DELICIOUS. I'm a master cooker, you know!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Chef.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I'm a chef cooker!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: That was the perfect meal, Bonnie! We'll all sleep well tonight and be full of energy tomorrow!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: It was almost too much, to be honest... I don't think I can move...
(You didn't eat much this time.)
(Your stomach feels weird...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...You... You didn't like it?
(Wuh oh.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "I'm just not very hungry."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: But you're always hungry?!?
(WUH OH.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "I, uh, may have eaten some bread earlier."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: How could you do this to poor Boniface.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Look at them. They're pouting so hard they're about to explode.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: KABOOM!!!!!!!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I exploded.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Siffrin was destroyed on impact.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: A beautiful explosion.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Siffrin... You died because of your hubris...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: (How regrettable.) "Was it just me that died?"

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Yes. You were the only casualty.
(That's fine then.)
(You still dramatically fall over for good measure.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "No... How could this happen..."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hehehe...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Sif...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Hey... hey Sif. Siffrin. Siffarooni.
(Isabeau is whispering your name...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Um...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Sorry? To wake you up?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I just have to tell you something.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: If that's okay.
(Again with this?)
(You didn't get to the King, so you don't know what he wants to tell you...)
(You nod.)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Okay, okay, okay.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Then I shall tell you the thing!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: The thing I woke you up to tell you!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Haha!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Um, okay. So.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: The thing I have to tell you

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Is

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: That

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I  don't have anything to tell you right now.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: But I will, when, uh, when we beat the King tomorrow.  Okay?

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I-it's not meant to be???

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I, uh, just don't wanna tell you right now. It might distract you. And we wouldn't want that, right???

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: So, um, I'll tell you when we beat the King.  Okay?
(You haven't gotten to the King yet, so you still don't know what he wants to say.)
(You're so curious. But the only thing you can say is...)

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: "Okay."

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: ...  Okay!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: SOME PEOPLE ARE TRYING TO SLEEP!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: YEAH ISABEAU! SOME PEOPLE ARE TRYING TO SLEEP! CLOSE YOUR MOUTH AND SLEEP!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: YOU CLOSE YOUR MOUTH, HOUSEMAIDEN! YOU'RE GONNA WAKE UP M'DAME ODILE!

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: I'm already up.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: And if the noise continues, I will stand up.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: You do not want to know what will happen if I stand up.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Sorry.

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Sorry m'dame...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: S-Sorry...

acts/act2/intro2.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act2/intro2.html.dialogue: Good night, Sif!
(You think about how far you still have to go before beating the King.)
(You fall asleep.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Why don't you ask them if they need help?
(Bonnie is here, looking morosely at the fields.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't want you to help me with anything!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't! You're stupid and you don't know me, so I don't want you to help me!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You really don't! Not even a little bit!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You don't even know my three favorite foods, stupid!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Wait, you're making fun of me!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: See, that's also why!!! Why I don't wanna talk to you!!!
(...  Okay, this is a silly idea, but what if you COULD prove you do know their favorite food...)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You need to prove to them that you know their favorite foods... How childish!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Don't you take snack breaks every so often in the House? You should pick some different snacks every so often, instead of going for your favorites.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You might find out something new!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Or you can brute force it, and talk to them until you get it right. That's what looping is for, after all.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And for our third and final snack, we are proud to present...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You messed that one up on purpose.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I have some onigiris for everyone!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: One of those Ka Buan rice balls, right?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You and every other kid on this planet, Boniface.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Some pineapple slices. They have some sugar on them.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Some pineapple slices...? They have some sugar on them.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: With sugar, Za. That's what makes them good.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And pineapple's really good, you know!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: SO WHICH SNACK DO YOU GUYS WANT?!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Wait, you like pineapples too??? I didn't know!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Pineapples are one of my three favorite foods! Sounds like you have good taste sometimes, Frin!!!
(So pineapple is one of Bonnie's favorite foods, huh...?)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Um, I'll start with the worst one.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Yeah... They're the ones I burnt...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But I thought I should still keep them in case we get super duper hungry.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Don't be mean to the burnt samosas, they were delicious!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: They really were. They're not the "worst" of anything.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: So, which one? Which snack do you guys want?!
(Bonnie hands you and Isabeau some of the burnt samosas, and keeps some for themself.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Those have potatoes in them, right?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Yeah, because I LOVE potatoes in samosas.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Hm... I seem to remember Sif saying the samosas they're used to didn't have potatoes in them...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Different recipes depending on cultures, I suppose.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Yeah... I love samosas a whole whole WHOOOOLE lot, but some places make them with cheese in them...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Gross. Why would you dirty a perfectly good samosa with cheese.
(Samosa, with potatoes, no cheese. Got it.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: What, need a reminder on their favorite foods?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Well, so far, you've found out that they like...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Go on, then! Go and find out their favorite foods!
(Bonnie is here, looking morosely at the fields.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't want you to help me with anything!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't! You're stupid and you don't know me, so I don't want you to help me!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You really don't! Not even a little bit!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You don't even know my three favorite foods, stupid!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Yeah, I bet you don't even know that!!! Which samosas are my favorite, stupid!!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Y-Yeah...  That's all my favorite foods...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: If you remembered them all, you...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You... Do... Pay attention to me...?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: No, that's stupid, of course you do.  Or else you wouldn't have...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: There's something you can help me with. Can you come with me?
[You don't REALLY have to go through this whole thing again. You can just zone through it, and skip it completely, if you'd like.]
[You'll even still get their cool skill! But if you do, the skill will be a tiny bit less useful. Your choice!]

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Okay. But come back soon, yeah?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't want you to help me with anything.
(You don't think Bonnie will let you guess again this loop.)
(You can see some weak sadnesses roaming around in the distance.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You said I could ask for anything, yeah?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I...  I need you to teach me how to fight!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I know Dile's gonna say I can help you all in battle tomorrow...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But it'll be from far away, right?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I want to help! To actually help!!! And for that, I...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: ...I need to learn how to fight.
(You run towards Bonnie as fast as you can.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I'm not scared... I'm not scared...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I can do this... I can do this!!!
(You've seen this before, but your heart stutters still.)
(You could fall over now, couldn't you...?)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: (You don't have to remember to yell.)
(Bonnie didn't get hurt before, but you want to make sure...)
(You breathe slowly, in and out, and make sure Bonnie breathes with you.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You weren't there... You weren't there to help me and tell me what to do!!!
(You stare at them, without saying a word.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I'm sorry. I'll listen. Tell me how to fight.
(You put your index finger in front of your mouth to tell Bonnie to stay silent, and point towards the Sadness.)
(You tell Bonnie to look at the Sadness' hands.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: They're vulnerable to Rock Craft! Yeah!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I know Rock Craft! S-So I can hit them, right?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I DID IT!!! I DID IT, FRIN!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Hey Frin, why aren't we allowed to touch you?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Um... Dile and Za and Belle said we're not allowed to touch you because it makes you jump and because they said so.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: It's true that you jump, but I was wondering why, 'cuz it means we can't high five or anything.
(None of them are touching you... On purpose?)
(You don't know what to think about the fact that they talk about you behind your back.)
(Poor Siffrin, so fragile they come with instructions.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Oh! Maybe it's because you're not ready for it when it happens.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: That's how it is with Nille.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: My sister! Her name's Pétronille, but it's dumb, so I call her Nille.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: She doesn't like it when people touch her and she's not ready for it.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Nille's really cool and tough, but she gets scared easily, I think.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: One day I touched her shoulder, and she didn't know I was there, and she screamed really loud!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But then she said I shouldn't do it again, because when she's scared she said her scared brain takes over, and she might suplex me without meaning to.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Which sounds really cool, but she said she doesn't want to suplex me, because she doesn't want to hurt me.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: She did suplex one dude who scared her once, though, heheh.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: So I'm not allowed to touch her if she doesn't know I'm there, so I always try to walk real loud so she hears me coming!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: That's why my shoes are so big, see?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't wanna talk about my sister anymore.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: She's frozen in time and she's not here, so I don't want to talk about her.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: She says talking behind people's backs is bad.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And also, talking about her hurts and makes me sad.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: ...  I want Nille to be here...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I should have helped her, when...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Why aren't you used to being touched?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Did your family not hug you when you were a kid?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: So if you can see me, and if I tell you I'm gonna touch you, it's fine?
(Bonnie jumps up and down, making sure you watch them do it.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I am going to touch you now!!!
(Suddenly, Bonnie pokes you hard in the stomach.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: (You jump, more because of pain than surprise.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You saw me and I told you so it's fine!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Okay, let's go, let's fight one more Sadness! I can do one more!!!
(You spot a Sadness in the distance, and attack.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Okay! I can do this!!! Watch me, Frin!!!
(This is different from usual... You're not used to fighting outside anymore.)
(The ground is uneven, and there's rocks and branches to worry about.)
(The first time... You fell over, didn't you?)
(Because you were in danger, Bonnie defeated that Sadness on their own.)
(That was a little early... You hope Bonnie doesn't notice.)
(You think you have the timing figured out.)
(The Sadness saw you fall, and is running towards you to attack!!!)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I...  You haven't called me Bonbon in forever... Only Za calls me that now...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: It just...  It reminded me of before, that's all.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Yeah. You remember, right? It was a while back...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: When you protected me from that other Sadness, you know.
(What Sadness do they mean? You can't remember...)
(But you have to follow the script.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: The one that got your eye, stupid!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: See, I told you!!! I knew it!!! You're so crabbing stupid!!! You didn't even remember it!!! You think it doesn't matter!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You keep getting hurt because of me and you don't care!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You can't see from one eye because of me and you think it doesn't CRABBING MATTER!!!!!
(It was after you all met Bonnie. Before they started barely speaking to you anymore.)
(They weren't careful, and a Sadness was about to hurt them.)
(They're so small. No one else was close enough to do anything.)
(So you ran, and got in front of them, and...)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Why did you do it, Frin?! Why did you do it!!! Why did you protect me!!! I don't understand!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You could've stayed put! I could've... I could've taken care of it!!! I was fine!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But nooo, Frin thinks they're better than everyone else!!! And you tried to protect me, like a stupid crabbing idiot!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: A-And you got hurt! Because of me!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Because of me, you can't see from one eye!!! You have a big scar!!! And you bump into things all the time, and you trip all the time--

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But it is!!! It really is!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You got hurt because of me, and--

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And I don't like it!!! I don't want it to have happened!!! You should have stood there and let me be hurt!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: If I died, it would have been fine...!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't...  I don't want you to be hurt...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't want you to be hurt...!!!
(You can reassure them all you want, say you're sorry, promise you'll never do it again...)
(But you would do it again.  Again and again and again.)
(If it had happened now, while you're stuck in a time loop, you'd jump in and protect them every time.)
(Because what's the alternative? Try to find a way to save them without being hurt?)
(But what if you failed? What if you couldn't do it, and they did get hurt instead?)
(What if they died because you tried to get a better ending?)
(You would do it again, the exact same way, for as long as needed.)
(AND YOU DON'T WANT THEM TO BE HURT, EITHER!!!)
(THE KING, HOLDING BONNIE IN THEIR HAND, HOLDING, HOLDING, SQUEEZING--)
(AND IT'S BECAUSE YOU TRIED TO CHANGE IT! CHANGE FATE! YOU TRIED TO FIND ANOTHER WAY!)
(BECAUSE YOU TRIED SOMETHING NEW...  BONNIE...!  BONNIE...!!!)
(You try to breathe, slowly, in, and out--)
(What was-- What do you have to say? What should you say?)
(What was-- What do you have to say? What's your line?)
(HAHAHA, it's fine, you're fine, teehee!)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You promise you won't get hurt again?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: As long as you promise, it's fine!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And anyway, I protected you just now, right? If it wasn't for me, you would've been hurt! So!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: So you can protect me, and I can protect you...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: And we can protect everyone, too!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Y-You see me, right? I'm gonna touch you now!!!
(You freeze, until you remember what to do.)
(You hug them back tightly, tightly, tightly.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: ...See, you do know how to hug.
[When Memory of Training is equipped, your Kid will never miss when attacking!]
[Your Kid also learned the skill "Billion Blows Technique"!!! They'll be able to hit the enemy harder during battle!!!]
