[It's so strong, you'll only be able to use it when you've had this exact conversation. So if you loop back to Dormont, you'll have to talk to them all over again! Remember that, okay?]
[Your kid learned the skill "Billion Blows Technique" again!!!]

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I gotta show everyone how cool I am now!!!
(You clench your fists to make your hands stop shaking.)

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You got to hang out with that Kid, didn't you?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: So all this time... They felt guilty, because they feel like they're the reason you're half blind...

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But, they're dealing with a lot right now.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Their sister is frozen in time, they had to run away from their home to escape the King's Curse, and they had to see you and your stupid eye every day.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: No wonder they don't know what to do with all these thoughts rattling in their brain. No wonder you felt like they hated you.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: But isn't it nice? To not be hated, anymore?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Well. I suppose you're still hated, now.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You said I could ask for anything, yeah?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: ...I need to learn how to fight.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: Hey Frin, why aren't we allowed to touch you?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: I don't wanna talk about my sister anymore.

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: The one that got your eye, stupid!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: If I died, it would have been fine...!!!

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: You promise you won't get hurt again?

acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/bonniequest.html.dialogue: As long as you promise, it's fine!!!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like... ...
(You won, didn't you? Why are you back? WHY ARE YOU BACK?!)
(The whole Universe is closing in on you)

(You're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here your journey was over a nd you're  back  here)
(Your journey was over, wasn't it!!!! You won, didn't you!!! You all survived, right!!!! And yet!!!! AND YET, YOU'RE--!!!!!!)
(YOU TRY BREATHING IN BUT YOU CAN'T BREATHE- YOU CAN'T BREATHE--)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin, finally you answered! What's wrong, what happened?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Oh no... It must've been a horrible nightmare...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: ...Do you want to talk about it?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: ...Um, why would making onion quiche make you--

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I was cutting a lot of onions!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN, YOU CRAB!!! I CAN'T BELIEVE I WAS WORRIED!!!
(You laugh in a very convincing way.)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Hmf! I'm glad at least your nightmare wasn't that bad, but... Hmf!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I'll be waiting in the village, alright? Come talk to me later!!!
(Why are you back...? You beat the King, didn't you? Did something go wrong?)
(It was the end of your journey, and yet you...)
(The Head Housemaiden... She said something about the world being rotten?)
(They're the only one you can talk to... They might... know what's going on...)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I'm, uh, I'm sorry I woke you up earlier. I know you joked about it, but are you feeling better now? I'm worried...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: (Well, this is new...) "Yes, don't worry about me!"

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: (You really have to talk to Loop right now...) "I have things to do, I'll talk to you later!"
("But help me tell everyone about the sleepover"?)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: ...Can you come talk to me later? So we can talk? I'll wait in front of the library...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Okay! Go do your thing, and then come back, okay? I'll be waiting!
(Habit takes over, and you tell her about the CARROT method.)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: W-Wait, how did you know about--
(Mirabelle learned the Craft Skill "Adorable Moving Shield" again.)
(You can't talk to anyone right now.)
(You have to see... You have to ask Loop... What they think...)
(You ran here to talk to Loop, to try to figure out what to do, but...)
(You can't look at them right now.)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: You did?!? Oh, stars above, I'm so proud of you!!! You did it!!! You succeeded!!! You--
(They don't seem surprised at all, do they?)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: But it felt cruel to tell you, so I didn't.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: So happy and innocent and stupid!!! I just didn't have the heart to tell you!!!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: ...I just didn't have the heart to tell you.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I knew from the start that the loops wouldn't end after defeating the King.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I don't know why it didn't end with beating the King.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "I never thought about the reason why I got this power."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "I just thought... It was to beat the King."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "That the Change God, someone, anyone, gave me this power to beat him."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "But if beating him made me loop back anyway..."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "I don't know what to do now."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: So will you give up, then?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: You're stuck in this loop, stardust.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Beating the King brought you back here. You don't know why. You don't even know how you even got this power.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: You don't know if there's even a way to escape.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: So... Because there's no clear way to escape...
(Right now, you're alive. Right now, you can think. Right now, your allies are still here. Right now, you're not alone.)
(There's no reason to give up now, just because you're trapped.)
(If you're trapped, find a door, and open it.)
(And, you still have some doors to open, don't you?)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden seemed to know something was wrong, didn't she?"

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: She said something about... Something being broken? Failing?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Maybe the loops WERE supposed to stop after beating the King, but something went wrong somehow.
(And that's something you can find out.)
(You just need to talk to her again. Find out what she knows.)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "He can freeze people's time. And I can rewind time."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Both powers ARE related to time, aren't they?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I don't think I've ever heard about anyone who could control time before...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "Isn't that something to find out more about?"

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "Maybe I just need to ask him."

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Well, um, sure, I suppose that might work?

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Talking to the King himself... I do wonder what he'd have to say.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I know you're not interested in talking to your party about the loops. If so...

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: You'll have to make sure to act so they don't find out anything is wrong.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: And you already failed this loop by making your Housemaiden worried about you, teehee!
(It's true. With the way you woke up, she's probably worried about you, even now...)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: She said she wanted to talk to you, didn't she? You should talk to her this loop, see what that's all about.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Add this to your brain list of things to do.
(There's quite a few things on it already.)
(Find out more about the King and his powers, to see if they're related to yours.)
(Talk to the Head Housemaiden, to see if she knows more about the loops.)
(Talk to Mirabelle this loop, see what's wrong. Might as well talk to everyone else after, too.)
(As long as you have paths you can follow... Questions to answer...Goals to strive for...)
(They appeared after you looped for the first time... And said they were here to help.)
(And they knew about the loops. Knew this whole time beating the King wouldn't help.)
(And they picked that name, didn't they? "Loop"?)
(Aren't they... Related to the loops, too?)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: If you can believe anything, believe that.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I asked to be here, so I could help you.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: "Aren't you stuck here too, just because you're helping me?"

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I reiterate, stardust: I asked to be here.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me. Being here is surprisingly restful!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: I'm here to help you any way I can, and I mean it!!!
(It'd be stupid not to take it, isn't it?)
(You don't really need to know, do you?)
(You don't want to start doubting them.)
(Loop said they're here to help you. That's all you need to know.)

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: ...I'm very glad to hear that, stardust.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: Please don't give up, stardust!!! If the loops started, they can end!!!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: It's just basic logic. I can guarantee that you won't be stuck here forever.

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: And as always, you can count on me to help you!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: If you need a refresher, or help figuring out where to go, I'll be here!

acts/act3-4/intro3.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/intro3.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop, stardust?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (You need help on how to...) "...help everyone."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Which one, stardust?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (Which ally...) "Isabeau."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Him, huh...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Why don't you ask him if he needs help?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Do I need help with anything... Um...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Well... Maybe, kind of, but...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Hmmmmmmmmmmmm...
(It seems serious... Does he have a big problem he needs help with?)
(You steel yourself.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Okay, well...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I'd rather you ask everyone else if they need help, first. Mine might take some time.
(Huh... A task so long it might take a long time?)
(It must be really important to him.)
(You nod seriously.)
(Time to see what's the best place to look at the stars, maybe...?)
(You nod.)
(You nod.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, so serious!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So, um, yeah! Make sure to help everyone and do whatever you need to do, first!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Hm, you haven't helped everyone yet, right?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I'd rather wait until you're done!
(Sounds like you'd better help everyone else in the same loop first.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (You need help on how to...) "...help everyone."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Which one, stardust?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (Which ally...) "Isabeau."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Him, huh...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Your Fighter apparently wants you to help everyone else first. Scary...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Don't you think he's asking you to finish helping everyone first because he wants to ask you something really complicated???
(That's what YOU'RE thinking!!!)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Well, only thing you can do now is helping everyone else, stardust!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Huh? Oh, that's cool!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I did see you running around with everyone earlier. It looked like fun...
(Oh.)
(That's right, you didn't ask him if he needed any help, this loop...)
(Well.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Help?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! Yes, I do need help with something, now that I'm thinking about it!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Is that what you were doing today? Helping everyone out? I didn't know!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I-I'm glad!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I was just thinking I wanted to hang out with you today, since I saw you running around with everyone.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But you didn't talk to me much today, so I was, um, worried you... Didn't want to...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I-It doesn't matter! I'm glad I thought about what we could do today, then!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: You did? You did!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, I saw you run around with everyone today, which made me very jealous.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I'm glad I get to spend time with you!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Um, are you ready now?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: We'll probably have to go to the Clocktower immediately after we're done, so I don’t think you'll have time to do anything in the village after...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I wanna make sure you did everything you needed to...?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, okay! Well, um...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Follow me, Sif!!!
[Wow, you're here again!]
[You don't REALLY have to go through this whole thing again. You can just zone through it, and skip it completely, if you'd like.]
[You'll even still get their cool skill! But if you do, the skill will be a tiny bit less useful. Your choice.]
(Zone out?)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Sure, Sif! In the meantime, I'll let you do your thing here, and I'll wait for you North of Dormont, okay?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Sure, Sif! I'll see you later!!!
(A field...?)
(There's nothing around...)
(What could he possibly need?)
(The field again.)
(He must've spent some time looking for a good spot to see the stars...)
(Your throat tightens.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Huh? Oh, um...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Lay down with me?
(You lay down.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And then...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Look up!
(You look up.)
(Stars, stars, stars, all around you.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Y'know, when you asked me if I needed help earlier, I wasn't sure what to say!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I don't really need help with anything... And I did all I needed to prepare for tomorrow and stuff.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But I saw you run around and help everyone today, and that seemed kinda fun! And so, I thought...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "Sif's making sure to help everyone today, but I just want to hang out with him!!!
(Oh.)
(Oh.)
(On what he thinks is his last day on Earth, he just wanted to spend some time with you.)
(Say the line.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (...) "Why stars?"

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Um.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So, you know how you say this word, when you're annoyed or something bad happens?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I don't know what language it is, but I always thought it was like a swear word? Like "crab"?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I looked in a few books, but I couldn't find the word anywhere, and I got really curious...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And one day, I heard someone else say it! So I asked them, and they said it means "stars"!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I noticed you know stuff about the sky! You talked about planets once, and the sun, like you really knew what you were talking about.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And sometimes, when we slept outside, you'd spend most of the night looking at the night sky.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I thought that was interesting, because I never thought about what's up there before! But, um...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I thought maybe, um, like, you'd like, to see the stars? Together? O-or just in general!
(How perceptive, Isabeau!)
(You want to cry.)
(The stars won't listen.)
(You can't say anything now, even if you wanted to.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh no, was I wrong??? Was it really more of an actual swear word like "crab", where you don't actually like stars and stars are bad and gross??? Did I step in it??? Did I mess up???

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "...No, you didn't step in it."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh, phew! I got scared, heheh.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Anyway, I've heard some people can see stuff in the stars, sometimes! Like, pictures!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: They're called... Conste-something?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "Constellations."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Constellations!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Yes, that! Do you know some?
(You look up at the stars.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "No, I don't know any."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Huh.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...You're saying I didn't step in it, but...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Sif...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (Change the subject.) "No, no, you're fine, hahaha!"

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "Tell me something?"

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Something?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "Something about you."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh, okay! Um...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Well, okay, you know I'm from Jouvente, right?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I've lived there my whooooole life!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: It's a nice, big city. More than one House, too. Waaaaay bigger than Dormont.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Big enough that you don't know the life story of every person you see, haha.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Anyway, you might think it's surprising, I dunno...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But when I was Bonnie's age, I was like, the SMARTEST smarty pants around.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Not like, slightly smart, or anything...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But like, the NERDIEST kid you can imagine.
(Huh.)
(You have trouble imagining Isabeau as anything other than the boisterous man he is.)
(Now that you know this about him, you do notice it more.)
(He sometimes knows things even Odile doesn't know.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, like, really imagine it!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Big glasses. Super neat braids. Always knows the answer to any question the teacher has. Always getting perfect grades.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Always too shy and focused on grades to even know how to make a friend in the playground.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: That was me!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And, um, I didn't really like myself.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: 'Cuz, like I was smart, but... I really hated being shy. Being alone. Not even able to ask a classmate for a pen, because I was so paralyzed by fear.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I was ready to spend the rest of my life like this.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But one day, after years of living like this, I looked at myself, and the way I was, the way I existed in this world...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I looked at that kid in the mirror, and I thought...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Is this it?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Is this really who I want to be?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Couldn't I just be someone else? Someone that can make friends, someone people could love? Someone I could love?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Someone I wouldn't feel ashamed of being?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Couldn't I just... Change?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And, that's one of the things people go to Houses for, you know? To learn things, to train, to do Body Craft on yourself...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: To Change!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And you can stay for a bit, and come back Changed, and no one would say a thing. They'd just accept the new person you've become.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I went to one of Jouvente's Houses and threw myself into it! Trying to be the coolest, strongest, most dependable person around!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Lifting weights! Training my voice to be deeper, louder! Crafting my own body to be cooler, stronger!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Looking at myself in the mirror every morning and yelling " I'm the coolest!!! "!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Change is destruction, you know?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: To bring about Change, you need to know you might hurt people. Might hurt yourself, even.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So you always have to be careful, and think about whether the destruction you bring about is worth it.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I decided it was.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So, the person I was before...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I made them disappear.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Killed them with my bare hands.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Made sure they'd never, ever come back.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I could live.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Ah, it sounds so bad, when I say it like that!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: The kid I was before is still here! I just, hm, grew around them? To protect them?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Building an armor, until it becomes the real thing?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I could become someone strong, someone outgoing... Someone comforting to be around.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Someone I would've liked to know, before.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Meh. It doesn't matter that much.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I'm here, is what I mean! And I love myself so much more now than I did before!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But even the person I'm now is a work in progress. I want to Change, still.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I became a big and strong and dependable, happy-go-lucky dude, because that's who I needed to be.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: But lately, I've been feeling like I need... To let down the airhead facade a bit? Act less stupid, that sort of stuff.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: It doesn't feel great, when people think I'm stupid, just because I act a certain way.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I might Change again soon! And become someone slightly new!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: That sounds cool, right?
(You never knew.)
(Isabeau wanted to change, to become someone else, and he did it.)
(He must've worked for so long, to make his wish come true...)
(Crafting himself into a new person.)
(His wish came true.)
(You're not the only one acting in this play, are you?)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh... I might change to be a mix between a jock and a nerd.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Balancing it all, you know?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: More like a nock! Sounds better, doesn't it? Better mouth feel.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: More like a jerd! Sounds better, doesn't it? Better mouth feel.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "They both sound bad, Isa."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Nooooo , don't say that! Hahaha!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: A smart jock... How avant-garde, right?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...You think I'm buff?
(You quickly look away from him.)
(You pointedly do not look at his arms.)
(You do not avert your gaze.)
(There's a silence.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Huh.
(You both blink.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: A-Anyway, after we beat the King tomorrow, and go our separate ways, I'll just change into someone else!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Someone who can be both strong AND smart!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Both at once!!! What a concept!!! Doesn't that sound like someone cool?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Doesn't that feel like someone you wouldn't feel ashamed of knowing?
(Is that what he thinks...?)
(You don't understand why he'd think you'd ever feel ashamed of knowing him.)
(Doesn't he know that you wouldn't be who you are without him?)
(Isabeau.)
(You want to tell him.)
(You want to tell him that he brought laughter into your life, before all this.)
(That you learned puns and jokes to make him laugh.)
(That you didn't know how to describe yourself, you didn't know who you even were, until you said a bad pun once and he laughed so hard you thought he was going to pass out.)
(That even now, you wouldn't trade this half-life for anything else.)
(You want to hold his hand.)
(You grip the grass under your palm.)
(Isabeau.)
(You feel disgusting just looking at him, now.)
(Why did you have to do that?)
(Why do you have to take advantage of his feelings for you, every time?)
(He only loves you because you're forcing him to love you.)
(If he knew you, if he knew what you've become, he would hate you.)
(Even now, you'll say the same line, won't you?)
(It's all about making him happy, making him think you're perfect for him.)
(You're disgusting , Siffrin.)
(Follow the blinding script.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: ...Yeah, Sif?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "I have never felt ashamed of knowing you."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "Not even a little bit."

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, you're gonna make me blush, Sif...!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And, well... You know I feel the same, right? You're like, maybe the coolest person I know... You know that, right?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I really like spending time with you! When we hang out, I always discover new things, like cool theater stuff, or even just something new about you,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I like how you always have a pun ready for any situation,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: How you breathe in this specific way sometimes, and I wish I could breathe with you to make you feel better,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I like the way your face looks when you eat your favorite foods,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I want to know more about you,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Talk with you more,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Laugh with you more,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And... And I...
(You can't look away from him.)
(You wait.)
(You hold your breath.)
(You look away.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: W-Woah, is that a shooting star?! Hey, look up! I-Isn't it cool?
(You look away from him, and look up at the starry sky.)
(There's no shooting star.)
(But you don't mind.)
(You want to keep looking at him, but that's not what the script demands.)
(Pulling your gaze away from him, you look up at the starry sky.)
(You haven't seen a shooting star in years.)
(You look up.)
(Nothing to wish to.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: AhHAH!!! See, I told you they'd be here!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: You heard Isa mumble to himself about it earlier, more like.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Hi Siffrin, hi Isabeau! We figured you'd be here!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Can we join you?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: EVERYONE IS HERE!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Good to see you, everyone!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Such a beautiful night... Was it your idea to come here, Isabeau?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: It was!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Under the stars, huh...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: How romantic. Very well done, Isabeau.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Wh-What? No, it wasn't romantic at all.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Just a pals outing. A buddies hangout. I, of course, would bring anyone of you here.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Uh huh.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I brought our food!!! So we can eat here!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: A nightly picnic!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oh, I can smell samosas... Yummy...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Yeah, I made a lot! Frin, take one!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Take two, even. You deserve it.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin sure worked hard today, didn't they? Thank you for your help earlier!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Yes, thank you, Siffrin. You've been a great help today.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Frin taught me how to fight!!! I'll be able to help you tomorrow!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Oooh! I'm looking forward to it, Bonnie!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Za, did Frin help you today too?
(You freeze.)
(Did you???)
(You look at Isabeau.)
(He was already looking at you, smiling.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heheh...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Of course Sif helped me today!!!
(Isabeau is looking at you, smiling brightly.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Thank you for spending time with me, Sif!!!
(Oh.)
(You hide your face beneath the rim of your hat.)
(You awkwardly smile back.)
(You smile back.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: How wonderful!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Thank you, oh great helper.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Here, have another samosa.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And have some pâté and bread!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I'm sure you want some tea, too!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And here's some of my curry--
(Your plate is overflowing...!!!)
(You see everything on your plate sway back and forth...)
(You eat as much as possible before everything falls down.)
(Free food time.)
(You eat what's on your plate as fast as possible.)
(Before the food even starts to sway, you eat everything on your plate.)
(None of it fills your stomach.)
(You burp.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: EW!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Hehe!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: HAHAHA!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Ha! Nice reflexes, Siffrin!
(Everyone starts laughing happily.)
(You laugh, too.)
(You're surrounded by your allies...)
(Your heart lifts.)
(You love them.)
(You're glad you got to spend time with them.)
(You're glad you know them better.)
(You're glad--)
(You laugh, too.)
(Are you... Doing the right thing?)
(Repeating this day? Repeating this moment?)
(Making sure they're happy, making sure they like you?)
(Who are you doing this for?)
(You laugh, because the script demands this of you.)
(You're disgusting, Siffrin.)
(Look at you. Going through the motions. Making sure they like you.)
(Making sure they love you.)
(You don't care about them anymore, do you?)
(They're just characters in a play to you, now.)
(Your perfect, perfect play.)
(Are you enjoying yourself?)
(Now that you know the exact steps you have to take to be loved by them?)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Frin, you okay? Want more snacks?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: (You smile.) "Yes, please!"

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Then eat! Eat as much as you want!!!
(You all ate and laughed under the stars...)
(Tomorrow, once again, you'll go into the House, and fight the King.)
(But today... Today, you're happy.)
(But today... Today...)
(You're doing this for them. Yes, you're sure of it.)
(You want them to be happy.)
(And now, you know how to make them happy forever!)
(It's the least you can do, right? It's what they deserve, isn't it?)
(They didn't ask to be here.)
(So you have to make sure everything is perfect.)
(But today.)
(But at least, you're here.)
(With them.)
(Characters in a play they may be, but they're here.)
(You know every single one of their lines at this point, but they're here.)
(It's almost reassuring, to know exactly how they'll react.)
(It's not tiring or frightening at all.)
(At least they're not leaving you behind.)
(They're here.)

(They're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here they're here.)
(But you don't know how much longer it'll be enough for you.)
(You had a nice time yesterday, hanging out with Isabeau under the stars.)
(You got a MEMORY OF STARGAZING!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[Hi stardust!  I didn't want to interrupt before, but... You got a new memory!]
[When equipped, Memory of Stargazing boosts all of your Fighter's stats by 30! Wow!]
[Your Fighter also learned the skill "WE WILL WIN"!!!]
["WE WILL WIN!!!" is amazingly strong. When used, it boosts everyone's ATTACK, DEFENSE and ATTACK SPEED for a few turns!!!]

[It's so strong, you'll only be able to use it when you and your Fighter have had this exact conversation. So if you loop back to Dormont, you'll have to talk to him all over again! Remember that, okay?]
[But hey, stardust, it was nice, wasn't it? Hanging out with all of them, yesterday?]
[They love you, now! Your bond with them is stronger, now!]
[...Isn't that neat?]
(It is neat.)
(You don't want to have to loop back to before you spent that time with them.)
(What would happen, if... If you stayed with this version of them... Until the end?)
(If you went through the entire House, without looping ahead, beat the King, and saw the Head Housemaiden, with them?)
(Would anything happen?)
(Would anything change?)
(Time to walk all the way up, and beat the King.)
[Your Fighter learned how to use "WE WILL WIN!!!" again!!!]

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Which one, stardust?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Had a nice time talking with your Fighter?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: What a nice guy. He prepared everything so you could watch the night sky, because he noticed you liked the stars, and he wanted to spend some time with you.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Who knew he had such a history with the Change belief, too...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, come to think of it, he might represent the Change belief better than your Housemaiden does. She must hate that.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And he tried to tell you something at the end, too. Do you think it's the same thing he always tries to say, at the end?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: He'll never spit it out, poor guy.
(That's right...)
(You wonder what he wants to say to you, every time.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Teehee.
(Isabeau leads the way.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Lay down with me?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Look up!
(You look up.)

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: "--but I just want to hang out with him!!!"

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: So I thought maybe, um, like, you'd like, to see the stars?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Constellations!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Sif...

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I've lived there my whooooole life!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And, um, I didn't really like myself.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: To Change!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: I made them disappear.

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: That sounds cool, right?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Someone who can be both strong AND smart!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Heh, you're gonna make me blush, Sif...!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And I want to know more about you,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Talk with you more,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Laugh with you more,

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: W-Woah, is that a shooting star?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: See, I told you they'd be here!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: A nightly picnic!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Za, did Frin help you today too?

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Of course Sif helped me today!!!

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: And here's some of my curry--

acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/isaquest.html.dialogue: Ha! Nice reflexes, Siffrin!
(You all ate and laughed under the stars...)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (You ran here to talk to Loop, to try to figure out what to do, but...)
(You can't look at them right now.)
(You can't.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue:
(...)
                        "...I beat the King."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You did?!? Oh, stars above, I'm so proud of you!!!  You did it!!! You succeeded!!! You--

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "And yet I'm still here."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...Yes.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Indeed you are.
(...They don't seem surprised.)
(They don't seem surprised at all, do they?)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Did you know this would happen?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I had a feeling, yes.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But it felt cruel to tell you, so I didn't.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You looked so...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So happy and innocent and stupid!!! I just didn't have the heart to tell you!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...I just didn't have the heart to tell you.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I knew from the start that the loops wouldn't end after defeating the King.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Why not...?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I don't know why it didn't end with beating the King.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I just knew it wouldn't.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "I never thought about the reason why I got this power."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "I just thought... It was to beat the King."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "That the Change God, someone, anyone, gave me this power to beat him."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "But if beating him made me loop back anyway..."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "I don't know what to do now."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So will you give up, then?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You're stuck in this loop, stardust.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Beating the King brought you back here. You don't know why. You don't even know how you even got this power.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You don't know if there's even a way to escape.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So... Because there's no clear way to escape...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Will you give up?
(Give up...?)
(No. You're fine, aren't you?)
(Right now, you're alive. Right now, you can think. Right now, your allies are still here. Right now, you're not alone.)
(There's no reason to give up now, just because you're trapped.)
(If you're trapped, find a door, and open it.)
(And, you still have some doors to open, don't you?)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden seemed to know something was wrong, didn't she?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Ah... I guess she did.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: She said something about... Something being broken? Failing?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Did she mean the loops?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: The loops, breaking?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...That's possible.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Maybe the loops WERE supposed to stop after beating the King, but something went wrong somehow.
(And that's something you can find out.)
(You just need to talk to her again. Find out what she knows.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "And the King..."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: The King?! What about him?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Something about his powers..."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "He can freeze people's time. And I can rewind time."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...Yes, that's...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Both powers ARE related to time, aren't they?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I don't think I've ever heard about anyone who could control time before...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Isn't that something to find out more about?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...I suppose so?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Maybe I just need to ask him."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Ask the King?!?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Well, um, sure, I suppose that might work?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Talking to the King himself... I do wonder what he'd have to say.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's worth trying!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...And, stardust...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I know you're not interested in talking to your party about the loops. If so...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You'll have to make sure to act so they don't find out anything is wrong.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And you already failed this loop by making your Housemaiden worried about you, teehee!
(It's true. With the way you woke up, she's probably worried about you, even now...)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: She said she wanted to talk to you, didn't she? You should talk to her this loop, see what that's all about.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Add this to your brain list of things to do.
(There's quite a few things on it already.)
(Find out more about the King and his powers, to see if they're related to yours.)
(Talk to the Head Housemaiden, to see if she knows more about the loops.)
(Talk to Mirabelle this loop, see what's wrong. Might as well talk to everyone else after, too.)
(But see?)
(As long as you have paths you can follow... Questions to answer...Goals to strive for...)
(You'll be fine.)
(You're fine.)
(Why is Loop helping you?)
(They appeared after you looped for the first time... And said they were here to help.)
(And they knew about the loops. Knew this whole time beating the King wouldn't help.)
(And they picked that name, didn't they? "Loop"?)
(Aren't they... Related to the loops, too?)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Loop..."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Hm~?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Stardust...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Yes.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: If you can believe anything, believe that.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I asked to be here, so I could help you.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Why?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "Aren't you stuck here too, just because you're helping me?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I reiterate, stardust: I asked to be here.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me. Being here is surprisingly restful!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I'm here to help you any way I can, and I mean it!!!
(If they're offering their help...)
(It'd be stupid not to take it, isn't it?)
(You don't really need to know, do you?)
(You don't want to start doubting them.)
(Loop said they're here to help you. That's all you need to know.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "To answer your question, though..."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Hm?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "No, Loop."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "It's too early to give up."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...I'm very glad to hear that, stardust.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Please don't give up, stardust!!! If the loops started, they can end!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's just basic logic. I can guarantee that you won't be stuck here forever.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's a Loop Guarantee!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And as always, you can count on me to help you!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: If you need a refresher, or help figuring out where to go, I'll be here!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I'm here to help, stardust!!!
(You smile.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oh my, genuine thanks!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: GROSS!!!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ... It's my pleasure, stardust.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Teehee, well...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop, stardust?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Well... I think it's a stupid idea, but...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: You should go and talk to the King. Sounds like you have some questions to ask.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "You don't agree?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: He's a giant monster who might be related to the reason why you're trapped in time.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I would never have anything to say to him.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But you do! So have fun!
(The King...)
(You finally managed to beat him last time, but you still have so many questions...)
(Why is he freezing Vaugarde in time? Does his power have anything to do with the time loops you're stuck in?)
(If you ask him something... Will he answer...?)
[Urgh, fine.]
[You can now "Ask" the King questions by going into your Craft menu!]
[The things I let you do, stardust, I swear.]
(You still have questions for the King.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (Ask the King...)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oh...... My goal...?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: . . . . . .

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Sif... Does it matter?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (But they might!)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin...?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oooh, oooooooh...!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Can't you guess......? Can't you tell?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oh, stars...... I thought my intentions were clear...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: We don't know! We don't understand you!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Why would you want to make an entire country suffer And expect everyone to be okay with it!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: There must be a reason!!! Why would you freeze Vaugarde in time!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And only Vaugarde, for that matter?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: That's true... No other country has been attacked.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: With a power like yours, you could freeze more than just Vaugarde.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But you stopped at the borders. Other countries are safe. Why?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oooh, ooooooh......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Because...... Vaugarde......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Is perfect.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Perfect...?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Such welcoming, creative people.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Always willing to welcome travelers in, even travelers with no name, no home to speak of......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Such...... Precious memories......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It is perfect. I do not want it to change. I want it to stay exactly how it is.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So it cannot ever be destroyed.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: That's so...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: What backwards thinking.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I don't know what about Vaugarde made it perfect for you, but you cannot stop us from living!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oh, oooooh...... "Doing this"......?
(Stars, you don't want to explain it in front of everyone...)
(But the King... He could be the one trapping you in time!)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: "The one imprisoning me here."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (...) "The one imprisoning me here."

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Huh?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Imprisoning you...?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ......     Whatever is happening to you, I am not the one responsible, bright one.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But...... That scent around you, could it be......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It does not matter.
(He doesn't seem to know what you're talking about.)
(So the King isn't the one responsible for the loops?)
(...Isn't that weird?)
(You're looping through time, he's freezing it...)
(Aren't you using the same power?)
(Power over time?)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ......     Ha.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Pst, Sif, could've told you that one if you asked.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's Time Craft, buddy.
(...You don't know what that is.)
(Time Craft, you've heard this before...)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Time Craft... The ability to craft time itself.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But Time Craft is supposed to be impossible to control...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: How can you use it, yet alone do it as such a grand scale?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Ha...... If the bright one isn't bright enough to know of Time Craft......

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: King
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: They will not be bright enough to understand how.
(Ouch.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Don't be mean to Frin!!! Shut up!!!
(Time Craft...)
(That's something to look into, isn't it?)
(Either way... It doesn't seem like he's the one trapping you here.)
(...Since you're here, it might be worth it to beat the King now, so you can go talk to the Head Housemaiden...)
(She said something before. About how you're looping. About something being broken.)
(She knew something!)
(After that, you have to find more information about Time Craft somewhere.)
(And you can always go back and fight the King if you have anything else to talk about.)
(...You have to find more information about Time Craft somewhere.)
(And you can always go back and fight the King if you have anything else to talk about.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Welcome to the library!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Well. Our selection is kind of lacking. All the good books are in the House.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: But the House is. Well. Closed until further notice. Since the King. Took residence there. And froze. Everyone in time.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...Are you looking for a book in particular?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (Are you?) "Anything about Time Craft?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Time Craft? Like, um, specifically?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I'm not sure... You should look through books about Craft. We have one here, but it might not talk about Time Craft much...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I wonder... Where could you find Craftonomy books...
("Craftonomy?")
(You make sure to look confused.)
(The librarian notices your confusion.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oh, the study of Craft in general is called "Craftonomy".

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I don't think the libraries here or in the House carry any... Maybe you should look elsewhere?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...Also, why am I thinking about candles right now? Must be nothing.
(Someplace other than the libraries... Maybe someone's dorm room in the House?)
(A craftonomy book.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Oooh, is this a craftology book?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Piercing Craft, Creative Craft... Where's the Protecting Craft chapt--

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's a craftONOMY book, not a craftOLOGY book.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: This one is about the study of Craft, not your fortune.
(A book about the study of Craft?)
(Could it have any information about Time Craft, maybe...?)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (...) "Does that craftonomy book have anything on Time Craft?"

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: (You know this already.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Time Craft? What for?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Hm...  It is related to our situation, isn't it?  With the King?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: We don't have ti--

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: What's Time Craft? I dunno what that is.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...Should we have a crash course on Time Craft, then?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Urgh, fine.
(Odile flips through the book.)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...It does have a section on Time Craft.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Alright. So, Time Craft is, as the name implies, the power to wield and craft time itself.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It's a type of craft that's been hypothesized to exist for decades, but its existence has never been proven.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Until now, right?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Stopping time... That's what the King does, right?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So the King is using Time Craft?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: The King most likely is, yes. Which would make it the first time in history someone managed to harvest that power.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Outside of stories told in familytales, that is.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I've heard scholars outside of Vaugarde are really excited right now! Time Craft, confirmed to be real!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: ...So they're happy because he froze people in time?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: W-well, it's more complicated than that!!!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Morals aside, it does change everything we knew about Time Craft.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Think about how Time Craft could be used. The King is only stopping people's time... But it could be used for many other things.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It could be used to hasten or slow people's time, too. Maybe make people's bodies younger or older. Maybe make buds grow into trees in an instant.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Worst case scenario, it could be used to change history itself! Crafting time to go back in time, and change history!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Woah!
(Woah.)
("Worst case scenario".)

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: The possibilities are endless... And terrifying.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Definitely not the kind of power you want in someone's hands!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And definitely not someone like the King.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And, correct me if I'm wrong... But crafting time wouldn't be like crafting clay to a specific shape, or crafting a sword.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Those are easy enough to do and won't tire you out, but crafting time? Something as basic and essential as time?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Wouldn't it ask for immense amounts of power?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Exactly. Crafting clay barely asks for any power from the user... But crafting time...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: It was theorized that crafting time, even to pause time for a single second... Would probably kill the user immediately.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: KILL THEM DEAD?!?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Kill them dead.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: And yet, the King is still alive...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: So it raises the question...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: What gave him enough power to use Time Craft without dying? And how did he learn how to use it?

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Good questions, Isabeau. You have pretty smart insights sometimes.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I sure do!

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: Time Craft is what the King uses and it's dangerous. Got it.

acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act3-4/kingquest.html.dialogue: I suppose talking about this was useful. I'm surprised you're curious about this, though... Siffrin.
(You shrug.)
(Time Craft, a type of Craft that allows the user to control time...)
(Isn't that what you and the King have been using?)
(But neither of you should be able to use it... Using it would ask for immense amounts of power.)
(So then... What gave you this power?)
(...Maybe you should ask the King about this.)
(And... You still need to go talk to the Head Housemaiden.)
(She seemed aware that you were looping in time... Maybe she knows why you're able to use Time Craft?)
(You need to talk to her.)
(But what if it isn't enough? What if he doesn't want to tell you anything about Time Craft?)
(You've talked to the King, and the Head Housemaiden... Are those really the only two people that would know anything about the loops you're stuck in?)
(Who else could you talk to about the loops? To theorize?)
(Oh, wait.)
(There is ONE person.)
(You close the bathroom stall door.)
(You clench and unclench your fists, not knowing what to do with yourself.)
(You try not to breathe too loudly.)
(Sometimes you feel so  much  anger.)
(Why do they not remember? Why are you the only one living like this?)
(You're the only one living and knowing and experiencing the same moments over and over again.)
(Why is it just you? Why shouldn't everyone feel this pain?!?)
(Why should you be the only one stuck here when you've done nothing wrong?!?)
(Is this some kind of curse?)
(You always felt awful about not remembering, and now you have to live your life, knowing you're the only one who remembers this time?)
(Remembering every single moment, every single sentence, every single battle, wound, death, everyone unaware?!?)
(You grab fistfuls of your hair and tug!!! )
(It's not fair!!! It's not fair, not fair, not fair, it's not!!! Fair!!!)
(You want it all to be over!!! This loop, this life!!!)
(You're caught between a sequence of life and death and life again, going through the motions until the next time the loop restarts!!!)
(It's torture!!! Every second of it!!!)
(And everyone is acting like nothing's wrong!!!)
(Why do they get to ignore it?! Get to keep acting, like actors in a play they don't know the ending to?!?)
(You hate them all!!!)
(Your [allies/family members], the whole country, the whole world should know this pain!!!!!!)
(THE WHOLE WORLD SHOULD SUFFER AS YOU HAVE SUFFERED!!!!!!)
(Sometimes   you understand the King more than you'd like to.)
