acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "Unless I die first, or touch a Tear."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Yes... Maybe the loop considers getting frozen in time by those Tears a sort of death?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But why aren't you looping back when you get frozen in battle...?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Huh? Isn't it because...) "I thought the Tears worked differently than an actual time freeze skill."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Is that so? ...Well, you're the one getting frozen, so you'd know...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: So, you loop if something keeps you from advancing in some way...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I wonder if other things would count as "keeping you from advancing".

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "Like what?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Like...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: What if we cut off your legs, would you immediately loop back? You can't "advance" if you have no legs, right?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Um...) "I'd rather not test that one."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Awww. But understandable.
(But it is interesting, though.)
(What makes the loop actually loop?)
(You feel like... You can remember a few times when time looped back on its own, even if it was just a few minutes...)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Maybe... Does the loop consider talking to the Head Housemaiden... Something that keeps you from advancing, somehow?
(Maybe, but...)
(What would "advancing" even mean, then?)
(Towards what goal?)
(Is there something that happens when you talk to the Head Housemaiden that makes a certain goal impossible to accomplish?)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: As you've found out, all of this might be the work of Time Craft, a power that should be impossible to use...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you and the King are somehow able to manipulate it.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (But...) "Am I manipulating Time Craft if I can't control it?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you can, can't you?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You can more or less control where you come back. Except when you talk to the Head Housemaiden, it seems, which brings you back to the start.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But just being able to loop back in time and avoid death might count as you being able to use Time Craft.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (But if Time Craft is supposed to be too dangerous to even use...) "How did I get that power?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And how can you break the loop for good?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Yes, those are the big questions, aren't they?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...   I do wonder about the limitations of your powers, still.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: What makes you actually loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Somehow, I feel like finding out more about that would be useful...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Stardust, we've been talking for a while, so maybe not right now, but...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: When you have some time, will you hang out with me for a bit?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Hang out?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I have... A theory I'd like to test. And...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And we haven't spent any time together, stardust!!! I'm lonely!!! I want to have a long conversation with someone, anyone!!! I wanna hang ouuuuuut!!!
(Urgh.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Again, it doesn't have to be right now.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Our little hang out time might last a while. Maybe even longer than the rest of the day.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'm sure you have plans for this loop, so I can wait until you have time!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Okay?
(A theory Loop would like to test about the loops...?)
(It might be useful.)
(You should talk to Loop and hang out with them when you have time, then.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Yay!!! I'll be waiting, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hey, stardust. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Our theory hangout! Yes!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But we can't actually hang out right now. It'd be pretty useless.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: So how about you come back here early tomorrow, after you're done acting things out at the Clocktower?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Wait...) "You want me to sneak out?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And spend a loop with me, yes!
(You always go to the House, after the Clocktower.)
(If you're not here, what will everyone do?  What will everyone think--)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Does it matter what they think?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: They'll forget it all in your next loop, after all!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...So you won't do it?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You won't come and hang out with little old me?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Neat!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Will you come, then?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Neat!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...I'll see you soon, then?
(You nod.)
(You don't want everyone to go to the House without you.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...So you won't come, huh...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'd really like you to spend a loop with me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: It doesn't matter if it's right now, or in a dozen, a hundred loops...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You'll have to spend time with me eventually! Just let me know when you want to!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...It's important.
(You glare at Loop.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Will you come and hang out with me now?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (It'll mean leaving everyone behind, but...)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Neat!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Don't worry, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...I'll see you soon, then?
(You nod.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Ouuugh, rejected again!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: How dare you play with my feelings like this, stardust!!!
(You spend the rest of the night with everyone...)
(Early in the morning, while everyone is still asleep, you quietly slip away and head to the Favor Tree...)
(...But you can't see Loop anywhere.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Up there, stardust, up there!!!
("Up there"...?)
(Did Loop go back to their home or something?)
(You look up.)
(Loop is waving at you from the top of the tree.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'm here, I'm here~!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Come and join me, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Oh, come on.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Just climb the tree! I know you can do it!
(You sigh and climb the tree.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Aaaah...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Isn't it pretty, stardust? We're so high up!
(You are.)
(You can see the House from there.)
(Everyone will be inside the House soon...)
(You try  not to think about it.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Thank you for coming to today's Loop hangout!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: If you hang out with me, it'll take some time, and...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Well. You know how this goes.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "I sure do."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hm.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I, um. I haven't actually prepared anything to talk about.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Soooooo...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Tell me about yourself, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Really?) "I'd rather not."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Huuuuuuuuh? Why noooooooot?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "Don't you already know me?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hm?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "It just feels like it."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "You know too much about me."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "You knew my name, you know how I think..."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "You knew me before we even met, didn't you?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Kind of.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Kind of?) "Do I know you?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Oh! No, you don't know me, teehee.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Don't worry, your memory isn't failing you, this time!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: When we met under the Favor Tree, that was... That was the very first time we've ever seen each other.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Is that so?) "So then..."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "Is that why you're helping me?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "Because you know me?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Not really.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: When I decided to help you...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You were not a factor in the slightest.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...You are now, I suppose.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But, does that mean you actually believe me? When I say I'm here to help?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You don't think I'm lying, and I'm actually the one trapping you here, or whatever?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You really believe that I'm here to help you...?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You always surprise me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...I know I wouldn't believe myself, if I was in your place.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Maybe time has made me more jaded than you are...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hahahahahaha!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Yes, that's it! I knew it! You don't believe me at all!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hahaha... I don't mind, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I wouldn't believe myself either, if I was in your place.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But it's fine.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Whether you believe me or not, I'm here to help you.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: So you can escape this loop.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "So you believe it's possible?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "For me to escape?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Of course.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Why would I be here, otherwise?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'm trapped here with you, after all.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I want to escape just as much as you do.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I know how it feels, you know.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: To be stuck somewhere... With no hope of escape...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Forced to relive the exact same events over and over...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Taking any deviation as a sign that things are finally going to change. That everything will be okay.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And finding yourself trapped, still.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hahaha... Look at me, talking and talking!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Don't pay attention to me. I'm doing fine.
(Loop laughs sadly, and looks at the House in the distance.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (. . .) "...Tell me about yourself, Loop."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'd rather not, teehee!
(Loop winks and blows you a kiss.)
(Despite yourself, you laugh.)
(You hear Loop laugh softly, as well.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Hahaha...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Say, stardust, that reminds me...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Are you at level 80 already? That is SUCH a high level! Do you like fighting that much?!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Have you really looked at more than a hundred barrels?! Do you think barrels look that appealing to the eye? Do you have a crush on barrels?!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Have you really gone fishing more than fifteen times? Don't you have anything better to do?!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Did you really ask for the Change God's blessing more than ten times? You know it's not your belief, right? Teehee!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Did you really slip on that banana more than ten times?! Why is a banana peel even here, anyway?! It's a blinding tropical fruit!!!

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I can't believe your first death was being crushed by the very first trap!!! How embarrassing!!!
(You and Loop animatedly talk about the different things you've done during your loops...)
(It's nice. To be able to talk about them with someone.)
(You talk and talk until the sun has risen high above you in the sky...)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Ah.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: It'll happen soon, now.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (?) "What will?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: The theory-crafting part of our hangout session, of course.
(You open your mouth to ask, and then...)
(You heard a horrible sound.)
(Your head...)
(You saw... Something.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'm glad you decided to spend some time with me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Sorry it's going to end with this.
(What...?)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I thought maybe it wouldn't happen, but...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: See that light, in the distance?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: It's from the King's floor.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I see it every time you get far enough to fight him.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: His first attack.
(The King's... First attack?)
(How long have you been talking to Loop?)
(Who was the King attacking?)
(Who was he...)
(...)
(The King doesn't attack, or do anything, until you get to him.)
(He would only attack if... If someone...)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I can feel it, every time.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Whatever he does, it makes you see something, doesn't it?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Something awful.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Something so terrible that it's enough to bring anyone close enough to their knees.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Stars, I wonder who he attacked.
(. . .)
(You can't even hear Loop speak.)
(Your friends)
(They were against the King just now)
(You know how to survive his first attack, you found out, but)
(but)
(but)
(You hear someone cry out.)
(You look at Loop--)
(Loop is just. Looking at you.)
(Not saying anything.)

(There's no pity in their gaze)
<!--no full stop sic-->
(No sadness)
(Just some slight impatience, like...)
("Did you figure it out yet?")
("Did you figure out what made the King attack just now?")
("There's only one answer, stardust.")
("Just figure it out already, so we can move on.")
("Who was the King fighting?")
("Who did the King just kill?")
("Did you figure it out yet?")

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Did you?
(You start screaming.)
(IT'S BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE!!!!!!)
(THEY DIED, BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE!!!)
(THEY'RE GONE, BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T!!! THERE!!!!!!)
(YOU CLUTCH YOUR HEAD, YOUR HAIR, YOUR STOMACH)
(BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE)
(BECAUSE OF YOU, THEY'RE GONE)
(THEY'RE GONE)

(BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF Y
(You stumble, and fall to your knees.)
(You breathe, harshly, in, and out.)
(It's not working.)
(You can't  take  a full  breath)
(You can't)
(You hit the ground with your fist.)
(Loop does not answer.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "DID YOU KNOW THIS WOULD HAPPEN?!?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Which part? You looping back, or your party dying?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I had a suspicion about the former.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I was certain about the latter.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "YOU--"
(Loop is looking straight at you.)
(They don't even seem to care that you drew out your dagger.)
(Somehow, this calms you down.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: If I tell you to breathe, will you?
(You)
(You breathe slowly, in, and out.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (...) "What was that for."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: For funsies, of course!
(You take a step forward--)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And because I was curious to know how the loops work.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Aren't you?
(How the loops work?)
(How could what just happened teach you anything about the loops?!)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Think, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Why did you loop back just now?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Because the King won, isn't it?"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Why would the King winning make you loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You don't immediately loop back the second you and your party lose, don't you?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: (Don't you?) "I kind of do, though."

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: No, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You loop when you die.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "I-- No, it takes a little bit--"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You loop when you die, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: The fact that the King "wins" is irrelevant.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you didn't die just now, did you?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: So why did you loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: "But--"

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: It's the same with the Head Housemaiden. You don't die when you talk to her, so what makes you loop?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You loop when the Head Housemaiden talks to you, and you looped just now.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And when... When the Kid died, you looped back, too. Even though they're the one who died, not you.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Why?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: Don't you think this would be important to figure out?
(Loop's right...)
(There have been other times you looped back without dying, too.)
(But... What could be the reason...?)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I wasn't lying when I said I wanted to spend time with you.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: We never got the opportunity to really talk, after all.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But...   Yes. I figured this would happen.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I won't say sorry, so you can stop waiting for it!!!
(You don't answer.)

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Well, it looks like that's all you can find out about the loops for now.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you can still help your party...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you can still find out more about the King, can't you?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: But you can still help your party...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: And you still have questions to ask the King, don't you?

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: I'll be ready to help you out next loop... But for now, I think we both need some time.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...I think you can find out more about the loops, if you search for it.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: There might be some places you can go to, now that you can read those books in your language again...

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: You should do that. I think we both need some time, before we can talk more.

acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loophangout.html.dialogue: ...Come back next loop, stardust!
(You just walk away.)
(You don't want to talk to Loop right now.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (You're back.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: --frin!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Siffrin?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Good morning!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like... ...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin, what's wrong?
(You can't breathe.)
(You won, didn't you? Why are you back? WHY ARE YOU BACK?!)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin, answer me, what's wrong?
(Your hands are shaking)
(Your stomach is killing you)
(The whole Universe is closing in on you)
(You're back to the start)
(You're back here)

(You're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here your journey was over a nd you're  back  here)
(Your journey was over, wasn't it!!!! You won, didn't you!!! You all survived, right!!!! And yet!!!! AND YET, YOU'RE--!!!!!!)
(YOU TRY BREATHING IN BUT YOU CAN'T BREATHE- YOU CAN'T BREATHE--)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (AH!)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Mira...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin, finally you answered! What's wrong, what happened?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You weren't answering me...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And you're so pale...!
(Slowly,  gently,  she touches your cheek.)
(You still flinch.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ah, s-sorry!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm sorry... ...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Did you...  have a nightmare?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yes, that's exactly it.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh no... It must've been a horrible nightmare...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you're awake now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Do you want to talk about it?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I... I was crying...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Crying...? Why?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...because...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I was making onion quiche.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Um, why would making onion quiche make you--

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I was cutting a lot of onions!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN, YOU CRAB!!! I CAN'T BELIEVE I WAS WORRIED!!!
(You laugh in a very convincing way.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hmf! I'm glad at least your nightmare wasn't that bad, but... Hmf!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hmf!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Okay, well...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'll be waiting in the village, alright? Come talk to me later!!!
(With Mirabelle gone, your smile drops.)
(You're  back.)
(Why are you back...? You beat the King, didn't you? Did something go wrong?)
(It was the end of your journey, and yet you...)
(The Head Housemaiden... She said something about the world being rotten?)
(You should go see Loop.)
(They're the only one you can talk to... They might... know what's going on...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Siffrin... You're up...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm, uh, I'm sorry I woke you up earlier. I know you joked about it, but are you feeling better now? I'm worried...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Well, this is new...) "Yes, don't worry about me!"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ah... Okay, but...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (You really have to talk to Loop right now...) "I have things to do, I'll talk to you later!"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Huh?! Um, Siffrin, please wait!!!
(What now.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Well, I know you're busy, but...
("But help me tell everyone about the sleepover"?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Can you come talk to me later? So we can talk? I'll wait in front of the library...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Please.
(Oh.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Okay! Go do your thing, and then come back, okay? I'll be waiting!
(You nod again.)
(Habit takes over, and you tell her about the CARROT method.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: W-Wait, how did you know about--
(...And wink.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: O-Okay...
(Mirabelle learned the Craft Skill "Adorable Moving Shield" again.)
(You can't...)
(You can't talk to anyone right now.)
(You have to see... You have to ask Loop... What they think...)
(You ran here to talk to Loop, to try to figure out what to do, but...)
(You can't look at them right now.)
(You can't.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (...) "...I beat the King."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You did?!? Oh, stars above, I'm so proud of you!!! You did it!!! You succeeded!!! You--

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "And yet I'm still here."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Yes.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Indeed you are.
(...They don't seem surprised.)
(They don't seem surprised at all, do they?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Did you know this would happen?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I had a feeling, yes.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But it felt cruel to tell you, so I didn't.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You looked so...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So happy and innocent and stupid!!! I just didn't have the heart to tell you!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I just didn't have the heart to tell you.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I knew from the start that the loops wouldn't end after defeating the King.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Why not...?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I don't know why it didn't end with beating the King.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I just knew it wouldn't.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "I never thought about the reason why I got this power."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "I just thought... It was to beat the King."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "That the Change God, someone, anyone, gave me this power to beat him."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "But if beating him made me loop back anyway..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "I don't know what to do now."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So will you give up, then?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You're stuck in this loop, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Beating the King brought you back here. You don't know why. You don't even know how you even got this power.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You don't know if there's even a way to escape.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So... Because there's no clear way to escape...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Will you give up?
(Give up...?)
(No. You're fine, aren't you?)
(Right now, you're alive. Right now, you can think. Right now, your allies are still here. Right now, you're not alone.)
(There's no reason to give up now, just because you're trapped.)
(If you're trapped, find a door, and open it.)
(And, you still have some doors to open, don't you?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden seemed to know something was wrong, didn't she?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ah... I guess she did.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: She said something about... Something being broken? Failing?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Did she mean the loops?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: The loops, breaking?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...That's possible.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Maybe the loops WERE supposed to stop after beating the King, but something went wrong somehow.
(And that's something you can find out.)
(You just need to talk to her again. Find out what she knows.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "And the King..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: The King?! What about him?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Something about his powers..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "He can freeze people's time. And I can rewind time."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Yes, that's...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Both powers ARE related to time, aren't they?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I don't think I've ever heard about anyone who could control time before...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Isn't that something to find out more about?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I suppose so?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Maybe I just need to ask him."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ask the King?!?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Well, um, sure, I suppose that might work?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Talking to the King himself... I do wonder what he'd have to say.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's worth trying!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...And, stardust...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I know you're not interested in talking to your party about the loops. If so...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You'll have to make sure to act so they don't find out anything is wrong.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And you already failed this loop by making your Housemaiden worried about you, teehee!
(It's true. With the way you woke up, she's probably worried about you, even now...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: She said she wanted to talk to you, didn't she? You should talk to her this loop, see what that's all about.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Add this to your brain list of things to do.
(There's quite a few things on it already.)
(Find out more about the King and his powers, to see if they're related to yours.)
(Talk to the Head Housemaiden, to see if she knows more about the loops.)
(Talk to Mirabelle this loop, see what's wrong. Might as well talk to everyone else after, too.)
(But see?)
(As long as you have paths you can follow... Questions to answer...Goals to strive for...)
(You'll be fine.)
(You're fine.)
(Why is Loop helping you?)
(They appeared after you looped for the first time... And said they were here to help.)
(And they knew about the loops. Knew this whole time beating the King wouldn't help.)
(And they picked that name, didn't they? "Loop"?)
(Aren't they... Related to the loops, too?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Loop..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hm~?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Stardust...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yes.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: If you can believe anything, believe that.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I asked to be here, so I could help you.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Why?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Aren't you stuck here too, just because you're helping me?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I reiterate, stardust: I asked to be here.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me. Being here is surprisingly restful!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm here to help you any way I can, and I mean it!!!
(If they're offering their help...)
(It'd be stupid not to take it, isn't it?)
(You don't really need to know, do you?)
(You don't want to start doubting them.)
(Loop said they're here to help you. That's all you need to know.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "To answer your question, though..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hm?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "No, Loop."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "It's too early to give up."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I'm very glad to hear that, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Please don't give up, stardust!!! If the loops started, they can end!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's just basic logic. I can guarantee that you won't be stuck here forever.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's a Loop Guarantee!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And as always, you can count on me to help you!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: If you need a refresher, or help figuring out where to go, I'll be here!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm here to help, stardust!!!
(You smile.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: GROSS!!!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's my pleasure, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Teehee, well...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop, stardust?
(But what if it isn't enough? What if he doesn't want to tell you anything about Time Craft?)
(You've talked to the King, and the Head Housemaiden... Are those really the only two people that would know anything about the loops you're stuck in?)
(Who else could you talk to about the loops? To theorize?)
(Oh, wait.)
(There is ONE person.)
(The Head Housemaiden said the exact same thing.)
(Time looped again.)
(You're back here.)
(She... She really repeated the exact same thing, huh?)
(Usually, when you react differently, everyone reacts differently as well, but she...)
(It was like you weren't here.)
(What now?)
(You've now talked to the King and the Head Housemaiden... Are those really the only two people that would know a ing about the loops you're stuck in?)
(Who else could you talk to about the loops? To theorize?)
(Oh, wait.)
(There is ONE person.)
(You needed to go and talk to them anyway, so...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "So."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Sooooooo?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Got any theories about the loops I'm trapped in?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why would I?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Your name is LITERALLY 'Loop'."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh, stars above, it is! Teehee!
(URGH.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But just because I call myself "Loop" doesn't mean I know anything! I'm just bad at names!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But I'll see what I can do. What's your question?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Do you know anything that could help?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Such a broad question, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: As I've told you before... I know as much as you do, right now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "How can that be?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: What do you mean?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Aren't you here to help me?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Why don't you know more about the loops you're supposed to help me with...?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Tee--

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Don't you 'Teehee' me."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Awwwwwwwww.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I still don't have a good answer for you, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Isn't it already nice that you have me to talk to about those loops?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You could be alone, stuck with only your tiny brain for company, with no one to talk to!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Okay, okay, okay...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Well...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why don't we summarize what we know about those loops? We might find something out!
(You sigh, and nod.)
(Nothing better to do, you suppose.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Soooooo...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You're currently stuck in a time loop, for some unknown reason.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: The loop starts when you wake up in Dormont, and seems to end when you talk to the Head Housemaiden...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Unless I die first, or touch a Tear."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yes... Maybe the loop considers getting frozen in time by those Tears a sort of death?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But why aren't you looping back when you get frozen in battle...?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Huh? Isn't it because...) "I thought the Tears worked differently than an actual time freeze skill."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Is that so? ...Well, you're the one getting frozen, so you'd know...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So, you loop if something keeps you from advancing in some way...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I wonder if other things would count as "keeping you from advancing".

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Like what?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Like...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: What if we cut off your legs, would you immediately loop back? You can't "advance" if you have no legs, right?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Um...) "I'd rather not test that one."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Awww. But understandable.
(But it is interesting, though.)
(What makes the loop actually loop?)
(You feel like... You can remember a few times when time looped back on its own, even if it was just a few minutes...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Maybe... Does the loop consider talking to the Head Housemaiden... Something that keeps you from advancing, somehow?
(Maybe, but...)
(What would "advancing" even mean, then?)
(Towards what goal?)
(Is there something that happens when you talk to the Head Housemaiden that makes a certain goal impossible to accomplish?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: As you've found out, all of this might be the work of Time Craft, a power that should be impossible to use...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you and the King are somehow able to manipulate it.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (But...) "Am I manipulating Time Craft if I can't control it?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you can, can't you?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You can more or less control where you come back. Except when you talk to the Head Housemaiden, it seems, which brings you back to the start.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But just being able to loop back in time and avoid death might count as you being able to use Time Craft.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (But if Time Craft is supposed to be too dangerous to even use...) "How did I get that power?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And how can you break the loop for good?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yes, those are the big questions, aren't they?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ... I do wonder about the limitations of your powers, still.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: What makes you actually loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Somehow, I feel like finding out more about that would be useful...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Stardust, we've been talking for a while, so maybe not right now, but...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: When you have some time, will you hang out with me for a bit?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Hang out?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I have... A theory I'd like to test. And...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And we haven't spent any time together, stardust!!! I'm lonely!!! I want to have a long conversation with someone, anyone!!! I wanna hang ouuuuuut!!!
(Urgh.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Again, it doesn't have to be right now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Our little hang out time might last a while. Maybe even longer than the rest of the day.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm sure you have plans for this loop, so I can wait until you have time!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Okay?
(A theory Loop would like to test about the loops...?)
(It might be useful.)
(You should talk to Loop and hang out with them when you have time, then.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yay!!! I'll be waiting, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hey, stardust. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Our theory hangout! Yes!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But we can't actually hang out right now. It'd be pretty useless.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So how about you come back here early tomorrow, after you're done acting things out at the Clocktower?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Wait...) "You want me to sneak out?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And spend a loop with me, yes!
(You always go to the House, after the Clocktower.)
(If you're not here, what will everyone do? What will everyone think--)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Does it matter what they think?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: They'll forget it all in your next loop, after all!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...So you won't do it?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You won't come and hang out with little old me?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Neat!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Will you come, then?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Neat!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I'll see you soon, then?
(You nod.)
(You don't want everyone to go to the House without you.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...So you won't come, huh...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'd really like you to spend a loop with me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It doesn't matter if it's right now, or in a dozen, a hundred loops...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You'll have to spend time with me eventually! Just let me know when you want to!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...It's important.
(You glare at Loop.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Will you come and hang out with me now?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (It'll mean leaving everyone behind, but...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Neat!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Don't worry, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I'll see you soon, then?
(You nod.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ouuugh, rejected again!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: How dare you play with my feelings like this, stardust!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: See you later, stardust.
(They gently wave you goodbye.)
(You give them a nod, and walk away.)
(You spend the rest of the night with everyone...)
(Early in the morning, while everyone is still asleep, you quietly slip away and head to the Favor Tree...)
(...But you can't see Loop anywhere.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Up there, stardust, up there!!!
("Up there"...?)
(Did Loop go back to their home or something?)
(You look up.)
(Loop is waving at you from the top of the tree.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm here, I'm here~!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Come and join me, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh, come on.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Just climb the tree! I know you can do it!
(You sigh and climb the tree.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Aaaah...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Isn't it pretty, stardust? We're so high up!
(You are.)
(You can see the House from there.)
(Everyone will be inside the House soon...)
(You try  not to think about it.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Thank you for coming to today's Loop hangout!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: If you hang out with me, it'll take some time, and...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Well. You know how this goes.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "I sure do."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hm.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I, um. I haven't actually prepared anything to talk about.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Soooooo...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Tell me about yourself, stardust!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Really?) "I'd rather not."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Huuuuuuuuh? Why noooooooot?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Don't you already know me?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hm?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "It just feels like it."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "You know too much about me."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "You knew my name, you know how I think..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "You knew me before we even met, didn't you?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Kind of.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Kind of?) "Do I know you?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh! No, you don't know me, teehee.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Don't worry, your memory isn't failing you, this time!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: When we met under the Favor Tree, that was... That was the very first time we've ever seen each other.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Is that so?) "So then..."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Is that why you're helping me?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "Because you know me?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Not really.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: When I decided to help you...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You were not a factor in the slightest.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...You are now, I suppose.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But, does that mean you actually believe me? When I say I'm here to help?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You don't think I'm lying, and I'm actually the one trapping you here, or whatever?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You really believe that I'm here to help you...?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You always surprise me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I know I wouldn't believe myself, if I was in your place.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Maybe time has made me more jaded than you are...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hahahahahaha!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Yes, that's it! I knew it! You don't believe me at all!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hahaha... I don't mind, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I wouldn't believe myself either, if I was in your place.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But it's fine.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Whether you believe me or not, I'm here to help you.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So you can escape this loop.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "So you believe it's possible?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "For me to escape?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Of course.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why would I be here, otherwise?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm trapped here with you, after all.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I want to escape just as much as you do.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I know how it feels, you know.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: To be stuck somewhere... With no hope of escape...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Forced to relive the exact same events over and over...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Taking any deviation as a sign that things are finally going to change. That everything will be okay.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And finding yourself trapped, still.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hahaha... Look at me, talking and talking!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Don't pay attention to me. I'm doing fine.
(Loop laughs sadly, and looks at the House in the distance.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (. . .) "...Tell me about yourself, Loop."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'd rather not, teehee!
(Loop winks and blows you a kiss.)
(Despite yourself, you laugh.)
(You hear Loop laugh softly, as well.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Hahaha...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Say, stardust, that reminds me...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Are you at level 80 already? That is SUCH a high level! Do you like fighting that much?!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Have you really looked at more than a hundred barrels?! Do you think barrels look that appealing to the eye? Do you have a crush on barrels?!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Have you really gone fishing more than fifteen times? Don't you have anything better to do?!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Did you really ask for the Change God's blessing more than ten times? You know it's not your belief, right? Teehee!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Did you really slip on that banana more than ten times?! Why is a banana peel even here, anyway?! It's a blinding tropical fruit!!!

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I can't believe your first death was being crushed by the very first trap!!! How embarrassing!!!
(You and Loop animatedly talk about the different things you've done during your loops...)
(It's nice. To be able to talk about them with someone.)
(You talk and talk until the sun has risen high above you in the sky...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Ah.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It'll happen soon, now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (?) "What will?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: The theory-crafting part of our hangout session, of course.
(You open your mouth to ask, and then...)
(You heard a horrible sound.)
(Your head...)
(You saw... Something.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'm glad you decided to spend some time with me, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Sorry it's going to end with this.
(What...?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I thought maybe it wouldn't happen, but...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: See that light, in the distance?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's from the King's floor.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I see it every time you get far enough to fight him.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: His first attack.
(The King's... First attack?)
(How long have you been talking to Loop?)
(Who was the King attacking?)
(Who was he...)
(...)
(The King doesn't attack, or do anything, until you get to him.)
(He would only attack if... If someone...)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I can feel it, every time.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Whatever he does, it makes you see something, doesn't it?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Something awful.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Something so terrible that it's enough to bring anyone close enough to their knees.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Stars, I wonder who he attacked.
(. . .)
(You can't even hear Loop speak.)
(Your friends)
(They were against the King just now)
(You know how to survive his first attack, you found out, but)
(but)
(but)
(You hear someone cry out.)
(You look at Loop--)
(Loop is just. Looking at you.)
(Not saying anything.)
(There's no pity in their gaze)
(No sadness)
(Just some slight impatience, like...)
("Did you figure it out yet?")
("Did you figure out what made the King attack just now?")
("There's only one answer, stardust.")
("Just figure it out already, so we can move on.")
("Who was the King fighting?")
("Who did the King just kill?")
("Did you figure it out yet?")

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Did you?
(You start screaming.)
(IT'S BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE!!!!!!)
(THEY DIED, BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE!!!)
(THEY'RE GONE, BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T!!! THERE!!!!!!)
(YOU CLUTCH YOUR HEAD, YOUR HAIR, YOUR STOMACH)
(BECAUSE YOU WEREN'T THERE)
(BECAUSE OF YOU, THEY'RE GONE)
(THEY'RE GONE)

(BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF YOU BECAUSE OF Y
(You stumble, and fall to your knees.)
(You breathe, harshly, in, and out.)
(It's not working.)
(You can't  take  a full  breath)
(You can't)
(You hit the ground with your fist.)
(Loop does not answer.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "DID YOU KNOW THIS WOULD HAPPEN?!?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Which part? You looping back, or your party dying?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I had a suspicion about the former.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I was certain about the latter.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "YOU--"
(Loop is looking straight at you.)
(They don't even seem to care that you drew out your dagger.)
(Somehow, this calms you down.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: If I tell you to breathe, will you?
(You)
(You breathe slowly, in, and out.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (...) "What was that for."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: For funsies, of course!
(You take a step forward--)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And because I was curious to know how the loops work.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Aren't you?
(How the loops work?)
(How could what just happened teach you anything about the loops?!)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Think, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why did you loop back just now?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Because the King won, isn't it?"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why would the King winning make you loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You don't immediately loop back the second you and your party lose, don't you?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: (Don't you?) "I kind of do, though."

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: No, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You loop when you die.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "I-- No, it takes a little bit--"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You loop when you die, stardust.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: The fact that the King "wins" is irrelevant.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you didn't die just now, did you?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: So why did you loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: "But--"

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: It's the same with the Head Housemaiden. You don't die when you talk to her, so what makes you loop?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You loop when the Head Housemaiden talks to you, and you looped just now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And when... When the Kid died, you looped back, too. Even though they're the one who died, not you.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Why?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: Don't you think this would be important to figure out?
(Loop's right...)
(There have been other times you looped back without dying, too.)
(But... What could be the reason...?)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I wasn't lying when I said I wanted to spend time with you.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: We never got the opportunity to really talk, after all.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But... Yes. I figured this would happen.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I won't say sorry, so you can stop waiting for it!!!
(You don't answer.)

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...Well, it looks like that's all you can find out about the loops for now.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you can still help your party...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: And you still have questions to ask the King, don't you?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: But you can still find out more about the King, can't you?

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: I'll be ready to help you out next loop... But for now, I think we both need some time.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: ...I think you can find out more about the loops, if you search for it.

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: There might be some places you can go to, now that you can read those books in your language again...

acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act3-4/loopquest.html.dialogue: You should do that. I think we both need some time, before we can talk more.
