acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And I thought it was the same for you.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I thought, "It's okay, they don't mean it, it's how they are. They tease me, but they're never mean. And Siffrin never really hurts me."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Thinking I should be alone... Telling me I should be alone...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Who do you think you are, to say this to me? Acting like-- Like you know better than me!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Always soooo mysterious, Siffrin, always talking as if you're better than me! As if you know me!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But you don't, Siffrin!!! You're just as lost and useless as I am!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: So stop!!! Talking!!! As if you know me!!!!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You've hurt me, Siffrin. And I was wrong.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: For you to say something like that to me, and think it was okay...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You're awful. You're not my friend, not my ally, not anything.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't want to see you until tonight.
(No, no, that's not what's important here, is it?)
(She'll get over it one way or loop or another, but you didn't get her shield skill.)
(But maybe it doesn't matter that much.)
(You can just bring her back to that book about shields in the secret library, before you go and fight the King.)
(You don't really need her special skill, after all. The usual shield skill will do just fine.)
(It WOULD be nice to get everyone else's special skill, though...)
(You need to talk with Mirabelle, first.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "...Have you heard of something called a familytale?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: ... I may have. What about them?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I've heard of someone who has one."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Would you like to come check with me?"
(Don't waste time. Just talk to her.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: This is the only book I have!
(She happily shows off the Paperasse familytale.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Were you two looking for this?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Well, I suppose you two can borrow it, if you'd like?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Thank you both. We'll give it back shortly.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: How did you know the little girl had a familytale?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Knowing that little girl owned a familytale is one thing, Siffrin...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But... How did you even know I wanted to read one?
(You already failed this one, didn't you.)
(Why didn't you remember that she always, always finds out?)
(She always figures out something is wrong, when you're not careful.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And even this place... Why did you bring us here?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't mind secrets, Siffrin. I have many of my own. If you want to keep yours... That's fine.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But what I hate... Is when those secrets are about me, and when people I consider friends keep them from me.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And you're so tense. Like you're about to snap...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Siffrin... I was worried before, but now I'm VERY worried.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: W-What's happening? What's wrong? How can I--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "If you're going to ask questions, instead of acting like normal..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Then I don't need you!!! I don't need this right now!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "If you can't act normally then just leave me alone!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But clearly something's wrong, Siffrin, just--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Why are you always like this? So overbearing, always trying to know everything?!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Just leave me behind! Just like you left Ka Bue behind!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Thank you for finding that familytale for me, Siffrin.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I'm sure you have a lot of things left to do today.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Don't come back for a bit.
(How could you have said such a horrible thing to her!!!)
(She was only worried about you!!! And you said, you said--)
(Well, that's fine. You didn't really need that skill, anyway.)
(You can barely remember what it does half the time.)
(And Odile already has so many useful skills...)
(You're the one who needs to deal the final strike, anyway.)
(You need to talk with Mirabelle, first.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "How about I teach you how to fight, today?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I would really like that. Will you really?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I'm not scared... I'm not scared...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I can do this... I can--
(Too long, too long, it's taking too BLINDING long.)
(You only need to fall over to make them act, don't you?)
(You just need to make them realize they can protect you.)
(The Sadness saw you trip, and now has its sight on you.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Why did you fall?! What did you trip on?!? You almost got hurt!!! You... You . . .

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You...  Didn't trip on anything. It's like you just... Fell?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You fell on nothing... And you... You didn't look scared...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You...   let yourself get attacked on purpose?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I saw it, I saw you! You-- You looked around, and the Sadness was about to attack, and you, you just fell...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And-- You didn't even look surprised, Frin!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But why would you do that?! I don't get it!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You fell, and I... I didn't think you could've moved fast enough, so I... attacked the Sadness...  On my own . . .

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "And you beat it on your own, too!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I did that so you'd become stronger! More confident!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "If I get hurt, you protect me."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "And if you get hurt, I'll protect you!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "That's how it is with us, isn't it? We promised!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I-I just wanted you to be stronger!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU?!?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: YOU GOT HURT ON PURPOSE? SO I WOULD SAVE YOU?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: WHY WOULD YOU THINK I WANTED THIS, FRIN!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I DON'T WANT THIS!!! I NEVER WANTED THIS!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I DON'T WANT TO BE STRONG IF IT MEANS YOU HAVE TO BE HURT!!! NO!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!! FRIN, YOU STUPID IDIOT!!!!!!!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: NO!!! IT DIDN'T HELP!!! IT REALLY DIDN'T HELP!!!
(Not that their attacks got that much stronger after you talked to them, didn't it?)
(You'll be fine, as long as you know Bonnie's here to watch your back.)
(As long as you defeat the King yourself, it doesn't matter what skills they all do or don't have.)
(Your smile stops Isa in his tracks.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Mira, Odile and Bonnie came to talk to me, earlier... They all looked a little upset.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Would you like to go see the stars with me?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: The stars? But those only appear at night... It won't be nighttime for a few hours still...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Well! I've heard from trusted sources that you are not doing very well today.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Yeah, that's a lie and we both know it, buddy.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: What's wrong? Is it something you can tell your buddy Isa?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: You know, I get like that too. Sometimes, I feel weird, and I wanna push away everyone.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But you know it's not good, right? It's not healthy!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And I, and everyone else, we want you to be okay. To talk to us!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Because we're companions! Comrades in arms!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And we want everyone in our little crew to be ready for anything, right?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Especially since... No matter what, tomorrow will be our last day together, as a family, I guess.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: So please don't hesitate, okay? And talk to us! Or just me, or just Odile, or whoever! About anything!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And you know, I get like that too. Sometimes, I feel weird, and I wanna push away everyone.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: What the...  Sif, were you even listening to what I was saying...?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: They were right, Sif, something IS wrong!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Mirabelle said you were acting weird since you woke up! Odile told me something happened, with a book? That you shouldn't have known about?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And Bonnie was crying so much they could barely string two words together!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Did you do something? Did they misunderstand? They had to, right? You wouldn't... You wouldn't do stuff like that...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: What's happening, Sif? Is something wrong? Can you tell me?
(Why is he so suspicious of you right now?)
(Always talking behind your back, always acting weird, always deviating from their role every time you look away for a single blinding second!!!)
(You just want them to come with you!!!)
(And the easiest way to keep them close is to make sure they don't die, and the easiest way to make sure they don't die is to make them stronger, why can't they understand that?!?)
(You don't want to think about your problems!!!)
(You just want to follow the script, the Universe, to the end, like always, except this time, you'll break it, and you'll kill him, and you'll escape, and everything will be--)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I knew it! What is it, can I help?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: If you tell me, we can go and talk to everyone, and--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "What's wrong is that you're getting on my nerves."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "You're acting as if you're so calm and reasonable..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "When all you are is weak and useless!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I know what kind of person you are, now."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: What kind of... Person I am?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Never able to say what you mean, never able to do what you want."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Because it's easier, isn't it? To not do anything?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "To only project a facade of confidence, but not doing anything to back it up?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "It's easier to let people do everything, isn't it."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "To just encourage them, while staying on the sidelines."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "You keep changing and changing, from a nerd to a jock to a clothing designer..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "But deep down, you know you can't escape yourself."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't know where this is all coming from, but...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I'm weak. Yeah, I'm a coward.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I feel like I can never do things right.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I keep changing personalities like clothes, because it's easier than learning to like myself.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: YEAH, there are things I can't tell you, no matter how hard I try.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But at least, I'm trying to change. I'm trying to be someone I can be proud of. I'm trying to be better.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: So I can help and support the people I care about.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't want to talk to you right now.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I'm gonna join everyone at the Clocktower.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Take all the time you need!
(They're all upset right now, but they wouldn't go to the House without you.)
(You just need to give them some time to calm down.)
(And you have one last person to talk to, anyway.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: This was... Not the nicest thing you could've said?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "They'll come with me to the House anyway."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "How to break this loop! How to escape!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I'm here to kill the King, aren't I?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Everyone's been wishing for it, for the King to be defeated, so that's why I'm here, aren't I?!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: The one? The one to what?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "The one to deal the final strike on the King!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: (Why doesn't Loop get it?!?) "And if everyone's wish is centered on me..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "And if I'm the only one who's looping and remembering..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "And if time keeps rewinding after I kill the King..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden said it might be because the wish hasn't come true, right? So..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Isn't it rewinding because it's not me, the person who's in the middle of this, killing the King?!?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: It can't be that simple, stardust.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "We've never thought about it, haven't we?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Maybe it WAS that easy, all this time!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I can say with certainty that it's not it.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: It has to be something else...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Huh? Well, are you even sure you've never defeated the King yourself?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I'm sure it must've happened once or twice. You've been looping for a long time, so you might have forgo--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "I'm certain I never defeated him myself."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "How can you say it with certainty?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: N-No, I don't know any more than you, stardust!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: It's just... I know that's not it.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: It has to be something else that's causing the loops, something else that can break them. Something--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "WHAT ELSE AM I SUPPOSED TO DO? WHAT ELSE AM I SUPPOSED TO TRY?!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I MAKE EVERYONE COME WITH ME? SHOULD I RELY ON THE POWER OF LOVE?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I TALK TO THE KING? THE HEAD HOUSEMAIDEN?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I DIE? SHOULD EVERYONE DIE? WHAT? WHAT ELSE IS THERE? HAVEN'T I DONE IT ALL?!?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "THERE'S NOTHING ELSE, LOOP!!! I KNOW IT'S STUPID, I KNOW IT'S A LONG SHOT, BUT IT HAS TO BE THIS!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "IT HAS TO BE THIS, LOOP, OR-- OR--"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "Or, or does it mean-- It means--"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "It means I'm stuck here for good, aren't I?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: (No.) "You think I'm stuck here forever."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "You knew this whole time there was no escape."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: (Stars.) "No, no, no, no, no, no..."

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I was b-brought here to help you, and-- And I thought, if I was here, we could--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "You knew there was no way to break the loops?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I thought that if we tried, together, w-we'd--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW THIS ENTIRE TIME!!!!!!!!!!!!"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "WAS IT ENTERTAINING, AT LEAST? WAS IT FUNNY?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: "DID YOU LIKE WATCHING ME RUN AROUND IN CIRCLES, HOPING, WISHING?"

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: No, I didn't like to watch this at all.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I'm sorry... I really am...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Loop
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But please, stardust-- Siffrin!!! If we think, if we go through it all again, we can--
(You need to join them, and act normally this time, so you can all go to the House together tomorrow.)
(You don't care if they're not strong enough. You can make it on your own, defeat the King on your own.)
(But no-- You can hear them talk.)

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And then I left. I couldn't... Be there anymore.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Why would Sif act like this suddenly? That's not like them at all...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't understand... Why he'd do stuff like that.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I don't understand at all!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Siffrin might come back any second now...  So we need to decide what to do.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Are you saying... Leave without Siffrin?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I-I understand how you feel, but...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: But we shouldn't leave Sif behind! H-He's the one who leads us...! We wouldn't be able to avoid traps without them!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Plus, he's our friend! We can't leave them behind!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Yeah! H-He was mean, but, but Frin was always with us, so--

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I agree, but...  B-But would he even agree to come with us, still?

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Maybe they won't even come back tonight...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: No, Frin will be there!!! I know it!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And either way, we should wait for them, everyone... We can't...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: I... I just... I just don't know if we can trust Siffrin anymore.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Not at such an important moment.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: We'll be fighting the King tomorrow, Isabeau!!!

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: It's not just a simple Sadness. It's the KING. The being who has trapped Vaugarde in time.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: And we need to be a team.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: We need to be united, we need to trust one another.

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: ...  After what just happened to all of us today...

acts/act5/act5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/act5.html.dialogue: Could you entrust your life and future to someone like Siffrin right now?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: How could you say all those horrible things to us, Siffrin!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: That wasn't cool. Not cool at all!!!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You were kind of a crab earlier, yeah.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: But why did you go off on your own?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Going through the entire House alone... That was foolish, Siffrin.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And why were you acting so weird?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: It's not like you to be mean like this...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You didn't mean it, right? You were mad about something?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Something happened before you talked to us, it had to or you wouldn't-- Wouldn't have said all that, right?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: What's wrong, do you feel sick?!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Siffrin, let me help you up...   Huh?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Siffrin, your skin feels so warm... What's wrong?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Sif went up the entire House on their own, right? It'd make sense for them to be woozy...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We had a lot of trouble, even with Loop's help... I can't imagine doing it alone.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Oh, your friend, Loop? I think you two know each other, somehow...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We were looking for you so we could talk to you, but we couldn't find you anywhere, and no one knew where you went--

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And so we ended up at the Favor Tree, and Za asked it to help us find you, and then this weird star appeared.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: They told us they were a star and that's why they were spiky and glowy!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: They helped us find you. We couldn't have made it here without your help.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: They made us do a weird hand symbol so we could hear them as we went up.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: But we could hear them less and less as we went up... I can't hear them at all, now.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: But for you to go through the entire House alone...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We barely saw any Sadnesses, but it was still a struggle.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And the House felt very weird, when we were coming up...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We saw weird stuff! Like you were walking around but not really, and rooms were repeating and leading us weird places!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: It did all feel very... Off.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Moreso than I was expecting, even with the King taking over...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Please don't say things like that, please.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: The House felt almost unsettling, too... I suppose it's better now, but then, why. . .

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden should be up ahead, yes?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Y-Yes! We should get Siffrin to her... She might be able to help!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And she might be able to tell us what's happening, too.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I-I'll go on ahead and let her know!!!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Maybe...   Since he was so powerful, he was filled with Craft, which allowed him to change his size...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And now that he's frozen, the Craft escaped, and now he's smaller.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You won't be going any farther, young one.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden is just ahead...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I'm sure she'll be able to heal you, Siffrin! So just-- Just come!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: The House feels off here too... I thought it would've gone back to normal after we beat the King...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And there's this feeling of pressure, now, too...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And it smells weird now still!!!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: It all feels... A little worrying, doesn't it?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: ...I'm worried... I hope everyone is okay...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: It's not dark, or light, or anything... It's just...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We need to get to the Head Housemaiden as fast as possible.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: He still feels super warm, Odile.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Do you get vertigo like Dile, Frin?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You look exhausted... I'm sorry, just a little bit to go.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Hm... If Frin's afraid of heights too...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Do you wanna hold hands, Frin?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Okay, don't look down! Look at me!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I-It's only a bit longer, Siffrin...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden is right ahead!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Th-There'll be time for that later, Siffrin!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I'm so proud of you! Look at you! The savior of Vau--

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: We have someone we need you to take a look at.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And also the world outside looks like it's ending so if you could help with that too that'd be great.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Well, he sure is running a fever!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Those symptoms... I would say they've been using Crafts too much, maybe?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I think so! Maybe they've used too many Crafts at a time without taking time to rest, or without cooling down for as long as they needed!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Does that sort of thing usually give someone a fever, though? I've never heard that before...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I've heard about it before... It doesn't happen often, that's for sure!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You would need to Craft, like... an IMMENSE amount, for long periods of time.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Like Crafting a painting for weeks at a time?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Or going through an entire House, fighting against Sadnesses and a King for hours?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: But he'll be fine, now that the battle is over.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And do you super duper promise?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Okay... Well, that's something at least.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And what about the world outside?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I...   I don't know, but... I can feel everything around us so strongly, and it feels... Wrong.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Every time I've tried to reach out and feel what's happening, I sense... Chaos...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: It feels like something is...   Rotting...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: I know you thought your quest was over, but it can't be!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Something's broken, something's failing, rotting--

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: But I am so glad to see you all safe!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Are you done talking with your companions? Yes, wonderful, wonderful, wonderful, wonderful, wonderful, wonderful!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: She's... Repeating, just like some of the rooms we went through...

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Is it happening to her, too?!
(why why why why why why why)
(you didn't beat the king on your own you didn't fix anything and they hate you and you're still stuck here)

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: And y y you, Mirabelle's companions... Th ank you for helping her get th i s far.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: You have my gratitude, and the entire country of Vaugarde's...!

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Hey, m'dame Head Housemaiden... Can you hear us?

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: ...   Soon, you'll be able to go back to your normal lives. Away from battle and strife.

acts/act5/endrooms5.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/endrooms5.html.dialogue: Finally, you'll all be able to go home!!!

(they'll go home  they'll go home  they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll go home they'll gohomethey'llgohomethey'llgohomethey'llgohomethey'llgohomethey'llgohome)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Um, are you okay? Did you have a nightmare during your nap, maybe...?
(You have to deal the King the final hit instead of her, you're sure of it, but...)
(You need her to learn her shield skill. The one that protects you from anything.)
(Come to think of it, you forgot to tell her about the original shield skill, earlier.)
(The one you usually tell her about when you enter Dormont.)
(Oh well. The shield she learns when you help her with her papers will do the job just fine.)
(You need to get to the King)
(you don't have time you don't have time you don't have

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: With my papers? N-No, of course not!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Don't worry about them! They're not important at all, they're--

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I... I suppose I could use your help, Siffrin...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Y-Yes, let's do it!!! It'll distract us both!!! From our problems!!!
(Mirabelle looks at you without saying a word.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Well, you know they're bonding papers, so I don't need to explain...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: B-But really it's more like, um, dating? Dating profiles... I-I'm not thinking about being bonded yet...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Before this all started, with the King... I decided I wanted to, uh, try. To date someone.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And so I asked a dating company, and they gave me a bunch of folders of people that I could meet, and that I could date... But I haven't gone through it yet...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: So I figured I could at least get that done today. And look through all of them, and make a list?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Of people I could see myself... Dating.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And... I suppose I need help?  I'm choosing someone I could spend the rest of my life with... So I'd appreciate another pair of eyes.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Or, um, just the one eye. As long as it's not my two eyes looking at this. Um...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And also I need a distraction from tomorrow very badly, so I figured I--
(Too long, too long, this is taking too long.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "You know, you don't have to be bonded to anyone.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "If you're alone for your whole life, then that's just how it is."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Isn't it better to just come to terms with it now, rather than later?""

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "You don't need to be with anyone to be happy, after all!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: How can you say such horrible things, Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I'll never be bonded with anyone? I'll always be alone?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Change, what makes you think you can say such horrible things, Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Then HOW did you mean it, Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: What's wrong with you today? You were weird when you woke up, you were walking around and not responding to anyone...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: ...You knew about my papers even though I didn't tell anyone, and now this!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Is something wrong, Siffrin? Did something happen? Did you have a nightmare or something?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Then what happened, Siffrin! Because clearly something did happen!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Otherwise, i-if nothing happened, I'll have to accept the fact that I was wrong about you!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And it's fine. Everybody does. I guess I have the kind of personality where it's easy to want to tease me.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But I know people don't mean it. It's how-- It's how some people make friends.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And I thought it was the same for you.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I thought, "It's okay, they don't mean it, it's how they are. They tease me, but they're never mean. And Siffrin never really hurts me."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Thinking I should be alone... Telling me I should be alone...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Who do you think you are, to say this to me? Acting like-- Like you know better than me!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Always soooo mysterious, Siffrin, always talking as if you're better than me! As if you know me!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But you don't, Siffrin!!! You're just as lost and useless as I am!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: So stop!!! Talking!!! As if you know me!!!!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You've hurt me, Siffrin. And I was wrong.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: For you to say something like that to me, and think it was okay...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You're awful. You're not my friend, not my ally, not anything.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I don't want to see you until tonight.
(No, no, that's not what's important here, is it?)
(She'll get over it one way or loop or another, but you didn't get her shield skill.)
(But maybe it doesn't matter that much.)
(You can just bring her back to that book about shields in the secret library, before you go and fight the King.)
(You don't really need her special skill, after all. The usual shield skill will do just fine.)
(It WOULD be nice to get everyone else's special skill, though...)
(You need to talk with Mirabelle, first.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "...Have you heard of something called a familytale?"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: ... I may have. What about them?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "I've heard of someone who has one."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Would you like to come check with me?"
(Don't waste time. Just talk to her.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: This is the only book I have!
(She happily shows off the Paperasse familytale.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Were you two looking for this?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Well, I suppose you two can borrow it, if you'd like?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Thank you both. We'll give it back shortly.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: How did you know the little girl had a familytale?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Knowing that little girl owned a familytale is one thing, Siffrin...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But... How did you even know I wanted to read one?
(You already failed this one, didn't you.)
(Why didn't you remember that she always, always finds out?)
(She always figures out something is wrong, when you're not careful.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And even this place... Why did you bring us here?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I don't mind secrets, Siffrin. I have many of my own. If you want to keep yours... That's fine.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But what I hate... Is when those secrets are about me, and when people I consider friends keep them from me.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And you're so tense. Like you're about to snap...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Siffrin... I was worried before, but now I'm VERY worried.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: W-What's happening? What's wrong? How can I--

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "If you're going to ask questions, instead of acting like normal..."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Then I don't need you!!! I don't need this right now!!!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "If you can't act normally then just leave me alone!!!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But clearly something's wrong, Siffrin, just--

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Why are you always like this? So overbearing, always trying to know everything?!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Just leave me behind! Just like you left Ka Bue behind!!!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Thank you for finding that familytale for me, Siffrin.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I'm sure you have a lot of things left to do today.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Don't come back for a bit.
(How could you have said such a horrible thing to her!!!)
(She was only worried about you!!! And you said, you said--)
(Well, that's fine. You didn't really need that skill, anyway.)
(You can barely remember what it does half the time.)
(And Odile already has so many useful skills...)
(You're the one who needs to deal the final strike, anyway.)
(You need to talk with Mirabelle, first.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "How about I teach you how to fight, today?"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I would really like that. Will you really?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I'm not scared... I'm not scared...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I can do this... I can--
(Too long, too long, it's taking too BLINDING long.)
(You only need to fall over to make them act, don't you?)
(You just need to make them realize they can protect you.)
(The Sadness saw you trip, and now has its sight on you.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Why did you fall?! What did you trip on?!? You almost got hurt!!! You... You . . .

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You...  Didn't trip on anything. It's like you just... Fell?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You fell on nothing... And you... You didn't look scared...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You...   let yourself get attacked on purpose?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I saw it, I saw you! You-- You looked around, and the Sadness was about to attack, and you, you just fell...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And-- You didn't even look surprised, Frin!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But why would you do that?! I don't get it!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You fell, and I... I didn't think you could've moved fast enough, so I... attacked the Sadness...  On my own . . .

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "And you beat it on your own, too!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "I did that so you'd become stronger! More confident!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "If I get hurt, you protect me."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "And if you get hurt, I'll protect you!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "That's how it is with us, isn't it? We promised!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "I-I just wanted you to be stronger!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU?!?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: YOU GOT HURT ON PURPOSE? SO I WOULD SAVE YOU?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: WHY WOULD YOU THINK I WANTED THIS, FRIN!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I DON'T WANT THIS!!! I NEVER WANTED THIS!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I DON'T WANT TO BE STRONG IF IT MEANS YOU HAVE TO BE HURT!!! NO!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!! FRIN, YOU STUPID IDIOT!!!!!!!!!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: NO!!! IT DIDN'T HELP!!! IT REALLY DIDN'T HELP!!!
(Not that their attacks got that much stronger after you talked to them, didn't it?)
(You'll be fine, as long as you know Bonnie's here to watch your back.)
(As long as you defeat the King yourself, it doesn't matter what skills they all do or don't have.)
(Your smile stops Isa in his tracks.)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Mira, Odile and Bonnie came to talk to me, earlier... They all looked a little upset.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Would you like to go see the stars with me?"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: The stars? But those only appear at night... It won't be nighttime for a few hours still...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Well! I've heard from trusted sources that you are not doing very well today.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Yeah, that's a lie and we both know it, buddy.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: What's wrong? Is it something you can tell your buddy Isa?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: You know, I get like that too. Sometimes, I feel weird, and I wanna push away everyone.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But you know it's not good, right? It's not healthy!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And I, and everyone else, we want you to be okay. To talk to us!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Because we're companions! Comrades in arms!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And we want everyone in our little crew to be ready for anything, right?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Especially since... No matter what, tomorrow will be our last day together, as a family, I guess.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: So please don't hesitate, okay? And talk to us! Or just me, or just Odile, or whoever! About anything!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And you know, I get like that too. Sometimes, I feel weird, and I wanna push away everyone.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: What the...  Sif, were you even listening to what I was saying...?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: They were right, Sif, something IS wrong!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Mirabelle said you were acting weird since you woke up! Odile told me something happened, with a book? That you shouldn't have known about?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: And Bonnie was crying so much they could barely string two words together!

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Did you do something? Did they misunderstand? They had to, right? You wouldn't... You wouldn't do stuff like that...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: What's happening, Sif? Is something wrong? Can you tell me?
(Why is he so suspicious of you right now?)
(Always talking behind your back, always acting weird, always deviating from their role every time you look away for a single blinding second!!!)
(You just want them to come with you!!!)
(And the easiest way to keep them close is to make sure they don't die, and the easiest way to make sure they don't die is to make them stronger, why can't they understand that?!?)
(You don't want to think about your problems!!!)
(You just want to follow the script, the Universe, to the end, like always, except this time, you'll break it, and you'll kill him, and you'll escape, and everything will be--)

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I knew it! What is it, can I help?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: If you tell me, we can go and talk to everyone, and--

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "What's wrong is that you're getting on my nerves."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "You're acting as if you're so calm and reasonable..."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "When all you are is weak and useless!"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "I know what kind of person you are, now."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: What kind of... Person I am?

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Never able to say what you mean, never able to do what you want."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "Because it's easier, isn't it? To not do anything?"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "To only project a facade of confidence, but not doing anything to back it up?"

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "It's easier to let people do everything, isn't it."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "To just encourage them, while staying on the sidelines."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "You keep changing and changing, from a nerd to a jock to a clothing designer..."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: "But deep down, you know you can't escape yourself."

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I don't know where this is all coming from, but...

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I'm weak. Yeah, I'm a coward.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I feel like I can never do things right.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Yeah, I keep changing personalities like clothes, because it's easier than learning to like myself.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: YEAH, there are things I can't tell you, no matter how hard I try.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: But at least, I'm trying to change. I'm trying to be someone I can be proud of. I'm trying to be better.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: So I can help and support the people I care about.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I don't want to talk to you right now.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: I'm gonna join everyone at the Clocktower.

acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/friendquestsACT5.html.dialogue: Take all the time you need!
(They're all upset right now, but they wouldn't go to the House without you.)
(You just need to give them some time to calm down.)
(And you have one last person to talk to, anyway.)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: (But all you can do is keep attacking.)
(MAL DU PAYS breathes in, and out.)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: DON'T JUST STAND HERE SILENTLY, JUDGING ME!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: TALK TO ME! DON'T IGNORE ME! SAY SOMETHING!!!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Why did you protect me, all those times?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: You should've let me die, back then, Frin.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: It's not like you haven't let me die before, right?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Why did you protect me? I never asked for your help, Frin!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I could've been okay on my own!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I don't need you, Frin! No one does!!!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: If you had to be hurt to protect me...

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Then it would've been better if you died!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: You should've died! You should've died to protect me!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: It hurt so much, when the King killed me, Frin! You said you would always protect me!

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: You should've died to protect me.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: You should've died to protect me, instead of trying to make me stronger.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: But you couldn't keep your promise.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I WILL NEVER FORGIVE YOU!!!!!!
(Bonnie would never say something like this.)
(BONNIE WOULD NEVER SAY SOMETHING LIKE THIS!!!)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I thought you were smarter than this.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Why would you ever think we were friends?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Why would I be friends with someone who doesn't even remember where they're from?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Here's a philosophical conundrum for you, Siffrin.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: If you don't have a home to go back to,  what kind of person does that make you?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: If you don't have memories of your own childhood,  can you still consider yourself human?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: If you have forgotten something as important as your country, your childhood, your family, your own name,  then are you even a person?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: If something is forgotten by everyone, then has that thing ever existed?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Something as forgetful as you could never have friends.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: You forget them all,  and are forgotten by them in return.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Every time I'm forced to look at you, I forget everything about you.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: It is just so easy to forget you.
(No, no, no, you don't want that)
(You don't want to forget them)
(And you don't want to be forgotten!!!)
(No!!! Odile is smart, she never forgets anything, she'd never forget you, this is just--)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Oh, Sif... I'm so glad you're here.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I can finally tell you what I've been meaning to say, all this time.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I don't understand why you're so attached to me.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I don't understand anything you say. I don't understand your jokes, your words, your very existence.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I don't want to know someone who won't even try to change, who luxuriates in things staying the exact same, like you do.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: When you're next to me, I wonder what I did to get someone so weak standing next to me.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Someone who's so afraid of everyone.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Someone who's even afraid to be touched.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Do you know why I never touch you, when we talk in front of the Favor Tree, Siffrin?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Because the idea of making skin contact with you makes me want to puke.

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Did you think we never noticed? How you took advantage of us?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Using your loops to make your life easier? To make yourself look better?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: Because it's so much easier to be loved if you know all the right answers, isn't it?

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: This is the only reason why I want you, Siffrin.
(Disgusting, disgusting, disgusting--) (Disgusting disgusting disgusting--)
(of course this is what he thinks, this is what you are)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: I can't wait to never see you again.
(The figure opens its mouth, but you strike!!!)
(stop it, stop it, stop it!!!)
(it's not real, it's not real, it's not real)
(you just need to wake up!!!)

(wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up wake up)

(wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not rea (wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not real wake up it's not ree

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: SOMETHING
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: (THEY DON'T WANT TO SEE YOU AGAIN.)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: SOMETHING
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: (THEY'LL GO BACK TO THEIR HOMES, WITHOUT YOU)
(no no no no no no)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: SOMETHING
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: (THIS JOURNEY WAS ONLY MEANINGFUL TO YOU)

acts/act5/maldupays.html.speaker: SOMETHING
acts/act5/maldupays.html.dialogue: (YOU CAN WISH AND WISH AND WISH ALL YOU WANT, BUT IT'S INEVITABLE)
(the  s adness  w ith in   yo u  i s   ri g h  t) (the sadness. within, you. is, right)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Huh?!?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What's happening?! Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: AH--!!! NO!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh no... No, no, no, something went wrong, why--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue:
You-- Siffrin!!!!!!!
<!-- [sic] -->

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Please, Siffrin, listen to me, we can--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: PLEASE, WAIT--
(YOU PUSH THE HEAD HOUSEMAIDEN AWAY.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: AH!!! EUPHRASIE!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: She's okay, she's okay! But-- But we need to--
(FIGHT.)
(Odile strikes!)
(IT HURTS IT HURTS IT HURTS)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: ODILE?!? Why are you attacking them?!?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: He's threatening us!!! I'm defending myself!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: No, no, no, stop!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: NO!!! No attacking Frin-- He's our friend!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: WE DON'T ATTACK FRIENDS!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: BUT--
(hurts hurts hurts)
(we don't attack friends)
(so if odile is attacking you, it means you were never friends)
(it means you're hated hated hated)
(IT MEANS YOU'RE HATED!!!)
(Your friends don't know what to do.)
(Bonnie yells at you to stop.)
(Isabeau yells encouragements to everyone!)
(Mirabelle brings her palms up to the sky!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin, stop!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Frin, why are you doing this?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What's happening, Sif?! Talk to us!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Huh?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin, what do you mean?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Isn't that what we all wanted?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I-It's what we should do next, right?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We beat the King! We save Vaugarde! We all go home!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Y-Yeah!!! Now that the King is gone, everything will go back to how it was before, right?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Belle stays here, Dile goes back to Ka Bue, Za to Jouvente, and--
(THEY DON'T UNDERSTAND!!!)
(YOU CANNOT ALLOW THEM TO GO HOME!!!!!!)
(BECAUSE...  BECAUSE IF THEY DO, THEN...!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I don't understand! Don't you want to go back? Back to where you're from?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Why else come with Mirabelle, if you didn't want to beat the King just so you could go back home?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Can't go back...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "A perfect ending"...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Not what I wished for"...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Gone.... Through it all.... Too many times."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Loop was correct, then.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: The way you acted yesterday... The things you said...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Maybe you DID mean some of them. Maybe you didn't. Maybe it's a little of both.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But beyond that... Some of the things you knew...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: How you knew what Mira's papers were about...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: How you knew about Isabeau's dream to design clothes...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: How you fell in battle, like you knew it would push Bonnie to defeat that Sadness...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: How you knew I was looking for a familytale, something I hadn't told anyone, and immediately knew where to find it, as well...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: How you managed to go through the entire House on your own...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Even the way you were acting when we fought the King...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And, just now,  how you've said you've "gone through it all, too many times"...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Huh?!?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You two...  You don't mean...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: ...Looks like that star was right, hm?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hahaha... I thought they were exaggerating, but...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin, you...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You've been  looping in time, haven't you?
(...!!!!!!)
(NO!!!!!!)
(IF THEY FIND OUT, THEY'LL HATE YOU!!!)
(IF THEY FIND OUT YOU WISHED FOR THIS, THEY'LL HATE YOU!!!)
(YOU HAVE TO LOOP BACK, YOU HAVE TO--)
(YOU FEEL A TUG ON YOUR STOMACH.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh no you don't.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You won't be going any farther, young one.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You are staying right here until we're done talking!!!!!!
(no, no, she can't--)
(YOU CAN'T LET HER DO THIS!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Woaaaaah... That felt weird.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That feeling... That was Time Craft, wasn't it?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin tried to rewind time just now, didn't they?!?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Felt bad!!! It made the whole air smell like caramel someone left to burn for hours!!! Yuck!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yuck indeed... I'm getting a headache just standing here.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I don't know how or why those loops are happening to you, but I won't let you escape.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You are STAYING WITH US until we're DONE TALKING!!!!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah!!! Dile's gonna make you stay right here, stupid!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Go m'dame Odile, go m'dame Odile, go!!!
(no no no no no no)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But, looping in time, using Time Craft...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: L-Loop mentioned it before, and how you'd need a lot of power for that, right?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh, oh, that was the Wish Craft thing, yeah?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Wish Craft is the stuff like going to the Favor Tree and asking for stuff to come true!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Loop said you were both looking into what everyone wished, and that you thought it was because of everyone's wish to save Vaugarde...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But if you thought everyone's wish was to blame...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Why would the wish's powers be centered on you?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And, just now, Siffrin mentioned... Something about a wish they made... So...!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You must know this already.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: The reason you're the only one who got those powers, when we were also on a journey to fight the King...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Isn't it because you, somehow, got involved?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Isn't it because of something YOU wished for?
(no, no, no, no, no, no...)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I think you need to tell us your wish.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us your wish!!! It might be the key to freeing you!!! The key to making sure you won't loop anymore!!!
(no!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us, so we can help you!
(NO!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us, so you can be saved!!!
(NO!!!!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us already, you stupid crab!!!!!!!!!!
(NO, NO, NO, YOU DON'T WANT TO!!!!!!)
(YOU DON'T WANT TO THINK ABOUT IT YOU DON'T WANT TO SAY IT YOU DON'T WANT TO--)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Sif...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: This is what I wished for!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
