acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wished for Vaugarde to be saved!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wished for my sister to be okay!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wished to win a stupid coin flip!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And I wished that we'd be able to find you, to help you, to save you, Sif!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And what about you, Sif?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What did you wish for?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What did you wish for!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What did you wish for, Siffrin!!!
(STOP!!!!!!)
(It doesn't matter!!!)
(It won't come true, you know this now, you've accepted it, you did, it doesn't matter, it doesn't matter, it doesn't matter!!!)
(they can't make you tell them, please, please, please--)
(IT WILL NEVER COME TRUE ANYWAY!!!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: TELL US!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: JUST TELL US, SIFFRIN!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us what you wished for. Come on.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Tell us. Tell us. Tell us. Tell us tell us tell us tell us tell--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Just say it, already.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "But I don't want to say it."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I'm scared to say it."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Scared...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What are you scared of?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I'm scared that..."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "That if I tell you, something terrible will happen."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Okay, but...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But we REALLY wanna know, Frin.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Maybe we can kick your butt again to make you say it?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah! If we do, you'll say it eventually, right?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We should try it out.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Everyone, violence is NOT the answer!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But I am in the mood for more butt kicking if you don't spit it out right now, yes.
(Against your will, a nervous laugh escapes you.)
(Everyone grins your way.)
(If you say it, something terrible will happen, you think,  but...)
(You breathe in. And out.)
(And in.  And out.)
("I wished...")

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh... Siffrin... That's really lovely!!! Thank you!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That is a very cute wish, Siffrin.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: R-Really? You'd... You'd like that?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I would love that, Sif!!! I would love to make clothes for you!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh my!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That's...  That's a lovely thought, Siffrin. I would like that.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Dile, are you blushing?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: N-No.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hehehe!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Y-Yeah, yeah!!! I want you to meet my sister, too! I want everyone to meet her!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wanna come too! That'd be awesome!!!
(Oh!)
(Your heart feels tight.)
(You want to cry.)
(But that wasn't it, was it?)
(If that was all your wish was,  then you wouldn't be here.)
(You wished for that, yes, from the bottom of your heart, but...)
(Mirabelle has changed so much since you've met her...)
(You didn't expect to have so much fun traveling with Isabeau.)
(Ka Bue is where Odile is from... She probably knows all the cool places.)
(Even if she doesn't, talking with Odile is always interesting. You're both strangers to this country, ignorant of its culture, so you have a lot in common.)
(Bonnie has been distant from you lately...)
(You're not sure why.)
(But you'd like to be here when they see their sister again...)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Deep down, I wished..."
(She doesn't realize it, but now she's able to talk to people while looking them in the eyes. Sometimes she even snarks back when you tease her, which you didn't think was even possible.)
(You'd l ike to continue traveling with her and see her get even more comfortable expressing herself.)
(You often joke together, but you never really talk about real, important things... You're glad he told you about his dream to become a clothes designer. It suits him.)
(To t alk to him, and watch him as he crafts clothes for you to wear... Seeing his smile as you wear something he created himself... It would make you happy.)
(Being with Odile is easy. Sometimes you feel like she understands you better than you understand yourself.)
(You'd l ike to talk with her more so you can understand her, too.)
(They miss their sister so much. Sometimes you can hear them cry out at night, calling their sister's name.)
(If you c ould help them save her, help them get back to their sister and see her safe and alive... You'd like to do that. You want them to be happy.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I wished...!"
(You  want  to  stay  with  them!)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I... I wished I could just stay with everyone...!!!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: What...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Sif...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "When we win against the King, then our journey ends, doesn't it?"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Mirabelle will go back to the House, Isabeau to Jouvente..."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Odile to Ka Bue, Bonnie to their sister!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "You'll all go back home!!!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Frin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "If we win, then you'll all leave!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And I don't-- I don't want that at all!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I just want to stay with all of you!!!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I know it's not fair! I know you have homes to go back to!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And I know I should be fine with leaving, because you're fine with it, too!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "I-It's fine that this journey meant more to me than to all of you!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And that, as soon as this journey is over, you'll forget me!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "But I didn't-- I don't wanna be alone!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And I didn't mean to do that, I didn't mean to trap everyone here, but I--"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Is that really what you thought...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That we didn't care for you?   That we'd forget all about you, as soon as this journey is over?!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I don't want to forget the times we all had together.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And I wouldn't want to never talk to any of you again, either!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: A-And nothing is keeping me in Dormont! I would love to leave, to keep traveling! I've been thinking that for a while!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But...  But it's just wishful thinking, isn't it? I don't...  I don't know if everyone. . .

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wanna...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wanna see Nille again soon, but...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But I wanna keep traveling, too!!! I don't wanna leave everyone behind!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I wanna make malanga fritters for you, Frin! And Dile still needs to teach me more Ka Buan recipes! Belle needs to finish reading me that story I like! And I still have pranks I wanna pull on Za!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Ha, no, not the pranks!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But... Yeah, I...  It's the same for me.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I have connections with all of you I've never had with anyone else!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Even if it's just for a bit, I want to keep traveling with everyone! And after that, I want to keep in contact with everyone!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I want to know who Bonnie grows up to be. I want to hear more about what Odile thinks of Vaugardian culture. I want to see Mira open up and change even more.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And I want to get to know you more, Sif! Talk to you more, be with you more!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I want to be with everyone for a long, long time!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I... I never knew we all agreed on this.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I thought I'd eventually manage to ask if some of you wanted to keep traveling for a bit...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It would be nice to finally travel together without worrying about the King, after all, wouldn't it? But... I never found the courage to ask...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And... I . . .

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I'm having fun. Traveling with you all. Talking with you all.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I don't... I don't want to stop traveling with everyone just yet!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We want to stay with you, too.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It's not just you!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: This journey won't be over yet, not if we have anything to say about it!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And even when it ends, it won't be the end. We'll all stay in each other's lives for a long, long time.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: So stop being stupid and thinking we'll forget you or whatever, because we won't, stupid Frin!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Sif!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Siffrin!!!
(The world around you went back to normal.)
(You're exhausted...)
(Your entire body hurts.)
(After all those battles, after everything, walking around is all you're managing to do right now.)
(But you feel refreshed, too.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: So, in the end... You love us so much you wished to stay with us so hard you almost broke the world?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That's not great, Frin.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Hmrf."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yes, Siffrin. I had stalkers with less issues than you.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Hmrnghrgh."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I think it's nice.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I agree! Ending the world for love is what good stories are made of!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Rhghhmghmmghhrm."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "...I'm sorry."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "For everything."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Which is...?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "For saying all those things yesterday."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Okay, good start.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I think I'm speaking for everyone when I say that we forgive you, but we reserve the right to be mad about it still later!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh yeah.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I won't be mad, but sure.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I might be mad later, once someone explains to me everything that happened with easy words.
(You nod.)
(It'd be fine even if they don't forgive you for a bit.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: ...And?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And for, uh, unknowingly trapping everyone in time."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh, that one's fine, isn't it?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah, we don't remember that part, so no worries here.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I also don't understand that part.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We'll explain everything later, Boniface.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Thank you very much.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Aaaaaaaand?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: (Um...)  "What else? I'm sorry..."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Apologize for not talking to us about everything, dummy!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah, dummy! We could've helped, dummy!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Even if I still don't really get it.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: The adults could've helped, at least!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We could have. If you had talked to us about it.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: About the loops, about how you felt, about how you wanted to keep traveling together!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "W-Well, uh, well..."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "None of you said you wanted to keep traveling together either!!!"

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Well... That's true.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But this is YOUR apology tour. We can have one later.
(Ha!)
(You surprise everyone by laughing.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Heh!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hehehe!
(Everyone laughs with you.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: ... Well, that was cute. But we need to decide what we'll do next, so...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Uh, we'll go and escort our dear little preteen back to their sister, duh.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: YEAH!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We should go and see Nille!!! And send her a message so she knows I'm okay!!! And then I can hug her!!! And then--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And then we'll see, I guess. We can go and travel more after she knows I'm okay.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Yeah?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Sounds good to me."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Um... Before that, though...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I would like to talk to her beforehand and make sure she's fine with you traveling with us, Boniface.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Otherwise, going on a journey together with you becomes a little something called a "kidnapping".

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Very true.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: We need to make sure it's fine with her first, Bonbon!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hmm...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I think it'll be fine. She can come with us, right?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: She always wanted to travel, but she didn't wanna do it alone and also she had to take care of me, so she'll say yes and come with us for sure!!!
(This sounds fun!!!)
(You nod furiously.)

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Oh! That would be lovely!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That does sound fun.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Bonnie's sister... I'm so curious! I wanna meet her!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: And after that, we could--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: AH!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Wh-What--

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: THE HEAD HOUSEMAIDEN!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: OH!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: AH!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Ohohoho! Don't worry about me, everyone!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: H-Head Housemaiden! You're okay!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I am! I was staying away for a little bit.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You all seemed like you needed to talk, so I was patiently waiting for you all to finish your conversation!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: That's very considerate of you.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It IS very considerate of you!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Sorry for forgetting about you for a sec, m'dame Head Housemaiden.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "Also, I'm sorry for throwing you, earlier."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Ohohohohohohoho!!! Do not worry!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I haven't had this much fun since reading the last issue of "The Cursing of Château Castle"!!!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I do feel awfully dizzy though. I have a wicked headache, like I've been using Crafts too much!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Have I said anything strange?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: You did say some weird things, yes.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It felt like you were taken over by whatever was happening to the world...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "You said the things you always say when I come and talk to you."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "About how the world is rotting."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: "And you can't do anything to help."

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Interesting! I don't feel like saying it now, though!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Or at all! The wind feels nice and fresh.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It just feels like a beautiful day, doesn't it?

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: It does!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Well! That's that, I guess!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Heh.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: Travelling one... Siffrin...

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: I'm sure you must have a lot to talk about with everyone.

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: But be sure to talk to me when you're all done!

acts/act5/VSFriends.html.speaker: Euphrasie
acts/act5/VSFriends.html.dialogue: So I can happily bless you and your companions' new journey!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: (Oh, people!)
(That's... Frozen people from the House?)
(Nothing else to do elsewhere.)
(You should talk to the Head Housemaiden, and start your new journey.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Idol
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Housemaiden Mirabelle saved us all, didn't she?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: That's what I heard! Young Housemaiden Mirabelle!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Ah... It feels like it was only yesterday she asked me if she could borrow the first issue of "The Cursing of Château Castle"...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And now, she saved the country!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Idol
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I wonder if it'd be awkward if I told her I'm proud of her...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, sweetie...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I think that hearing you say that would kill her on the spot.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Idol
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: H-Huh?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Idol
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But I don't want to kill her...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Sometimes, people need to be killed. With compliments.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Idol
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I-I suppose...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Light-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Do you know who I saw, earlier...?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Light-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: The pottery teacher, giving a bonding earring to their partner!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Housemaiden with Overalls
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh!!! We should congratulate them!!! Where are they n--

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Light-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, they obviously immediately booked it to their bedroom.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Light-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Isn't love beautiful?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Housemaiden with Overalls
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I guess...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Short-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: --And I have bandages, in case anyone who fought the King is hurt!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Long-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: You know Mirabelle has healing Crafts, right?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Short-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: W-Well, I think seeing a bandage where you know you were hurt can be reassuring!!! Don't judge me!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Long-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Long-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Could you put a bandage on my hand?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Short-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh! Are you hurt?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Long-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Not really!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Long-Haired Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But this bandage has a little cat drawn on it, so I want it!!!
(The long-haired Housemaiden now proudly wears a bandage with a little cat drawn on it.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sleepy Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I was asleep in the infirmary this whole time... And when I woke up, the sky was all weird. Some end of the world business.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sleepy Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But I heard everything was okay, now.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sleepy Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And I'm still sleepy, so... Snzzz...
(Despite their open eyes, they have fallen back asleep.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stressed Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh... Mirabelle really did do it... She saved us all!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stressed Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Everyone will be so happy! Everyone will make sure she never has to worry about a thing, now! Everyone will make sure to punish anyone who made her sad, ever!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stressed Housemaiden
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I HAVE TO GIVE HER BACK HER BOOK I "BORROWED" FOR SIX MONTHS BEFORE ANYONE FINDS OUT!!!!
(He seems stressed out...)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: YOU!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: What do you think of my face?
(You don't know how to respond. Um...)
(You think their face is a good face, so you give them a thumbs up.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Striking, yes...  I succeeded, then.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I was in the Changing Room when the King attacked, see?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I woke up, found out we were saved, and quickly finished Crafting my body so I could make my grand reentrance today!
(You give two thumbs up.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Fu fu fu...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Handsome Person
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Fu fu fu... I'm so happy...
(They keep poking their cheeks, giggling happily.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Housemaiden and Dog
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: My doggy... My doggy is okay... She's okay... My doggie... My puppie... My sweet pupperino...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Housemaiden and Dog
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We're okay, puppie!!!!!!!!!
(The dog barks happily.)
(The dog is licking their face.)
(Gross?!? They don't seem to mind, though.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: HEY!!! YOU!!! Aren't you one of the saviors?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Friend
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We heard about you! You were traveling with Mirabelle!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Is Mirabelle okay? Is she okay?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Is the sunshine of my life okay. My absolute best friend. The roommate of my heart.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Friend
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes, if Mirabelle is hurt in any way, you'll have us to answer for, so reply wisely.
(Their words are harsh, but they look very worried...)
(You smile and point ahead.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh. She might be with Euphie, then...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Friend
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Mirabelle's okay? She isn't hurt?
(You shake your head.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Okay! We'll come and say hi later, then. I'll need to go and plant a big kiss on Euphie, anyway.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle's Friend
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Thank you for telling us, stranger!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Claude
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And for being at her side!
(Oh no, genuine thanks!!!)
(You run away.)
(So those are Mirabelle's friends...)
(You hope you made a good first impression?!?)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Siffrin! Are you going back to Dormont?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We'll come with you!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yeah, you're stupid if you think we're leaving you to do whatever you want right now.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: You heard the kid, Siffrin.
(You smile.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Take your time, Siffrin! Let Isabeau know when you're ready to go.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, b-but, by the way, Siffrin!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I, um... I don't know if you'd know where to find them...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But can you tell Loop "thank you" for me?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: From all of us! We wouldn't have found you without them!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Especially that hallway... Without them, we'd have been crushed.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And they helped us with the Sadnesses and what their weaknesses were, too!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes! We could hear them while we went through the House, but as we got closer to you, we could hear them less and less...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: They seemed really worried for you, too.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm... So, maybe you have a way to talk to them?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: So you can tell them thank you, from all of us, for bringing us to you!
(Loop...)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Please go and talk to Loop! And tell them thank you for me!
(Mirabelle is sitting on the bench.)
(She looks tired... But she's smiling, too.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: The lady who was sitting on that bench gave me a peach.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I love peaches. They're like... My number one favorite food!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Did you say "thank you" to that nice lady?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yeah! . . .

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Ah, no, I forgot.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Bonnie...
(Oh!)
(You didn't know Bonnie liked peaches.)
(You smile.)
(Bonnie looks a little sleepy.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Snnnnnzzzzz . . .

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: WAHRGFH!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: N-No, I wasn't asleep.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hurry up and do what you need to, Siffrin.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We still need to talk to the Head Housemaiden after that...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Prepare for our journey to reunite Bonnie with their sister... Make sure it'd be okay for Bonnie to travel with us... Maybe she'd like to come too...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And we need to take care of any unseen wounds we might have right now... And eat... And sleep, and...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Eh, I'll worry about all this later.
(Odile is reading the familytale you got for her with a gentle smile on her face.)
(She seems content.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...  Hey, hey, m'dame Odile.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: You're not studying anything, are you?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Like, we were wrong, and you're not here to study anything.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh my... How did you find out?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, I had a feeling for a while.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But it was fun to imagine what you were studying. Thank you for playing along!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hahaha...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I am very proud of you for finally figuring it out.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yay!
(The wind blows through Isabeau's hair.)
(He seems at peace.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...Ready to go, Sif?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Alright. We'll wait for you!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Alright!!! Let's go, then!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, I hope Housemaiden Mirabelle is okay!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hah... Mirabelle.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Huh? Huh? What's that sigh for?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: DO YOU NOT LIKE MIRABELLE, YOU MONSTER?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: She owns the 3rd issue of "The Cursing of Château Castle".

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes? And--

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: First edition.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: What? The one that supposedly has a misprint that foreshadows something that happens in issue 63? Isn't there only ten of those in circulation in Vaugarde?!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...How did she--

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: She sent a letter to the publishing company that straddled the line between adorable and stern so well, the publishing company sent her a copy.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Along with an autograph from the author.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Stylish One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, Housemaiden Mirabelle... You're so cool...
(They're now talking about their theories for the last issue of "The Cursing of Château Castle".)
(What a heated conversation!)
(You shouldn't spoil it for them... You leave them to it.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Cool Jeweler
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: This one... Why this one...
(She is looking at her wife with an incredulous smile on her face.)
(The unfrozen lady is wearing a necklace with uneven, weirdly shaped pearls.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Cool Wife
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: It has personality!!! I love it!!!
(She is looking at the necklace with tears in her eyes.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: So.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: So.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I've heard everyone in Dormont has gotten flowers, or flower seeds from you at some point.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And that you've even given some flowers to some of the travelers.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I did.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: WHY HAVEN'T I GOTTEN ANY?!??!?!!
(Oh!)
(It's true, their house doesn't have any flowers around it, doesn't it?)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: You know why.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, come on... How long will you hold that over me for?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Beautiful One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I didn't mean to step on your foot this hard, the last time we danced together!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: OH YEAH? WELL--
(A dispute!!!)
(You leave them to it.)
(They seem to have stopped fighting.)
(They're smiling and laughing with one another.)
(You smile, too.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: So, I'm glad Vaugarde is saved and all...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But what the crab was that weird sky thing earlier?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I-I have a theory!!! Do you know about "colors"?!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm... The weird shades people could see before, correct?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes! So, my theory is...
(The librarian takes a big breath, about to explain their theory.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I'm sorry! I don't actually care that much! Please forget I asked anything!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I-I think I might write a book about this! People need to know!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I think you should! I'm sure it will make the Change God happy!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Isn't it nice, to sit down with everyone, on the dawn of a new day?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: It really is.
(The daydreaming one seems to be thinking hard about something...)
(You let them both be.)
(Discretely, you keep listening in.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Madame... You've lived in this village longer than I've been alive...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Do you...   Do you remember if I ever had a sister?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: A sister...?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm... I am not aware of you ever having a sister... But my memory isn't what it used to be!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Ah... Right...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I just... Had a nice dream. Where I had a sister.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh! Is that so?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: What did she look like, this dream sister?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...She had...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: She had very light shoulder-length hair, always in a bun. And she was always carrying this big bag around... Saying that...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...Saying that one day, she'll travel the world, and see every country on Earth!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yes! How did you know?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm...   I do not know!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Old One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But somehow, it's very strange, but... I can see you having a sister! I can imagine it very well!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hah...
(The daydreaming one smiles.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Daydreaming One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hearing this... Makes me very happy.
(They're both silently looking at the sky, each in their own worlds.)
(Um, you don't recognize this person.)
(Were they in the village before...?)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh... Hi... You're one of the saviors, right...?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Um... Thank you for your help.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I stayed in my home, while everything was happening with the King... I was too scared to come out.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I thought that if I stayed inside, I wouldn't be frozen in time or anything...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Which, um, was stupid, because everyone in Dormont got frozen for like a few hours.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: But now we're back, so. I went out so I could party with everyone.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I missed talking to everyone. I'm glad I can still do it, now.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And it's thanks to you, and Mirabelle, and everyone who helped her.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: So, thank you for saving us.
(Genuine thanks...!!!!!!!)
(You escape.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Shy Stranger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I get it... I'm shy, too.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Fishing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Ssshhh...   The fish are back.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Fishing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Do not make a sound, step back, and let me fish.
(You silently nod, and tiptoe away.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Fishing One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Heheheeeee...
(For once, her laugh seems genuine.)
(The blind one hears you walking towards him.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Blind One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh, hello.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Blind One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...   It feels nice to hear people laugh again, isn't it?
(He seems peaceful.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hey.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh. Did you want anything?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Sorry. Everyone ate my whole stock.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Turns out, knowing you're going to live makes people hungry.
(He seems happy.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: U-um!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hi!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I helped dad today!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Big Boulanger
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And you did a good job, too.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Small Boulangère
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: AND I DID A GOOD JOB, TOO!!!
(She has a big smile on her face.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Smug One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Vaugarde is saved now, isn't it?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Smug One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hm... I could go back to Poteria now, like I planned.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Smug One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Or I could stay a little bit longer.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Smug One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: For the pastries.
(They're drooling a little bit.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Running One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Hahaha, yes!!! Vaugarde is saved!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Running One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And you know what this means...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Running One
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I NEED ENERGY TO GO HUG MY NOW-UNFROZEN SIBLING!!! Boulanger, give me your scrumptiousest pastries!!!
(Even now, they are running in place, whispering "run run run run run run run" repeatedly under their breath.)
(No more croissants.)
(Soup!)
(A tower of plates.)
(Whatever this is, it smells good!)
(A tower of bowls.)
(Stew!)
(An empty bowl.)
(Some food.)
(It's locked.)
(They must be celebrating outside...)
(You could go back to everyone, but you haven't looked at that coin near the tree...)
(Stay here and go to the tree, or go and end your journey?)
(You decide to stay, and go look at that coin.)
(You're tired.)
(You just want to sleep.)
(You decide to go back with everyone to the Head Housemaiden.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Siffrin! Did you give our thanks to Loop?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Did something happen...?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: "I couldn't talk to Loop."

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Aw! That's too bad.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Maybe you can talk to them later, then?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: And we can come with you, and we can say thanks, too!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Bonbon...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: (You smile sadly.) "Maybe later, yeah."

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Heheh.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Pst... We WILL talk about this later, Siffrin.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I don't want you to stay sad and not talk about this.
(You smile, and nod.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Are we good? Let's go back to the Head Housemaiden, then!
(The kid turns to look at you.)
(The kid seems to study your face, and breaks out into a big smile.)
(Happily, they show you their drawing.)
(You crouch.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: "It's me and everyone."
(The kid giggles.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: "Thank you for all your wonderful drawings."
(The kid huffs proudly, and goes back to drawing.)
(You smile.)
(The kid kicks their feet happily.)

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Urgh.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: NO, we're NOT gonna play Rock Paper Scissors with you, Tutorial Kid.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Ngh...!!! How can this be?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Rock Paper Scissors is awesome!!! It's the basis of this world, of life, of--

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: URGH!!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I swear, do you only know this one game or what?!?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sky-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Yeah, Tutorial Kid, do you know any other games.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: OF COURSE I KNOW OTHER GAMES!!!!!!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...Okay I don't know any other games.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Frog-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sky-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Do you want us to teach you how to play other games?

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Sky-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We can play the cat game.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Frog-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: We can give you a tutorial!

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: Oh...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...I've always given tutorials to people...

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: I've never been given a tutorial before.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: First time for everything, Tutorial Kid.

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: Wizard-loving Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: No...  "The-One-Who-Was-Given-A-Tutorial Kid".

acts/act6/act6npcs.html.speaker: The-One-Who-Was-Given-A-Tutorial Kid
acts/act6/act6npcs.html.dialogue: ...!
(The-One-Who-Was-Given-A-Tutorial Kid looks emotionally compromised.)
(The kids are giving a tutorial on how to play the cat game.)
(It sounds complicated... Are you too old to get it?!?)
(Nothing to do here!)

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "And trying to make you stronger and stuff."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Oh, nah, it's okay, I get it.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: You were weird and mean yesterday because you were hungry and sick!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Me and my sister also get really cranky when we're hungry or sick.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: One time, I broke her favorite bowl because I was hungry, and another time, she yelled at me very loud because I didn't clean my room and she was sick.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And you were hungry AND sick at the SAME TIME!!!!!!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And also, um, you were sad, right? Because you thought we were all leaving?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And because we, um, didn't notice you were sad before? 'Cuz we don't remember it?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Because you went through the same day a bunch of times and we didn't know?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Odile said... You were sticked in a timeloops. Or something.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I don't really get it, but isn't it like...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: It's like you had to go to school every day without a day off or even a lunch break, right?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Like, you had to sit at school and the teacher taught you the exact same thing every time and you had to act like you didn't know the thing?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And you had to do that for a very long time?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I've never been hungry AND sick AND sad AND still had to go to school at the same time before...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: But I think that if I was, I would blow up the world.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: That's how mean I would be.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: (Hahaha!) "You would blow up the world, huh?"

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Blow up this whole crabbing world.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And you were only mean to us, which is four people, but THEN you went through the whole House on your own! And you almost beat the King, too!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And you ALMOST blew up the world I think, but not really, and it only made the sky go weird for a bit instead, so it's fine.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I think that, uh...     Bolances it out.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I tried to protect you, and I did the exact opposite."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I shouldn't have done what I did."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: It's okay, you were just being stupid.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Za told me adults can be stupid too. It happens.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: So try not to be stupid anymore!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "Do you still carry snacks on you?"
(Bonnie smiles mischievously and looks towards your pockets.)
(You got the ETERNAL SNACKS? BUT WHEN?)
(You put the snacks back in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Wait, of course you're hungry!!! You barely ate anything and you had a fever and you fought a bunch of Sadnesses on your own!!!
(Bonnie gives you a truly immense amount of snacks!!!)
(They smell so good!!! You're so hungry!!!)
(You start eating, expecting to eat them all...)
(You're not even halfway done with the pile, but you're already comfortably full.)

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Are you okay, Frin? Did you eat your fill?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I didn't realize you were such an amazing cook, Bonbon."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "You prepared a whole lot of snacks, before."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: So, so does that mean, um...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Did I ever... Make malanga fritters, before?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And... A-And, what did you think?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Well, of course you liked them. I'm very good at cooking.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: But I didn't know them before! Did you eat them a lot, when you were a kid?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "If nothing else, I do remember that, right now."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I'll tell you about that, one day, maybe."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "It would just be a lot to talk about, right now."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Ah, yeah, adult stuff, I get it.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: But tell me later, then, okay?
(Bonnie jumps and gives you one back.)

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Why are you talking about this?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I talked to you about it before."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I got in front of that Sadness back then because I wanted to protect you."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "I didn't mean to get hurt, but if it's anyone's fault, it was mine."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: But... If only I was stronger then...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I guess you can protect me sometimes if you promise not to get hurt.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I don't want you to get hurt

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: (You remember a hand, squeezing.)     "I haven't been very good at keeping promises to you."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I mean, if you aren't good at keeping promises, it doesn't mean you have to stop trying to keep them.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I... I'm not good at keeping promises either.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I kept promising my sister I would do my chores, or clean my room, or not blow up the kitchen, but sometimes I did it anyway.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: She yelled at me, and made me promise that I would run as far as I could, so I would live.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And I didn't think I could do it, but I tried very, very hard.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And I'm okay, now! And I'll get to show her I'm okay, when we go see her! So...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And you'll be with me! And I'll say, "That's Frin! I'm here and you're okay because he made a wish for that to happen"!!!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: So, I don't think promises are that important to keep, but they're important to TRY to keep, you know?

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: And I'll super duper try to protect you without getting hurt, too!!!
(Bonnie runs into you and bonks your stomach. Ouch!)

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Oh, you know how to give hugs, now!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: You had a teacher for hugs? That's weird.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: But, um, I know, stupid. I can see it.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: (Why would you tell a kid this!!!) "S-Sorry, it's just..."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "You... Because of us, every loop, you'd get really worried that we'd die."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "So... Even if you don't remember, I just wanted to tell you that we're all okay."

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: "Sorry, that was stupid. You don't even remember.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: No, I get it! You HAD to tell me!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: It's like when I dreamt that my sister stole my breakfast and when I woke up I wouldn't talk to her until she apologized.

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: Past Bonnie was scared about everyone dying and I don't remember but you do...

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: ...And it makes you happy everyone is okay and you wanted to tell past Bonnie about it, and I'm here so you can tell me!!!

acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/bonnieend6.html.dialogue: I'm glad everyone is okay, too!
(You smile, and breathe out slowly, trying not to cry.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "I'm sorry about everything I said it wasn't cool and you didn't deserve that when you were just trying to help--"

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Yeah, Sif, and the stuff you said yesterday was so accurate and cutting, too! My poor little heart was so hurt!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I was so hurt yesterday I couldn't do anything except lie in bed crying, and think about what horrible spirit possessed you...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: --And hey hey hey stop making that face I'm kidding sorry!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I mean, yeah, you hurt my fee-fees... My ling-lings...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: But it was also kinda cool?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I don't know, sometimes someone reads you a little too well and it's like, "Oh crab, that's so true!!! Why would you say this!!! Ow!!!"

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: But also, like... "Oh, you pay that much attention to me...?"
(Your cheeks feel impossibly warm all of a sudden.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: And I'm guessing a lot of what you said was stuff we talked about before, in your loops, right? And I must've repeated the same things a lot, but...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Weirdly enough I feel a little flattered! Thank you for seeing me this clearly!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: If you still feel bad, you can say something nice to me later. Balance things out.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: But I'm not mad about it! It was interesting!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: But also don't do that stuff again. You get a pass because you were sad and also going crazy.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: (You nod.) "I'll be sure to only say nice things, in the future."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Yay! Then feel free to tell me all the stuff you want! And I'll do the same!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: A-Actually, speaking of stuff to tell...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Can I tell you something, maybe?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I-If that's okay. I just have something to tell you, and I feel like this is the moment.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I dunno, Sif-- Are you sure? Is it okay if I tell you something now?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Because it might be a lot and you've been through a lot today already and I just want to make sure you'd be fine if I told you and--
(Even now, his hand is reaching out to you, hovering, unable to take the first step.)
(Gently, you take his hand, and hold it tightly.)
(The Universe seems to hold its breath.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I should just go for it, right?
(You just look into his eyes and wait.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Sif. I really really liked traveling with you during this journey. I really care about you, you're one of my best friends, my comedy partner, an incredibly important person to me, and...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I love you so, so, so much!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I love talking to you! And hearing your jokes! And seeing the little smirk you make right before telling one!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: And how you're so nice! How you always listen to what everyone has to say! How you always try to give advice even though you're not always very good at it!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh! And I love your eye! Your hair looks so soft! And I love that you're small and cute! But like in the way a very sharp cooking knife with flowers and little hearts is small and cute!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: And I like how your face looks when you eat something you like! And how you hide your face under your hat when you feel embarrassed! And how you look all focused when you watch a play or read a book! And--

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh!!! Sorry!!! I got a little excited...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh man... It felt like I couldn't stop talking! Like I was sitting on this forever!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Did you hear all of this already? Did I just repeat myself like an idiot when I already confessed a bunch of times?!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "No, that was the first time for me, too."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh well! Now you know, heh!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I love you, Sif! I love you!!! You better not forget it!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Well, to be honest, I knew you did, because I have eyes.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: But, do you love me the same way I love you, though?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "Give me some time to figure it out."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Of course! Take all the time you need, Sif!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh no, did I try to confess every single loop and chickened out, or something?!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Maybe you didn't get to say it before, but you did it this time, Isabeau.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: You did it, Za. You said the thing.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: About time, if you ask me.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I-I'm sorry, have you been in love with Siffrin for a long time and I never noticed?!?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh Change!!! Congratulations for saying it, Isabeau!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Th... Thank you? I can try and catch you up later, if you want?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Also, wait, were you all listening earlier?!?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Of course we were listening. We needed to make sure we wouldn't interrupt.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Bonnie
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: We would never interrupt!!! We have been raised well!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Did we interrupt, in your previous loops...?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh, that's really funny, actually. So sorry, Isabeau.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Past yous are all terrible wingmen?!? What the crab?!?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "And that's all that matters, doesn't it?"
(You make sure everyone has stopped listening, and whisper to Isabeau.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "There is one thing I'd like to apologize for, Isa."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "I kissed you, once, in one loop."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "I didn't really ask if it was okay or anything..."
(You hear a very high pitched sound. Are you hearing things again?)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I'm fine. I'm okay. We kissed. It's fine. I'm being perfectly normal about this piece of information.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: This is like hearing I got blackout drunk and did some awesome stuff and I don't get to remember it.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Crab. I'm so mad I don't remember. Why is the world like this.
(You feel very warm all of a sudden.)
(He pushed you away, then, so clearly, even if it was fine, you must've done something wrong.)
(Isabeau is looking at your face carefully...)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: If it didn't go that well, the one time it happened...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Maybe we just need to get more practice, huh?
(You raise your eye and look at him.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "There's loads of time I wouldn't have been able to progress without you knowing about stuff."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh, the mirror... It's true no one knew about it, earlier...

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I don't like to show off! Being too smart puts people off, I think.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I mean, look at m'dame Odile.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Odile
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Are you trying to tell me something, Isabeau?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: We like you for your stunning personality and not because you're smart, m'dame. I need you to know that.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "And we wouldn't like you any less if you were smart, you know."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Let me become a clothing designer first, and then I'll go up to being a smart clothing designer.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Oh! And you knew about the clothing designer thing, too!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Did I tell you about it, before?
(You didn't want to hear anything about the future, after that.)
(You do want to hear about it, now.)

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: Well, when I become a clothing designer, you know you'll have to be my first model, Sif.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I wanna design some cool comfy clothes for you!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: It's what you wished for, after all, huh?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "Alright, then. I'll let you design clothes for me."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: A joke? You know you don't need to ask at this point, buddy.

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "I do want to preface by saying."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "That you told me this joke before."

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: "'Why shouldn't you take up time travel?'"

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: When did I tell you this joke?

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: That's such an awful joke, though!!! I'm so sorry!!! Hahahahaha!!!

acts/act6/isaend6.html.speaker: Isabeau
acts/act6/isaend6.html.dialogue: I gotcha. I'm very easy to say hi to.

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: Siffrin! Are you feeling better?

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: You looked so sick earlier!!! I got really worried!!!

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: "I... I'm better now, Mira."

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: Ah... I'm very glad.

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: Um, are you--

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: (You have to say it!!!) "I-I'm sorry for what I said earlier. Yesterday."

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: Oh!

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: "It was, um... I was out of line. I'm sorry."

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Mirabelle
acts/act6/miraend6.html.dialogue: Siffrin...

acts/act6/miraend6.html.speaker: Siffrin
