random/deaths.html.dialogue: And the Kid's name is Bonnie. Boniface, but no one except Odile calls them that.

random/deaths.html.speaker: Loop
random/deaths.html.dialogue: They have trouble seeing this name as theirs, because they're still young. They introduced themselves as Bonnie as soon as they could talk.

random/deaths.html.speaker: Loop
random/deaths.html.dialogue: You called them "Bonbon" for a while, because they always had snacks and sweets on them. But you stopped, after you started thinking they hated you.

random/deaths.html.speaker: Loop
random/deaths.html.dialogue: Nicknames are for people who like you, after all.

random/deaths.html.speaker: Loop
random/deaths.html.dialogue: ...I think you could call them Bonbon again, and they wouldn't mind.

random/deaths.html.speaker: Loop
random/deaths.html.dialogue: Take a break, stardust. Do that breathing thing you like. We can talk later, okay?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Remnants of the people that were defeated by the King...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Their grief and sadness is all that remains.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: They cannot tell friend from foe anymore. Defeating them is all we can do...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue:
Every Sadness has a different resistance and weakness.
Maybe there's a way to figure it out from their appearance...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We need to do certain hand signs when we Craft skills... So maybe we should look at their hands?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: They must be different somehow... If we can catch a difference, it might become easier to find their weakness.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: One strengthens our enemies, the other weakens us...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It'll be bad if we let them do as they please!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Isabeau, you have a few similar Crafts at your disposal, so...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I'm on it! Just keep attacking, and I'll buff you guys up!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Aw, poor buddy lost its friends!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Boniface, it may look different, but it's still a Sadness like all the ones we've seen before.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I believe the preteen when it comes to the Sadness' weirdness, m'dame.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Let's get the weird Sadness, then...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This one... Is it just me, or is there something weird about it...?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It seems a little stronger than the Sadnesses we've seen so far!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And it's not showing its hands! It's crabbing annoying!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We could observe its attacks, or look at it carefully when we hit it.
(The Sadness left something behind when it dissolved...)
(It has a teardrop engraved on it...)
(You put the Star Crest in your Pocket.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Like the Tear we passed by earlier.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Hm... Maybe it'll be useful later?
(Could you use this on the Tears blocking your way...?)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Like the Tears we just saw.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Hm... Maybe this crest can help us clear the way...?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It seems to be guarding the rest of the House from us...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It feels strong! Stronger than those we've seen so far!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Something appeared for a second on the big ball head!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We can probably assume that's its current Craft Type...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: If you need help, Siffrin, let me know and I'll analyze this enemy.
(Looks like you'll have to figure out its type based on how it attacks.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It showed a [Rock/Paper/Scissors] symbol! So it's [Rock/Paper/Scissors] type now!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I'm not sure [Rock and Scissors/Paper and Rock/Paper and Scissors] attacks will work...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This might be a good opportunity to build up Jackpot points, everyone.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Let's use the same Craft Type five times in a row!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It's not advertising its new Craft Type anymore...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Sounds like we'll have to try stuff out and see what hits!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This one is kind of cute!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Is it? I think it looks frightening...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I'm with m'dame Odile on this one... Creepy...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: You said "creepy" first so we win.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Playing both sides, though... How devious, Siffrin...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: THEY SAID CUTE FIRST!!!! I HEARD YOU, YOU SAID CUTE FIRST!!!! IT'S CUTE!!!!!
(ANGOISSE protects an ally with its body!)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Yeah... Defeating someone who's only trying to protect someone else doesn't feel very...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: They still ARE attacking us, you know.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: If it makes you feel better, even if we break the remnants apart, they'll come back together eventually.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And happily kill us with no remorse.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Let's focus on the one we can attack right now.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: If it explodes, we'll be lucky to get out unharmed. I can try and slow it down with my Crafts while you attack, but...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Eh, we can always escape if we get too scared!
[Reminder, stardust! You can escape almost any battle!]
[To escape, instead of attacking or using a Craft, press [back]. From there, you have the option to escape!]
[You're pretty crafty, so escaping will never be a problem. Well, unless you're fighting a Floor Boss, or the King.]
[Make sure to escape when you need to. Not all battles need to be fought.]

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Like the one that gave us the Crest?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Wait, Boniface? What do you mean by wei--

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: N-no time, madame! Let's get ready!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This one... Is it just me, or is there something weird about it...?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It seems a little stronger than the Sadnesses we've seen so far!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And it's not showing its hands! It's crabbing annoying!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We could observe its attacks, or look at it carefully when we hit it.
(You put the Star Crest in your Pocket.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We should be careful about where we use this one...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: The long-haired one is doing something...!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And gave the other one more strength in the process...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: The short-haired one is doing something...!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And healed itself in the process...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: The long-haired one looks enamored with the other... It looks like it wants to protect the short-haired one more than it wants to attack us.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We could go for the one that doesn't attack, or the one that does... It's up to you, Siffrin.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: With its dying breath, it protected its partner...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Hm. And how does that make you feel, Bonnie?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: No! I mean the SADNESS is stupid.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We're gonna beat the other one now. It should've protected itself, and not another Sadness.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It's stupid for protecting the other one.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And the one who's being protected is stupid too!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Heh, I'm not stupid, YOU'RE stupid!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: No!!! Young love, dashed into pieces!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This is what love does to you.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Stop acting like a jaded old woman, m'dame, it doesn't suit you.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Alright! One last floor to go!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Sadnesses whose focus is in slowing us down.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I feel slower and heavier just looking at them...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue:
If we get too slow to react, it might become dangerous...
Make sure to keep your speed up.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: What a mess... I can't tell which is which.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: I can't tell when they'll attack, either!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Or how much health they've got left...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: So annoying. Alright everyone, let's untangle this one.
(You can't see it's health, or when it'll attack.)
(But you can see them. You just need to aim.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Cute but strong, aren't you little guy!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Beating a Sadness like this will definitely make us stronger!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Let's stay on our guard. We can still run away if it's too strong for us.
[To escape, press [back] during anyone's turn, and choose "ESCAPE"!]

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: This one... Is it just me, or is there something weird about it...?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: It seems a little stronger than the Sadnesses we've seen so far!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: And it's not showing its hands! It's crabbing annoying!!!

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We could observe its attacks, or look at it carefully when we hit it.
(You put the Star Crest in your Pocket.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Alright, Boniface, what do you mean by..."Weird smelly".

random/enemies.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Those sadnesses all smell really sugary.
(The hole doesn't really bring you anywhere.)

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Boniface, what about this wall? What does it smell like?
(The big one is now vulnerable to [Rock/Paper/Scissors] attacks[!/.])
(The big one is now even more vulnerable to [Rock/Paper/Scissors] attacks[!/.])

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Very nice of those hands to not attack us.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/enemies.html.dialogue: But none of our attacks are hurting that big one...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: All those hands around it... It is making it invulnerable?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We should try to defeat one of those hands and see what happens.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Just like I thought... Defeating those hands made it more vulnerable.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: So by defeating a [Rock/Paper/Scissors] hand, which is vulnerable to [Paper/Scissors/Rock], we made the big one vulnerable to [Paper/Scissors/Rock] as well...

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Do you think that defeating two same hands would make it even more vulnerable to our attacks?

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: We could take care of all those hands first, or we could just defeat a few and maybe save ourselves some time.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Odile
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Let's attack that big one, then.

random/enemies.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/enemies.html.dialogue: Come on everyone, let's keep going!!!

random/equipment.html.dialogue: (Woah.)
(You stumble.)
(There was something there, you remember.)
(Did this happen because whatever you found here before is already in your possession...?)
(You feel dizzy.)
(You don't stumble this time, but you feel dizzy still.)
(Felt like the air around you warped and changed for a second...)
(You're getting used to this.)
(Something was here before, but you always keep whatever weapons or armors you get through loops...)
(Is the world... Rewriting itself, when you look again?)
(You're ready for it, this time.)
(You'll be fine looking at old spots like this, from now on.)

random/equipment.html.speaker: Odile
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Something's weird.

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Huh? Something's weird? Like what?

random/equipment.html.speaker: Odile
random/equipment.html.dialogue: ...I'll let you know when I find out.
Your trusty dagger. Does the job.

Not that easy to wield. Cuts everything.
[Boosts ATK, lowers ATKSPD.]
(The closet is filled with gardening supplies.)
(You got the GARDEN SCISSORS!)
(You put the Garden Scissors in your pocket to equip later.)
(There's some gardening books about rare and powerful plants.)
(Powerful plants... Somehow, you're reminded of the Favor Tree.)

(The bottom of the page says "For more information on this topic, check out...")
(You can't read the title they're recommending.)
(They do mention the cover of the book they're recommending has a picture of a big, sparkly tree.)
(Can you find that book somewhere...?)
(None of them catch your eye.)

A blade gifted by the Change God, and sharpened by you.
[Boosts ATK when fighting the King.]
(Sharpening stone, apply to KeyKnife.)
(You take the KeyKnife and sharpening stone, and mumble repeatedly the first thing that comes to mind...)
(You take the KeyKnife and sharpening stone, and mumble repeatedly...)

random/equipment.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Please be sharp,

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Please be sharp,

random/equipment.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Please be sharp!!!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Odile
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Well, it's sharp now.
(Woohoo!)
(You got the KNIFEKEY!)
(You put the Knifekey in your pocket to equip later.)
[Woohoo, you did it!]
[You are now the proud owner of a KnifeKey, a knife that can cut anything, ESPECIALLY the King.]
[Yes, you heard that correctly! When the KnifeKey is equipped, your ATTACK will be boosted when fighting against the King! Isn't that grand!!!]
[One thing though... This weapon isn't like the others. You can only equip it when you make it, which means you'll have to pick up the KeyKnife and sharpen it every time.]
[It's an important item, after all! You can't just HAVE it!!!]
[Unless...]
(You got a MEMORY OF KNIFEKEY!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[If you equip this memory, and loop back to the King, you will automatically have the KnifeKey equipped!!!]
[That's it, stardust! Bye!!!]
(You got the KNIFEKEY!)
(You put the Knifekey in your pocket to equip later.)

Looks remarkably like a wizard's hat.
[Boosts ATKSPD & CritChance.]

The fabric lining the inside of the hat is filled with stars.
[Boosts DEF, ATKSPD & CritChance, heals 5% HP every turn.]
(A drawer.)
(You open it...)
(There's a beautiful hat inside.)
(It's very similar to yours.)
(You got the STARRY HAT!)
(You put the hat in your Pockets to equip later.)
(There's--)
(--Nothing inside.)
(But the Starry Hat was here before. You remember.)

You can see better, now.
[Boosts ATKSPD & CritChance]
A graceful weapon made stronger with a Housemaiden's will.
A rapier made for battle-- and big stitches. Protected by sharpness.

random/equipment.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Oh! Look, on the wall, there's a sword!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/equipment.html.dialogue: This sword looks rapier-like. You wanna take it, Mira?

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Hm... Taking things that don't belong to you is bad...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Okay... Oh, it's from one of my classmates...? I...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Oh... Oh!!!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: That's from, um, a scary classmate of mine...!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Or at least, I thought she was scary! She has a very intense look, you know!!!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/equipment.html.dialogue: But... She's gifting me a bow she made...

I WON'T BE ABLE TO KNOW WHAT HAPPENS
TO LORD JOSÉPHANDRE IN THE FINAL ISSUE OF "THE CURSING OF CHÂTEAU CASTLE"!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Did he manage to protect his castle to the very end?!? Did he finally find his friend Pierre-Jacques-Erneste, did he finally find more about himself?!?

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: That's...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: THAT'S AN ENDING BETTER THAN MY WILDEST DREAMS!!!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: He was just a guy... He was just a guy...!!!

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: He saved so many people, made the world a better place, and everyone thought it was because of who he was, of his past, but...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: But he was just a guy...!!!
(Uh oh, tears are coming out!!!)

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Thank you. I... I'm so glad I got to know this, before...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Um, I wanted to give you something, but... I can't...

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Knowing the final issue's contents must've shocked me more than I thought.

random/equipment.html.speaker: Castle-Loving One
random/equipment.html.dialogue: Now... Can you please leave? I need to lay in bed and think about this ending.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Shut up!"

random/memories.html.dialogue: "SHUT. UP."

(Huh?)
(HUH?)
(Hold on,
(DID YOU JUST DIE?)

(You DID, you think! You must have! You were in the House and then a big rock fell and now you're in the meadow, back in Dormont, and what Mirabelle just said to you, waking you up, that was, very, familiar???)
(But aaargh, the trap, the trap!!! You idiot! You stupid fool! It's your job to take care of traps and you got taken out IMMEDIATELY!!!!)

(You didn't even see a glimpse of the King!!! And it's your job, stupid!!! Your job to see ahead, to take care of traps!!! You couldn't even do your job and now you're DEAD because you did a SLOPPY AWFUL TERRIBLE JOB,)
(And you DIED!!! YOU DIED!!!! You felt your body being crushed and now you're laying on the grass, alive, and your skin itches and your stomach hurts and you DIED!!!!)
(You put your hands over your mouth and scream!!! Stars!!!! You’re so stupid and useless and dumb!!!!!!!!!)
(AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA)
(Okay you're over it now.)
(You take a deeeeeeep breath iiiiiiiiin, and ouuuuuuuuuut.)
(Pheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeew.)
(You put your shaking hands behind your back, pressing them hard between you and the grass.)
(Okay, you died, that's one thing.)
(And now, you're alive, and not a crêpe, that's another thing.)
(And it's apparently the day before, back when Mirabelle woke you up from your nap, that's the third thing.)
(You went   back in time?)
(Okay, that's normal. Totally normal.)
(Totally one hundred percent completely normal.)
(...Oh well, at least you were in the lead as always.)
(Judging by where you were when you died, you were probably the only one who got hit. The only one that...)
(In a way, you're REALLY glad you're forced to take the lead every time you and everyone else get somewhere dangerous.)
(But...   You're back. Back to the day before you went to the House.)
(And why?)
(And...   Can you make sure to not die this time?)
(Back to work, Siffrin. You have a country to save.)
(You got a MEMORY OF LOOPING!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[Memories are a type of item you can equip. Each Memory is specific to one character, and gives them special abilities.]
[For example, the Memory you just got can only be equipped by you. When Memory of Looping is equipped, it'll boost your MaxHP by +5 per loop.]
[You can equip Memories by opening your menu and going to the Equip section!]
(What is that voice you've been hearing this whole time...?)

Still a long way to go.

(Woah, hahaha! Woohoo!!!)
(THAT WAS AWFUL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!)
(You try to catch your breath.)
(Your body is fine and unharmed, but your brain still hasn't gotten the message, it seems.)
(Stars, this was awful!!!)
(Did he really kill you in one strike? This feels a little disrespectful, doesn't it?)
(That attack was so strong!!! Why was it so strong??? HOW is he so strong???)
(That strike hit so hard, you don't think just buffing your defense with skills or equipment will be enough to survive it...)
(Is there something out there that could protect you against it? A Craft Skill, maybe?)
(...Mirabelle...)
(She's the one who usually heals you all in battle. She knows healing Crafts you've never even heard of.)
(Maybe she would know something.)
(But for now...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hey--

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Stop."

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Just say 'I told you so', and we can move on."

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: I TOLD YOU SO!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Teehee, what a stupid idea you had!!! Thinking the King could be turned good!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: He's the King!!! He's probably the reason you're here, or related to it, at least!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: And all you had to do was find out he shares your tragic backstory for you to feel pity for him. He didn't have to lift a finger!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: And because of you... Bonnie was--

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Anyway, I told you so.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: But... What he said back then...

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "He mentioned something..."

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Something about 'Wish Craft'."

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: He did.

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "What's 'Wish Craft'?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: I don't know.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Wish Craft... Crafting wishes? That sounds impossible, and way too convenient.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: But he seemed to imply you were using it? That's what it felt like to me.

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I've never heard of Wish Craft before."

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Me neither. I wouldn't even know where to find information about it.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: But... That IS new information.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: So, as stupid as the whole "making friends with the King" was...

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: You did find something new.
(Was it worth it?)
(Every time you close your eyes, you still see a hand, tightening.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: I'm also wondering... The way you looped last time, wasn't it...

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Whatever, it's not like your Kid will remember whatever just happened anyway!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Just put it behind you!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: And this whole thing gave you something else, didn't it?

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Another Memory to equip.

(You didn't even notice...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: You'll always remember this, after all.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Let me do the usual.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: [You got a MEMORY OF MEMORIES. When equipped, Memory of Memories allows you to read books you couldn't before!]

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: The ones written in that language that just gives you a headache. The ones from your country.
(Oh, how useful and neat, to be able to read your own blinding language.)
(You might as well read any books you find, before you forget again.)
(Like you do everything else.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: And, if you can read that language...

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Maybe you can explore the House a bit more.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: Don't despair, stardust. There's still a path to follow!

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...You should talk to me about the loops, too. I can help you figure out what to do next.

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: In the meantime, though...

random/memories.html.speaker: Loop
random/memories.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

Mirabelle, always ready to learn more.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: It's a nice classroom, isn't it? Wonder what classes were taught here.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hnrgh... I have bad memories of this classroom.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Why? Did you have a bad class in this room, Belle?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ah, no, not... Um...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: It's... I gave a class here, not too long before the King attacked.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: YOU'RE A TEACHER?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Gasp! You never said!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: N-no!!! It was just one lecture, I, um...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden... She said it would be good for me, to give a lecture...

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: A lecture on...?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: I'm... I'm well known in Dormont's House for being the Housemaiden who has taken... The most classes?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Taken the most classes? Like, as a student?

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: How many is that?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Haha... Since I came to live here, I think I registered for...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...A little more than a hundred and fifty classes...?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: HUH?!?

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: MIRABELLE?!

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: YOU WENT TO SCHOOL THAT LONG?!????!??!?!?!?!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: So she wanted me to do a lecture... On what taking all those classes taught me...

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...And?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: And...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: And I messed it up. I just didn't know what to say...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: I didn't think taking all those different classes taught me anything worthwhile, to be honest.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: I liked taking them! And I liked learning those things!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: But... I didn't do anything with what I learned. And I wasn't even good at any of it.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: So... Wasn't it all just a waste of time?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: And that's what I ended up saying during the class...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: And everyone was just... Silently looking at me. Judging me...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: So, um, I ran away from the class and stayed in my room for a week, haha.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh no!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh gems.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: To evade judgement and wait for it to blow over, I get it.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: But taking all those classes doesn't seem like it was a waste of time, though?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: It's fine to learn things just for learning's sake!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: And you never know when that knowledge might come in handy.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hm... That's true!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: But... Thinking about it now, I felt like I HAD to do something with that knowledge.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Everyone else in the classes felt like they were learning about their passion, you know?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Artists taking art classes, getting better at their craft, that sort of thing.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: But I was just... Not using those skills outside of class...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: But... Just because everyone was doing their way... Means I can do things my way, too.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: And I can just take a lot of classes because I like to learn!

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yeah!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Maybe this is what the Head Housemaiden wanted you to realize, when she asked you to prepare this class.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Heh, maybe!

random/memories.html.dialogue: Froma--

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Wh-WHAT WAS THAT?!?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh, look! Something's on the ground...

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: A piece of paper...?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ehehehe... BEHOLD!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh!!!
(It's a picture of all of you.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: It's us!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: This is lovely.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Isn't it? It's a crafted mirror that takes pictures!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: I heard rumors that someone was creating one, but I didn't know this someone lived in Dormont's House!

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: We look so surprised!

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hehe, only Isabeau knew this was coming!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Pictures are so rare... It's nice to have one of us.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Thank you for telling us about it, and for taking a picture, Isabeau!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hehe... It's nothing!
(You got a MEMORY OF REFLECTION!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When MEMORY OF REFLECTION is equipped, your DEFENSE will be automatically boosted at the start of a battle!]

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: What should we do with it?

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hm...
(Odile looks at you.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Would you keep it safe, oh one with all the secret pockets?
(You beam.)
(You got the MIRROR PICTURE!)
(You put the picture in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
(Yay!)

Isabeau. Like trying to get blood from a stone.
[Isabeau is immune to Rock attacks.]

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Sif!!! We did it!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: We did it, Sif, we did it! We did it! We stopped the King! We can finally go back to our normal lives! Isn't it great???

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "It is..."

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yeah!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: I... Uh. I said. Do you remember what I said? At the Clocktower?
(You remember.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "You wanted to tell me something?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yes. Um... Yes.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Okay. Phew...

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...  Sif. Siffarooni.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...Siffrin.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...Uh, Sif? ...Is everything okay?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "What?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: You look... Kind of upset.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: What's wrong?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Nothing! What did you want to tell me?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: No, it doesn't matter right now. You don't look good at all.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Are you hungry, maybe? I can tell Bonnie to--
(STARS.)
(Oooooooooooooh, you want to scream. You just want to scream right now.)
(You did everything right. And he won't say it. He can't say it. The Universe won't let him say it!)
(You're not stupid. You know what it is! What he wants to tell you! You know!)
(But it doesn't count if he doesn't say it! It doesn't exist if it's not said!)
(In fact, you can't trust it even if he did say it! Maybe it's not even true! Maybe it is! Maybe it is and it's because you forced him to!)
(You did, didn't you? You forced him, you're forcing him right now!)
(Looping forwards and backwards, making sure no one can interrupt, making sure everything is perfect! Making sure you're perfect!)
(It's because you're looping, you're forcing him, manipulating him to say it! To think it!)
(Making sure he has to say it! Making sure he has no recourse!)
(It's not good! It's awful! He can't feel this way about someone like you!)
(SOMEONE DISGUSTING LIKE YOU!!!!!!!)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: --frin, Siffrin! Please stop gripping your hair, you're going to hurt yourself--

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "DON'T TOUCH ME--"
(You feel a tug on your stomach--)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: --everything okay?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Yep, all good!"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh... Okay!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Anyway, Sif, I'm glad this is over!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: I can't wait to go back to my old job, you know? Make sure to say hi when you're near Jouvente, 'kay?
(You nod, smile fixed on your face.)
(You got a MEMORY OF CONFESSION!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, Memory of Confession makes your Fighter immune to Rock attacks.]

Isabeau makes you laugh.
[Boosts CritChance by 15%.]

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Okay, my turn!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hm... What's a good joke...

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "What for?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Well, to make you laugh, duh.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: You always make me laugh with your puns, so it's my turn!

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "But why?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Uh, because we're friends?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...Do you not-- Nevermind.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: A funny joke, a funny joke...
(Isabeau looks around, and seems to notice the Clocktower in the distance.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ah, I know!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Do you know what I think about 6:30?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "...The time?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yup.

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I dunno, what?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Well...

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: I think 6:30  is HANDS DOWN the best time of the day!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...Oh, you knew this one?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hey, it's okay, I have others. Hm...

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yesterday, I bought like ten watches. Do you know why?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I don't know, Isa."

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Because I have a lot of time on my hands!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...Oh, you knew this one too? Tough crowd, tough crowd.
(Hey, stupid, maybe smile when someone tells a joke.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Okay... Last chance, Isabeau... Don't mess it up.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Okay, so, why shouldn't you take up time travel?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: (Ha.) "Why, Isa?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Easy.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Because there's no future in it!!!
(Hahaha!)
(HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!)
(OH NO, YOU CAN'T STOP LAUGHING!!!)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Heh!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: See, I knew I was gonna get it eventually!
(You keep laughing.)
(You just can't stop.)
(Tears run down your face.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Woah, hey, Sif...
(Oh no, oh no, you're laughing too much!!!)
(You've been laughing for too long, stupid!!! He's gonna think you're weird!!!)
(Stop laughing!!!)
(You try and breathe slowly in, and out, come on, stupid.)
(Pheeeeeeeeeeeew...)
(Okay.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: So, sounds like I should become a comedian, huh?
(You try not to start laughing again.)
(You wipe your face.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I needed that, I think!"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yeah, looks like you reaaaaally did.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: What's wrong?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Nothing's wrong!"

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh, so we're gonna ignore the hysteric laughing and crying, huh?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Yyyyep."

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Okay, but only for now, and only because it's you, Sif!
(You smile.)
(Isabeau hesitantly smiles back.)
(You got a MEMORY OF PUNS!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When Memory of Puns is equipped, your Fighter will have a higher chance to do a Critical hit!]

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Do you want to talk a little more...? About something else, maybe?
Isabeau can learn this skill. [When equipped, learns the skill "SO WEAK!!!"]
(Isabeau just learned a new skill...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Fufufu... I have gotten stronger.
(You got the MEMORY OF SO WEAK!!!!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, your Fighter will be able to use SO WEAK!!! as a skill, even if he isn't at level 46.]

Isabeau can learn this skill.
[When equipped, learns the skill "BREAK, BREAK!!!"]
(Isabeau just learned a new skill...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Fufufu... I have gotten stronger.
(You got the MEMORY OF BREAK, BREAK!!!!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, your Fighter will be able to use BREAK, BREAK!!! as a skill, even if he isn't at level 49.]
[BREAK, BREAK!!! is a skill that lowers one enemy's DEFENSE!]
Isabeau can learn this skill. [When equipped, learns the skill "NOT OVER YET!!!"]
(Isabeau just learned a new skill...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Fufufu... I have gotten stronger.
(You got the MEMORY OF NOT OVER YET!!!!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, your Fighter will be able to use NOT OVER YET!!! as a skill, even if he isn't at level 54.]
[NOT OVER YET!!! is a skill that lowers all of [a friend/an ally/a family member]'s Craft Skill COOLDOWNS by 4.]

You and Isabeau looked at the stars together.
[+30 to all stats.]
(You had a nice time yesterday, hanging out with Isabeau under the stars.)
(You got a MEMORY OF STARGAZING!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[Hi stardust!  I didn't want to interrupt before, but... You got a new memory!]
[When equipped, Memory of Stargazing boosts all of your Fighter's stats by 30! Wow!]
[Your Fighter also learned the skill "WE WILL WIN"!!!]
["WE WILL WIN!!!" is amazingly strong. When used, it boosts everyone's ATTACK, DEFENSE and ATTACK SPEED for a few turns!!!]

[It's so strong, you'll only be able to use it when you and your Fighter have had this exact conversation. So if you loop back to Dormont, you'll have to talk to him all over again! Remember that, okay?]
[But hey, stardust, it was nice, wasn't it? Hanging out with all of them, yesterday?]
[They love you, now! Your bond with them is stronger, now!]
[...Isn't that neat?]
(It is neat.)
(You don't want to have to loop back to before you spent that time with them.)
(What would happen, if... If you stayed with this version of them... Until the end?)
(If you went through the entire House, without looping ahead, beat the King, and saw the Head Housemaiden, with them?)
(Would anything happen?)
(Would anything change?)
(Time to walk all the way up, and beat the King.)

Odile, curious and perceptive. This is how you remember her.
[+5 to all stats.]

Odile knows her tonics. [Health items used by Odile
during battle restore more HP.]

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: A storage room! Let's look around!

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: I see a few tonics on those tables... Make sure to pick them up and give them to Bonnie before we leave.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Check that closet too, there might be some cool stuff in there!

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: (Urgh, items to pick up again.) "Do we REALLY need items?"

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh? I'm surprised to hear this from you, since you just love to pick up random things.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Of course we need those items. Tonics, juices... Those items will keep our health up, and are integral to our survival.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: We can't always count on Mirabelle to heal us. Don't hesitate to use tonics or items in battle if you get overwhelmed.
(This seems important... You decide to remember those words.)
(It'd be bad to be beaten in battle because you forgot about the items you carry...)
(You got a MEMORY OF TONICS!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When Memory of Tonics is equipped, any tonic the Researcher uses will recover more HP!]
Odile is merciless. [Auto ATKSPD UP at the start of battle.]
(A cooking book all about...)
(...Croissants?)

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: So, Mirabelle, about Vaugardian croissants...
(You tune out.)
(Don't want to even think about croissants.)
(Odile is smiling, which means they're probably done.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hm... Fascinating. Thank you, Mirabelle...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hehehe...

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Heh, you were right, Mira...

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: ... You have something to say, perhaps?

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh, no, we would never.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Haha! It's just...

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: It's very cute, right?

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yes!!! It's cute!!! Your eyes light up and everything when you're learning things! It's cute!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Cute...?

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Dile isn't cute, she's old.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: No, Boniface... They have a point... I AM very cute, aren't I?

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: I wonder how cute you'll think I am when I put wasabi in your sandwiches when you least expect it.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: You'd help me out, wouldn't you, Boniface?

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: I'm always up for putting spicy stuff into people's lunches, so yeah.

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Oh no...

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Sorry, madame!!! W-we didn't say anything!!!
(You chuckle.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ah, looks like Siffrin wants a sandwich as well. Would you like me to offer you one of my sandwiches, Siffrin?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: (You've been spotted...!)

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Heh. Good.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: I'll put twice as many peppers in theirs, Dile.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: See that you do.
(Scary!)
(You got a MEMORY OF FIRST STRIKE!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, Memory of First Strike makes everyone FASTER at the start of a battle!]

Too perceptive.
[+50 ATK]

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Huh... I finally figured it out.
(You got the MEMORY OF CRAFT BREAK!)

You and Odile went on a secret quest together.
[+30 to all stats.]
(You got a MEMORY OF SECRET QUEST!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, Memory of Secret Quest boosts all of your Researcher's stats by 30! Wow!]

Bonnie, young and angry. This is how you remember them.
[Bonnie is more likely to attack.]

Bonnie likes to feed everyone.
[Bonnie is more likely to heal everyone.]

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: S-So? Do you all like it? Did I do a good job as Snack Leader?
(You absently nod.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Yeah, this is good.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Mhm!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ah.

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Um.
(Uh oh.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: (You say very loudly:) "THANK YOU SNACK LEADER FOR THIS DELICIOUS MEAL!"

random/memories.html.speaker: Mirabelle
random/memories.html.dialogue: Ooooh, this is soo good!!! Thank you, Bonniiiiiie!

random/memories.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/memories.html.dialogue: Mmmmm, so good, Bonbon!!! I feel refreshed, invigorated, alive!!!

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Hmf.

random/memories.html.speaker: Odile
random/memories.html.dialogue: Mmm, good food, yummy yum yum.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: YES
(You got a MEMORY OF SNACKS!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When equipped, Memory of Snacks makes the Kid more likely to heal during battle.]

Bonnie won't let anything happen to you.
[Bonnie is more likely to buff everyone.]
(Bonnie was listening to you all talk about burial rituals, earlier...)

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "You know, adults are stupid."

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: Huh...?

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "We like to think about every possible thing that could happen..."

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "Even though it probably won't."

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about. I wasn't listening, earlier.
(You don't say anything.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...  But...  But what if everyone...

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "We won't."

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: But you don't know that.

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I do."

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I won't let anything happen, Bonnie."

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "I promise."
(AND YET, YOU LET BONNIE DIE.)
(You shake your head.)

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: . . .  Okay.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: ...I promise, too.

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: I won't let anything happen, either!
(Bonnie smiles confidently.)
(You smile back.)
(You do your best to smile back.)
(You got a MEMORY OF PROMISE!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[If the Kid has Memory of Promise equipped, they'll be more likely to buff everyone's stats during battle!]

Bonnie is always taking care of you.
[Recover all HP after the end of a battle.]
(Wait.)
(Have you tried every single one of Bonnie's snacks?)
(You count them in your head.)
(Plantain chips, cookies, malanga fritters...  Yes, you have.)
(Huh.)
(Just the fact that you've tasted them all... Means you've been looping for a while...)
(And even though you might be tired of some of them, they're all so different and delicious still.)
(How long did it take Bonnie to prepare all those snacks for today...?)

random/memories.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/memories.html.dialogue: "You're a really talented cook, Bonnie."

random/memories.html.speaker: Bonnie
random/memories.html.dialogue: H-Huh?

random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Some change you got from buying a croissant.
A nice silver coin that has followed you even through time.
A coin.
Your coin. There's only one like it in the Universe.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)
(You flip the coin in the air a few times.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Clap clap clap!

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Odile
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You can just actually clap instead of saying "clap clap clap" out loud.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Isabeau
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Never!!!!
(You think about the Incident.)
(You think about the stars.)
(You grip the coin tightly between your fingers.)
(for some reason you think about Loop,)
(That's your coin!)
(It really has followed you through this whole adventure, hasn't it...?)
(Somehow, you feel like there was something you could've done with this.)
(You suppose it's too late, now.)
(This is your silver coin.)
(You've had it since before the loops started.)
(You need to look at that other coin.)
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Oh, THAT thing.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Stop keeping that stupid coin! Go buy a snack with it or something, stars.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Are you rolling that coin again?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You've kept it this whole time. It's just pathetic, now.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Urgh.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Do you want to talk about it.
(Why would you?)
(It's just a coin, after all.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Of course it is.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: There's definitely not a single reason you've kept it this whole time.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You haven't even tried to buy anything with it. A snack, a stupid item, ANYTHING.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Leave it behind already!!!
(Why does Loop care, anyway.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: I don't care. Not in the slightest!
(You look at the coin.)

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You can get so fixated sometimes.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You don't need to swear off croissants because of what happened. You don't need to keep that coin to remember what happened.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You don't need to keep that coin to remember them.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Those rituals won't accomplish anything.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Siffrin
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: (You don't want to hear this right now!) "How could you understand how I feel?!"

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: ...Heh!

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: You're right. I can't understand you.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: After all, I don't know what it's like to feel your home slip out from under you. To feel cut off from everything.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: To want to remember it all, no matter what.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: How could I?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Look at me, stardust. Look at my face.

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Do you REALLY think I'm supposed to be here?!

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Do you REALLY think I can't understand what it's like, to not have a home I can go back to?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: To see reflections of it everywhere I look, but without the connection that comes with it?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Do you really think I don't understand wanting to remember everything I've left behind?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: I'm a star, but do you really think it warms me up? That my chest isn't empty, still?

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: And even now, I'm alone, no one can understand what I'm going through, and the only person that could is...

random/silvercoin.html.speaker: Loop
random/silvercoin.html.dialogue: Nope, that's it! That's all you get, teehee!
(You feel like you understand Loop a lot better now.)
(A few days ago, you all passed through a little town for supplies.)
(A few days ago, before you started looping, you all passed through a little town for supplies.)
(You remember.)
(Before you became stuck in time, you passed through a little town for supplies.)
(Everyone had things to do, but you were so stupidly hungry you could barely think, so you stopped at a boulangerie nearby.)
(The boulanger was an old man, but strong. Looked like he woke up smiling every day. Even then, with the threat of the King looming over everyone.)
(Wordlessly, you pointed at a croissant, showing some coins. Silently, smiling, he got you your pastry, took your money, gave you one silver piece of money back.)
(You both said "thank you" at the same time.)
(And you both froze.)
(Apart from Isa and Mira, who have the same accent, you all have very different ways of speaking the same language. Makes sense, as you all come from different places.)
(Through your travels, you met a lot of people with Mira and Isa's Vaugardian accent, a few with Bonnie's coastal accent, and even fewer with Odile's Ka Buan accent.)
(But your accent stayed unique, foreign.)
(The boulanger's accent     was the same as yours.)
(Without breaking eye contact, the old man grabbed your arm. His eyes were stunned. Fearful. Hopeful.)
(And he said: "Young one...   Where are you from?")
(And you couldn't answer.)
(There was no way you could answer.)
(How could you answer?   Did he know?   Did he remember? Could he answer? Was he asking you? Taunting you? Could he remember the lights, still? The shapes they cut in the darkness? Their stories?)

(Did they beat in his chest, still? Were they still warming up his heart? Could he speak them and everything into existence? Could he say it? Let the words out? Did he remember? Did he remember? Did he remember?)
(DID HE REMEMBER?)
(You left the boulangerie running.)
(You could see the night sky, dotted with lights, but your chest was empty.)
(When you ran back, you thought about how you'll always forget about the things you love)
(it's an immutable fact)
(but you don't want to forget about your [allies/family members], ever)
(ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever )
(no matter what, you'd make sure)
(that you would)
(always)
(remember)
(You ate the croissant, when you got back to everyone else.)
(It   didn't taste like anything.)
(You think about silver coins.)
(You think about croissants.)
(You think about accents.)
(You think about--
(...But the Universe won't let you.)
(You rub your chest, to bring back some warmth, and think about everyone.)
A silver coin you found under the Favor Tree.
(You should look at this near the Favor Tree.)
(This is Loop's silver coin.)
(They must've spent a lot of time carrying it around, too.)
(You flip it once, twice, three times.)
(You'll see each other again!)
