[You can also save your progress by praying at the Change God's statue!]
(Wow! Okay, that's enough for today.)
(You thank the Change God for its blessing and quickly run away, crossing it out from the Reminder Note.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Siffrin! You're here!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: We were waiting for you! Let's go inside!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I am SOOOOO hungry.
(You're pretty hungry yourself.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I brought back a bunch of food! Let's go, let's go!!!
[Pst, stardust...]
(As you're about to take another samosa to munch on, you hear Loop's voice, and try not to jump.)
[Heh, sorry, sorry!]
[So, here again, huh? Don't worry, you'll get to zone out during this entire event if you want. But there is something...]
[You're able to zone through most conversations you've seen at least once, yes... But some of them might be slightly different!]

[Oh, don't stress out about it. Don't worry, if it was REALLY important, you'd stop zoning out immediately. But remember that just because you can zone out, doesn't mean the events will be exactly the same!]
[So... To zone out, and miss some small things, or to listen to it all again? What a dilemma!]
[That's all! Bye, stardust~!]
(You go back to your samosa.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Phew, Bonbon...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: That was DE-LI-CIOUS!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: You keep getting better at cooking, Boniface. Those samosas were delicious.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Really? It wasn't bad? You liked it?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I-I MEAN, OF COURSE IT WAS DELICIOUS. I'm a master cooker, you know!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Chef.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I'm a chef cooker!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: That was the perfect meal, Bonnie! We'll all sleep well tonight and be full of energy tomorrow!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: It was almost too much, to be honest... I don't think I can move...
(Was it too much?)
(You could've eaten more...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Aw, Sif, are you still hungry?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Frin, you ate a lot, huh!!! You liked my cooking a lot, huh!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Here, have some more food since you're so hungry and like my cooking so much.
(Bonnie gives you one (1) carrot slice.)
(Chomp.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: How can you still eat... How can such a small body eat that much...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "I'm a growing kid."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: A growing kid that drinks alcohol?!?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: You're older than most of the people here?!?
(You wink cutely.)
(You didn't eat much this time.)
(Your stomach feels weird...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...You... You didn't like it?
(Wuh oh.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "I'm just not very hungry."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: But you're always hungry?!?
(WUH OH.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "I, uh, may have eaten some bread earlier."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Siffrin!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: How could you do this to poor Boniface.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Look at them. They're pouting so hard they're about to explode.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: KABOOM!!!!!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I exploded.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Siffrin was destroyed on impact.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: A beautiful explosion.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Siffrin... You died because of your hubris...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: (How regrettable.) "Was it just me that died?"

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Yes. You were the only casualty.
(That's fine then.)
(You still dramatically fall over for good measure.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "No... How could this happen..."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Hehehe...
(You ate all the food on your plate and more, but you're still hungry...)
(You try not to show it, though.)
(The food always tastes the same.)
(You eat anyway.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Um, everyone...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Can I... say something?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: What's up, Mira?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Um...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: We... We've all been traveling together for a while now.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: It hasn't always been easy, but meeting you all...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Traveling through Vaugarde to get the Orbs needed to open the House's Gate again...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: There's no way I could've done this alone.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I... I want to say thank you... For coming with me this far!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: But tomorrow, we'll go and fight the King... Someone who has thrown Vaugarde into stillness and silence.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Someone who has now frozen almost all of Vaugarde in time.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I-I'll do my best to make sure this doesn't happen to any of you, b-but if you don't want to come, if you want to go back home, I would--

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Kind of late for that, Mirabelle, isn't it?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ... I know... I--

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: And by that, m'dame Odile means that we're with you!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Of course I do. We've come this far, after all.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Did you really think we'd leave you behind? Let you go alone?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: We'll follow you, Belle!!! We'll help!!! Don't worry!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: We'll stay with you, Mira.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Oh...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Oh, thank you...!
(Isabeau and Bonnie hug Mirabelle tightly, while you and Odile stand a bit apart like always.)
(This is when the audience at a theater would say "aaaawww".)
(Isabeau, Bonnie and Mirabelle hug.)
(Cue audience aw.)
(Odile, you understand... She'd curse them if they tried...)
(But why do they never hug you?)
(There must be something wrong with you, isn't there?)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...Let's go to bed!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: We have a big day tomorrow!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Indeed... Then, goodnight, everyone.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: G'night!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Sif...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Hey... hey Sif. Siffrin. Siffarooni.
(Isabeau is whispering your name...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...Already asleep, huh?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Oh well.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Then maybe... It would be fine if I... Said it now...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...No, no, that's not cool.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I'll tell them tomorrow, when we've beaten the King.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: You really have to, Isabeau... You crabbing coward...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...  Goodnight, Sif...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Um...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Sorry? To wake you up?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I just have to tell you something.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: If that's okay.
(He dares interrupt your beauty sleep...)
(He knows you value your sleep, so this must be important.)
(Again with this?)
(You didn't get to the King, so you don't know what he wants to tell you...)
(Not for the first time, you wonder about what he wants to tell you.)
(All you know is...)
(You will not learn tonight.)
(You nod.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Okay, okay, okay.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Then I shall tell you the thing!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: The thing I woke you up to tell you!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Haha!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Um, okay. So.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: The thing I have to tell you

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Is

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: That

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I  don't have anything to tell you right now.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: But I will, when, uh, when we beat the King tomorrow.  Okay?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I-it's not meant to be???

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I-it's not meant to be???

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I, uh, just don't wanna tell you right now. It might distract you. And we wouldn't want that, right???

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: So, um, I'll tell you when we beat the King.  Okay?
(What could he want to tell you?)
(It seems important to him... So the only thing you can say is...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "Okay."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...  Okay!
(You haven't gotten to the King yet, so you still don't know what he wants to say.)
(You're so curious. But the only thing you can say is...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "Okay."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...  Okay!
(But you don't know if you'll ever manage to beat the King!)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "Can't you tell me now?"

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Well, no, it doesn't work like that, sill--
(That's what he was trying to tell you at the end... Before you were forced to loop back...)
(You never did hear what he had to say to you.)
(Maybe if you went back to that time... After you beat the King... If you asked again, made sure you had no interruptions, maybe you'll be able to hear it this time.)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: "Okay."

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: ...  Okay!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: SOME PEOPLE ARE TRYING TO SLEEP!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: YEAH ISABEAU! SOME PEOPLE ARE TRYING TO SLEEP! CLOSE YOUR MOUTH AND SLEEP!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: YOU CLOSE YOUR MOUTH, HOUSEMAIDEN! YOU'RE GONNA WAKE UP M'DAME ODILE!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I'm already up.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: And if the noise continues, I will stand up.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: You do not want to know what will happen if I stand up.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Sorry.

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Sorry m'dame...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: S-Sorry...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Good night, Sif!
(You feel safe surrounded by all your friends...)
(You fall asleep.)
(You think about how far you still have to go before beating the King.)
(You fall asleep.)
(You close your eyes.)
(You wonder if you'll be able to sleep tonight.)
(You never actually rest, at the Clocktower.)
(Isabeau talks to you to say nothing, and you answer, or you don't, and you blink, and it's over.)
(You never sleep here, you just thought you did.)
(Soon, you'll close your eyes, and open them, and everyone's waking up.)
(No, everyone's ready to go.)
(No, you're all leaving.)
(No, you're at the entrance of the House, and you look up, and--)
(You wait for the Universe to bring you to the entrance of the House.)
(You blink.)
(The House's Gate...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: The House's Gate, huh?

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: It's bigger than I thought! So scary!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: It really is locked shut. I can see space for us to put the Orbs...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: This whole adventure... This whole journey...

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: After all this time... I can finally open it!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: I have my Orb right here!

rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower.html.dialogue: Let's go for it, then!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: (The Clocktower.)
(You arrived later than usual.)
(Is everyone eating still?)
(You need to join them, and act normally this time, so you can all go to the House together tomorrow.)
(You don't care if they're not strong enough. You can make it on your own, defeat the King on your own.)
(You just want them here.)
(You enter silently.)
(You don't hear cutlery or anything.)
(Your stomach hurts.)
(They must've eaten without you.)
(Maybe they're already sleeping.)
(But no-- You can hear them talk.)
(You get closer...)

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: And...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: And then I left. I couldn't... Be there anymore.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Why would Sif act like this suddenly? That's not like them at all...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Clearly, something happened.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: B-But what?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: I don't understand... Why he'd do stuff like that.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: I don't understand at all!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Bonnie...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Everyone.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Siffrin might come back any second now...  So we need to decide what to do.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: What to do?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: About tomorrow...?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Yes.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: What do you mean?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Are you saying... Leave without Siffrin?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: What?!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: I-I understand how you feel, but...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: But we shouldn't leave Sif behind! H-He's the one who leads us...! We wouldn't be able to avoid traps without them!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Plus, he's our friend! We can't leave them behind!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Yeah! H-He was mean, but, but Frin was always with us, so--

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: I agree, but...  B-But would he even agree to come with us, still?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Maybe they won't even come back tonight...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: No, Frin will be there!!! I know it!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: And either way, we should wait for them, everyone... We can't...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Please, listen to me.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: I... I just... I just don't know if we can trust Siffrin anymore.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Not at such an important moment.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: But--

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: We'll be fighting the King tomorrow, Isabeau!!!

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: It's not just a simple Sadness. It's the KING. The being who has trapped Vaugarde in time.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: And we need to be a team.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: We need to be united, we need to trust one another.

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: ...  After what just happened to all of us today...

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Could you do it, everyone?

rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/clocktower5.html.dialogue: Could you entrust your life and future to someone like Siffrin right now?
(You)
(You decide to

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: What is a plantain peel doing here...?
(You approach the Change God's statue.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: The Change God's statue...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Quite a peculiar figure, don't you think?
(You shrug.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: All done with... Whatever you were just doing?
(You nod.)
(Some croissants.)
(You refuse to even look at them.)
(You grip the silver coin tightly.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Croissants, huh... You really started hating them for no reason a few weeks ago, didn't you?
(You don't respond.)
(The woman is daydreaming, singing softly under her breath.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Please don't make us talk to everyone in Dormont, Siffrin, PLEASE.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Fishing One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I am fishing.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I see that. Caught anything recently?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Fishing One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Heheheee...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Fishing One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Maybe I have, maybe I haven't.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Thanks, that was very helpful.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin, madame Odile! On a secret quest again?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: "Again", huh.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, sorry! I feel like... I've seen you two go on secret quests very often?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Like... Literally every time we've stayed in a town or village?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Isabeau and I always wondered where you were going!
(Ah, that's right...)
(You and Odile often used to visit antique shops, every time you went to a new place.)
(Neither of you ever asked what the other was looking for.)
(...Come to think of it, she was probably looking for a familytale...)
(...Did you used to go on secret quests together?)
(You can't remember.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Are you two betting on it? On what our "secret quests" are about?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, I would never bet on anything. It goes against my moral code, madame.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: But Isabeau will read a horror book of my choice if my guess is right, hehe!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh no, you're not going to tell me what your secret quests were about now that I've said we're betting on it.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: We'll see you later, Mirabelle.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: NO!!! NO, COME BACK!!!!!!!!!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, Mirabelle... You almost had it...
(Odile is out of breath.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Urgh... Ha...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Running One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Sounds like someone needs to do some more exercise!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Curse you and your legs.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Running One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Spoken like someone who prioritized her brain over her body for decades and decades!
(No answer for that one, huh?)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Smug One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hell-

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hello, no time to talk, have a good day.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Smug One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Um, bye then?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hey!!! Wanna play Rock Paper Scissors?!?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: No.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Tutorial Kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Urgh...!!! Another lost soul, who won't play against me...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, hey Dile.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Boniface.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Did you find some good stuff for tonight?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Not much. I did find some flour, though. I know we were running low.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Yesssssss.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Why are you with Frin? Was the flour too heavy? I could've helped!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Siffrin and I have things to do.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh. Can I help? I wanna help.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: We're looking for a book.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: With words in it. No pictures.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I am so sorry I cannot help, Dile. I wish you the best in all future endive-vors.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I will stay here and also do my important things.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Like look at this field.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Thank you for your support, Boniface.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I will never help you find a book. I have more important things to do.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Like watching this carrot grow.
(The kid looks up at you.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: No time, Siffrin. Wave goodbye, now.
(You wave goodbye.)
(The kid waves back, happily.)
(The kid dances, and doesn't care about you and your old cohort.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hey. Hey, old one.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hey, baby one.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Nice one, old lady.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: How does it feel to be old?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: It feels nice, I suppose.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Huh.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: ...Really?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Really. I wouldn't go back to being your age, that's for sure.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Huh!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: ...Crab, I wanna be old, now.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: I wanna be old so bad......

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Let's play again soon. That was fun.
(The little girl making a frog embroidery seems too shy to make eye contact with you, especially now that you have an older woman with you, which puts you firmly in the "Big Adults" category.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Frog-loving kid
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Bye bye! Good luck with the book!
(Some recipes.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hm... Think we should look at those for Boniface?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Ah, hello? Is anyone there?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: We are, but we don't actually have time to talk. Sorry to bother you.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Haha, it's no problem! Have a good day!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Sheep
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Meeeeeeeeeeh.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Meeeeeeeeeeh.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: That's the way to the Clocktower.
(Not right now.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Ohoho! You guys look thick as thieves as usual. Are you on a secret quest again?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Indeed we are.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Good for you. Nothing like a secret quest to make life worth living.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Ah, I'm so jealous... I'd love to go on a secret quest, too...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Let's go on a secret quest before we part ways, yeah?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh, I'd love to. A secret quest with you could be fun, Isabeau.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Huh?

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: OH, WITH YOU, M'DAME ODILE!!!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Yes!!! That's exactly what I meant!!! I definitely meant going on a secret quest with you, because you are also standing right here. Yes.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Please don't look at me.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Uh HUH.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Have fun, you two!

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Old One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hello--

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Hello, nice to talk to you, goodbye.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Old One
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Oh... Goodbye.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: The Favor Tree, huh...

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Quite an interesting tradition, isn't it?
(You shrug.)

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: Piou piou.

rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/dormont/dormdile.html.dialogue: There's no need to go here right now, is there?
(Apparently not.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: (This kid seems to be drawing pictures of someone.)
(They shuffle their drawings around and show you another one.)
(The kid smiles and kicks their feet happily.)
(You'd like to get that drawing again.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: "Can you draw me something I can take with me?"
(The kid looks at you for a moment, and then gets to work.)
(The kid makes a happy noise and gives you the drawing.)
(You put the drawing in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
(The kid laughs happily, and gets back to drawing.)
(The kid grins at you, and gets back to drawing.)
(The kid looks up at you, and seems to jump.)
(The kid stares at you with big eyes, then looks down to draw something.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: "Can you draw me something I can take with me?"
(The kid looks at you for a moment, and then gets to work.)
(You put the drawing in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
(You thank the kid, and walk away.)
(The kid still dances as she looks at you curiously.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Are you from up in the sky?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: If you're from the sky then... I'm going to give this back to you.
(You put the leaf in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: It fell from the sky, but I'm giving it back.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: It's okay. I won't tell anyone.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: ...I asked for everyone to be okay tomorrow.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Sky-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Hope you found that book, too
(The kid still dances as she looks at you warily.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: My mother talked about you. She said you're a traveler with a big hat but it doesn't mean you're a wizard, because wizards aren't real.
(The kid turns away and ignores you...)
(The kid turns away and ignores you...)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Thank you kind wizard. For making me a frog.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Yeah, you're too weird to be a wizard.
(The kid turns away and ignores you...)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Huh? Who cares about some stupid tree?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I-It's your job to save us tomorrow anyway, isn't it?!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Come back and play anytime, yeah?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Coa coa coa! I'm a frog.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: My mother talked about you. She said you're a traveler with a big hat but it doesn't mean you're a wizard, because wizards aren't real.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: But I don't think wizards make faces like yours anyway, so you must not be a wizard.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Wizard-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Hey, hey, what are you then?!?
(The little girl making a frog embroidery seems too shy to make eye contact with you.)
(You don't want to force her to talk if she doesn't want to.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Frog-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I asked for a big frog to come in and punch the King in the face.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Frog-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: It was fun, earlier... Come back and play soon!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Frog-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Did you know toads and frogs are different? Frogs are smooth and slimy but toads are dry and they have warts everywhere!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Frog-loving kid
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: And toads crawl but frogs are the ones that jump all the time! I like frogs better but when my friends say they hate toads I get mad because toads are still cute and--
(You listen patiently while the little girl tells you all about frogs and toads.)
(The little girl making a frog embroidery seems too scared to make eye contact with you.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Oh, I don't recognize your voice... Are you perhaps one of the saviors...?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Ah, I knew it, I knew it! It's very nice to meet you!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I've met another one of you earlier... They smelled like snacks... A little kid by the name of "Bonnie", was it?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: If you're looking for them, I heard them go past the bridge just south of here a little while ago.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: They went to look at my veggie field, talked to me about my veggie field, and went back to look at my veggie field.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: They said my vegetables looked "really shiny and delicious!!!", so I would die for them now.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: ...Ah, perhaps I shouldn't make such jokes, considering...
(...Considering they might actually die soon because of the King's Curse...)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: If I asked anything to the Favor Tree?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I did! I asked for everyone in Vaugarde to be saved. Pretty boring, huh?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Oh! You're THAT savior! The one with an eyepatch, aren't you? I've heard about you.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Ah, I see... Trying to get advice from another blind person, I see!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I've heard from people in the village that this is a new development for you...?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I see... And how are you dealing with it?
(You decided a while ago that you wouldn't worry about it, so...)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Ah, because of depth perception or some such, correct?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I've always been blind, but I've heard getting used to not having depth perception might be difficult.

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Aren't you the one leading all the other saviors around? So you can find traps, right?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Isn't that something you could ask them to help you with...?

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: Well, if you need advice from another blind person, you know where to find me!
(Being half blind is the least of your problems, right now.)

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: I let that kid take some of my veggies, so I'm sure you'll all eat well tonight!

rooms/dormont/east.html.speaker: Blind One
rooms/dormont/east.html.dialogue: The air smells nice and sweet. I wonder if someone's baking something...
(The sign says: "My Friend Made A Sign For My House So Now I Have To Keep It".)
(This is the way to the Clocktower...)
(But you should go talk to everyone else and check the Change God's statue first.)
(You did all you needed to do, so you can join everyone at the Clocktower.)
(This is the way to the clocktower, but...)
(Even if you don't HAVE to go talk to everyone again, you'd like to go to the Favor Tree.)
(You need to talk to Mirabelle first.)
(You have to go and talk to Loop first.)
(This is the way to the clocktower, but...)
(Even if you don't HAVE to go talk to everyone again, you could still talk to Loop and hear what they have to say.)
(You decide to go talk to Loop.)
(You decide to go talk to Loop.)
(You decide to not go talk to Loop.)
(Someone probably put it here to make sure you don't get lost...)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Siffrin! You're up!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (The usual, please.)
(Here again.)
(You'd like to make sure Mirabelle doesn't get upset, but is there any way to make this conversation go faster...?)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (Something like...)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (Here again.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (Enter Mirabelle.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Hey, Siffrin! Hehehe!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: So how was your nap? On a scale of one to ten!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I'm glad! I know how much you value your naps.

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: ...That bad? I'm sorry to hear that...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I hope you'll sleep well tonight! I know how much you value your naps!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Oh, wait! I had something I wanted to ask you!!!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Um, I have an idea for tonight... This will be the night before we go fight the King, so I felt like we could make it special somehow...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I'm sorry... I was trying to find something fun to do tonight, but that's all I could think of...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: It was... It was a stupid idea, wasn't it...? Maybe we should forget about it...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (Something like...) "That sounds like an AMAZING idea, Mira!"

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Yeah? Oh, I'm so glad you think so!!!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

(...MISSION COMPLETE.)

(This was a small change, but if your fate isn't set in stone... Then...)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: --so, could you let everyone know? I would really appreciate it!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Okay, see you at the Clocktower later then! I'll be near the library if you need me, come talk to me whenever!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle

(Okay, that was... slightly different from what you remembered, but still...)
(So it seems you really are... repeating the same day. With small differences.)
(And Mirabelle... doesn't seem to be aware of it.)
(Are you the only one repeating today?)
(What should you do...?)
[So.]
[You should come to the Favor Tree when you have a second, stardust.]
(What...?)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Siffrin... You're up...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I'm, uh, I'm sorry I woke you up earlier. I know you joked about it, but are you feeling better now? I'm worried...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (Well, this is new...) "Yes, don't worry about me!"

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Ah... Okay, but...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: (You really have to talk to Loop right now...) "I have things to do, I'll talk to you later!"

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Huh?! Um, Siffrin, please wait!!!
(What now.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: ...Well, I know you're busy, but...
("But help me tell everyone about the sleepover"?)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: ...Can you come talk to me later? So we can talk? I'll wait in front of the library...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: ...Please.
(Oh.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Okay! Go do your thing, and then come back, okay? I'll be waiting!
(You nod again.)
(Habit takes over, and you tell her about the CARROT method.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: W-Wait, how did you know about--
(...And wink.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: O-Okay...
(Mirabelle learned the Craft Skill "Adorable Moving Shield" again.)
(You can't...)
(You can't talk to anyone right now.)
(You have to see... You have to ask Loop... What they think...)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Siffrin! You're--

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Oh Change, you look...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: You look really, really tired! I thought you were taking a nap! D-Did you not sleep well?

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: "Not really, haha!"

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Oh no... I'm sorry to hear that...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I was going to tell you something, b-but forget about it! Go on and do whatever you need to today!!!

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: "Sure."

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: "Do you know if Bonnie is okay?"

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: Bonnie...? Why wouldn't they be?

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I saw them near the fields earlier, to the East, if you'd like to talk to them...?
(You nod.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: O-Okay...

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: I-I'll leave you alone... Make sure to rest up, and we'll meet for dinner at the Clocktower later!
(You nod again.)
(Habit takes over, and you tell her about the CARROT method.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: W-Wait, how did you know about--
(...And wink.)

rooms/dormont/entertown.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/entertown.html.dialogue: O-Okay...
(Mirabelle learned the Craft Skill "Adorable Moving Shield" again.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (The sign says: "Favor Tree".)
(Don't forget to check the Favor Tree!)
(Now that you're here, you'd like to check the Favor Tree.)
(You can tell Loop is looking at you.)
(You need to talk to Loop.)
(No time to run around anymore.)
(You have to talk to Isabeau.)
(You have to talk to Loop.)
(This is the Favor Tree.)
(There's nothing for you to do there right now...)
(The Favor Tree looms above you.)
(You slowly walk closer to the trunk of the tree, where you can see some leaves you can grab.)
(You need a leaf to ask the Favor Tree for something, after all.)
(You look around for a leaf you like, and think.)
(Asking for a favor from a higher power like a big tree sounds pretty close to a wish, you think.)
(A wish, a wish...)
(The Favor Trees seem to be popular among people in Vaugarde lately. You think that if people came to make a wish, they'd probably wish for Vaugarde to be saved...)
(You don't really need to add another wish like that to the pile. The trees are probably already on it.)
(But you'd feel bad wishing for something big and taking away from everyone's wish to save Vaugarde.)
(Something small, then. Something simple. Something nice.)
(Okay, you have a few ideas... But you can only choose one.)
(You wish...)
(Mirabelle has changed so much since you've met her...)
(She doesn't realize it, but now she's able to talk to people while looking them in the eyes. Sometimes she even snarks back when you tease her, which you didn't think was even possible.)
(You'd like to continue traveling with her and see her get even more comfortable expressing herself.)
(You didn't expect to have so much fun traveling with Isabeau.)
(You often joke together, but you never really talk about real, important things... You're glad he told you about his dream to become a clothing designer. It suits him.)
(To talk to him, and watch him as he crafts clothes for you to wear... Seeing his smile as you wear something he created himself... It would make you happy.)
(Ka Bue is where Odile is from... She probably knows all the cool places.)
(Even if she doesn't, talking with Odile is always interesting. You're both strangers to this country, ignorant of its culture, so you have a lot in common.)
(Being with Odile is easy. Sometimes you feel like she understands you better than you understand yourself.)
(You'd like to talk with her more so you can understand her, too.)
(Bonnie has been distant from you lately...)
(You're not sure why.)
(But you'd like to be here when they see their sister again...)
(They miss their sister so much. Sometimes you can hear them cry out at night, calling their sister's name.)
(If you could help them save her, help them get back to their sister and see her safe and alive... You'd like to do that. You want them to be happy.)
(You want to stay with them!)
(A wish in mind, you look at the leaf you've chosen, and wish.)
(You breathe your wish into the leaf, repeat it three times, and fold the leaf closed, keeping your wish safe.)
(All done!)
(Gently, you let the leaf go, and walk back to the town.)
(You have a sleepover to go to, after all.)
(The Clocktower to the east of town, past the broken bridge, huh? It may be time for you to head out there...)
(The Favor Tree is here.)
(You can see the leaf with your wish swaying gently in the wind.)
(The Favor Tree.)
(Isabeau said the tree felt "weird"...)
(And you heard someone telling you to come here, didn't you?)
(What was that voice...?)
(You walk towards the tree.)
(...The tree is so big, everything under it is dark as night, but...)
(You feel like someone is here, sitting at the foot of the tree.)
(Looking at you.)
(Cautiously, with a hand on your dagger, you walk towards the base of the tree.)
(Well, uh, you found someone alright.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Uh, hello, stranger."
...Hello, stranger.
My, struck speechless at the sight of me, aren't you?
You're so cute, stardust!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Stardust?!?) "Um--"
Aw, Siffrin, look at you. All lost and confused.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Huh? Wait...) "How do you know my--"
Why wouldn't I know? You're Sif! Siffrin!
No middle names, no last name! Just Siffrin!
I shouldn't wonder why you look like this, though. It makes sense that you'd feel overwhelmed!
Considering this is your first loop, and all.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (HUH!??!) "HOW DO YOU--"
Aw, of course I know, stardust!
I know about you, I know about your party, about the loops, about that funny silver coin you carry--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Alright, that's it.) "CAN YOU STOP TALKING PLEASE"
Oh stars, no need to yell.
Let's take a deep breath in, and out, okay? Breathe with me, let's go. In...
(Your head hurts and your hands are shaking and your heart is beating like it's about to explode, so you probably should.)
(Slowly, following the astral being, you breathe in, and out.)
Pheeeeeeeeeee e e e ew.
Alright! Who I am, right?
Hm, well, let's see, let's go with...
Loop. Your ally Loop, here to help you with the loops. Easy to remember, right?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: And for pronouns, you may address me with the royal We.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Um.) "That doesn't make ANY sense."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Ah, yes, that's true, isn't it?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Then use they/them for me. I'm sure you'll think about me all the time, so you might as well know what pronouns to use!
(Yeah, better know this one's pronouns so you can think very clearly in your head that they're getting on your nerves.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Your turn, you guess.) "I use--"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: He/they, I know. It's in your profile.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I can read, you know!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "My what now--"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Anyway stardust, I'm here to help! Ask whatever questions your little heart desires!
(Yep, full blown headache now.)
(Urgh.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "You said I'm, uh, 'looping'?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Oh, getting right into it! I like it, stardust!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Are you sitting down? You better sit down, you're gonna get a lot of info at once!
(You sit down.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So! You're stuck in a time loop! Fun, right?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Which means that every time you die, you'll loop back, and you'll get to try it all over again!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: No matter how horribly or stupidly you die, like, let's say, crushed by a giant rock, you will always come back!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (They saw that...?) "Did you see--"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Of course I saw, stardust! How can I help you if I don't know what you're doing?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Also, you've probably noticed a lot of things got reset, right?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Your party members are saying the same things, all the items you got while you were in the House disappeared...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Yeah, you noticed your pockets got emptier...) "Because I didn't pick anything up yet, right?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Stardust, you smart cookie, you got it!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So you'll have to pick them up again. If you want! Which you probably should, since you got a long road ahead of you.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (So what about...) "I have to pick up keys again, too?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Yep! Every time! Well, until you learn.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Learn wh--"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Anyway, this is a lot of information, but don't worry! You'll pick things up as you go along!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Oh, but your weapons and equipment won't be reset though! So that's good news!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Isn't it nice that you get to keep your cool powerful equipment?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Especially since you, stardust, will keep whatever Experience you have, but the rest of your party won't. Compensate by having powerful weapons equipped!
(Your friends won't grow and get Experience like you?)
(You guess it makes sense, since they won't remember whatever enemies you face...)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Speaking of your party, you can tell them about the loops, if you want! They might be able to help, and nothing is keeping you from telling them, so...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Uh, why?) "Why would I tell them?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Why wouldn't you? Don't you need help?
(Uh, you've just learned that you can start again as many times as you want and fix your mistakes.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Why would you need help? You're the one in a position to help your friends here...) "I don't really need their help."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Right, because you got me!
(NOT what you meant.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "What should I do now?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Hm, let's see...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Have you tried Not Dying???

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I dunno! Just an idea!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Just go back to the House and try again! And maybe die again? Guess we'll see!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Remember: no death is wasted!
(Thanks, that was useless.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Questions, questions...) "Any advice?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Advice, yes. I have advice.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Don't eat pineapples! You're allergic.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Hey, you ask for advice, I give you advice!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You REALLY are. Don't try it!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...Aw, you look so steamed! Okay, real advice, real advice...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: While you were talking to your party, didn't you see a weird symbol appear?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Two little triangles, maybe?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It might happen with some conversations you've heard before. If you see it, you can zone out by pressing the [button] button.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It makes you stop listening and makes conversations go faster. No point in staying aware for conversations you've already experienced, huh?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Let's try it with the next text box, so you know how it works.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I am talking now, so press [button] whenever! Nope, that's the wrong button, stardust. Wrong again. I said [button]! Come on now, this is getting silly.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: No, don't press that, silly, press [button]! Let's try again.
(Yeah, that's it.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You did it! It'll take some time for you to get used to it, but it'll save you time, for sure.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You might miss what your party is saying, but who cares, right? If you make them mad, you can always loop back and they'll have forgotten all about it!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: If you want me to say it another way...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: [If you see the icon during a conversation, press [button] to fast-forward through it!]
(Ow ow ow ow.)
(You don't know how they did that, but their voice resonated through your head...)
(You've heard that voice before, yesterday-- Well, in another version of today, really...)
(So they WERE the voice you've been hearing, giving you advice?)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: See, I'm useful. I'm very useful! That's why I'm here, helpful Loop.
(That IS useful, but...)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (...) "Why are you helping me?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Because I think you should be helped.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I won't always have the answers, but... I think having someone on your side to talk to is better than dealing with this alone.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Right?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (...) "But I never asked for your help..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Tough luck, stardust!!! I'll still help you out!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Alright! That's all I have for you right now, but don't forget to come to me when you feel stuck, okay?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I'll be right here under this tree! Don't forget! Bye!!!
(They wave at you excitedly.)
(You awkwardly wave back as you go...)
(Loop, huh...)
(They're a little annoying, but... If you do find yourself stuck at some point, or just need someone to talk to, they might be able to help...)
(You ran here to talk to Loop, to try to figure out what to do, but...)
(You can't look at them right now.)
(You can't.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (...) "...I beat the King."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You did?!? Oh, stars above, I'm so proud of you!!! You did it!!! You succeeded!!! You--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And yet I'm still here."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...Yes.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Indeed you are.
(...They don't seem surprised.)
(They don't seem surprised at all, do they?)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Did you know this would happen?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I had a feeling, yes.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: But it felt cruel to tell you, so I didn't.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You looked so...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So happy and innocent and stupid!!! I just didn't have the heart to tell you!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...I just didn't have the heart to tell you.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I knew from the start that the loops wouldn't end after defeating the King.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Why not...?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I don't know why it didn't end with beating the King.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I just knew it wouldn't.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "I never thought about the reason why I got this power."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "I just thought... It was to beat the King."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "That the Change God, someone, anyone, gave me this power to beat him."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "But if beating him made me loop back anyway..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "I don't know what to do now."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So will you give up, then?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You're stuck in this loop, stardust.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Beating the King brought you back here. You don't know why. You don't even know how you even got this power.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You don't know if there's even a way to escape.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: So... Because there's no clear way to escape...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Will you give up?
(Give up...?)
(No. You're fine, aren't you?)
(Right now, you're alive. Right now, you can think. Right now, your allies are still here. Right now, you're not alone.)
(There's no reason to give up now, just because you're trapped.)
(If you're trapped, find a door, and open it.)
(And, you still have some doors to open, don't you?)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden seemed to know something was wrong, didn't she?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Ah... I guess she did.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: She said something about... Something being broken? Failing?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Did she mean the loops?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: The loops, breaking?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...That's possible.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Maybe the loops WERE supposed to stop after beating the King, but something went wrong somehow.
(And that's something you can find out.)
(You just need to talk to her again. Find out what she knows.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And the King..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: The King?! What about him?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Something about his powers..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "He can freeze people's time. And I can rewind time."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...Yes, that's...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Both powers ARE related to time, aren't they?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I don't think I've ever heard about anyone who could control time before...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Isn't that something to find out more about?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...I suppose so?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Maybe I just need to ask him."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Ask the King?!?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Well, um, sure, I suppose that might work?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Talking to the King himself... I do wonder what he'd have to say.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It's worth trying!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...And, stardust...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I know you're not interested in talking to your party about the loops. If so...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: You'll have to make sure to act so they don't find out anything is wrong.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: And you already failed this loop by making your Housemaiden worried about you, teehee!
(It's true. With the way you woke up, she's probably worried about you, even now...)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: She said she wanted to talk to you, didn't she? You should talk to her this loop, see what that's all about.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Add this to your brain list of things to do.
(There's quite a few things on it already.)
(Find out more about the King and his powers, to see if they're related to yours.)
(Talk to the Head Housemaiden, to see if she knows more about the loops.)
(Talk to Mirabelle this loop, see what's wrong. Might as well talk to everyone else after, too.)
(But see?)
(As long as you have paths you can follow... Questions to answer...Goals to strive for...)
(You'll be fine.)
(You're fine.)
(Why is Loop helping you?)
(They appeared after you looped for the first time... And said they were here to help.)
(And they knew about the loops. Knew this whole time beating the King wouldn't help.)
(And they picked that name, didn't they? "Loop"?)
(Aren't they... Related to the loops, too?)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Loop..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Hm~?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Stardust...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Yes.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: If you can believe anything, believe that.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I asked to be here, so I could help you.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Why?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Aren't you stuck here too, just because you're helping me?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I reiterate, stardust: I asked to be here.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me. Being here is surprisingly restful!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I'm here to help you any way I can, and I mean it!!!
(If they're offering their help...)
(It'd be stupid not to take it, isn't it?)
(You don't really need to know, do you?)
(You don't want to start doubting them.)
(Loop said they're here to help you. That's all you need to know.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "To answer your question, though..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Hm?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "No, Loop."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "It's too early to give up."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...I'm very glad to hear that, stardust.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Please don't give up, stardust!!! If the loops started, they can end!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It's just basic logic. I can guarantee that you won't be stuck here forever.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It's a Loop Guarantee!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: And as always, you can count on me to help you!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: If you need a refresher, or help figuring out where to go, I'll be here!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I'm here to help, stardust!!!
(You smile.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: GROSS!!!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It's my pleasure, stardust.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Teehee, well...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop, stardust?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Sure. What do you want to talk about?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Good luck, stardust!!!
(Loop waves you goodbye excitedly.)
(You wave back.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: This was... Not the nicest thing you could've said?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: To... Any of them?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Does it matter?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Well... Um...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Yes? Why wouldn't it matter?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "They'll come with me to the House anyway."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "They've always done it before."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ... Okay, but...
