rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "But it really doesn't matter!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Because I've found it, Loop!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Found it? Found what?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "How to break this loop! How to escape!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: What?! But--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "I'm here to kill the King, aren't I?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Everyone's been wishing for it, for the King to be defeated, so that's why I'm here, aren't I?!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Well, um...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Maybe? I don't--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And, and, and!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Mira's always the one, isn't she?!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: The one? The one to what?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "The one to deal the final strike on the King!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...And?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Why doesn't Loop get it?!?) "And if everyone's wish is centered on me..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And if I'm the only one who's looping and remembering..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And if time keeps rewinding after I kill the King..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "The Head Housemaiden said it might be because the wish hasn't come true, right? So..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Isn't it rewinding because it's not me, the person who's in the middle of this, killing the King?!?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: That...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It can't be that simple, stardust.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Maybe it IS that simple!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "We've never thought about it, haven't we?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Maybe it WAS that easy, all this time!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: No, I...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I can say with certainty that it's not it.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It has to be something else...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Why?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Huh? Well, are you even sure you've never defeated the King yourself?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I'm sure it must've happened once or twice. You've been looping for a long time, so you might have forgo--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "'It must've happened once or twice'?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "I'm certain I never defeated him myself."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "And yet..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "How can you say it with certainty?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Do you know something?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: N-No, I don't know any more than you, stardust!!!

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It's just... I know that's not it.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: It has to be something else that's causing the loops, something else that can break them. Something--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "THEN WHAT ELSE, LOOP?!?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "WHAT ELSE AM I SUPPOSED TO DO? WHAT ELSE AM I SUPPOSED TO TRY?!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I MAKE EVERYONE COME WITH ME? SHOULD I RELY ON THE POWER OF LOVE?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I TALK TO THE KING? THE HEAD HOUSEMAIDEN?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "SHOULD I DIE? SHOULD EVERYONE DIE? WHAT? WHAT ELSE IS THERE? HAVEN'T I DONE IT ALL?!?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "THERE'S NOTHING ELSE, LOOP!!! I KNOW IT'S STUPID, I KNOW IT'S A LONG SHOT, BUT IT HAS TO BE THIS!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "IT HAS TO BE THIS, LOOP, OR-- OR--"
(You fall to your knees.)

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Or, or does it mean-- It means--"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "It means I'm stuck here for good, aren't I?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Forever?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (No.) "You think I'm stuck here forever."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: What? N-No, I--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Loop."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "You knew."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "You knew this whole time."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "You knew this whole time there was no escape."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: . . .

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Stardust...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: (Stars.) "No, no, no, no, no, no..."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: S-Stardust, I...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Why didn't you tell me?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Why did you lie to me?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I-I didn't...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I was b-brought here to help you, and-- And I thought, if I was here, we could--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "You knew there was no way to break the loops?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I thought that if we tried, together, w-we'd--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "YOU KNEW."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "YOU KNEW!!!!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW YOU KNEW THIS ENTIRE TIME!!!!!!!!!!!!"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Stardust--

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "DID YOU HAVE FUN, LOOP?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "WAS IT ENTERTAINING, AT LEAST? WAS IT FUNNY?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "DID YOU LIKE WATCHING ME RUN AROUND IN CIRCLES, HOPING, WISHING?"

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "DID YOU LIKE THE SHOW?!?

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: No.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: No, I didn't like to watch this at all.

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: "Curse you, Loop."

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: Stardust...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: I'm sorry... I really am...

rooms/dormont/favortree.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/dormont/favortree.html.dialogue: But please, stardust-- Siffrin!!! If we think, if we go through it all again, we can--
(You don't have time for this.)
(The Clocktower.)
(You arrived later than usual.)
(Is everyone eating still?)
(You need to join them, and act normally this time, so you can all go to the House together tomorrow.)
(You don't care if they're not strong enough. You can make it on your own, defeat the King on your own.)
(You just want them here.)

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Hello!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Ah... Aren't you one of the saviors traveling with Mirabelle?

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: You're doing so much for us. I wish I could help you in some way.

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: ...I know!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: I grow flowers... Beautiful flowers that could make someone you like happy!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Here, have one! You could keep it, or gift it to someone special.
(You got the BRIGHT FLOWER!)
(You put the flower in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
[You can give the Flower to one of your party members by talking to them!]
(You got the flower again!)
(You could give it to someone else this time...)

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Heh, have you looked around my house? I cannot get rid of those fast enough!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: That's why everyone in Dormont has some, too.

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: And... It's just nice, isn't it? To be able to give physical proof of your love to people?
(It is.)
(Not really.)
(You're learning that physical things fade, too.)
(You need to ask...)

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: What I asked the Tree?

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: ...It's private, isn't it?

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: I didn't tell the Head Housemaiden, so I don't see why I'd have to tell you. Sorry.

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Good luck tomorrow! We're all counting on you!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Hello!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Ah... Aren't you one of the saviors traveling with Mirabelle?

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: You're doing so much for us. I wish I could help you in some way.

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: ...I know!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: I grow flowers... Beautiful flowers that could make someone you like happy!

rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.speaker: Flower Growing One
rooms/dormont/flowerhouse.html.dialogue: Here, have one! You could keep it, or gift it to someone special.
(You got the BRIGHT FLOWER!)
(You put the flower in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
(But there's no one left to give it to.)
(It's a barrel.)
(It's full of soil for gardening.)
(The closet is full of gardening supplies.)
(Flowers.)
(Wait. Those are fake.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Isabeau is here, probably pondering what favor to ask the Tree.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sif!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay, that's it!!! I'm ending this bit!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Aw.) "Booooo."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: That's how it has to be, Siffrin.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Aw, boo!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hey, uh, Sif? Are you still half-asleep?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You should stop taking forever naps, Sif. Naps give you cotton brain.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sif. Woke up on the wrong side of the bed? I get it.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh! Sorry, I'm in your way then, aren't I? I'll get out of your hair, see you at the Clocktower!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Wah! Sif! I didn't see you there!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Anyway, I was just looking at the Favor Tree! Isn't this tree cool???

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Oh, wait, you remember this!)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Joke time.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Cue joke.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Glad you agree!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Uh huh???
(No. You will always make the joke.)
(You have to keep some sort of routine to stay sane, and if always making the joke is how, so be it.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: HAHAHA!!!!! YEAH!!!! YEAH!!!!!! YES!!!!!!!
(You both laugh.)
(Laughing uproariously, he raises his hand towards your shoulder...)
(...but stops, and brings it to his side.)
(Didn't he do this before? What a weird gesture.)
(What's up with the hand???)
(Okay he did the hand thing again. You're too curious. You'll have to ask later.)
(You need to ask!!!)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(Laughing uproariously, he raises his hand towards your shoulder...)
(You get it now.)
(This is him   trying to touch you.)
(You freeze.)
(His hand is in the air.)
(And goes closer... Closer...)
(His hand   abruptly stops above your shoulder, and goes back to his side.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(Laughing uproariously, he raises his hand towards your shoulder...)
(You watch his hand get closer to you again.)
(Maybe this time...)
(Closer... Closer...)
(His hand   abruptly stops above your shoulder, and goes back to his side.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(You wait for him to touch you.)
(You're beginning to think he never will.)
(You look at his hand coming closer... Closer...)
(As expected, his hand stops above your shoulder.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(You wait for him to touch you. You wait for him to touch you. You wait for him to touch you.)
(He has to do it.   You will never do it yourself.)
(But he won't touch you because he thinks you don't want him to.)
(And you can't say it. Because. That's embarrassing.)
(That's life-ending, even.   Asking for someone's touch.)
(But please, you think. Please, please, please.)
(A flicker of movement makes you look at his face.)
(He looks   stricken. Sad.)
(Seeing you look at him, he laughs   and brings his hand down.)
(You wonder what face you were making as you were waiting for him to touch you.)
(You wait for him to touch you.)
(His hand stops above your shoulder.)
(Is it fun to go back here? To keep torturing yourself?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(You wait for him to touch you.)
(Why do you have to wait? Why do you have to wait? Why do you have to wait?)
(His hand stops above your shoulder.)
(Is it fun to go back here? To keep torturing yourself?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.
(Suddenly  you realize a very basic thing.)
(He will never touch you.   He will never say it to you.   You will be stuck here forever.)
(Stuck in your yearning.)
(Unless   you're the one who breaks the cycle.)
(You reach out.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Uh, Sif?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Ah--
(He  pushed you away.)
(He

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "Hi Isa, I need to do the Favor Tree thing!"

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh! Sorry, I'm in your way then, aren't I? I'll get out of your hair, see you at the Clocktower!!!
(You take a step back.)
(He does not reach towards you.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haa... That was funny.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Anyway! The tree feels weird somehow... Or maybe it's just me?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (What?) "The tree feels weird?"

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yeah! Like, it feels... weird.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But not mean! Like if a lion came towards you and offered you some candy, that'd be weird, right? That kinda weird!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (...What.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Aw, you always get me, Sif!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Last time...? What d'you mean? I just started feeling like this now!
(...The tree feels weird?)
(Maybe you should go take a look at it...)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I'm gonna go soon so you can do your thing with the tree, but do you wanna talk before I go?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Si--

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Woah, what's wrong?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "I need to do the Favor Tree thing."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh. Do you... Need me to leave?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sure. But let's talk later, okay?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hi again, Sif! What's up?
(Isabeau is here, looking towards the House.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hi again, Sif?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You looked like you were in a hurry earlier, so I left you alone, but... Is everything okay?
(You smile and nod.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sure, I'll believe you.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: What's up?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Questions for Isa...)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Huh? A sleepover? Crab yeah!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Doesn't the clocktower have only three beds though...? I'm guessing Bonbon and Mira will share, and m'dame Odile will take her own...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Which means we'll share beds again, Sif! I got dibs on the left side!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yay!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But please try to not hog the covers this time. It's getting cold at night.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: What??? Are you??? But WHY?!?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...You're smiling! You're messing with me, aren't you?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You should know this, Sif! I'll always be at your side, whether in battle or in bed!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...UM, Y-YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN!!!!!!!!
(What a nice guy.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh? You don't know about the Favor Tree?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...But didn't you just ask me to leave so you could...
(Oh, oops.)
(You did just ask him to leave the Favor Tree, didn't you...)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...You know, Sif, you can just ask me if you need anything! No need for those theatrics!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But I understand. I will now answer your weird question.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Well, it's just a random big tree. But when you're a believer of the House of Change, the biggest tree in a certain place is called a Favor Tree!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "It's like, it’s the tree with the most power, so you can ask it things? As a favor?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Like, "Please help me pass my Defender exams!!!!!" Which is like, a totally random example.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Wasn't Isabeau a Defender...?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (Just say the same thing...)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (You know your lines.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: And I passed with flying colors, thank you very much!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Well, I did study very hard, so it's not like the tree did much. But even a little bit helps!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You should ask the tree for a favor too! It's a big day tomorrow!
(You already did.)
(No point in asking for another one...)
(The Favor Tree...)
(Wish Craft...)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: After we beat the King?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Wow, Sif! So confident! So cool! I like it!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I think I'll just return home to Jouvente... I don't have anything else planned!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...I wonder how Jouvente is doing. When we left it, it was still standing, moving, but I think the King's Curse may have caught up to it...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (So then...) "Will you take your job back?"

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Nah, being a Defender has kinda lost its shine.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I always admired the Defenders, y'know? It's all about protecting your neighborhood, your city!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Helping them out with whatever they need, be it getting a cat from a tree or helping an old man with his bags!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But when Mira came to Jouvente asking for help, after Dormont's House had fallen...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I was ready to help, for all of Jouvente's Defenders to help, and you know what they said?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "Nah."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: And I could tell that they said that because they were scared! The worst Defenders see is like, a robbery maybe!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So suddenly helping to save Vaugarde was too much for them!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But not helping because you're scared... I just couldn't accept that. That's not brave.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So I quit, and I won't go back! I'll do something else... Maybe it's time for me to do something brand new!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I got a secret... I've always wanted to be a clothing designer! So maybe I could just take an apprenticeship somewhere...!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: (You never knew.) "That sounds great, Isa."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Heheh... I knew you'd approve!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: What about you, Sif? What will you do when we beat the King?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue:
(What will you do...?)
                        "Start a comedy club."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Wait, really? Are you serious?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yes... Finally more people will be able to hear your puns...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Aw! That would've been cool!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yeah! The tree!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I told you, something feels off.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...But I have other things to worry about, so who cares!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Um...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: The tree felt a little weird earlier, so I thought something was wrong, but it passed, so I guess it's fine.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue:
(Oh!)
                                "I know what's wrong with it."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh? What's wrong with it?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "It has a parasite."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: A... parasite. What kind?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "The shiny, annoying kind."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...So a firefly has taken over the tree...
(You nod.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: That IS weird.
(Sure is.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Do I need help with anything... Um...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Well... Maybe, kind of, but...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hmmmmmmmmmmmm...
(It seems serious... Does he have a big problem he needs help with?)
(You steel yourself.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay, well...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I'd rather you ask everyone else if they need help, first. Mine might take some time.
(Huh... A task so long it might take a long time?)
(It must be really important to him.)
(You nod seriously.)
(Time to see what's the best place to look at the stars, maybe...?)
(You nod.)
(You nod.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Heh, so serious!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So, um, yeah! Make sure to help everyone and do whatever you need to do, first!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hm, you haven't helped everyone yet, right?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I'd rather wait until you're done!
(Sounds like you'd better help everyone else in the same loop first.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Huh? Oh, that's cool!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I did see you running around with everyone earlier. It looked like fun...
(Oh.)
(That's right, you didn't ask him if he needed any help, this loop...)
(Well.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Help?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! Yes, I do need help with something, now that I'm thinking about it!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Is that what you were doing today? Helping everyone out? I didn't know!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I-I'm glad!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I was just thinking I wanted to hang out with you today, since I saw you running around with everyone.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: But you didn't talk to me much today, so I was, um, worried you... Didn't want to...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I-It doesn't matter! I'm glad I thought about what we could do today, then!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You did? You did!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Heh, I saw you run around with everyone today, which made me very jealous.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So I'm glad I get to spend time with you!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...Um, are you ready now?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue:
We'll probably have to go to the Clocktower immediately after we're done, so I don’
<!--CURLY APOSTROPHE SPOTTED-->
t think you'll have time to do anything in the village after...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So I wanna make sure you did everything you needed to...?
(Hang out with Isabeau now?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Heh, okay! Well, um...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Follow me, Sif!!!
[Wow, you're here again!]
[You don't REALLY have to go through this whole thing again. You can just zone through it, and skip it completely, if you'd like.]
[You'll even still get their cool skill! But if you do, the skill will be a tiny bit less useful. Your choice!]
(Zone out?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sure, Sif! In the meantime, I'll let you do your thing here, and I'll wait for you North of Dormont, okay?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Sure, Sif! I'll see you later!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: The... hand thing? What?
(You do the same gesture he does every time you talk to him at this time.)
(Bringing your hand up towards his shoulder, then sharply taking your hand back.)
(Isabeau looks at your gesture, confused, then suddenly stills.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Ah. Um. Well.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I'm. I was. Trying to touch your shoulder. As like. A bro thing.
(Huh?)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: B-But I remembered you don't like to be touched!!! I remembered mid-move!!!! So I didn't touch you!!!! So it's okay!!! Sorry!!!!!!!
(He was trying to touch your shoulder?)
(You're not sure how to react to this.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Aaaah, see, this is why I didn't do it! Because you do that face every time people try to touch you! I'm sorry!!! I try to remember!!!! Sorry!!!!
(Okay, you're confused, but...)
(It feels like he thinks you don't want to be touched.)
(You  don't want to think about this anymore.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: W-what? A flower?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...For me?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "You're the only one here, Isa."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Haha, yeah!!!!!!!!!
(Isabeau takes the flower and cradles it gently in his hands.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ... Thanks, Sif...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I... I'll treasure it forever!!!
(He seems happy.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay, my turn!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hm... What's a good joke...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Well, to make you laugh, duh.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: You always make me laugh with your puns, so it's my turn!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Uh, because we're friends?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...Do you not-- Nevermind.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: A funny joke, a funny joke...
(Isabeau looks around, and seems to notice the Clocktower in the distance.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Ah, I know!!!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Do you know what I think about 6:30?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yup.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Well...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I think 6:30  is HANDS DOWN the best time of the day!!!
(Heh!)
(That's pretty good.)
(You laugh.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yay!
(You'll need to remember to laugh, next time.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...Oh, you knew this one?
(Oh, you forgot to laugh.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Hey, it's okay, I have others. Hm...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yesterday, I bought like ten watches. Do you know why?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Because I have a lot of time on my hands!!!
(You laugh.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Success.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: ...Oh, you knew this one too? Tough crowd, tough crowd.
(Hey, stupid, maybe smile when someone tells a joke.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay... Last chance, Isabeau... Don't mess it up.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay, so, why shouldn't you take up time travel?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Easy.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Because there's no future in it!!!
(Hahaha!)
(HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!)
(OH NO, YOU CAN'T STOP LAUGHING!!!)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Heh!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: See, I knew I was gonna get it eventually!
(You keep laughing.)
(You just can't stop.)
(Tears run down your face.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Woah, hey, Sif...
(Oh no, oh no, you're laughing too much!!!)
(You've been laughing for too long, stupid!!! He's gonna think you're weird!!!)
(Stop laughing!!!)
(You try and breathe slowly in, and out, come on, stupid.)
(Pheeeeeeeeeeeew...)
(Okay.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: So, sounds like I should become a comedian, huh?
(You try not to start laughing again.)
(You wipe your face.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "I needed that, I think!"

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Yeah, looks like you reaaaaally did.

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: What's wrong?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "Nothing's wrong!"

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Oh, so we're gonna ignore the hysteric laughing and crying, huh?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: "Yyyyep."

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay, but only for now, and only because it's you, Sif!
(You smile.)
(Isabeau hesitantly smiles back.)
(You got a MEMORY OF PUNS!)
(You'll always remember this.)
[When Memory of Puns is equipped, your Fighter will have a higher chance to do a Critical hit!]

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Do you want to talk a little more...? About something else, maybe?
(You laugh in a totally not unhinged way.)

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Ah, liked that one, huh...?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay! I'll be going now, I'll see you at the Clocktower later!

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay...

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: I'll be going now, I'll see you at the Clocktower later, yeah?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay! Let me know if you need anything, 'kay?

rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/dormont/isatalk.html.dialogue: Okay... Let me know if you need anything, okay?
(You talked to Isabeau!)
(You cross Isabeau from the Reminder Note.)
(Time to go to the Favor Tree!)
(Isabeau said the tree felt weird...)
(You decide to take a look at the tree.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: (Some papers.)
(There's some sort of sale happening, it seems.)
(Some papers.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Ahoy, traveling one!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Oh! You're with Mirabelle and the lady with the glasses, I recognize you!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Can you believe Mirabelle has been blessed by the Change God to save us all?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: The Change God almost never gives blessings of any kind... It's truly amazing Mirabelle has been chosen!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: May the Change God protect her in her journey!!!
(You nod.)
(The Change God, huh...)
(You nod, again.)
(Blessings by the Change God, huh...)
(You wonder if the Change God is the one who revived you, and gave you those powers.)
(Eh, it doesn't matter that much.)
(But Mirabelle wasn't blessed by the Change God. She was blessed by the Head Housemaiden.)
(It doesn't make that much of a difference to you, but Mirabelle seemed very worried at the idea of people knowing, so much that she kept the truth a secret...)
(Probably Mirabelle getting stressed out for nothing.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Huh? What do you mean?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: If... If she wasn't blessed by the Change God, then...

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Then it would mean the Change God abandoned us, right? It would mean there's no hope for Vaugarde, right? Hahaha...

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: ...Where is this coming from, anyway? You said this hypothetically, right? She's really blessed by the Change God, right?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: VAUGARDE WILL BE SAVED, RIGHT?!?
(Ah, you get it now.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Hypothetically, of course!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Oh, okay! Phew! You had me worried for a second, there!!!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Ah, what a relief.
(You understand Mirabelle a bit better, now.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: (Oh, before you forget.) Know anything about locked doors in the House?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Locked doors...? Ah, yes!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: There's one locked by one of those word locks. Let's see...

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Ah, I remember! The openphrase to open it is "stostorage roomoom", because there's a storage room inside, but I didn't want it to unlock if you just said "storage room".

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: D-Don't look at me like that...

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Well, either way, there's not much in there. Nonetheless, I hope it helps you on your journey tomorrow!
(Didn't this shopkeeper know about that one locked room?)
(Maybe they'd know about other, secret, hidden rooms around the House.)
(Nothing else to do but explore, you suppose.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Know of any hidden rooms in the House?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Hm... Hidden rooms, hidden rooms...

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Oh! It's not really hidden, but... You might see a bunch of holes in walls. And rubble around them, too.

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Honestly, we've been trying to fix those... Some are water damage, some are accidents, some are, uh, scientific explosions.

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: But I have heard one of those holes actually leads to some old, blocked off hallway!
(You should keep a lookout for holes in walls, and rubble, you suppose.)
(You need to ask...)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: What I asked the Favor Tree?

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: For the Change God to keep protecting Vaugarde, of course!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Ahoy, tra--
(No point talking to them.)
(You're only in here to talk to Odile, anyway.)
(You walk away.)

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: Oh, um, okay! May the Change God protect you!

rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.speaker: Story-loving Shopkeeper
rooms/dormont/itemshop.html.dialogue: May the Change God protect you!
(Old, moldy books.)
(You can't even read their titles.)
(A closet filled with everything from empty salt shakers to half broken pencils.)
(Are they for sale...?)
(A little figure of the Change God.)
(It's been Crafted to dance slightly.)
(This one has a wide smile.)
(Shelves filled with various foods.)
(Being near them makes your stomach grumble...)
(Some little paintings animated by Craft.)
(You can see the shopkeeper, along with some other people from Dormont.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Welcome to the library!

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Well. Our selection is kind of lacking. All the good books are in the House.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: But the House is. Well. Closed until further notice. Since the King. Took residence there. And froze. Everyone in time.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Are you looking for a book in particular?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: (Are you?)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Survive a very powerful attack? Um... Like, crafting a shield?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I wouldn't know anything about that... That sounds highly specialized. I don't think we carry that sort of knowledge here.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I doubt even the House's library would own something like that...

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Maybe it would be in the secret library?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: (The WHAT.) The WHAT?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: The uh. Secret library.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: The secret library whose entrance is hidden in the library? That library.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: One of the walls looks normal, but if you check it carefully it'll reveal the secret library's entrance.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Technically only the librarians know about it. But you ARE trying to save Vaugarde, so. Don't snitch on me? And don't lose tomorrow?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: (...) Yeah, I'll try.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Heh. Cool.
(So the House's library on the second floor has a secret library? Sounds like you should go there and check the walls...)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Time Craft? Like, um, specifically?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I'm not sure... You should look through books about Craft. We have one here, but it might not talk about Time Craft much...

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I wonder... Where could you find Craftonomy books...
("Craftonomy?")
(You make sure to look confused.)
(The librarian notices your confusion.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Oh, the study of Craft in general is called "Craftonomy".

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I don't think the libraries here or in the House carry any... Maybe you should look elsewhere?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Also, why am I thinking about candles right now? Must be nothing.
(Someplace other than the libraries... Maybe someone's dorm room in the House?)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Familytales...?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Why would you even want to look at one? Aren't you from outside Vaugarde...?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Well, either way, we, um, we don't. We don't carry those here.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I'm not sure where you'd need to look for one... But I feel like I've seen one recently? It's weird.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Either way, the library in the House might help?
(Looks like there's no familytale in this library.)
(The library in the House, huh... You should look around there, and explore the secret library while you're at it.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ..."Wish Craft"?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: That sounds made up. Are you sure that sort of Craft exists?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Time?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: We, uh. Have a book about clocks somewhere?
(Not really what you're looking for.)
(You let it go.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: No problem! Let me know if I can help with anything...
(You need to ask...)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: What I asked the Favor Tree?

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: Um. I don't actually believe in that stuff... So I didn't ask for anything.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: I did help the Head Housemaiden with it. She was asking everyone what they asked for. I don't know why.

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: Bored Librarian
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: ...Why are you asking?
(The bookcase is filled with novels.)
("Run, Child, Run!", "The Unrestrained", "The Cursing of Château Castle" issues #6, #12 and #24...)
(...Issue #24? You should remember this number.)
(None of those catch your eye.)
(The bookcase is filled with books about culture.)
("Travelers Of The World", "The House: Monasteries Of The Change God", "Ka Buan Expressions"... Oh?)
(There's an old book stuck between the shelf and the wall...)
(Take it out?)
(Get the book out again?)
(Pushing some books around, you manage to get a hold of the old book.)
(Book between your hands, you try to read the title.)
(Try as you might, your mind can't seem to get a hold of the letters...)
(You put it back.)
(You take the book out again.)
(You try to read the title again, but to no avail.)
(You put it back.)
(You take the book out again.)
(You try to read the title until your eyes water.)
(You put it back.)
(You take the book out again.)
(You try to read the title until your hands hurt from gripping the book.)
(You put it back.)
(You take the book out again.)
(You put it back.)
(You take the book out again.)
(You can read its title, now...)
(Your heart is beating, badump, badump, badump.)
(...A translated copy of "The Cursing of Château Castle", issue #2.)
(You start laughing.)
(Laziness wins again.)
(You've got better things to do.)
(The bookcase is filled with books about culture.)
("Travelers Of The World", "The House: Monasteries Of The Change God", "Ka Buan Expressions", "The Cursing of Château Castle" issue #2...)
(The bookcase is filled with books about Craft.)
(...You can't see anything that could stop the King's onslaught...)
(Maybe you could ask the Librarian?)

("What is Craft? Crafting for Dummies", "Creative Craft: How To Use Paper Type Effectively", "Scissors Type and Me", "Just Because You're Rock Type Doesn't Mean You Can Destroy Walls", and many more.)
(...You should gift that last one to Bonnie.)
(Pick up "What is Craft? Crafting for Dummies"?)
(You pick up the book and open it at a random page.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: "What is Craft?"
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: "Protection Craft, Creative Craft, and Piercing Craft (or commonly known as Rock, Paper and Scissors Craft) are three branches of Common Craft able to be used by most people."

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: "What is Craft?"
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: "It is the art of molding the world around us as we see fit, like crafting clay into moving figurines, or using paint to create art that blablablabla..."
(You flip through the book.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: "What is Craft?"
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: "Using Craft in battle is taking the creative energy and making it physical to hurt enemies blablabla..."
(You flip through the book.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: "What is Craft?"
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue: "Other types of Craft include Body Craft, Time Craft blablabla..."
(You flip through the book.)

rooms/dormont/library.html.speaker: "What is Craft?"
rooms/dormont/library.html.dialogue:
"Time Craft.
You shouldn't be able to Craft time."
(There's a piece of paper taped to the page, with a tiny face drawn on it.)
(The tiny face is an upside down smiling face saying "hahahahahahahahahahahaha funny joke.")
(Hm.)
(Time Craft not being achievable was the theory for a long time, but the King is able to freeze people in time, isn't he?)
(And... What just happened... Couldn't it be considered Time Craft, too?)
(And what makes you loop in time could be considered Time Craft, too...)
(Oh well. You don't really care about how you can loop in time, at the moment.)
(You're just glad you got this power to help everyone!)
(You leave the book alone.)
(The paper seems to list people who aren't allowed in this library for "crimes against books".)
(Big papers.)
(You slightly unroll one to look inside...)
(It's a big map of Vaugarde.)
(A pile of papers.)
(What horrible handwriting... You can't read any of them.)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: (You shouldn't fall asleep, or Mirabelle will come and wake you up again.)
(You should get up before someone comes to bother you.)
(Wake up, you have things to do!)
(You wish you could sleep here a while.)
(Sleeping, in the middle of a play?)
(That's the same light you saw inside the House...)
[YOU HAVE SEEN THE END OF THIS PLAY BEFORE.]
[AS THANKS FOR SEEING THIS PLAY THROUGH, FAST FORWARD HAS BEEN UNLOCKED FOR ALL EVENTS THAT CAN BE SKIPPED.]
[HOWEVER, IF YOU DON'T WANT THIS BOON, YOU CAN TURN IT OFF IN THE OPTIONS WHENEVER YOU'D LIKE.]

[PLEASE ENJOY THIS TALE ONCE MORE.
I know I will! o(*°▽°*)o.]

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like you... Only you could sleep peacefully at a time like this, hehe!

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: I guess that's smart... We better get some rest while we can! We have to be ready for tomorrow...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: So we can finally face against the King!

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: You can sleep for a little longer, but not too long! Come to the village when you're ready, okay?
(You yawn so hard your jaw cracks.)
(You were having such a nice rest too...)
(You can't spend the rest of the day sleeping. That would be a waste.)
(Wake up Siffrin. You have a country to save.)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like you... Only you could sleep peacefully at a time like this, hehe!

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: I guess that's smart... We better get some rest while we can! We have to be ready for tomorrow...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: So we can finally face against the King!

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: You can sleep for a little longer, but not too long! Come to the village when you're ready, okay?

(You DID, you think! You must have! You were in the House and then a big rock fell and now you're in the meadow, back in Dormont, and what Mirabelle just said to you, waking you up, that was, very, familiar???)
(But aaargh, the trap, the trap!!! You idiot! You stupid fool! It's your job to take care of traps and you got taken out IMMEDIATELY!!!!)

(You didn't even see a glimpse of the King!!! And it's your job, stupid!!! Your job to see ahead, to take care of traps!!! You couldn't even do your job and now you're DEAD because you did a SLOPPY AWFUL TERRIBLE JOB,)
(And you DIED!!! YOU DIED!!!! You felt your body being crushed and now you're laying on the grass, alive, and your skin itches and your stomach hurts and you DIED!!!!)
(You put your hands over your mouth and scream!!! Stars!!!! You’re so stupid and useless and dumb!!!!!!!!!)
(You take a deeeeeeep breath iiiiiiiiin, and ouuuuuuuuuut.)
(You put your shaking hands behind your back, pressing them hard between you and the grass.)
(And now, you're alive, and not a crêpe, that's another thing.)
(And it's apparently the day before, back when Mirabelle woke you up from your nap, that's the third thing.)
(...Oh well, at least you were in the lead as always.)
(Judging by where you were when you died, you were probably the only one who got hit. The only one that...)
(In a way, you're REALLY glad you're forced to take the lead every time you and everyone else get somewhere dangerous.)
(But...   You're back. Back to the day before you went to the House.)
(And...   Can you make sure to not die this time?)
(Back to work, Siffrin. You have a country to save.)

[For example, the Memory you just got can only be equipped by you. When Memory of Looping is equipped, it'll boost your MaxHP by +5 per loop.]
[You can equip Memories by opening your menu and going to the Equip section!]
(What is that voice you've been hearing this whole time...?)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Well, more like, good afternoon, I guess...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Were you taking a nap? That's just like... ...
(You won, didn't you? Why are you back? WHY ARE YOU BACK?!)
(The whole Universe is closing in on you)

(You're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here you're back here your journey was over a nd you're  back  here)
(Your journey was over, wasn't it!!!! You won, didn't you!!! You all survived, right!!!! And yet!!!! AND YET, YOU'RE--!!!!!!)
(YOU TRY BREATHING IN BUT YOU CAN'T BREATHE- YOU CAN'T BREATHE--)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin, finally you answered! What's wrong, what happened?

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Oh no... It must've been a horrible nightmare...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: ...Do you want to talk about it?

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: ...Um, why would making onion quiche make you--

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: "I was cutting a lot of onions!"

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN, YOU CRAB!!! I CAN'T BELIEVE I WAS WORRIED!!!
(You laugh in a very convincing way.)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Hmf! I'm glad at least your nightmare wasn't that bad, but... Hmf!

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: I'll be waiting in the village, alright? Come talk to me later!!!
(Why are you back...? You beat the King, didn't you? Did something go wrong?)
(It was the end of your journey, and yet you...)
(The Head Housemaiden... She said something about the world being rotten?)
(They're the only one you can talk to... They might... know what's going on...)
(You cough until you can't move or even breathe anymore.)
(You cover your mouth with both hands, and try not to breathe, try not to make a single sound.)
(Even now, you can't say it, because you know, you know, you know...)
(Something terrible will happen if you try. Something has to.)
(That's the reason you won't try to say it, will never try to say it, that's the reason, the only reason.)
(Hope is for braver people than you are!!!!!)
(You should have tried to say it twice.)
(It would've worked, if you said it twice, it would've worked, it would have, you just know it would have.)
(See, if you say it now, it might work! You might be able to say it! Just say it! Just say it!!! JUST SAY IT!!!!!! )
(No sounds come out of your mouth.)
(What was the point, anyway? What was the point of saying its name? What was the King thinking?!?)
(Your home is gone, and has been for a long time.)
(There's nothing you can do to bring it back. Doesn't the King see that?)
(Doesn't he see that you have to let it go?)
(Will you ever take your own advice?)
(You need to go and talk to the King.)
(Stars, no, no, no, no, no--)
(You clutch your chest and try to catch your breath and forget!!!)
(You looped back!!! It's fine!!! It's fine!!! They're fine!!! Bonnie is fine!!!)
(Looping resets everything!!! Everything that just happened has been erased!!! Everything is back to normal!!! Bonnie is back to normal!!!)
(Just go and see them!!! They're fine!!! They're fine!!!)
(No, you're okay, Bonnie is okay, everyone is okay.)
(breathe breathe breathe breathe breathe breathe)
(Ha, see, because of the way loops work, they won't remember anything. They're not hurt, everything is back to normal.)
(There's no reason the loops would work differently this time.)
(Just breathe, and stand up, and make sure.)
(You have to make sure Bonnie is okay.)
(You open your eyes, hand already reaching out.)
(You press your palms against your eyes.)
(You really thought helping them would save you!!!)
(If you helped them, if you were loved, it had to save you, didn't it?)
(But not enough to save you!!!)
(Mirabelle is back to feeling awful and out of place!)
(Isabeau won't remember the night you spent under the stars!)
(Odile is still hiding everything about herself!)
(Bonbon is back to Bonnie, is back to hating you!)
(That's what you get for hoping! That's what you deserve! Haha! Hahahahahaha!!!)
(Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
(Hahahahahahahahahahahaha oh, Mirabelle will be here soon, won't she?)
(The power of friendship didn't work, it's fine.)
(All you can do is try something else, now.)
(It's all fine, that everything that just happened has been reset.)
[When equipped, Memory of Family doubles everyone's EXP gained in battle, except for yours.]
(She didn't say anything different. It was the exact same, even though... Even though everything about her was different.)
(Why is she repeating the same thing over and over? It was almost like you weren't there...)
(The King spoke of something called "Time Craft". It might be time to find out more.)
(You should ask the Dormont librarian, see if they know something...)
(You've now talked to the King and the Head Housemaiden... Are those really the only two people that would know anything about the loops you're stuck in?)
(Who else could you talk to about the loops? To theorize?)
(You needed to go and talk to them anyway, so...)
(The Head Housemaiden said the exact same thing.)
(She... She really repeated the exact same thing, huh?)
(Usually, when you react differently, everyone reacts differently as well, but she...)
(The King spoke of something called "Time Craft". It might be time to find out more.)
(You should ask the Dormont librarian, see if they know something...)
(You've now talked to the King and the Head Housemaiden... Are those really the only two people that would know anything about the loops you're stuck in?)
(Who else could you talk to about the loops? To theorize?)
(You needed to go and talk to them anyway, so...)
(You had a theory, and it was wrong.)
(You thought the Head Housemaiden would know how to save you, but she doesn't. That's all good. It's fine! It's all fine!!!)
(At least you know why you're here.)
(You're here because everyone wished for it!!!)
(Everyone in Vaugarde wished for your suffering!  Everyone wished for you to be stuck repeating everything, to bE ROTTING HERE FOREVER--)
(No, it's fine, it's fine, it's fine.)
(People in Vaugarde wished for the King to be defeated, for Vaugarde to be saved, but no one knew how to do Wish Craft. No one knew the correct rituals.)
(Is that why? Is that why you've been stuck in this loop?)
(They wished for it, but wished wrong, and so the wish is breaking, folding in on itself? Because it was done wrong?)
(Or maybe-- Maybe!!! Maybe YOU did it wrong! They wished for it, for the King to die, but-- But he disappears, every time you win, and the wish revolves around you, so maybe--)
(MAYBE YOU'RE DOING SOMETHING WRONG EVERY TIME, AND THAT'S WHY YOU'RE STUCK HERE!!!)
(THAT HAS TO BE WHY!!! If you're still looping, after everything, after trying it all, then it must be that you're missing something!!!)
(You must be going against the wish's will without realizing, and that's why it brings you back, because you're doing something wrong!!!)
(You don't want to be here, so what-- What are you doing wrong?)

(Is it waking up?! Are you waking up wrong?!? Or, going to the House? But you have to, you have to go, you have to beat the King, save Vaugarde, because obviously, saving Vaugarde is why you're here--)
(Defeating the King is why you're here, and you do defeat him, you fight, you get his guard down, he talks, everyone talks, you attack all at once, and you defeat the King with your own two hands--)
(You DON'T defeat him with your own two hands.)
(Mirabelle. She's always the one who deals the final strike, isn't she.)
(You've never, even once, defeated him yourself.)
(...But, why do you, specifically, need to defeat the King, why would everyone's wish revolve around--)
(No, don't think about it, this is definitely it.)
(If they all wished for you to defeat him. And you're the only one stuck in this loop.)
(Then you need to do it yourself. Fight him and tear him to pieces and rip his hair out and reach into his chest and kill!!!)
(It always comes back to him, doesn't it!!! It's his fault you're here!!! It's his fault you can't escape!!! It's his fault so many people are suffering!!!)
(There you go, hahaha! That's a theory! That's a goal!)
(You just need to make sure Mirabelle doesn't deal the final hit! That's all you need! That's all you BLINDING NEED--)
(Aaah, but it's okay, right? It's fine, isn't it?)
(Even if the entire country wished for you to be here... It's okay, isn't it?)
(It's fine, as long as you're with them.)
(You can live with this, as long as you're with them.)
(You're fine, as long as you're with them.)
(But this thought... IS NOT ENOUGH FOR YOU TO GO ON ANYMORE!!!!!!)
(YOU WANT TO BE WITH YOUR FAMILY!!! NOT WITH THOSE FICTIONAL CHARACTERS THAT HAVE TAKEN THEIR PLACE!!!)

(THEY CAN NEVER CHANGE! THEY CAN NEVER FIND OUT! THEY CAN NEVER TRULY SEE YOU! THEY CAN ONLY REPEAT THE SAME LINES OVER AND OVER AND OVER, BECAUSE THAT'S ALL THEY CAN DO, BECAUSE YOU WON'T EVEN ALLOW THEM TO DO OTHERWISE--)
(IF ONLY MIRABELLE DIDN'T DEAL THE FINAL HIT EVERY TIME... IF ONLY SHE...!!!!!!)

(If only you knew if only the wish wasn't broken if only you could get to the king deal the final hit end it all and finally you'll be with your family forever and you'll be okay and you can just end it all you just need to get
to the king deal the final hit make the wish come true make sure it all loops around you kill the king rip him to pieces for making you remember for making you see for not understanding for killing bonnie for getting in your
blinding way every time you just need to kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him kill him you just)
(and make sure everyone's wish comes true)
(You just need to defeat the King on your own.)

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Hehe, I thought you were napping, so I was just--

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Ah, yes! I'm... Sorry? I hope that's okay...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: W-Well, um... I had an idea for tonight, and I--

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: "To all meet at the Clocktower for a sleepover."

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Y-Yes? Oh, did you have... The same idea?

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: ...Okay... Well, I won't keep you, then...

rooms/dormont/meadow.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/meadow.html.dialogue: Um, let's all meet at the Clocktower later, then, alright?
(Yes, you need to kill the King before Mirabelle, but)
(you don't want  to be here  anymore.)
(You have to get to the King as fast as possible, get him close to death as fast as possible.)
(You need to make sure everyone else is strong enough.)
(You need  to make sure  they're all as powerful as they can be.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: (Mirabelle is here, sitting on a bench and looking at papers.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Hi Siffrin! Do you need anything?
[You don't need to talk to your allies about things you've already talked about, but the option is still here just in case you need a refresher!]
(Mirabelle is here, sitting on a bench and looking at papers.)
(She wanted to talk to you, didn't she...?)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Oh! Siffrin...

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Um, sorry to bother you while you're so busy, but I REALLY wanted to make sure you were okay...

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: You... You'd tell me if anything was wrong, right?

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: (Where is THIS coming from...) "Of course I'd tell you!"

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: I'm   not sure you're telling me the truth here.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: I don't want to force you to do anything, but you have to know I want you to be happy.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: And I know this is a stressful moment for all of us, but the only way we can get through this is if we talk to each other! If we share our worries!

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: S-So, um, I guess what I'm trying to say is, if you need help with anything...!

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: I-If you need help with anything, I'm, I'm here for you!
(Hm, okay, weird.)
(Why is she telling you this...?)
(Ah, you know why she's asking you this.)
(Poor Mirabelle can't just say it, so you'll have to do it for her...)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: (Clearly what's happening is...) "Do YOU need help with something?"

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Huh? HUH? HUH?!?

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: NO! That's not why I'm--URGH!
(Mirabelle urgh'd at you.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Sigh. You can be such an oblivious person sometimes. Anyway, I--
(AND she sighed! And called you names! Who is this!)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: --don't need help. Not at all.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: (Okay now that's a lie.) "Not even with those papers of yours?"
(She's been looking at those for every loop you've been in. Clearly there's something wrong with them.)
(You poke the papers to make your point.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: HUH?!? NO! NOT AT ALL!!!

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Do not look at the papers, the papers are irrelevant, do NOT LOOK AT THEM SIFFRIN I SEE YOU LOOKING AT THEM
(You arch an eyebrow, smiling.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Urgh!

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Alright, YES the papers are giving me a lot of trouble and I hate them.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: But I'm only looking at them now to get worried at something other than, um, tomorrow? They aren't that big of a deal.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: If I have to be worried I'd rather be worried about the thing that won't kill me.

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: There's even more in my dorm room in the House... Those stupid papers have been following me since before the King stuff even started...
(There's more in her dorm room...? The one on Floor 3?)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: So... If we're done talking about my papers...

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: If there's nothing I can do for you, Siffrin...?

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: "Nah, I'm good."

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Sigh...

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: I'll see you later, then...
(Sounds like you could help Mirabelle with her problems if you went snooping a bit...)
(...If she needs help, maybe everyone else does too?)
(You should ask everyone and see if you can help them with anything.)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin...? Is everything okay?

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.dialogue: (Questions...)

rooms/dormont/miratalk.html.speaker: Mirabelle
