rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I...... do try to be merciful.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I'd better not hold back, shouldn't I?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You're stronger than I thought, bright one.
(You see a vision of the future...)

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: This isn't the first time you've withstood this attack.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: What do you see, when I attack you like this?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: What vision do you see  that it hurts you this badly?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I am curious about something.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: The country, the knowledge we both share......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Why you're the only one facing me, without even flinching......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: This cloying, overpowering scent of sugar......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You've trapped this country in time even more surely than I have.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Even if I manage to beat you now......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: My victory will always be temporary, will it not?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Perhaps my wish has come true already, and I don't even know it.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Why didn't I think of it......?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: With this power, there's no one to stop you, is there.....

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: But I do not mind.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: As long as this country exists forever.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: As long as WE exist forever!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Proof that our country was real!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Doesn't a part of you agree with me?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Doesn't a part of you want to restart this battle, again, and again, and again?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You can guess what it was, can't you?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You have even heard it from my own mouth......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: But what about you, bright one?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: What trapped you in this eternal place?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: What does the star beating in your chest hunger for?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: WHAT DID YOU WISH FOR?!?!?!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I suppose it does not matter.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: ......I will win this battle soon, after all, for a time.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: When everything is perfectly frozen......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I will finally remember it all......
(you  don't   want   to    fight   a n y m o r e )

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Eyes on the enemy, Boniface! Siffrin will be alright!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You don't need to fight anymore, Siffrin! We got you!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We talked, after-- After yesterday, and we couldn't find you anywhere, and we decided to come after you!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We had trouble figuring out where you went, so we asked people in Dormont, and then--

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: A weird shiny person helped us!!! And--

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Aaaaaargh, it doesn't crabbing matter!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I'm still mad at you, Siffrin!!! So mad!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I still can't believe you said all those horrible things to us yesterday!!! And that you went to fight the King without us!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: But we'll talk about it later!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: And in the meantime I'm going to channel my anger to kick that stupid King's butt who froze our country in time!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: What Belle said!!! Get ready, King!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We'll explain the rest later, Siffrin. Right now, we have a King to defeat!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
Ooooooh......

So you had companions after all, bright one......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Quite a shame they couldn't be here to help you earlier.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: They must not care about you very much, do they?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We may be upset, but we wouldn't leave Sif behind.
(she said they should leave you behind)

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: If Siffrin was stupid enough to come and fight you on their own, the only thing we can do is follow and fight right alongside them.

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I'll fight, I'll fight, I'll fight!!! This time, Frin, it's my turn to protect you!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: So shut the CRAB up, King!!! I'm gonna kick your crabbing BUTT!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: YOU REALLY THINK YOU CAN DEFEAT ME, AFTER EVERYTHING?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I HAVE THE POWER OF THE UNIVERSE AT MY DISPOSAL!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Your bright companion may have been able to hurt me, because his Craft also draws from It...

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: But pathetic, wishless humans like you......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: CANNOT HOPE TO DEFEAT ME!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I WON'T LET YOU!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: You really think I'll let you defeat us like this?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: After you froze my beloved House in time, my country, my HOME?!?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We won't let you!!! We want to live!!! We want to be able to change, to grow!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: We don't want your eternity, King!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: But if you want eternity so bad, then--!!!
(a sound   like a sword getting deflected)
(like hitting a metal ball   with a bat)

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
Has been......

Reflected back......

To me......?

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
No......
No......
No!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
I don't want eternity!
Not yet!
Not now!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
Not when......
I still cannot......
Remember...... Its name......

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: Please...... Please...... Not now, please......!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: P L E A S E . . . . . . ! ! !

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
Why now, of all times......
I see it......

I can see it!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
The mountains, covered in trees and warm rocks!!!
The sea, clear, dangerous, yet giving!!!
The lightless sand, dark like the night sky!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue: I see it now, I see it!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight-act5.html.dialogue:
Aaaaaah......

I remember i t, n o   w......

I r e  m e m b  e r   i t    a l    l  .  .   .  .   .  .

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Oh...... Young ones......
Are you...... here to kill me......?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Oh...... Young lady......
You stand for Change Themselves, do you not......?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
I... I just want the world to stay the way it is now......
To be frozen in eternal beauty.......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: A world of everlasting peace and rest.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Young housemaiden......
In a way... Isn't my wish a form of Change?
Why aren't you on my side......?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Ah......
Can't you feel it, young lady......?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: The Universe yearns for everyone's hopes to be encased in limitless ice......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Won't you allow your fate to be ended......?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Corrupting and ending people's lives? You call this a form of Change?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: You DARE compare your dreams of ice and stillness to Change themselves?!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: This is NOT true Change! This is just you, acting as a god would, for your own satisfaction!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: One would think keeping a whole country from changing and evolving is the farthest thing away from change.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Seems like a pretty pathetic way to appeal to a Housemaiden's good nature, huh?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Is this what you want, then? For us to peacefully let ourselves be frozen in time?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: I will never be on your side, King.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Ha...... Spoken like a true Housemaiden of Change......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Aw, and I had a whole speech prepared too!
(Odile looks at you with an expression screaming "does he mean you or me?")

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: No...... That is not how it works, does it?
(The King looks at you, and sobs.)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: AND WE SHALL SEE WHICH SIDE THE UNIVERSE FAVORS!!!
(Your attacks will hit harder against the King[!/.])

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Despite what you may think......
I am......
A merciful King.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: I will give you some time to come to terms with your end......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
A most beautiful end......
An eternal end......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Wow, he's really taking us for chumps, isn't he...?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: We've gotten this far! We will not back down!!!
(You finally managed to beat him last time, but you still have so many questions...)
(Why is he freezing Vaugarde in time? Does his power have anything to do with the time loops you're stuck in?)
(If you ask him something... Will he answer...?)
[You can now "Ask" the King questions by going into your Craft menu!]
[The things I let you do, stardust, I swear.]
(You still have questions for the King.)
(You see a vision of the future...)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Oh...... Oooooooh...... You're still here......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Good. Let us fight to the death, then.
(You kind of mess it up, but manage to throw the bomb at the King!)
(You stick your tongue out at the King.)
(The King cries and cries and cries...)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Why......
Why won't you understand......
Why won't you understand!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Glad you're expressing your emotions and everything, very healthy, but learn to read the room.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Stop crying!!! JUST STOP CRYING!!! YOU CAN'T!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: You hurt so many people!!! People who won't ever move again unless we beat you!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: They're all frozen in time, because of you!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: YOU DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT TO CRY!!!
(...Was it always this easy to fight the King?)
(Even the King feels easy to fight, now.)
(The King's Tears disappeared and healed the King[!/.])
(You wait for the play to end.)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Please......
Please, all of you...... Tell me......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Why are you all fighting against me?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
But don't you see it?
Don't you want it?
This perfect ending?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Right now...
You are fighting me, a being close to divinity.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: The Universe Itself follows my will.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
And yet......
You are all facing me, without fear.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
You're all so powerful......
So united......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: And...... I can see it.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Oooooh......
You're all so stunningly......
So wholeheartedly......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Ah, aaaaaaaah, and that's why you should all understand!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Even now, don't you agree?
Don't you want it?!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Look at you all!!! You're all so powerful!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
You all managed to get this far!!!
Don't you want to be immortalized right now?
As winners?!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
DON'T YOU WANT IT ALL
TO END LIKE THIS!!!!!!
(You know this is all just a way to make you all stop fighting, but...)
(Don't you want the play to stop here!!!)
(The King... You've beaten him again, but you haven't asked him anything!!!)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Bonnie (no!1): --just a dumb baby idiot who froze the country in time for dumb baby idiot reasons!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: I do not want time to stop now.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: I don't want to be stuck here, in what you deem a "perfect moment"!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
Ooooh......
But...... Do you truly think your life will get more extraordinary than this?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Do you truly think you will become more powerful, more fulfilled than you are right now? Fighting me?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: ...Do I think something will fulfill me more than fighting you to save my country?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: "Life will never get better than this, so you should give up now"?

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: The eternity you wish for... I want no part of it!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: WE WANT NO PART OF IT!!! WE WILL NOT GIVE IN!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Because your eternity means the end of change!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: And I believe in change, King! I believe in a life that goes on!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Things CANNOT stay the same! They can't! They won't!!! Or we as humans cannot change for the better!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: So I will NEVER let you have your way!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Yeah, what she said! Nice try, trying to manipulate us into being frozen!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: But we won't listen to you.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: This isn't the end of our story, King! Not by a long shot!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: How egocentric to think fighting you is the highlight of our lives.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Believe it or not, beating you isn't even worth writing on my resume.

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Saying all those things to push us into being frozen... You're the worst, King!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: You're nothing!!! You're not even a King, you're no one! No one!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: You're just a dumb baby idiot who froze the country in time for dumb baby idiot reasons!!!!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue:
No......
No, no, no, NO!!!
(You attack the King with all you've got[!!!/...])
(You all attacked the King and hit as hard as you could...)
(Mirabelle's attack brings the King to his knees.)
(Like before, as always, Mirabelle's attack brings the King to his knees.)

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: No, I can't...... I can't disappear......

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Not yet...... No t  w h e n...... I   s t i l l  c a n  ' t  s  a y i   t.. .. .. ..

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: o o  o  o o  o o o  h . .  .  .  .   .

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Everyone, we did it!!! He's gone!!! The King is gone!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: HOLY CRAB THAT WAS SCARY!!! WE DID IT?!??! WE DID IT!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Hahahahaha!!! Oh, it was close for a second there!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: The people around us, I can... I can feel them coming back to normal, all over Vaugarde!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: Ah, I can feel her, she's okay, she's okay! She's okay!!!

rooms/king/kingfight.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/kingfight.html.dialogue: She's just ahead, come on!!! We have to tell her that everything's fine!!! Come on, let's go!!!
[When equipped, Memory of Victory automatically boosts everyone's ATTACK at the start of a battle.]

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: (Ask the King...)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh...... My goal...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: . . . . . .

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Sif... Does it matter?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: (But they might!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Siffrin...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oooh, oooooooh...!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Can't you guess......? Can't you tell?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh, stars...... I thought my intentions were clear...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: We don't know! We don't understand you!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Why would you want to make an entire country suffer And expect everyone to be okay with it!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: There must be a reason!!! Why would you freeze Vaugarde in time!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: And only Vaugarde, for that matter?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: That's true... No other country has been attacked.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: With a power like yours, you could freeze more than just Vaugarde.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But you stopped at the borders. Other countries are safe. Why?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oooh, ooooooh......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Because...... Vaugarde......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Is perfect.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Perfect...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Such welcoming, creative people.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Always willing to welcome travelers in, even travelers with no name, no home to speak of......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Such...... Precious memories......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is perfect. I do not want it to change. I want it to stay exactly how it is.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: So it cannot ever be destroyed.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: That's so...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: What backwards thinking.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I don't know what about Vaugarde made it perfect for you, but you cannot stop us from living!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh, oooooh...... "Doing this"......?
(Stars, you don't want to explain it in front of everyone...)
(But the King... He could be the one trapping you in time!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "The one imprisoning me here."

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: (...) "The one imprisoning me here."

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Huh?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Imprisoning you...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......     Whatever is happening to you, I am not the one responsible, bright one.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But...... That scent around you, could it be......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It does not matter.
(He doesn't seem to know what you're talking about.)
(So the King isn't the one responsible for the loops?)
(...Isn't that weird?)
(You're looping through time, he's freezing it...)
(Aren't you using the same power?)
(Power over time?)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......     Ha.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Pst, Sif, could've told you that one if you asked.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It's Time Craft, buddy.
(...You don't know what that is.)
(Time Craft, you've heard this before...)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Time Craft... The ability to craft time itself.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But Time Craft is supposed to be impossible to control...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: How can you use it, yet alone do it as such a grand scale?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ha...... If the bright one isn't bright enough to know of Time Craft......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: They will not be bright enough to understand how.
(Ouch.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Don't be mean to Frin!!! Shut up!!!
(Time Craft...)
(That's something to look into, isn't it?)
(Either way... It doesn't seem like he's the one trapping you here.)
(...Since you're here, it might be worth it to beat the King now, so you can go talk to the Head Housemaiden...)
(She said something before. About how you're looping. About something being broken.)
(She knew something!)
(After that, you have to find more information about Time Craft somewhere.)
(And you can always go back and fight the King if you have anything else to talk about.)
(...You have to find more information about Time Craft somewhere.)
(And you can always go back and fight the King if you have anything else to talk about.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Time Craft......? I suppose I am.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But, if you're using Time Craft... How did you manage to control it?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ha......!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Yes, it is true...... I could not have harvested Time Craft on my own.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: So...... I had some help.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Help? Who would...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ooooh, ooooooh......     Isn't it obvious?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: The Universe would.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ah, aaaaaah! I only had to wish for it......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: And the Universe delivered.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "The Universe"...? Who is that? A person?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Nah, it's, it's...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Wow, it's on the tip of my tongue, but I can't seem to remember.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It's... What's beyond this plane, correct? What's in the sky?
(You clench your fists.)
(You do not react.)
(The King sobs.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oooh, oooooooh......!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Aaaah!!! I knew Vaugardians were ignorant of it...... But I did not think travelers from other countries were, too......!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: How......     How could you have......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "Vaugardians", huh...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Interesting choice of words. Are you not from Vaugarde yourself?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: He isn't, madame Odile... I feel like I've seen an article about it somewhere recently.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I saw it today... Where was it again?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: So you're not from Vaugarde, but you still want to freeze it in time?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Where do you call home, then?
(The King flinches.)
(He does not answer.)
(You shake your head, and breathe out.)
(An article about the King, somewhere...)
(If Mirabelle remembers it, you might've seen it somewhere too. Could it be somewhere in the House?)
(You do not react.)
(Every single time you face him...)
(He asks if you remember.)
(There's something he thinks you should know... Should remember... But...)
(You ask again, but you know, you know, you know.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Does it really matter, Siffrin? He could just be trying to confuse you.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Yeah!!! Speaking in riddles to Frin!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Stop trying to confuse him! He hasn't forgotten anything!!!

(But you have, haven't you?)
(You try not to think about it, but... But...)
(You know, you know, you know.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "What have I forgotten?"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Forgotten?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh, bright one, bright one, why...... Why would you ask......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Don't you know at this point what you've forgotten? Haven't you always known?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Can't you see the hole it has left behind, if not what used to fill it?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Don't you feel it? Its absence?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: What the crab is he--

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ALL OF IT!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: YOU'VE FORGOTTEN IT ALL, BRIGHT ONE!!!!!! THEY ALL HAVE!!!!!! WE ALL HAVE!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: No one can say it!!! No one can even remember it!!! It escapes us, it will keep escaping us!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ooooh, why don't you remember?! I can tell!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Everything, from your accent, to the way you use Craft, to the stitching on your cloak and hat, to those pins you wear--

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: You should remember!!! You and I, of all people standing here, should remember!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Bright one, please, please!!!
Just remember it!!!
Say it!!! Make it real!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Please......
If you can remember, then......
Then maybe......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......
(...)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: What is happening? Is he okay...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Something we've all forgotten...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I haven't forgotten anything, stupid!!!
(Something you've forgotten.)
(Something everyone has, even if they don't pay attention to it.)
(The hole it has left behind.)
(Something bigger than just the stars.)
(What you're trying to remember doesn't exist anymore, but...)
(But someone might still have written proof it existed, haven't they?)
(You know,
you know,
(you know.)
(This feels important... But you'd still like to talk to the Head Housemaiden during this loop, while you're so close to your family members.)
(Are you sure you want to ask the King about this now...?)
(You open your mouth.)
(You shake your head.)
(You can ask him later.)
(Will he say it if you ask?)
(Can he say it?)
(Someone asked you this exact question before, and you couldn't answer, you couldn't say anything, you forgot it all, but... But...!!!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Where......
Where I'm from......?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Oooooh......
Bright one.....
If you're asking, with such a look in your eye......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Do you remember, then?
Can you see it?
Can you picture it?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Bright one. Bright one, please, you can't......
You have to remember......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
I know you can, we both can......
We're the only ones present here who can!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: What...?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Siffrin, what is he talking about?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Sif? Sif, are you okay?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Bright one......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: . . . . . .

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
No.     You're trying, I can tell.
But the knowledge keeps escaping you, doesn't it...... Slipping through your fingers......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is the same for me.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
But we have to try to remember, bright one!!!
I see flashes of it, of what was!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
The mountains!!!
The sea!!!
The lightless sand, dark like the night sky!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Our country, bright one!!!
Our country!!!
Our home!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
We have to say it!!!
We cannot let oblivion win!!!
Our home!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
We can rebuild it, together!!!
Your power and mine!!!
We just have to wish for it!!!
We just have to ask!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: WE JUST HAVE TO SAY ITS NAME!!!!!
(NGH...!!!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: AH!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: SIF?!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: AH!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: No, no, no......
(You heard it, he said it, he tried to say it! Your country's name, your home, your--)
(No, no, it's gone, it's gone!!!!!!)
(Did he say it, all of it?! Did he say it?!?)
(You couldn't hear it, can't remember it, can't--)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: W-What's happening?!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: The King is attacking Siffrin... Everyone, protect him!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Stop talking, King!!! Leave Frin alone!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Sif!!!
(Your head, it feels like it's splitting in two--)
(Your country, your home!!!)
(You can't remember it!!! It's gone, it's gone, it's gone!!!)
(gone from your past   gone from your mind   gone from the very planet you stand on and it was yours!!! It was yours!!!)
(It was yours and it's gone and you can't even say its name!!!)
(But if he--     If the King could, then maybe--)
(MAYBE...!!!)
(You have to say it!!! If he couldn't do it, maybe you can! Maybe you both can!!!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Bright one, please, please!!!!!!
(You inhale, you try to grasp it, grasp its name--)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: NO!!!!!!
(Your throat... Your head......!!!)
(It hurts, it hurts...)
(You spit blood, you hack up, you have to get it out--)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Bright one, I-- Almost heard it, I......!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Please, again!!!
Once again, we have to try......
Together!!!!!!
(Your entire body hurts...!!!)
(You can't hear it, you can't remember it, it's useless!!!)
(Let it die, let it be forgotten! You don't need it, you don't need to know--)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: BRIGHT ONE!!!!!!
(No, no, no, you can't, you won't.)
(Hands clutching your head, you take a step back, then another.)
(Everyone lines up before you.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Sif, what's happening?! Talk to us!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Don't listen to the King, Siffrin!!! We'll protect you!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: BRIGHT ONE!!! SAY IT!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Don't look at him, you're fighting us right now--

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Go away!!! Stop hurting Frin!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
PLEASE!!!!!!
IF WE SAY IT TOGETHER, TWO PEOPLE OF THE SAME COUNTRY, I'M SURE WE CAN--

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
WE CAN REMEMBER IT!!!
PLEASE!!!!!!
(Your entire body hurts...!!!)
(Your head is killing you!!!)
(But you have to try, you have to--)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: We have to stop the King...!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Siffrin, whatever he's telling you to say, STOP!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Bonnie
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: FRIN!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!!!!
(But you have to, but you have to!!!)
(What do they know, anyway? What do they understand, anyway?! )
(The pain of not remembering your own blinding country!!! Your own home!!!)
(The King is right, you have to get it back, you HAVE TO GET IT BACK...!!!!!!)
(You inhale...)
(Someone is screaming)
(You realize     it's your own voice)
(your throat   feels raw    your head feels like    it's splitting in two      your stoma ch    feels   like a    bl ack   hole--)
(the scent of   sug ar   is all    a rou nd you,    so   th   ick   yo   u    alm os t    ga g   o n    it)
(yo   u      c   a n    '   t
h o    l      d      o    n    t o     a  n   y   t  h    i n   g
a   n     y     m     o     r     e)
(     y     o      u

(You won't,
you won't,
you won't!!!!!!)
(You shake your head and cover your mouth!)
(BETTER KILL THE HOPE BEFORE IT GETS CRUSHED!!!)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: BRIGHT ONE!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "I WILL NOT, I CANNOT!!!"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "Our country is gone, King!!! It's gone and buried!!!"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "What good will it do to remember it?!?"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "We don't need to remember! We need to let it go! We HAVE to let it go!!!"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "Let it die! Let it DIE!!!! LET IT DIE!!!!!!"

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: No, no, no, aaah......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: NO......!!!!!!
(You hear the King scream)
(You feel wind on your face)
(And t h e   n)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh...... Ooooooooh......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
I have......
I have decided my will is more just than the will of Vaugarde.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Vaugarde doesn't know......
No one knows that I am doing what needs to be done!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: They do not understand!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Someone who selfishly does what needs to be done, against the will of the people......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: In Vaugarde, such a person can only be called a King.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: So you know!!! You know that what you're doing is wrong, that no one wants to be frozen in time!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Against the will of the people......
Yes.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Against the will of the Universe......
No.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
It is not wrong.
Our will is not wrong.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
I just want Vaugarde to stay like this.
Forever.
Forever.
Forever......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: !!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: . . . . . .
(The King looks straight at you.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: .....     What about you, bright one......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Where are you from?
(You flinch.)
(You do not answer.)
(You cannot answer.)
(You hear the King laugh.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oh......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Quite honestly......
It just happened.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: "IT JUST HAPPENED"?!?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: How?!?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
After I fully accepted the power at my disposal......
I found myself like this.
Towering over everyone.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But I do not mind.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I can see very far, in this body.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I can even see......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: . . . . . .
(You offer the Bright Flower to the King.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Odile
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: What.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Mirabelle
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Siffrin?!?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Uh, Sif, I don't know how it works where you're from...

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Isabeau
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: But in Vaugarde, we only give flowers to people we, um... Actually like.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: (...) "I remember that you can give flowers to whoever you want, as long as they're..."

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......Important.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Friends, family, rivals...... Enemies......
(The King takes a step forward, and gently takes the flower from your hand.)

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Bright one...... No matter how this battle ends......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Will you remember me......?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ha......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Let us make this battle a moment truly worth remembering, then!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Ha.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: ......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: If it's any consolation......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: I'll remember you after I defeat you, bright one.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Oooh, oooooooh......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: This sticky, sweet smell......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is around you......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is around me.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is around all your companions.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: It is around the whole of Vaugarde.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Hahaha......
I wonder how this country looks, from the outside in.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Skipping and stopping......
Rewinding and restarting.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
It is not true eternity......
But it is close enough, I suppose.

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: Whoever caused this   must've had a belief stronger than mine......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Ha......
So you remember......

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
I wished......
I wished......!
Oh......!!!!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
What else? I wished for power......
The power to make my true wish come true......!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: The power to Craft myself as a deity, the power to freeze time!!!

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue:
Hahaha......
What about you, forgetful one......?
What are you hungering for? What is your wish?!?

rooms/king/questions.html.speaker: King
rooms/king/questions.html.dialogue: WHAT BROUGHT YOU HERE?!?!?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: Heya, stardust! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: Sure! What do you want to talk about?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: Hey, stardust. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: But we can't actually hang out right now. It'd be pretty useless.

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: So how about you come back here early tomorrow, after you're done acting things out at the Clocktower?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: And spend a loop with me, yes!
(You always go to the House, after the Clocktower.)
(If you're not here, what will everyone do? What will everyone think--)

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: Does it matter what they think?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: They'll forget it all in your next loop, after all!

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: You won't come and hang out with little old me?
(You don't want everyone to go to the House without you.)

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: I'd really like you to spend a loop with me, stardust.

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: It doesn't matter if it's right now, or in a dozen, a hundred loops...

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: You'll have to spend time with me eventually! Just let me know when you want to!!!

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: ...Will you come and hang out with me now?

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: How dare you play with my feelings like this, stardust!!!

rooms/loop/basics.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/basics.html.dialogue: Sure. What do you want to talk about?
(You give them a nod, and walk away.)
(You don't want to talk to Loop right now.)

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: (You make the secret hand sign, and think about talking to Loop.)
(...You ignore the confused stares of your [friends/allies].)

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: Hello hello, Loop speaking! Thank you for calling! How may I help you!

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: Well, I'd love to chat, stardust, but you have other things to do, don't you?

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: Come by and see me anytime! We'll have time to chat about whatever you want!

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: Okay! Talk to you later, stardust!
(You're about to call Loop, when you hear...)

rooms/loop/call_loop.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/call_loop.html.dialogue: Stardust!!! Come talk to me, instead of calling!!!
(Might as well just talk to them in person...)
(Loop isn't saying anything, but you can feel them stare at you.)
(Might as well just talk to them in person...)
(You need to talk to them in person.)
(You try to call Loop, but there's no answer.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "Are you getting on my nerves on purpose?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Yes, I actually manufactured this personality especially to get on your nerves, stardust!
(You can't tell if that's sarcasm or not.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nah, I just have very good intuition!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Like somehow, I can tell what you're about to say. Soooooo weird.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What, me??? Suspicious??? Say it ain't so!!!!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: . . . Because you're what's left, I suppose.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: And because it's a cute nickname! You're my little stardust! My little cutie patootie stardust!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(Ew. But...)
						"Just say you don't want to answer, it's fine."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But it's so much fun to annoy you instead! Distracting people with puns and jokes is the best way to evade stupid questions.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "What do you do, when I'm not here?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Excuse you, my life doesn't revolve around you! I do loads of things while you're gone.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Like...  I look at the sky. And, um... I take a nap sometimes. Dream about things.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So! I'm sure you must have questions about me at this point. Theories.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: About who I am. Might be. That sort of stuff. Am I correct?
(Loop's just too mysterious. Suspicious from head to toe.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Of course you do. I'm just too mysterious, suspicious from head to toe.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So! Lay it on me! I'm so curious as to what you think.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Who, or what, do you think I am?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: HA? No? No theories? At all?!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You don't care enough about me to think about who I am? I'm so hurt, stardust!
(You just have other things to worry about, honestly!)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nope. I don't even believe in that sort of stuff.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "Always strive for change", or something? How naïve.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Sometimes, things stay the same, no matter what you do.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Um, yes? I AM a star, after all.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Plus, you're a part of the Universe, too! Everyone is!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: That's like saying "You're from this planet", or something!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nice try, I suppose. Better luck next time!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Not like you'll get another try, though.
(You felt like you had something there, but you forgot.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: No, I'm not the Favor Tree. I just like being under the shade.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nice try, though! But ultimately, incorrect!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Sure. Kind of. And this tree is my grave.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nice try, though. You're not incorrect, but not correct either!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I'm flattered, actually. I've always thought she was someone to... Emulate, I suppose.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: SURE! YEAH! SURE! I'M YOU! HAHAHA!
(Loop is laughing so hard, you feel like they're about to fall over.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: No, I'm not the King. Was that your best try?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I think I'm flattered? She DOES have an amazing sense of style.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: No imagination in that head of yours. I'm a little disappointed.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But... I suppose you have other things to worry about.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I was just curious what you thought! I won't ask again!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "I don't need to know who you really are or anything."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "You're Loop, and you're helping. I don't care about the rest."
(You're not sure if it made Loop happy or sad to hear this.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Why don't you tell your little team about the loops you're stuck in?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You didn't need to tell them before, because you thought you'd be able to help them with this power...

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(...)
						"I can still do it by myself."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What do you think of my [allies/family members]?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I don't really think about them.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I try not to even see them at all!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Your Fighter stands here for a while, every time before you come talk to me, doesn't he?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But I make sure to not look his way, so he doesn't exist in my eyes!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(...?)
						"What would happen if they saw you?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: He might be able to see me, if that's what you're asking.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But I'm not going to be seen, so we'll never know!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "And what would happen if you saw them?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Plus, why would I care about them?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I only care about you, stardust~!
(...Sounds like Loop doesn't want to talk about them for some reason.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What?!? Where is that coming from???

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "I dunno, you just act weird every time I talk about them."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Like what? Like I'm your partner, waiting at home, and when I finally get to talk to you, all you can talk about is the fun you're having with other people?!?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: F-Forget I said that. That was a terrible awful metaphor.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: ...You just gestured to all of me.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(Well, here goes.)
						"Do you control the King?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(Alright, but...)
						"Are you working with him, then?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(Okay, last question...)
						"Do you also want everything frozen in time?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: And what, just because the King likes stars and I have a star head means we have to be friends somehow?!?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Don't you like the stars, too?
(You don't know what to say, so you stay quiet.)
(You have nothing to talk about, so you stay quiet.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You're like, REALLY quiet, aren't you?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I knew you were quiet, but I didn't realize you were THAT quiet.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I really have to carry our conversations most of the time!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "But I don't mind if you stay silent for a bit, too, you know."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: ...Would you rather I don't say anything? Rather than talk all the time?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "I like to listen to people talk. I don't mind if you talk a lot."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: It IS just nice to hear people talk.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: HOLD UP!!! ME!!! I WANT TO CHAT!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You've been carrying that silver coin for a while, haven't you?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: The one in your pockets, I mean!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I dunno, I'm mentioning it because it is just so weird, for it to be the only thing you had in your pockets! Only a silver coin!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What's the deal with it, I wonder?
(You just like to twirl it, flip it, or interact with it every once in a while.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So it's not secretly made of gold, or it doesn't have anything hidden inside a secret box, or it doesn't even open some secret door if you press on it real hard?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Pretty pathetic, to be carrying it around with you this whole time, though!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Me? Nah, don't worry about me, stardust!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Oh, is that what you're worried about?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Don't worry. You are, and always will be, the only one who remembers previous loops.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Which is good news! They won't have to suffer like you do!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: This pain is yours, and yours alone.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I'll always remember your mistakes. It's my job!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Uh, no? Of course not? Stars don't talk, dummy?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Nah, I'm not a star. I'm more like...  A mirror.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: It's more fun to reflect! Being the real thing would be tiring!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I've been watching you this whole time. Talking to you this whole time.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I can't read your mind, stardust, not really, but...

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I can tell you've never let yourself think about what would happen if you managed to break the loop.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(But...)
						"But there's a lot to look forward to."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Well. That's just something I was wondering about, that's all.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: We can go back to not thinking about it.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Wait, actually. My turn to ask a question.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You know, don't you.  What your fighter is trying so hard to say to you!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I wonder who we should pity more, then.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: The one who won't be able to spit it out, almost like forbidden by time itself, or the one waiting endlessly for it...

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Such a terrible tragedy, isn't it?!?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: My turn, actually, my turn! I have a question!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So, I've seen you don't like to be touched, huh? Why do you think that is?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(You flinch.)
						"I'm just too precious to touch!"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: No, but really. Ever thought of NOT flinching when someone touches you, though?
(As if it was that easy. You just can't help it.)
(You can't help but jump when people touch you. You think it's because you're just not used to it.)
(It's not like you wanted to be like this...)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Maybe you could do some exposure therapy. Try to touch your allies. Like in that gardening room in the House!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You have nothing but time, after all!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: My turn, actually, my turn! I have a question!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So, so, so, how's your touch exposure therapy going?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: In the gardening room! You've been practicing to touch your party in that annoyingly cramped room, right?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue:
(How does Loop know about this...)
						"It's going well."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Touching people is so weird, right? At least you have all the time in the world to get used to it!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Especially since they don't remember what you did if you loop, right? Removes all the yucky yucky ew vulnerability of it all.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: My turn, actually, my turn! I have a question!!!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You know, poking all your party members in the gardening room.
(They used to react before, when you touched them.)
(You keep trying and trying, but nothing changes.)
(It's like you aren't even here anymore.)
(With some hesitation, Loop brings their hand forwards...)
(Loop seems to flash you a hesitant smile.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "Did you know your eyes have different shades?"
(You can barely see it most of the time, but you've been looking at Loop's face for a while, now.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I, um...  I'm not sure what I even look like, to be honest.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Th-there's no mirror around, you know!
(But big questions aside, that's kind of sad, not knowing what you even look like.)
(Crouching, you draw a dark silhouette on the ground.)
(Star head, star on their chest, two half moon eyes.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Anyway, please make sure to not die too early this loop, stardust~!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "What's the difference between looping with a Tear, and looping because of my dagger?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Yes, I suppose I got a little upset back then.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: ...  It just feels like a slippery slope to me.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I know there's no real difference. Freezing yourself in time is still knowingly ending your life for the purpose of looping back.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But... With your own dagger, in such a brutal way...

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You begin to see your own body as unimportant. Disposable.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Freezing yourself in time isn't that different, but at least your body is kept intact...

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: And there's already so little you can keep, when you're looping through time like this.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Your possessions aren't yours. Whatever events happen to you aren't yours.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I'm just glad you didn't go through with it, that's all!
(Somehow, you feel like Loop was speaking from experience just now.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "What's the difference between looping with a Tear, and looping because of my dagger?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Is this the start of a joke?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I don't want to hear any of your blinding jokes.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Shouldn't you already understand the difference?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Why don't you go and find out.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You've been... Using that dagger of yours quite often, aren't you?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But I know you won't listen to me on that point.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You're the one trapped. I suppose I shouldn't force you to act in a way I think is better.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: You're the one who has to cope with all this this time, after all.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What about this play you're in? Do you like it?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Where you're both actor and director?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Oh? So you don't follow the script, and say your lines exactly the same way every time, to make sure your party doesn't think you're acting weird?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Sometimes going as far as restarting the scene from the top if you don't like where it's going.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What is that, if not a director?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Do you even see them as people you knew, anymore?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Or are they just characters to you, without any agency of their own?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Do you remember their names, or their role?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I felt like being mean, and I'm owning up to it!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Can't make a play with no resources, after all!!!
(...You don't know what to talk about.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Me neither... Is there really nothing we can chat about, right now?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Come back when you've done something new! Maybe we'll have something fun to talk about then.
(...You don't want to talk about anything.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: ... I don't think we have much more to chat about, stardust.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: What else is there to say, really?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Come back later, though. Maybe we'll have something fun to talk about then.
(...You don't know what to talk about.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I... suppose... we've talked about a lot of things already.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Well, the Universe said there was nothing more to talk about, I guess!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: ...You know what this means, don't you?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "We used up all the conversations we had available to us?"

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: W-Well, we can't CHAT anymore, that's for sure!

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: But... If you need advice, or help with anything...  I'll still be there.

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: So... Even if we can't chat... Please come by and say hi still, hm?

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "Thank you, Loop, for chatting with me."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: "You can be a pain, and annoying..."

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: I was just about to say the same thing! It's like you read my mind, hahaha!
(You and Loop smile sadly at each other, and wait for the Universe to lead you once more.)

rooms/loop/chats.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/chats.html.dialogue: Anyway! How else can I help you on this wonderful loop?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: (Questions...)
"Should I check everything again?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You mean, should you check the same barrels, the same closets, the same objects on tables every loop?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I mean, you can, but... You know things won't change, right?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: If you really want to get a certain item again, or listen to your friends repeat something funny, you should!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I personally would only check two or three things every loop, and ignore the rest.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: It will just make you crazy to expect something to change, when nothing will.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: All that might change is your reaction to it!
"How come I can see where the keys are?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Whaaaaat? You caaaaaan? How can that beeeeeee?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Is it thanks to you?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Maybe.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I figured you'd have other things to worry about than where a stupid key is.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: No need to thank me.
"How did you know I was allergic to pineapples?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I just knew.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
