rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: (What?) "How?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I just knew, stardust!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Like, really. What am I, again?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Which iiiiiiiiiiiis?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Part of the Universe?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Indeed.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: So why wouldn't I know, when the Universe knows?
(You suppose that makes sense, but...)
"There's this book fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ah, that man living in the house full of books?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: He seems to be really into that book series your Housemaiden likes... "The Cursing of Château Castle", right?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Didn't the last issue come out right as the King's Curse started freezing Vaugarde in time? It might be hard to find...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: If you find any issues, you should remember the issue number and tell him! Maybe you might end up finding the very last one!
"There's this book fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Yes, and you found the last issue of that book series they like!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Too bad you didn't actually open it when you found it. Better go back and actually read it...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And then go and tell that book fan what the last issue is about! He'll be overjoyed!
"There's this book fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: So that's what the ending of that book series is about?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Where the hero is from... What their history is... It doesn't matter?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: What a stupid series.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Just go and let that book fan know if you haven't already.
"Mira has a fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: She does. That stylish woman in Dormont, right?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You should tell your Housemaiden! It'll make her happy!
"Mira has a fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: She does...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But she doesn't actually remember meeting her fan, even though they shared classes together! How devastating!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I wonder if there's a way to make her remember...
"Mira has a fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: She does! And the twist is...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Your Housemaiden thinks she's kinda cool but mostly scary!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You should let that stylish lady know... I wonder how she'll react?
"Mira has a fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Yes, and the stylish woman gave you a gift for your Housemaiden!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Give it to her! Do it! Do it!!!
"Mira has a fan..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And you gave that fan's gift to your Housemaiden!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: That was sweet. That was nice. Makes my heart grow warm.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You got a pretty bow for your Housemaiden too!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: It's too bad you shouldn't give that gift to your Housemaiden again. Can't give her something she already owns, huh?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And that's the end of this quest! Good job, stardust!
"I'm gonna make a bomb."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: YOU ARE!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Do it, do it, do it, it's gonna be so useful.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: So you need... A long thingy-thing, a short gizmo-gadget, and a secret ingredient, huh?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: The short gizmo-gadget is in your Housemaiden's dorm room... I wonder where the rest is.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: When you have all three ingredients, just interact with one of them in your pockets to make it!
"Do you know how to fix a knife?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Oh, are you thinking about fixing up the KeyKnife? Smart, smart.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I mean, don't you sharpen your own dagger? How do you do it?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Sharpening stone."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And... Where is it?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ha!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But then you don't have yours, huh.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: So just find one somewhere else!
"Do you know how to fix a knife?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Still trying to sharpen that KeyKnife, huh?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Using the sharpening stone you found on Floor 1 didn't do the trick...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But when you tried, your party said you were doing it differently that you usually do? What do they mean?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They said you usually mumble something when you sharpen your dagger, or carve wood.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They might remember how you usually do things if they saw wood carving tools, wouldn't they? I wonder where you could find some...
"Do you know how to fix a knife?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You know how to sharpen the KeyKnife now!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Find the sharpening stone on Floor 1, find the KeyKnife on Floor 3, apply stone to KeyKnife.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: It'll probably make battling the King easier, now!
"The sadnesses are different."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hm, I've noticed. They don't always appear at the floor where they should be, right?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "This didn't happen before I beat the King."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They did not. Is it because you beat the King? Is it related...?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "...No theories?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...None.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But hey, variety is the spice of life, isn't it? Teehee!
"Mirabelle's statue..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Huh?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Oh, the Change God's statue where you get the KeyKnife!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I didn't know your Housemaiden made it. Explains why it looks so bad, teehee!
(It's true, sadly.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I don't know much about the Change belief...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But maybe if you looked at a bunch of statues in the House, you might learn something about them!
"Mirabelle's statue..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ah, so believers make a statue to connect with the Change God, even in a small way...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And some people might have talked to the Change God through their statues?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Kinda cute! And it's a nice way to feel closer to your faith.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Not that you know much about the Change belief still, don't you? Maybe that'll come later...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You should look at your Housemaiden's statue again! Maybe you'll find out something more about it.
"Mirabelle's statue..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You went to Mirabelle's statue, I saw that! I wanted to ask you about it!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I couldn't see you very well... I saw you go to the statue, and ask your Housemaiden to touch it...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And then poof! Nothing! I think you were talking to someone?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: (Heh.) "Yeah, the Change God."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hahaha!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: WHAT?!?
(You tell Loop about how you and Mirabelle talked to the Change God.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Well, um, putting aside the whole "the Change God knows you're looping and thinks it's funny to watch" aside...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: It's so nice that the Change God talked to your Housemaiden!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: She was thinking she was a bad believer because she doesn't feel romantic or sexual attraction...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Isn't it nice to know some god out there doesn't care about that sorta thing?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Especially the Change God! Kind of freeing! Your Housemaiden got some closure!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Even if she doesn't remember.
(You nod.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue:
<small>
 So they think it's funny, huh...?
</small>
(Loop swears under their breath.)
(You're angry, too, but you just breathe and move on.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...Well, neat! That's neat! And I guess that's the end of that!!!
"At the end, Isabeau..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ah, the thing he said he'd tell you at the end of your journey?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: He mentions he wants to tell you something, when you go and sleep at the Clocktower... That's probably it.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But someone interrupted him just as he was about to tell you! How unfortunate!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: If only there was a way to make sure he wouldn't be interrupted, maybe you'd finally get to hear what he has to say...
(If you talked to Bonnie beforehand, maybe...)
(And it keeps happening, too.)
"At the end, Isabeau..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...Pft... Yeah...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: HAHAHAHAHA!!! Yeah!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Your Fighter... He was about to tell you, without being interrupted, and you had to ruin it yourself!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: How nice of him, to stop himself from saying it because you looked upset!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But you just really wanted him to tell you!!! Even though you know!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Because you know what he wants to tell you, don't you? You can be dense sometimes, but you're not THAT dense!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...Teehee, ooooh, you're so angry! I can see it in your face!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Who are you angry at? At me??? But I'm just telling the truth, stardust~!
(And laughing about it.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Because it's just too funny, stardust!!! A blinding tragedy, and there's nothing you can do to change it!!!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hahahahahahahaha!!!
(You want to stop talking about this.)
"Odile seems suspicious of me..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...Is that so?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: That Researcher of yours is pretty perceptive. Better not act weird, or interact with stuff that makes you act weird too often in one loop.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Or do! What does it matter? She won't be able to figure anything out anyway.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Figuring out you're looping in time just because you're "acting weird" would be quite an achievement!
"Odile seems suspicious of me..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...And she figured it out, didn't she?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I had something similar happen to me, once.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Someone figuring out I was hiding something.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "And what happened next?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Something terrible.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And now I'm here, so.
"Bonnie was looking at a book...."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They were, weren't they?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: A book with a scary figurine on it... They acted very defensive when they saw you'd noticed.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But... Who cares? Is it that important to find out?
(Something about it worries you.)
(Since Bonnie takes the book away before you can read it, you wonder if you could find that book elsewhere...)
"Bonnie was looking at a book..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They were... And you found a copy of that book elsewhere.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Life To Ashes: Death Rituals From Around the World"...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Why would... Why would they look at this book? What would make them interested in this...?
(You think you know the exact moment that made them think about this.)
"Bonnie was looking at a book...."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Yes.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They were looking at a book about burial rituals, because you all talked about what you'd all do if you died.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: No wonder the Kid was upset about it.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Pretty stupid of you adults to talk about that stuff where they could hear you!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: No wonder the kid hates you!!!
(...)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Will you do something about it? Talk to your Kid about it after, maybe?
(You can't, you can't, you can't even think about it.)
(You should.)
"Bonnie was looking at a book..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: They were! A book about burial rituals, because you adults all talked about your death.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Kids shouldn't be worrying about things like this... What a world we live in.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...I'm glad that you got the courage to talk to them about it. It seems like it helped you both.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And... You made a promise, didn't you?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Try to keep it!
(You'll try.)
(Too late for that, isn't it.)
"I've been seeing myself in the House.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Yourself...? Like how?
(You tell Loop about how you saw yourself walking around the House a few times.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: ...An image of yourself, walking around the House...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Maybe they're... Reflections? Remnants of your past loops? I wouldn't know.
("Remnants"?)
(Odile uses the same word to describe the Sadnesses...)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Could it be a Sadness?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ha! You see a copy of you walking around, and you assume it's a Sadness?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Are you sad, stardust?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I'm gonna go ahead and say they're linked to your loops.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: If they are, you might see them more and more as you loop through time...
"I've been seeing myself in the House."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Ah, yes, the copies of you walking around. And?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "They could see them too."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Your party could?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "They all went to talk to one of them."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "It smiled at them."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Mirabelle was really upset."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Why would me smiling at them scare her that much?"
(Isabeau said it had a blissful smile...)
(Like it was happy to see him... To see everyone...)
(So... It wanted to see them, and he thought it was...)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Heh.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: It must really have been a disgusting smile, for your Housemaiden to react like this!
(...)
"I've been seeing myself in the House."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: I shouldn't have said that, earlier.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: (Huh...?) "What?"

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: That the ghost... Or remnant of you, or whatever...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: That it probably gave them a disgusting smile.
(Oh.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "It's fine."
(It's probably true, anyway.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: You really love them all, don't you? Even now?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Enough for a reflection of you to react like this.
(Enough to make you want to cry.)
"I saw a weird shade..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: A weird... Shade?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "When I was fighting the King."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "A shade that doesn't exist."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: A shade that doesn't exist...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Interesting. I wonder if you could find more information about it somewhere...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Not that it's that important or related to the loops, but it's weird, right?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Like... A "color"?
(A "color"?)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Don't you remember? I think you read a book about it somewhere...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Maybe you should look at it again, try to find other books, if you wanted to find out more...?
"I saw a weird shade..."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Yep, and you found two books about it!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hm, so it seems colors have always existed, but we can't see them anymore...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: And we get to see them again when... Something breaks?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: One color appears first, it seems...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: A... "Visceral" color? Does that match what you've seen...?
(It does.)
(Somehow, that color made you think of blood and bodies and horrible things.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Maybe it appeared because you tried to break whatever rule makes it impossible for anyone to say your country's name?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: That'd count as something "breaking", wouldn't it? Breaking a rule?
(Breaking a rule...)
(Maybe that's it.)

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Hm.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But that's all speculation. And I doubt you'll be able to learn more...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But good job finding that out! You're so smart and knowledgeable, stardust!

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Huh? What?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Stay here? With me? Why? Don't you want to spend time with your party instead?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: But why...

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Do what you want. Just go away when you have enough.

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: "Thanks."

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Any actual questions?

rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/ihadaquestion.html.dialogue: Sure was! Go back to your party, stardust!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (The Favor Tree.)
(You take a step forward...)
(The sun is shining.)
(The wind is blowing through the village.)
(The tree's leaves rustle around gently.)
(There's  no one  under the tree.)
(You walk a little farther, look around, trying to see if there's anything left behind, but...)
(There's nothing. Loop is gone.)
(Why...? Where did they go?)
(Or... They were here to help you with the loops, weren't they...?)
(The loops won't happen anymore, you're too weak for it, so...)
(Has Loop  disappeared too?)
(Because they were here to help you, and their task is over?)
(Why... You didn't have time to apologize, to thank them...)
(You didn't have time to thank them for helping you this whole time!)
(That's not... Fair...)
(...)
(You remember another ritual, from your past. A tradition.)
(That when you visit a grave, you should always leave something behind.)
(Something you've carried with you for a long time, to leave behind a memory of you for their journey.)
(You look into your pockets, and gently put your Silver Coin where Loop used to sit.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Goodbye, Loop."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "And thank you."
(The sun hits the coin, making it almost glow.)
(The trees around you are silent.)
(You walk back.)
(The Favor Tree.)
(You take a step forward...)
(The sun is shining.)
(The wind is blowing through the village.)
(The tree's leaves rustle around gently.)
(There's  no one  under the tree.)
(You walk a little farther, look around, trying to see if there's anything left behind, but...)
(There's nothing. Loop is gone.)
(Why...? Where did they go?)
(Or... They were here to help you with the loops, weren't they...?)
(The loops won't happen anymore, you're too weak for it, so has Loop disa--)
(You see something shine, where Loop used to sit.)
(You pick it up.)
(It's  a Silver Coin.)
(A silver coin? But...)
(The Favor Tree.)
(You should look at this near the Favor Tree.)
(It's the silver coin you found under the Favor Tree.)
(You look at it from all angles.)
(It's a simple silver coin. Vaugardian currency. Nothing makes this coin different from any other silver coin out there. It has no recognizable grooves, no special design.)
(And yet, you know.)
(You've seen this coin before.)
(You've traveled with a similar one before, after all.)
(Journeyed across time with one.)
(The one item you could never get rid of.)
(And this coin you found under the Favor Tree, where Loop used to sit...)
(This coin you're holding  is a perfect copy of yours.)
(But  your own coin  is still  in your pocket.)
(So... Why was a perfect copy of your own coin... Here...?)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Loop."
(Silence.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Loop, answer me."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Or should I call you by your previous name, instead?"
(Loop is here.)
(Loop is staying silent, looking away, letting you look at them.)
(There's nothing about their appearance that you recognize from your reflection in a mirror, but...)
(But you were right, weren't you? This whole time?)
(But you're certain.)
(This is you.)
(You take your own silver coin out of your pocket, then flip it, aiming it towards Loop for them to catch.)
(They take it out of the air without looking, and mindlessly roll it across their fingers.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Oh, stardust...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So, you've won, haven't you?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You broke the loops? Defeated the King? Talked to your party?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Realized that all along, the reason you were stuck here was because of a stupid blinding wish you made?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Awwwwwww.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I'm soooooo happy for you.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You got your perfect ending, after all.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And now... I have nothing left to say to you.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So you should go.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why are you still here?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What do you want me to say?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: WHAT ELSE IS THERE TO SAY?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: YOU'VE WON!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hahaha... Oh, stardust!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You know, you know, I was just like you, once!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: A stupid, aimless traveler, trying to find any reason to keep going!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And then, I met everyone! And felt that finally, I had people I could count on, people I could love!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And then, I got scared!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And made the exact mistake you did!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Make a stupid blinding wish, hoping I could stay with them!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Went through the House, tried to fight the King, tried to win!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Did that for so long, I couldn't even give you a number!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And then... I couldn't do it anymore.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You see, not unlike you a few hours ago, I did a very special kind of giving up.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: But unlike you, who gave up on your wish, and almost destroyed the world in the process...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I gave up on my wish, and destroyed myself.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And made another wish instead.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wished it could be over.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wished I could get out of here.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wished for someone to help me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: For someone... Anyone, to help me!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And someone did help me, right?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: The Universe did! They got me out of here!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And trapped me in some other Siffrin's loops instead!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And it was fine. It was different. It was even peaceful, for a while.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I didn't have to stay inside the House, trying to defeat the King.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I didn't have to fight, I didn't have to struggle, I didn't have to do anything.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I just had to watch, and be happy that at least, I wasn't the only idiot out there who trapped themselves eternally in time.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I just had to be happy that at least, this time, it wasn't me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And now.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And now.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: AND NOW, YOU--!!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So! Since you won't leave, here's what I'm thinking...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Let's fight, you and I! Let's have a cute, minuscule, old-fashioned little fight like a bonded couple.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Okay~?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Ha...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Nothing to say, still?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Haha...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: STARS,

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: killing you will make me SO HAPPY.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Are you ready?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: No, you don't get a choice! We're doing it!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Let's go, stardust~~~~~~!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Let's just get right to it.
(It's you.)
(Loop is ready for you.)
Loop looped back.
LOOP loops back.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Teehee... Here's a tutorial for you!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: [If I die, I can loop back!]

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What? Surprised you're not the only one who can loop back?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hahaha...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Have you forgotten?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: HAVE YOU FORGOTTEN WHO I USED TO BE?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: It's okay. I know you forget literally everything.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: That's just the kind of person you are!
(Keep fighting, keep fighting.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Stage! Lights! Action! Teehee!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You know, in a way, I am so very proud of you!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You did so good, stardust~! I am so proud, stardust~!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: The Universe brought you to victory~! It only had to lead, and you followed~!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And I suppose, what the Universe wanted from me, was to just shut up and take it!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Everyone's favorite cosmic joke~!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: From main character, to stage director, to sponsor, to corpse!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: The King...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I could never beat him, did you know that?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: It took me dozens, hundreds, thousands of loops, just so I could beat him a single time, did you know that?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: No matter how hard I tried, the King always defeated me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And yet, look how easily you beat him, your first time!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Oh, you may think it was easy, but just seeing you succeed...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I was so blindingly angry!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why did you manage to beat him this easily?!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What kept me from defeating him?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What script was I following  that kept me from victory?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: IS THAT WHAT THE UNIVERSE WANTED FROM ME?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: THE UNIVERSE, THE STARS, THE KING... OUR COUNTRY...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I HATE THEM ALL!!! I HATE THEM!!! THEY CAN ALL DIE!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: AND THE CURTAINS OPEN ONCE MORE.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I finally saw your party, earlier.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I did really well, this whole time. Made sure they never saw me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Made sure I never saw them.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Those pale copies of the party I knew.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I didn't want to see them, ever again.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Didn't want to know.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hah, can you believe, I forgot their names, for a time?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Despair and trauma does that to you, sometimes, doesn't it?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: But... I had to talk to them, didn't I?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I was ready to tell them everything... Tell them who I was, what happened to me, that they had to go after you...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And yet... And yet, when they saw me...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: It was like  they were looking  at a stranger.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Can you imagine how it feels, stardust?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I loved them...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I loved them...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I loved them...!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And yet, they didn't recognize me!!! Didn't remember me!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Because, it never happened to me, did it? It happened to you!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You're the one who got their perfect ending!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: This... Remembering the times I spent with them, when they can't remember me, this is worse!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: This is worse than forgetting!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wish I could forget, stardust!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Ooooh, stardust, do you know how this feels? Can you imagine it?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: DO YOU KNOW HOW IT FEELS, TO KNOW THAT SOME COPY OF YOU WON, AND YOU'RE LEFT WITH NOTHING?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: MIRABELLE... ISABEAU... ODILE... BONNIE...!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: THEY WERE MINE, THEY WERE MINE, THEY WERE MINE!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: THEY WERE MINE FIRST!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: AND  YOU  STOLE  THEM  FROM  ME!!!!!!
(Loop flinched!!!)
(Seeing the opening, you strike.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Aaah...
(Loop  can't fight anymore.)
(You've  won.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Siffrin, stardust, whatever our real name actually is...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Just kill me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Why?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Are you stupid? Isn't it obvious?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wanted to kill you!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So I could take your place!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I wanted what you have!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Stars, I still do!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You... You don't... You don't want another you walking around.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You should just kill me and get on with your stupid life!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (You laugh.) "My self-hatred isn't that strong that I'd literally kill another me.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hah... Hahaha...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So killing yourself is fine, but killing other selves is off limits?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You've got weird priorities...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...But what if I'm asking you to? What if I want this?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What if dying is the ending I want?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Stardust, please, please, just kill me!!! I don't want to be here!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What else is there for me now?!?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You've won, so I should be gone!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I can't go back to how it was before, because that past is gone!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I can't go back to my friends, because they wouldn't recognize me!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: There's nothing else for me to do, no script to follow, no Universe to lead me, I--
(Loop is above you, hands on your neck.)
(They'll kill you, you know they will.)
(No, it's not over yet!!!)
(You reach out, trying to loop back, but)
(There's  nothing  to reach out to.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Oh, stardust...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Have you forgotten?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You sure burned yourself out earlier with your little temper tantrum, haven't you...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You~ can't~ loop back~ a~ny~ more~~~

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hahahahahahahahaha!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So this is it, stardust!!! I'll kill you!!! I'll kill you now!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Kill you get rid of you open up your ribcage take out my heart that beats in your chest!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And I'll finally be able to take back what's mine!!!!!!
(No, no, no, they can't, not now, no--)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hahahahahahahahahaha!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I'm sorry, stardust!!! I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: But I want my perfect ending, too!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why should you be the only one to get it?! I suffered, too!!! I endured, too!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I deserve it just as much, no, even more than you do!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I'll take it, I'm taking it!!! This perfect ending of yours!!!!!!
(NO!!!)
(No, no, no, you don't want to die, not now!!!)
(Not when everything was finally going to be okay!!!)
(You try to grab Loop's hands around your throat, push them away, get them off you, but they're not budging.)
(You can't escape.)
(No, no, no, no, no, no...)
(You clench your eye shut, trying to think of a way to escape, to not make them do this, to...)
(Loop  isn't moving.)
(Above you, you hear Loop trying to take a breath.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: No, I can't...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I can't do this.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Not when I had to see you fight so hard...!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I can't, I can't, I can't!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I can't...
(Loop sobs.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why did it have to be you...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I could've... I wanted to...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: If only back then, I... If I had held on longer... Maybe then.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (Oh, Loop...) "But don't you get it?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What is there to get...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Uh, the reason I succeeded, maybe?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "It's thanks to you, Loop!"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Without you, I would've given up, too."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "You were here, at my side, telling me to keep going."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Yeah, you didn't tell me everything, yeah, you didn't know what to do..."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "But just knowing that I wasn't alone... That you were here..."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You're lying.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Not."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: YOU'RE LYING!!!!!!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Not!"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: YOU'RE--

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Loop."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Mira sends her thanks, by the way."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "They all do."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Thanks?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (You laugh.) "Who else helped them get all the way to the King?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "They told me to say thank you, for bringing them to me."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "For saving me."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "See?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Stardust...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Why couldn't it be me...?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "I don't know."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Maybe it was in the script."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Maybe it was what the Universe wanted."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Or maybe it's no one's fault."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "I'm sorry, Siffrin."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "And thank you, Loop."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Without you, I would've given up a long time ago."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Thank you for helping me, this whole time."
(Loop doesn't respond.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: (. . .) "...Loop, we can--"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Siffrin.
(You flinch.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Please.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You're going to have to talk to them, from now on.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: No more keeping how you feel from them. We both know where this leads.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: And if one day, no matter what you do, everyone's paths and yours diverge...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You'll have to learn to be okay with it.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: We can't... We can't do this again.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Hold them hostage, against their knowledge, against their will, just because we're lonely.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Learning to talk to them... Learning to let go...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: It'll be hard. It'll feel impossible. You might think you'd rather die than share how you feel.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: After all, isn't bottling things up the reason you managed to break the loops?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You didn't have to tell them anything until the very end, and it turned out fine, didn't it?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "But if I had talked to them earlier, then maybe..."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Yeah, dummy. If only you had been strong enough to talk to them, maybe this whole story wouldn't have happened at all.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: If only...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Oh well. It doesn't matter now.
(You can barely see Loop's hands anymore.)

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Loop..."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "Where will you go now?"

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Oh, stardust...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I don't know! I'll join you so we can be one? I'll die? I'll stay under this tree forever?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Does it matter?

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Haha...

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...You're sweet, stardust.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Exactly!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: What happens next doesn't matter.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So you can imagine anything!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: ...Aw, don't worry, stardust.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Somehow... I'm sure I'll see you again.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: You... And everyone else.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: Mirabelle, Isabeau, Odile, and Bonnie.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I need to accept their thanks in person, don't I? That's just basic etiquette.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: A-And I'll need to give you back your silver coin eventually!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: "You do."

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I'll see you all again soon enough, stardust.

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: I promise! I super promise! I super duper promise!

rooms/loop/loopfight.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopfight.html.dialogue: So don't forget me, okay...?
(This is Loop's silver coin.)
(They must've spent a lot of time carrying it around, too.)
(You flip it once, twice, three times.)
(You'll see each other again!)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: (You wave the flower towards Loop.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Urgh, a flower.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: I don't want any of your stuff, stardust!

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Get that outta here!!!
(This is where your gentle, giving heart gets you.)
(You wave the flower towards Loop.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Urgh, that flower AGAIN?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: I don't want it, stardust! Give it to someone else!
(You wave the flower towards Loop.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Really, stop. This is getting annoying, now.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Give it to someone else.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: "Like who?"

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Like...

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Like the Housemaiden.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: She'll never wear it, but it would fit her, I think.
(Would it...?)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Like the Fighter.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: He'd like anything you'd give him, that sucker.
(Would he...?)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Like the Researcher.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: It would surprise her, if nothing else.
(Would it...?)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Like the Kid.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: They're a kid, and what kind of kid doesn't like flowers?
(Is that so..?)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: "Will you ever accept the flower?"

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: No, I won't, so stop trying.
(Oh?)
(Maybe next time.)
(You wave the flower towards Loop.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Fine.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Give me the blinding flower.
(You bring the flower to Loop, and gently drop it in their hand.)
(Loop doesn't say anything.)
(But it's fine.)
(You wave the flower towards Loop, asking them silently if they'll accept it again.)
(After a minute, they nod.)
(You gently drop the flower in their open palm, and act like nothing out of the ordinary happened.)
(Loop does, too.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Oh, that's...

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: That kid in Dormont really is a nice artist, aren't they?
(Loop looks a little sad...)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: That's the gift for your Housemaiden, isn't it?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Don't snoop, okay? Snooping is bad!!!
(Urgh.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: YOU SNOOPED!!! You snooped, you awful person!!!

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Teeheehee!!! You're terrible, terrible, terrible, stardust!!!
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Oh, THAT thing.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Stop keeping that stupid coin! Go buy a snack with it or something, stars.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Are you rolling that coin again?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You've kept it this whole time. It's just pathetic, now.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Urgh.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Do you want to talk about it.
(Why would you?)
(It's just a coin, after all.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Of course it is.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: There's definitely not a single reason you've kept it this whole time.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You haven't even tried to buy anything with it. A snack, a stupid item, ANYTHING.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Leave it behind already!!!
(Why does Loop care, anyway.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: I don't care. Not in the slightest!
(You look at the coin.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You can get so fixated sometimes.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You don't need to swear off croissants because of what happened. You don't need to keep that coin to remember what happened.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You don't need to keep that coin to remember them.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Those rituals won't accomplish anything.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: (You don't want to hear this right now!) "How could you understand how I feel?!"

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: ...Heh!

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: You're right. I can't understand you.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: After all, I don't know what it's like to feel your home slip out from under you. To feel cut off from everything.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: To want to remember it all, no matter what.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: How could I?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Look at me, stardust. Look at my face.

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Do you REALLY think I'm supposed to be here?!

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Do you REALLY think I can't understand what it's like, to not have a home I can go back to?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: To see reflections of it everywhere I look, but without the connection that comes with it?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Do you really think I don't understand wanting to remember everything I've left behind?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: I'm a star, but do you really think it warms me up? That my chest isn't empty, still?

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: And even now, I'm alone, no one can understand what I'm going through, and the only person that could is...

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Nope, that's it! That's all you get, teehee!
(You feel like you understand Loop a lot better now.)

rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/loopnirs.html.dialogue: Think this is funny, don't you.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heya, stardust! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hey, stardust. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heya, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You were just fighting the King for the first time, weren't you...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: He's pretty strong, isn't he? Didn't he kill you in one shot???
(He sure did.)
(You can still feel that hit... Your whole body is wracked with tremors.)
(And what it did...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hm, what to do, what to do...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I feel like... Finding a way to win against the King would be a good first step?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Is there a way for you to survive his first attack? Maybe you should ask your Housemaiden, or look around Dormont...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Welcome back, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Power of love didn't cut it, huh?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: That's too bad. I was hoping this could be it somehow, too.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But at least you found out more about your party, didn't you? You had fun, didn't you?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "What is it all good for, if they'll all forget it in the next loop?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yeah, but...
(For once, Loop seems at a loss for words.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Well, anyway...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You've helped your party during one loop. You talked to the King, and, well, found out some things, I guess.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Maybe you should find out more about the loops now, don't you think?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Come and talk to me later. I can help you figure out what to do next.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And you can read some of that weird language now. Maybe there's some place you should go to, that you couldn't access before in the House...?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And, knowing you, there's probably some books you didn't want to look at before, didn't you? Maybe you should try and read them, now.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: In the meantime, though...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hey--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Stop."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Just say 'I told you so', and we can move on."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I TOLD YOU SO!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Teehee, what a stupid idea you had!!! Thinking the King could be turned good!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: He's the King!!! He's probably the reason you're here, or related to it, at least!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And all you had to do was find out he shares your tragic backstory for you to feel pity for him. He didn't have to lift a finger!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And because of you... Bonnie was--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway, I told you so.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But... What he said back then...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "He mentioned something..."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Something about 'Wish Craft'."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: He did.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "What's 'Wish Craft'?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I don't know.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Wish Craft... Crafting wishes? That sounds impossible, and way too convenient.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But he seemed to imply you were using it? That's what it felt like to me.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I've never heard of Wish Craft before."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Me neither. I wouldn't even know where to find information about it.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But... That IS new information.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So, as stupid as the whole "making friends with the King" was...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You did find something new.
(Was it worth it?)
(Every time you close your eyes, you still see a hand, tightening.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I'm also wondering... The way you looped last time, wasn't it...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Whatever, it's not like your Kid will remember whatever just happened anyway!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Just put it behind you!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And this whole thing gave you something else, didn't it?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Another Memory to equip.
(Oh.)
(You didn't even notice...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You'll always remember this, after all.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Let me do the usual.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [You got a MEMORY OF MEMORIES. When equipped, Memory of Memories allows you to read books you couldn't before!]

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: The ones written in that language that just gives you a headache. The ones from your country.
(Oh, how useful and neat, to be able to read your own blinding language.)
(You might as well read any books you find, before you forget again.)
(Like you do everything else.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And, if you can read that language...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Maybe you can explore the House a bit more.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Don't despair, stardust. There's still a path to follow!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...You should talk to me about the loops, too. I can help you figure out what to do next.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: In the meantime, though...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "So."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Sooooooo?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Got any theories about the loops I'm trapped in?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Why would I?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Your name is LITERALLY 'Loop'."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Oh, stars above, it is! Teehee!
(URGH.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But just because I call myself "Loop" doesn't mean I know anything! I'm just bad at names!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But I'll see what I can do. What's your question?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Do you know anything that could help?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Such a broad question, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: As I've told you before... I know as much as you do, right now.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "How can that be?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What do you mean?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Aren't you here to help me?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Why don't you know more about the loops you're supposed to help me with...?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Tee--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Don't you 'Teehee' me."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Awwwwwwwww.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I still don't have a good answer for you, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Isn't it already nice that you have me to talk to about those loops?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You could be alone, stuck with only your tiny brain for company, with no one to talk to!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Okay, okay, okay...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Well...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Why don't we summarize what we know about those loops? We might find something out!
(You sigh, and nod.)
(Nothing better to do, you suppose.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Soooooo...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You're currently stuck in a time loop, for some unknown reason.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: The loop starts when you wake up in Dormont, and seems to end when you talk to the Head Housemaiden...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Unless I die first, or touch a Tear."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yes... Maybe the loop considers getting frozen in time by those Tears a sort of death?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But why aren't you looping back when you get frozen in battle...?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Huh? Isn't it because...) "I thought the Tears worked differently than an actual time freeze skill."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Is that so? ...Well, you're the one getting frozen, so you'd know...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
