rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So, you loop if something keeps you from advancing in some way...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I wonder if other things would count as "keeping you from advancing".

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Like what?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Like...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What if we cut off your legs, would you immediately loop back? You can't "advance" if you have no legs, right?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Um...) "I'd rather not test that one."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Awww. But understandable.
(But it is interesting, though.)
(What makes the loop actually loop?)
(You feel like... You can remember a few times when time looped back on its own, even if it was just a few minutes...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Maybe... Does the loop consider talking to the Head Housemaiden... Something that keeps you from advancing, somehow?
(Maybe, but...)
(What would "advancing" even mean, then?)
(Towards what goal?)
(Is there something that happens when you talk to the Head Housemaiden that makes a certain goal impossible to accomplish?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: As you've found out, all of this might be the work of Time Craft, a power that should be impossible to use...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But you and the King are somehow able to manipulate it.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (But...) "Am I manipulating Time Craft if I can't control it?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But you can, can't you?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can more or less control where you come back. Except when you talk to the Head Housemaiden, it seems, which brings you back to the start.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But just being able to loop back in time and avoid death might count as you being able to use Time Craft.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (But if Time Craft is supposed to be too dangerous to even use...) "How did I get that power?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And how can you break the loop for good?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yes, those are the big questions, aren't they?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...   I do wonder about the limitations of your powers, still.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What makes you actually loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Somehow, I feel like finding out more about that would be useful...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stardust, we've been talking for a while, so maybe not right now, but...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: When you have some time, will you hang out with me for a bit?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Huh?) "Hang out?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I have... A theory I'd like to test. And...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And we haven't spent any time together, stardust!!! I'm lonely!!! I want to have a long conversation with someone, anyone!!! I wanna hang ouuuuuut!!!
(Urgh.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Again, it doesn't have to be right now.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Our little hang out time might last a while. Maybe even longer than the rest of the day.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I'm sure you have plans for this loop, so I can wait until you have time!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Okay?
(A theory Loop would like to test about the loops...?)
(It might be useful.)
(You should talk to Loop and hang out with them when you have time, then.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yay!!! I'll be waiting, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: In the meantime...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hi stard--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Loop!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Woah! Y-yes?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "You heard it, didn't you?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heard what? You know, I don't actually spy on you all the ti--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I found it, Loop!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Wish Craft!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Wish Craft...? The thing the King spoke of?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I found it in a book, Loop!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "The writer said they wanted to create a whole new body, and used Wish Craft for it!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Wish Craft made their wish come true!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Create a whole new body?! That's--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Impossible, right?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "But they did it, with Wish Craft!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "It's real, Loop, it has to be!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: A Craft that allows you to do the impossible... Like creating a body...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Like looping in time!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Like, maybe... Freezing people in time, as well?
(That's right...)
(If the King knows about Wish Craft, could Wish Craft be how he got the power to Craft time?)
(Did he use Wish Craft to be able to use Time Craft?)
(It makes sense, doesn't it? Doesn't it?!?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Huh...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Ha! Stars, that's something, isn't it? That's a new lead!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Finally, right?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Finally, indeed!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Well. You know what to do, don't you, stardust?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Find more information!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Indeed you do.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Not to send you on another book chase, but...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Book time."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Book time.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can read those weird books now, can't you? Maybe one of them might mention it...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Alright! Now that you're here, though...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Heya, stardu--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "LOOP!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I figured it out, Loop!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Everyone's wish-- It's probably the reason I'm here!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Everyone's wish to save Vaugarde!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Huh?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "It makes sense, Loop!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I'm looping and not dying so we can beat the King!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Everyone has been wishing for Vaugarde to be saved from the King!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "And if I die-- The King can't be beaten, Vaugarde can't be saved!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "That's why I can loop back in time, Loop! THAT'S why!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What? But then, why--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "This whole time-- I might be trapped because Vaugarde wished for it!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Vaugardians don't know the ritual for the Favor Trees, but their belief and hope alone might have been enough!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "An entire country of people wishing for the same thing should be enough to make the Universe listen, isn't it?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "And the Head Housemaiden knows this! She made a list!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "And she knows about the loops, at the very end, she always notices!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "So she knows about Wish Craft, about the wish that brought me here..."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "So she'll know! She'll know how to fix it!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I just need to ask!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Is that so? But, didn't you already--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "It is so!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I might be able to break the loop, somehow!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "You know, it might just be that I need to make everyone's wish come true! And everything will be back to normal!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "If I talk to her, she'll know, she'll be able to tell me what to do..."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "If I can just talk to her...!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...But, stardust, you already tried, and...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "It's all thanks to you, Loop."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: W-What?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "If you didn't push me to keep going, if you weren't there, I wouldn't have gotten this far."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "So, thank you, Loop!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "After I talk to her, I'll see you, right?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I'll see you, in a brand new world!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Sure, stardust.
(You smile.)
(Loop seems to smile back.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...But, stardust... Before you go and talk to her...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I had a theory, while you were gone.
(A theory?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...How do I put this...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: The times when you loop back on your own, and not because of your death...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I was thinking the reason why might be linked to your emotional state.
(Huh?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Emotions are often high, when you loop back in those moments, aren't they?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So maybe you don't loop because you die... But because you feel like there would be no reason to go on, maybe?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Something that, to you, feels on the same level of hopelessness as death? On the same level as the world ending?
(You think about a House, exploding in lights.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Something like the death of my family members, you mean?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Yes.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But wouldn't that fit? Wouldn't that explain it?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because your party is dead.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because the Kid is crying and hates you.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because the Fighter rejected you.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because you killed a Sadness in a way that makes them scared of you.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because you all saw a ghost of yourself and they're reacting like nothing's wrong.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because your Researcher has found out about your loops and hates you for keeping them secret.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because the King has beaten you, and the Kid is about to die.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You can't continue, because, somehow, you know this is the end.
(Maybe that's the case, but...)
(But why would time loop back just because of how you feel?)
(You didn't wish for any of this, did you?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "What about the Head Housemaiden?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Why do I always loop back when I talk to her?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...I don't know, yet.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I don't know if what happens with the Head Housemaiden is even related to that. It could be that this is the loop's natural end, or something.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But if it is linked to your feelings...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Does something happen when you see her that makes you feel like this is the end?
(You
(Loop sighs.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heya stardust! How can I help you in this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Aw, you did come and see me!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Was it because you felt sorry for me, all alone under this big tree? That's so sweet, stardust!
(You're regretting it, now.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Aw, stardust, I can tell you're starting to like me. It's okay, just admit it! I won't judge! It's not weird!
(Urgh.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Teehee!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway, how can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heya, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: It takes you a lot of time, doesn't it? To loop back and talk to me?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue:
(It sure does.)
                        "It's fine."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Is it?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Uh huh.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But, hm... I wonder if... Yeah, that's a good idea.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How about I teach you a special Craft Skill so you can talk to me whenever?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue:
(A Craft Skill to talk to Loop, even when you're not near them?)
                        "That seems impossible."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Only because you don't know the specific hand shape for it.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yes, stardust.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: A fourth hand shape. So you can talk to me whenever. Are you interested?
(A fourth hand shape...)
(If anyone would know about this, it'd be someone like Loop.)
(You nod.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Great! Alright, are you ready?
(You nod again.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So, take your hand, and make a fist.
(You do so.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Then, you're going to raise your thumb and little finger.
(Raise thumb, raise little finger...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And, keeping your hand in that shape, you're going to put your hand next to your face, with the thumb to your ear and little finger to your mouth.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: THAT'S the secret hand shape no one knows about.
(Interesting...)
(You've never heard about this, but you have a bad memory. You may have just forgotten it.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And then, the very last step...
(There's more?!)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: There is, stardust.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You just have to think very loudly: "Boy I sure wish I could talk to Loop right now!!!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (...) "Now that part just sounds silly."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: HAHA!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yes, that's definitely the silly part of this ritual.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And that's it! Now, you can call me whenever!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Well, mostly whenever. It might not work, sometimes. Especially if you get too far.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And we won't be able to chat very long or anything, so you'll still need to come whenever you want a breather, or need to chat.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But now, I can help you out, and give you hints whenever!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Or, if you want me to put it another way...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [You've just learned the skill (Call Loop.) You can call me anytime to get some precious hints!]

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [To call me, just go into your Craft menu and select (Call Loop.)! Easy as pie!]
(Ow.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Teehee!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Alright! Now that you're here, though...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stardust, you traitor!!! I thought what we had was special!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But you didn't value me, did you, and I had to see you kiss the fighter, in front of my very eyes! The shock! The betrayal!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Shut up."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And then you looped right back! Refusing to face the consequences of your actions!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What were you afraid of? For him to finally see you? To see what kind of person you truly are?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Maybe he would have accepted you, you know. Maybe you're not as disgusting as you think you are.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Shut up!"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Or, stardust... Maybe you ARE that disgusting. Not letting the poor fighter make his own decisions! Who would do that! Or--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "SHUT. UP."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "I don't want to talk or THINK about ANY of this."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Especially not with YOU."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But, stardust... Who else but me?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway, you got a Memory for your troubles. You can check it out later, I don't think you'd like me to tell you what it does.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hi, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Thanks, for earlier."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Please don't mention it.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hi, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Are you calling your party "family members" now? You know this sounds really awkward, right?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue:
(...)
                        "YOU'RE awkward."
(Oh, somehow this one seems to have hit home.)
(You feel a little bad.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: A-Anyway! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?
Full page: Your Dagger

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hi, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Say, you've looped back a lot using tears, haven't you? Was it on purpose, or did you trip into them?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Well...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You sure are, teehee!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I suppose it is useful! It's a fast way to loop back.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Isn't it tiring though, having to walk back to find one? Are you tired? Are you annoyed yet???
(Are they trying to get on your nerves on purpose...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Not on purpose! Just trying to make conversation!
(It IS annoying to have to walk back every time, though.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Right??? Well, there's no faster way, and it's either this or die in a fight, so I'd say the Tears are better.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Is it the only way...?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Those Tears are sure getting on my nerves though."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Heheh, so annoying, right?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Haha, you sure do!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What do you mean, "I do have a dagger"...?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stardust, are you serious? You want to stab yourself and die so you can loop back?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You shouldn't! Stabbing yourself isn't as easy as touching a Tear, you know! It'll hurt! A lot!!!
(That's quite a reaction from Loop...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (It'd definitely hurt, yeah...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...So you won't think about it anymore?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Okay. Good.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Anyway! How can I help you this time, stardust?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stardust, I don't want you to!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Listen to me and don't even think about it, for Universe's sake!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: (Loop seems REALLY against the idea...)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Okay, GOOD!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stars. Such a stupid idea.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway! How can I help you this time, stardust?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Stardust, don't--

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Ah--
(Loop suddenly freezes.)
(You see them clutch their head in their hands in pain, when suddenly--)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [YOU CAN NOW USE YOUR DAGGER TO LOOP BACK WHENEVER YOU WANT.]

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [YOU CAN DO SO BY GOING INTO YOUR POCKETS, AND USING YOUR DAGGER, IN BATTLE OR ELSEWHERE.]

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [DOING SO WILL IMMEDIATELY END A LOOP, ALLOWING YOU TO LOOP BACK WHENEVER YOU PLEASE.]
(Loop won't look at you.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You should probably go now. I'd rather not see your face again this loop.
(...)
(You flee.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Aw, I can't stay mad at you, you little cutie!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Look at you, stardust! So stupid, so lost. So willing to stab themselves for things to go slightly quicker.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Just so you know, being forced to tell you how to kill yourself? Not the best way for me to spend my day.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So, how did suicide feel, you cutie patootie?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Not so easy, huh?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yeah.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: . . . Yeah, I wonder too.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Anyway. How can I help you on this WONDERFUL new loop.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Of course you will. As upset as I am, I might've done the same in your position.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: It IS very useful, to be able to loop back whenever you please.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Just, you know. Curse you for putting me in this position, I guess.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: And... Even though you have it, still... I hope you won't use it.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: For your sake.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Anyway. How can I help you on this WONDERFUL new loop.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Sure. If you want to.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Do you want to? As upset as I am, this IS a useful skill to have, you know.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: It'll only get easier and faster, too.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anything that makes a loop end slightly quicker.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Okay.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Then, uh...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: PCHOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: There.
(You're glad.)
(It probably would've gotten easier, but killing yourself to loop back isn't your idea of a good time.)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue:
(But...)
                                        "What happened to you, back then?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Oh, you know. Universe stuff.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...I can help you out, stardust, but...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Helping you out comes with certain rules.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But I asked to be here. So it's fine.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Anyway, stardust! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yeah, I get it. I'd probably do the same, in your shoes.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: ...Anyway. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Hi, stardust!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I feel like I see you pretty often. Are you sure you don't have anything better to do?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: If I was in your place, which I'm not... I'd spend my time in the House forever, getting stronger and stronger.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: HERE AGAIN?!?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You really like to talk to me, huh stardust? It's been more than 15 times already!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue:
(Urgh.)
                        "I'm soooo sorry for bothering you."

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I forgive you, stardust.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: But, hm... Maybe you should get something as a reward, don't you think? For coming to talk to me so often.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: A secret tutorial! Maybe you'll know about it already, though.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So! There's an item you can give to your party if you talk to them in Dormont. Did you know that?
(Is there...?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: How did you not find it already?!?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You should explore Dormont a bit more, stardust! There's a flower you can get, and give it to your party.
(Is Loop talking about that flower...?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Yes, yes!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: "Is the tutorial about how I can give you that flower, too?"

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: What?! No, gross!!! I don't want it!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I don't want any of your stuff. But...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I am a bit of a special case still, and so, there's a couple items you can show me, if you wanted.
(Is that so...?)

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: I'm too lazy to open new choices for you in our conversations, though.

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So just stand kinda close to the tree, and just interact with your Souvenirs. Maybe I'll have something to say about it!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: So, in simpler terms...

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: [If you use a Souvenir near me, I might react to it!]

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway! How can I help you?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: A parasite, huh?

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: You wound me, stardust!!!

rooms/loop/predialogue.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/predialogue.html.dialogue: Anyway! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Heya, stardust! How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(Questions, questions...)
                        "What should I do next?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: What you should do? Well...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Anything else?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: "Nah, nothing."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: See you later, stardust!
(They wave at you excitedly.)
(You awkwardly wave back as you go...)
(You wave back as you go.)
(You wave back as you go, smiling.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Well, stars, I don't know.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Did you get to the top of the House so you can fight the King yet?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: I dunno! Just an idea!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Come on stardust! You can do it! I believe in you~!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(Urgh.)
                        "You're sooooo helpful."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: I really am. Thank you for noticing.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Don't worry. I know there's that big pesky trap in the way, but I'm sure you'll find a way around it, if you just look.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Oh, you passed the trap, see?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Knew you could do it, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: And you found out about Tears, didn't you? Very useful little things. Annoying, too.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: But you might find yourself in a situation where you need to loop back, and dying against a monster takes soooo long!
(They're not wrong...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Of course I'm not wrong, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You're up against that big Sadness, aren't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: It's not easy to beat, so make sure you're all stocked up on items before you go!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: And, oh, don't forget you can loop back, well, forwards?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: If you found a way to die here, in Dormont, you'd be able to loop back to Floor 1.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: With all the doors opened, too, if you remember to press [button] when you're dead!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(But...)
                        "How does that even work?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You pretty much loop back and dissociate the whole way to wherever you need to go.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Your allies won't notice a thing though, so it's all good!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck with that big Sadness! Remember, if battles are tough, there's a few things you could do.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go and pick up tonics in the rooms you've seen, you can fight Sadnesses for EXP, make sure you and your party have the equipment you need...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go to the Change God's statue in Dormont, too! Or help out some of the villagers, they might have a gift for you at the end!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck, stardust! I believe in you!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You beat that big Sadness!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: So you're on... Floor 2 now, right?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Some spooky things there. Nothing that dangerous, though!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: The library's on that floor, too... You don't have to read the books there, but they're interesting!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You're not quite halfway there yet, but you're close! Don't give up, stardust! I believe in you!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Big rock trap again, huh? That's what happens when you don't look hard enough, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(Urgh.)
                        "Hard to see things with one eye."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Yeah, I know.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You'll miss things no matter what, especially with your sight reduced. You shouldn't feel bad.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can loop back and look everywhere again, after all!!!
(That was... a surprisingly nice thing to say.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: I'm always nice, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(And yes, you came to see Loop, but...)
                        "It's gonna be a pain to go back to Floor 2..."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Not really? You could always loop back, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: So, you know, find an easy way to die somewhere in Dormont.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: There's an easy loop-back spot somewhere. I wonder if you can find it...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You found the key in the Head Housemaiden's office! Congrats, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: That library is quite something, isn't it? You definitely don't have to, but I'd recommend looking around and reading a bit!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Knowledge is never wasted!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You found all the keys for the second floor, didn't you? Congrats, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Big enemy ahead, though... Two whole enemies!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck with it! Remember, if battles are tough, there's a few things you could do.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go and pick up tonics in the rooms you've seen, you can fight Sadnesses for EXP, make sure you and your party have the equipment you need...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go to the Change God's statue in Dormont, too! Or help out some of the villagers, they might have a gift for you at the end!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck, stardust! I believe in you!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You did it, you're on Floor 3!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: This is the last floor before the King. This floor will have a bunch of Tears blocking your way, too.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: One of those blocked paths will surely have what you're looking for, but it doesn't mean the other paths are useless! Do your best!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Ah, you have to go back to Floor 2, don't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: There's something waiting for you in the classroom on Floor 2! How exciting!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: (...) "I missed something again."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Stardust, you're missing an eye. Of course you'd miss things.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Maybe you wouldn't miss things if your party took the time to help you search instead of chatting.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue:
(Hey...)
                        "It's not their fault."

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Sure, it's not.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: And it's not your fault either, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Ah, you're so close to the end of Floor 3, stardust!!! So close!!!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Too bad you have to backtrack for that key...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Who knew the key for a door on Floor 3 would be in the classroom on Floor 2?

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Have fun walking there, stardust~!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Heh, AND you went to the bathroom! Doing such a great job over there, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Don't worry, I don't ALWAYS watch you. I have more interesting things to do with my time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can do this, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You're against a big Sadness again, aren't you? The last one before the King.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck with it! Remember, if battles are tough, there's a few things you could do.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go and pick up tonics in the rooms you've seen, you can fight Sadnesses for EXP, make sure you and your party have the equipment you need...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You can go to the Change God's statue in Dormont, too! Or help out some of the villagers, they might have a gift for you at the end!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Good luck, stardust! I believe in you!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Is there a way for you to survive the King's first attack? Maybe you should ask your Housemaiden, or look around Dormont...

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Shouldn't you go to the House's library? You might find a way to survive the King's first attack.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Remember! The library is on the second floor!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: It might be faster to just die and loop back there immediately... Don't forget to press [button] while dead so you don't have to open any doors!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: You've got it, stardust. All you have to do now is beat the King!

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: If you're not strong enough, you can always fight Sadnesses to gain power. Make sure your friends are leveled up, too.

rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact2.html.dialogue: Come on stardust! You can do it! I believe in you~!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Source: Common Event 167 (WhatToDo Act 3-4)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hey, stardust. How can I help you on this wonderful new loop?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You're doing so many different things! What do you need help with?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Sure, stardust. What do you need help with?
(You need help on how to...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What do you need?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "Nah, nothing."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: See you later, stardust.
(They gently wave you goodbye.)
(You give them a nod, and walk away.)
(You need help on how to...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hm, well...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Sounds like your Housemaiden wanted to talk to you, didn't she? You might as well talk to her this loop, before you forget.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Which one, stardust?
(Which ally...)
"Mirabelle."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So your Housemaiden is hiding something? Some papers?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: She implied at the time that she has more of those papers somewhere in her dorm... Maybe you should go and take a look!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Be careful, though! She might be watching you closely, since that's her room. You might have to be sneaky about it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: (You need help on how to...) "...help everyone."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Which one, stardust?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: (Which ally...) "Mirabelle."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You found some papers in your Housemaiden's room! The same as the ones she's always reading in Dormont! Mystery solved!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well, not really solved. They looked like files about different people, didn't they?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Each file was about a different person, answering some questions like "where do you see yourself in ten years?" or whatever... I wonder what that's about?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You should go back to Dormont and ask her about it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Had a nice time talking with your Housemaiden?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So... She feels bad, because she can't love people romantically, and she feels like she can't do what's needed of her, as a Housemaiden...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: She feels like she can't change in the way that's asked of her, since she doesn't want to get in a relationship, ever.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Must be hard. Having a crisis of faith like this.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...Sounds like talking to you helped her, though.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And talking to her didn't help you, but it made her stronger, which is all you can ask for, huh?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Don't forget! If you want her to get that special skill again, you'll have to hang out with her once more.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Or, well, you could do it and zone out the whole time if you wanted to. But that's cheating!
"Isabeau."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Him, huh...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Why don't you ask him if he needs help?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Him, huh...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Your Fighter apparently wants you to help everyone else first. Scary...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Don't you think he's asking you to finish helping everyone first because he wants to ask you something really complicated???
(That's what YOU'RE thinking!!!)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well, only thing you can do now is helping everyone else, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Had a nice time talking with your Fighter?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What a nice guy. He prepared everything so you could watch the night sky, because he noticed you liked the stars, and he wanted to spend some time with you.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Who knew he had such a history with the Change belief, too...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Heh, come to think of it, he might represent the Change belief better than your Housemaiden does. She must hate that.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And he tried to tell you something at the end, too. Do you think it's the same thing he always tries to say, at the end?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He'll never spit it out, poor guy.
(That's right...)
(You wonder what he wants to say to you, every time.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Teehee.
"Odile."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Her, huh...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Why don't you ask her if she needs help?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Ah, the researcher...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: She's looking for a sort of book called a "familytale", huh? Interesting.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I've never heard of those... Maybe the librarian in Dormont might know something?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Oh, her!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So, she's looking for a familytale, and one such book might be owned by someone in Dormont...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: That's great news, isn't it? That there's one here, in the village?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You should talk to your Researcher and let her know!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Your researcher...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So, she was looking for a familytale, maybe the whole time you've known her.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Familytales are a Vaugardian tradition, and as half-Vaugardian, she felt like it would bring her closer to her roots...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And that's why she came to Vaugarde, even. To find out more about herself.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Being able to go wherever you want, and find more about yourself in the process...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well, that sure was interesting, wasn't it?
"Bonnie."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Them, huh...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Why don't you ask them if they need help?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Them, huh...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You need to prove to them that you know their favorite foods... How childish!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Don't you take snack breaks every so often in the House? You should pick some different snacks every so often, instead of going for your favorites.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You might find out something new!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Or you can brute force it, and talk to them until you get it right. That's what looping is for, after all.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What, need a reminder on their favorite foods?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well, so far, you've found out that they like...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Go on, then! Go and find out their favorite foods!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You got to hang out with that Kid, didn't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So all this time... They felt guilty, because they feel like they're the reason you're half blind...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What a silly idea.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But, they're dealing with a lot right now.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Their sister is frozen in time, they had to run away from their home to escape the King's Curse, and they had to see you and your stupid eye every day.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: No wonder they don't know what to do with all these thoughts rattling in their brain. No wonder you felt like they hated you.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But isn't it nice? To not be hated, anymore?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well. I suppose you're still hated, now.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Okay, well...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: At this point, you should try and see if anyone needs your help!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Nothing more to it than that. Let me know if you need help on how to help a specific one.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you helped them all out, at least once during the same loop!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Helping them was fun, right? Too bad there's nothing else to do.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue:
(...)
                        "I'd like to go through the whole House with them now, though."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Huh? Why?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well... It won't hurt, I suppose.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Make sure to help them out in the same loop, then go from the House's entrance, and have your little snack times, all the way to the Head Housemaiden.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...WITHOUT looping forwards and backwards.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I wonder if anything will change, though.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What, you need help with your "family members" again?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You know what to do. Just help them all out in the same loop, and go through the House with them.
(But you know it won't change anything.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It really won't.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue:
(So...)
                        "Do I really need to help them again?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Do you WANT to help them again?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Heh.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well, you can help them again if you want, but you don't really need to.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: They'll do just fine without you, you know!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Who do you think you are? Their savior?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Silly.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: If you do help them, you can just zone out and fast forward to it, if you get bored!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And you'll still get a nice skill for them out of it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I pity them, though. I wonder if they'd think you're doing this out of obligation.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Or worse, just because it makes your life easier.
(You need help on how to...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well... I think it's a stupid idea, but...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You should go and talk to the King. Sounds like you have some questions to ask.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "You don't agree?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He's a giant monster who might be related to the reason why you're trapped in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I would never have anything to say to him.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But you do! So have fun!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you talked to the King.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Seems like he's using some type of Craft called Time Craft to freeze people in time, huh?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Time Craft... I don't know much about it, myself.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But, as always, if you need information about something, you should read a book!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Maybe ask the Librarian in the Dormont library? She might know something.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So, thanks to that book, you found out that you and the King might be using Time Craft, to rewind and stop time, respectively.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But Time Craft has long been hypothesized to be impossible to control, since it'd ask a lot from the person using it...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: How can both you and the King use a power that should kill any other person...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What gave you that power...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...You should probably ask your new friend the King about it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So the King might not be from Vaugarde...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: That IS interesting information.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue:
(You smile smugly.)
                        "Sounds like asking him stuff was a good idea, huh?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, stardust, you were right.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: We really don't know anything about him, so any new information IS useful.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...Your Housemaiden mentioned she saw some articles about the King somewhere, didn't she?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: If she saw some, maybe you should check around rooms that you explore every time while going through the House...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It might be a lot of information, though, so make sure you ask yourself the right questions!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King's armor has some star patterns on it...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I saw them, but never thought anything of them.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "Most people don't know anything about the stars, do they...?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: They sure don't. You barely do, most of the time, don't you? But then...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: How does the King remember?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And why does he care about stars, to the point he has them on his armor?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Someplace that has something to do with the stars...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Maybe it might be time for you to explore the House a bit more, stardust.
(You guess so...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You know where to go, don't you? You've found it already.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: That room.
(You know where to go.)
(The stars, your memories...)
(The fact that the King, every single time you face him, asks you if you can remember...)
(What does he want you to remember...!)
(You know, you know already, but...)
(...You have to go and ask him.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King says everyone has forgotten something, including himself...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Including you.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But why would anyone write down what they've forgotten? Why would anyone know its importance, if they can't remember? Except...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...I'm actually surprised you haven't found it yet. Not reading a lot of books, are we?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: If you read it... Maybe you'd understand.
(Something you have to read...?)
(You sigh. Time to go hit the books again.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You know, don't you? Something no one can remember, something other than the stars...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You have proof. You just need to go and find it again.
(You don't want to have to open that diary again...)
(But you have to.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So the King is from that country... The country no one can remember.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The way he asks if you remember, every time you meet him...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The way he talks about the stars, the Universe...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I never knew, before... Never would've guessed...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But then...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "...Why is he so focused on Vaugarde?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Exactly. Why freeze Vaugarde in time, specifically?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "We know he appeared in Vaugarde in his adulthood."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: In the city of Corbeaux, right?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It's a nice place to live. And he must've stayed long enough to have put down some roots.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "He said, earlier..."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "He thought Vaugarde was perfect."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Perfect... And yet he wanted to freeze it in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Freezing something perfect in time...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Somehow, it reminded me of something, but I forgot, teehee!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You should look around for something similar to what he wants.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Come to me if you get stuck, I might've remembered what "freezing something perfect in time" is making me think of...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Like a picture.
(A picture...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Just go and talk to him.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I can tell you want to.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "You still disagree?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I... I don't...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I don't know.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I don't know how I feel about any of this.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Just do what you want.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King is from your country, the one no one can remember.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Something happened to this country, to make it disappear even in people's minds.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And he wants to freeze Vaugarde in time to make sure that, in a twisted way, it'd never be forgotten...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...What a blinding idiot.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "Loop..."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "I have to talk to him, one last time."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "The King is trying to remember our country, trying to keep Vaugarde from meeting the same fate."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "He's deluded, he can't bring it back, but... But..."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But you have to try.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...Just do whatever you want, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Have fun.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: There's nothing more to say, don't you think?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: A refresher? Sure!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: . . . Sure, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King has frozen almost the entire country of Vaugarde, and you're trying to beat him so everything can go back to normal.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You've beat him before, in fact. You'll keep beating him, of course.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You've also decided that he's misunderstood, or whatever, so you've started talking to him to know more about him.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: To freeze people in time, he's using something called Time Craft.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It's not something simple to do like Rock Craft or Scissors Craft, but a Craft much more complicated and rare.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But it's what allowed him to freeze the entire country in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: In fact, it might be the same power you're using, to be able to loop back in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But Time Craft has long been hypothesized to be impossible to control, since it'd probably kill anyone trying to use it...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And yet both you and the King are fine. How?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He's saying he's able to use Time Craft thanks to the Universe.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The Universe, the stars... Things that are familiar to you, but completely unknown to your friends, for some reason.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
