rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He's also from someplace other than Vaugarde.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And the King's armor is covered in stars...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Stars... You can recognize them as stars, but you can't remember anything about them, can you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The names of constellations escape you, everyday item names escape you, your childhood escapes you, you can't remember anything.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And the King keeps asking you if you remember. But you know, don't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You'll never remember anything. no one ever will.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You'll never remember anything about your country. Not its stars. Not its faith. Not the childhood you've spent here.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You can't even read or speak your own language.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: There's proof it existed, though. The diary in the library talks about it.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You can't even say its name, though. Why would you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Even I... I wouldn't be able to say its name even if I tried.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And that's it, isn't it? What the King wants?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: After having all of his memories of his country erased without warning... Being welcomed into Vaugarde, making his life here...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He just wants to make sure what happened to your country doesn't happen to Vaugarde.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And nothing can happen to Vaugarde if it's frozen in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: How pathetic. He can't accept that it's gone, even now.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It's just gone.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: "Were you from there, too?"

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What a WILD idea, stardust! Teehee!!!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And you're pathetic, too, for thinking you could make him give up on it.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: His country. His memory. His life.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Did you truly think you could've swayed him from it? From his wish?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You can be so blinding stupid sometimes, stardust!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: That was a lot of information, wasn't it? I don't blame you for zoning out, teehee!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well. I blame you a little bit.
Full page: Loopquest
(About the loops...)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: To find out more about the loops, you could try and talk to the King, couldn't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You and the King seem to share some kind of control over time... It might be worth it to ask him questions about it.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And you wanted to go and talk to the Head Housemaiden, too. So, you could go to the King and talk to him, and beat him to talk to the Head Housemaiden.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you've talked to the King and found out about something called... "Time Craft", was it?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You should try and find out more about it, but first, you should go and talk to the Head Housemaiden and see if she knows anything.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I wonder where you'd be able to find out more about it.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: There might be a book about it somewhere... Maybe the librarian in Dormont knows something.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you've found out more about Time Craft, and the Head Housemaiden just repeated everything when you saw her...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What else could you do to find out more about the loops...?
(Maybe you could talk to someone whose name is "Loop", huh.)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The loops... Wouldn't it be useful to know how they work, exactly?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I have some theories I'd like to test...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So please come and talk to me! And let's hang out! It's important!!!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I don't know if there's anything you can do to find out more about the loops right now...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But you do have other things to do, don't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Help your party, talk to the King...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You still have to help your party, after all.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You still have to find out more about the King, after all.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You can go back to your loop quest after you're done with this, don't you think?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hm...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You found out more about your friends, and the King...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King mentioned something. "Wish Craft"...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...You can read those books in your language, now. Maybe you should explore the House again...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I'm also pretty sure there's a room you could access now that you couldn't before?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Um, have you found anything new? I wasn't watching.
(You have to go and talk to Loop in person!!!)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you've found a book mentioning Wish Craft...!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It could've been fiction, so there's a chance it's not real still...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But the fact that it was mentioned somewhere means the King didn't invent it, or something.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I wonder if there are any other books out there mentioning Wish Craft...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Have you opened all the doors you could? You should explore the House more.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So Wish Craft is the power to make wishes come true, by using rituals and belief...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And those Crafted wishes can give the Crafter immense power.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I wonder if there's other books elsewhere in the House about Wish Craft... Maybe in one of the multiple libraries?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So, someone's wish, or multiple wishes, might be the reason you're looping in time...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Siffrin
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue:
(You've thought about it, and...)
                        "I don't think it's my wish."

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Hm... And it doesn't seem to be anyone in your party, either.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So... What did everyone else in Vaugarde wish for?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Perhaps you could ask people in Dormont...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Someone mentioned the Head Housemaiden asked them the same thing... But she probably won't answer if you ask her.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Is there a way to know why the Head Housemaiden asked them this, besides talking to her? Maybe you should search her office, on the second floor...
(You have to go and talk to Loop in person!!!)

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Go on, then.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Go and talk to the Head Housemaiden.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: No matter what happens... I'll see you soon, alright?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: A refresher? Sure!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: . . . Sure, stardust.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I'm repeating what you already know, but... You're stuck in a time loop.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You're repeating the same two-ish days, from when you wake up in Dormont, to, seemingly, when you talk to the Head Housemaiden.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: When you get to the Head Housemaiden, or when you die, you immediately loop back.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You're not completely helpless though, since you can more or less control when and where you loop back!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And just the fact that you loop back means you seem to have some kind of control over time... Just like the King.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King said his power comes from something called Time Craft, so we can assume this is what you're using as well.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The power to craft Time...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It has been hypothesized to exist, but was never proven, up until the King appeared.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Time Craft is supposed to ask for immense amounts of power... It was believed that crafting time to pause time for a single second would kill the user immediately.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So... How did the King get this power? How did YOU?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You also found out that what happened with the Head Housemaiden wasn't a one-off.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Every time you talk to her, she seems to be repeating the exact same thing, until you loop again.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: She says something is broken, failing, rotting...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: After that, we had our little hangout session!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...I was wondering about the rules of your loops. You loop back when you die, but there have been times when you looped back without dying, didn't you?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You looped back on your own, without dying, when we hung out together.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But if that's the case... Does something happen with the Head Housemaiden that makes the loops activate, as well?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: What do all those moments have in common...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You did your whole thing with the King, too. That was worse than useless, but...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The King mentioned something called "Wish Craft".

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: He seemed to think you were using this "Wish Craft", and also seemed to realize you were looping in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You ended up finding a diary mentioning Wish Craft, which proves the King didn't come up with it on his own, I suppose.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Wish Craft can apparently make any wish come true, even things that seem impossible.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Like creating a body... Like freezing people in time... Maybe, like looping in time, as well.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It's not definite proof, but maybe Wish Craft is how you managed to control Time Craft...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And then, you found another book mentioning Time Craft! [sic]

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: It was very dense, but it pretty much went like this...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Belief + Rituals = Wish Craft.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Belief, how much you want your wish to come true, and rituals, which are actions that strengthen your wish enough to make it come true.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Rituals are more important than belief, but that doesn't make belief unimportant, either.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But Wish Craft might not necessarily make a wish come true, but instead might give you the means to make it come true.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Like for the King... He wished for Vaugarde to be kept safe and perfect, so Wish Craft gave him the means to make his wish come true...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: ...By giving him the power to freeze Vaugarde in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The book had a lot more than this, like what would happen if multiple people wished for something, or what if two people wished for opposite things...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: So you can always go back to the locked storage room on Floor 1 to refresh your memory!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And then you found a THIRD book about Wish Craft! Aren't you lucky!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: You found out the Favor Trees are actually one way to do Wish Craft, if you know the rituals for it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And the "favors" people asked the Tree were just wishes, even if they didn't realize it!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But the thing is, you seem to be the only one who followed the correct rituals... Maybe that was knowledge you got from where you come from?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But the wish you made to the Favor Tree can't be why you're here, right? At least you don't seem to think so. And it's not your party's either.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: More so because they messed up their rituals, teehee!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But, maybe... If a lot of people wished for the same thing, even if the ritual was wrong... Maybe their wish might come true.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Which apparently might be what happened...?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden found out everyone in Vaugarde seems to have wished for the same thing...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: To save Vaugarde.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And... It might be why you're stuck looping in time.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Maybe the loops exist so that you can beat the King... And that's why you loop back when you die, so that you can get to him and beat him, no matter what...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But then... Why is the wish centered on you? Why not on your whole party?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: And why do you loop back without dying, sometimes?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I think it's related to your emotional state, and maybe something happens every time that makes you feel like this is the end... And that's why you loop, but...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: I don't know. I feel like we're missing something.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden... She might know something...

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: But... No matter what, know I'm with you, okay?

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: That was a lot of information, wasn't it? I don't blame you for zoning out, teehee!

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Well. I blame you a little bit.

rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.speaker: Loop
rooms/loop/whattodoact34.html.dialogue: Any other questions?

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Does the King... need to poop?

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: We can definitely beat someone who needs to poop!!!
(Better make a small detour to the bathroom.)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Just so you know, if you DO need to go...

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: When they make books about this moment, I'll be sure to mention how we needed to stop for a bathroom break.

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: I, uh, I don't need to go.

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Oh, hey, wait, do you need to go too, Siffrin?

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: I-I mean, what a coincidence!!! I need to go too!!!!!
(You enter the stall, and lean against the door.)
(You try to breathe, slowly, silently, in, and out.)
(You have to act, you can't crack, you have to fake it and play it exactly as you did the first time for the whole way through so your friends don't find out anything is wrong)
(You don't want to know what would happen if they knew their quest was in vain)
(If they knew their quest for justice and change always ends in stillness and death!)
(You can't let them know you can't let them know you can't let them know you can't let them know you can't let them know you CAN'T. LET. THEM. KNOW.)
(Hahaha, aaah, your skin feels hard and cold, you're breaking, you're rotting, you're being frozen alive...!)
(The only thing you can do at this point is ignore it all! Ignore how everything's break ing down around you by closing your ears and covering your eyes!!!!)
( And you can't think about... ...)
(Uh, wait. You can't close your ears.)
(You can't close your ears, you dummy!!! What does that even mean??? Are you an idiot??? Are you LOSING IT??????? )
(You laugh at yourself for a little bit.)
(If you're gonna lose it, might as well laugh about it!)
(Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha h

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue:
Hey buddy, what's up? I can hear you laugh...
Is there a funny drawing in there?
(You cover your mouth with both hands.)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: I mean, I could try closing them, like a ravioli, try a new fashion, but--
(Ooooh no, you can't laugh, you can't make noise, that's so creepy, stop--)
(Oops, tears and snot are running down your face.)
(Stop laughing and crying like an unhinged person, or he'll start worrying!!!)
(Or will he? Maybe laughing like this is something you did, before?)
(Did you     used to laugh at your own jokes?)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Woah Sif, you look like you... needed that?
(You do your business while having no breakdown whatsoever.)
(You sit down and hide your face beneath the rim of your hat.)
(You massage your cheeks for a minute.)
(Keeping a smile on everytime someone looks at you is exhausting.)
(But   if no one can see you   then maybe   you won't need to exist   for a little bit.)
(Soon, if you don't die first, you will be facing the King.)
(You must have had reasons to do so before. A goal.)
(Now   walking to your death is just routine.)
(Or   are you stuck listening to the same lines forever?)
(Sometimes   you wonder how long you can keep doing this.)
(But still. You're not stupid! You know what this is!)
(You used to love those moments in plays.)
(The darkest act, where The Hero, at their lowest point, is alone. Only their thoughts for company. They often forget what they're even fighting for.)
(Was their goal even achievable? Noble? Is the world broken, or The Hero?)
(And then, ah! The Hero wakes up! Gets their life around! Lives happily ever after surrounded by all their friends!)
(You're not a hero, Siffrin.     You never were.)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Sorry, you weren't answering so I thought you were sleeping...

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: And I tried to shake you awake...

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: And... Um... You can let go of my wrist now?
(You had forgotten about the shoulder touch.)
(One finger at a time, you let his wrist go.)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Oh noooooo! I'm sorryyyyyy! I didn't mean to~~~!

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: May this young fighter ever hope to be forgiven???

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Are you two all done over there?
(You wait outside and absolutely do not dig bruises into your wrist.)

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue: Of course I washed my hands--

sasasap/bathroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/bathroomsap.html.dialogue:
Alright, he washed his hands.
Let's get moving, everyone.

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: You look really crabbing bad, so take this.

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: Ooooooh , someone's taking this snack duty very seriously!

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: I'm real proud of you, buddy!

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: Hey hey, I have something for you too!
(The kid gave him a frankly unimpressive rock.)

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: Awww!!! Thank you!!! I'll treasure it forever!!!!!!

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: He's too nice for this, kiddo.

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: Urgh!!! You guys are so annoying!!!
(It's small, and round, and a little bit sticky.)
(The wrapper makes a nice crinkly sound when you touch it.)
(You roll the candy in your hand for a little bit.)

sasasap/candy.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/candy.html.dialogue: ...I gave you the candy for a reason, y'know.
(You slowly bring the candy to your mouth.)

sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: (Another failure. Another death.)
(There might be some things you missed...)
(But... Is there anything you can do? Anything that would change your destiny?)
(Listening or not listening to your friends, talking or not talking...)
(Maybe if you act to make sure your friends don't notice anything wrong...?)
(Back to the stage.)
(What else can you do...)
(Maybe go for the extremes...?)
(Acting perfectly normal, always listening, unknowing...)
(Or start not caring, who cares if your friends notice, go straight for the keys and crests without checking anything else first...?)
(Back to the stage.)
(Acting perfectly normal didn't work, acting like you usually do didn't work...)
(At this point... You're starting to not care at all anymore.)
(("Starting to..."))
(You should probably go straight for the crest and keys and not even care about how your friends would feel if they saw you acting weird and all-knowing.)
(See what happens.)
(You had it loops ago.)
(You had it.)
(Enough.)
(Just go straight for the crest and keys.)
(It's fine if they think you're weird. You don't care about this anymore.)

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Wow Sif, you don't... you don't look okay right now. Are you okay?

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: (uuurgh) "I'm fine!"

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: You promise you're fine? 'Cuz if you keep pulling this face I'll have to start getting worried!

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: ( ... ) "I said I'm FINE."

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Ah... S-sorry...
(You   decide to not do that again.)
(You   feel like throwing up.)

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Woah--Sif???

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Siffrin??? You look sick...

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Is everything okay?

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: Did you eat something bad...?
(You smile.)
(You're back. The curtain opens once more.)
(Did you enjoy it? Was it enough? Are you satisfied?)
(You don't think this miracle will repeat.)
(And even if it did...)
(A miracle that happens twice   isn't much of a miracle, isn't it?)
(Somehow, though... You feel like... What happened during this last loop was somehow what you needed to do.)
(Sometimes   you just feel   so much   anger.)
(Why does no one remember? Why are you the only one living like this?)
(You're the only one living and knowing and experiencing your own death over and over again.)
(They only have to die once. You've died more times than you can count.)
(Why is it just you? Why doesn't everyone feel this pain?)
(Why should you be the only one suffering like this when you've done nothing wrong???)
(It's not fair! It's not fair, it's not fair, it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's!!! not!!! fair!!!!!!)
(Caught between a sequence of death and life and death again, going through the motions until the next time your life is extinguished!!!)
(It's TORTURE!!! Every second of it!!!!!)
(Your friends, the whole country, the whole WORLD should know this pain!!!!!!!)
(THE WHOLE WORLD SHOULD SUFFER AS YOU HAVE SUFFERED!!!!!!!!)
(Sometimes   you understand the King more than you'd like to.)

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: ...Siffrin? Is everything okay?

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: (you're okay yes you're okay yes you're doing SO GREAT ,)

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: You sure? You looked a little...

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: ...Eh, it was just my imagination! Let's get going then!!!

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: A joke so bad it'd make even Siffrin themselves cringe...

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: A forbidden joke...

sasasap/deathssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/deathssap.html.dialogue: You better keep it under lock and key. A joke like this could destroy the world.
(You want to scream, but the smile you have permanently taped on your face prevents you from doing so.)
(Looping back like this is the only way you can rest anymore.)
(Had a nice nap?)
(That was sloppy.)
(She doesn't know. None of them know.)
(It's fine. You'll take a painful throat and a heart full of scars over them being worried about what comes next.)
(If you can live in a world where you're with your friends forever...)
(Even if you have to die for it, isn't that real happiness?)
(Sometimes, when you loop back here....)
(In the corner of your eye, you can sometimes see someone that looks just like you.)
(Is it a you from another loop? Remnants of your past failures?)
(Are you going crazy?)
(May they succeed where you cannot.)
(The curtain opens once more.)

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Is it the water? Should I not touch the weird floating water???

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: OH!!! THE ROCK FROZE WHEN IT TOUCHED THE WATER!!!

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Do NOT approach those. We'd probably get stuck in time just like everything else...

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: It wouldn't hurt too much though, right?

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Yes, theoretically. Why, would you care to try it out?

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: I've heard that being frozen makes you go to sleep, and gives you a super good dream!

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Oh... Where did you hear that from?

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Um... A nice lady told me that when my sister got frozen...

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: I-I know it's not true!!! I'm not stupid!!!

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Just... It would be nice... if that was true.

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: So you should touch the weird frozen water and be frozen and let me know how it goes!!!
(You let the conversation go on without you.)
(You know that while being frozen in time doesn't hurt, it doesn't bring you a wonderful dream either.)
(It's just like  missing a stair step and being stuck in midair, forever.)

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Well, there must be a way to make this water disappear somehow... Let's look around a bit more.
(One more loop, one more close call.)
(You couldn't catch him in time, once. It was before you started making sure the housemaiden knew how to make someone's time move again.
There was nothing any of you could do.)
(If you slept still, the sight would haunt your dreams.)
(But you try to only repeat your last few hours, so. Small mercies.)

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: --must be a way to make them disappear somehow... Let's look around a bit more.
(He's fine, he's fine, he's doing fine.)
(You look at the floating tears for the required amount of time.)

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: --must be a way to make them disappear somehow... Let's look around a bit more.
(Use the STAR CREST to clear the way?)
(You throw the crest into the tears, then watch them all melt away...)

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: The thing you found made the weird water go away!!!

sasasap/hallwayssap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/hallwayssap.html.dialogue: Probably a good thing... I don't want to know what would've happened if we touched those.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ah...... ah......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh...... Young ones...... Are you...... here to kill me......?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh...... Young lady...... You stand for Change Themselves, do you not......?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: ...I...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I... I just want the world to stay the way it is now...... To be frozen in eternal beauty.......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: A world of everlasting peace and rest.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Young housemaiden...... In a way... Isn't my wish a form of Change? Why aren't you on my side......?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ah...... Can't you feel it, young lady......?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: The Universe yearns for everyone's hopes to be encased in limitless ice......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Won't you allow your fate to be ended......?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Corrupting and ending people's lives? You call this a form of Change?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: You DARE compare your dreams of ice and stillness to Change themselves?!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: This is NOT true Change! This is just you, acting as a God would, for your own satisfaction!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ha...... Spoken like a true Housemaiden of Change......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ha...... I understand...... Seems like   there is only one end for you all.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Interestingly enough, the same as yours!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Death comes for everyone, including you.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: But yours will come first!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Hahaha...... Ooh...... Ooooh......!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ooooh, ooooooh, oooooh!!!! The Universe weeps...... The stars cry out in grief......!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oooh...... Oh...... Young ones...... If you won't obey...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I suppose I'll have to MAKE you obey.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (Stars...) "Let's just get right to it."

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Yes!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Aw, and I had a whole speech prepared too!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Get ready, everyone.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: There's no reasoning with him, it seems.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Everyone, get ready to fight. And...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I'll be here for backup! Hit him hard!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We won't back down, not now! Too many people are counting on us!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We'll defeat you. For all the people you've hurt, for all the people you've killed...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: FOR THE SAFETY OF ALL OF VAUGARDE!!!
(You can feel everyone's love for you and Vangarde...)
(Everyone's stats went up!!!)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: There's no reasoning with him, it seems.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Everyone, get ready to fight. And--

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ooooh.... Ooooooh....

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I'm afraid   it won't be as easy as you think.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ooooh....Oooooooh....

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I'm afraid   this is goodbye, young ones.
(The King is preparing his last move... and looking right at you.)
(Not for the first time, you see his tearful, wrathful eyes.)
(He won't miss. He never does.)
(You'll die with the next hit.)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Urgh...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: No... not like this... Not like this...!!!
(Nothing you can do.)
(At this point   it's just a matter of whether you'll die frozen in time   or die choking on your own blood.)
(You think for a little bit.)
(For this loop... You would   rather die...)
(Yeah.)
(You hope the King freezes you in time, lending you some rest.)
(Yeah.)
(You hope the King kills you quickly, in blood and stars.)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: No, please, please, don't leave me alone here!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Sif... ....Sif! SIFFRIN!!!!
(The King   strikes.)
(Your blood   drips down   your cloak)
(Your   vision   blurs)
(You   can taste   iron)
(You're   dying   choking   on your own blood)
(You   let   go.)
(Not   the death   you   wanted)
(Oh well   there's   always next   time
(The world
stops.
You     are     static
You     are     endless
You   rest   for   as   long   as   you   are   abl
(This could've worked.)
(You acted perfectly normally, didn't you?)
(Nothing out of place, nothing weird, every line the same as it might've been the first time?)
(Ah... That was your mistake, wasn't it...?)
(Because... Didn't your very first time... end exactly like this?)
(The King throws the Housemaiden's body onto the floor again.)
(She hasn't said a word   or breathed   for a long time.)
(No one else   is making a sound.)
(You hope   this body of yours   expires soon.)
(This is just the start. Your friends seem determined.)

(The Fighter.
The Housemaiden.
The Researcher.
The Kid.)
(These are your friends. You know, you know, you know.)
(But, as you fight by their side, against this undefeatable enemy, for the tenth, hundredth, thousandth time...)
(You are painfully aware of the fact   that   you don't remember   any   of their names.)
(Is it craft? Is it a curse?)
(Or   did you just   refuse   to remember?)
(If even your thoughts are repeating, there's no hope for you, is there?)
(The King sobs.)
(Tears appeared to help the King...)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh.... ooooh.....

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Stop it, stop it, STOP IT!!!!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: YOU CAN'T CRY, NOT IN FRONT OF US!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: YOU HURT SO MANY PEOPLE!!! WHO WON'T START MOVING EVER AGAIN!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: MY VILLAGE, MY FRIENDS, M-MY SISTER......

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: YOU DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT!!!!!!
(Something... Something to do with beauty?)
(An old sounding name?)
(Maybe... Maybe something fruity?)
(One of them is only known by their nickname, you know that...)
(So   you remember? You must have heard it. You've known them for weeks, months, years. They introduced themselves to you, even if you can't recall. Of course you remembered their names!)
(...No? You don't? You're too broken to remember?)
(You're a terrible friend, Siffrin. Terrible, terrible, terrible .)
(The torch in the infirmary? That's important!)
(The key in the book? Soooo important. )
(The names of your friends, that have been by your side throughout this entire adventure?)
(Not   worth   remembering.)
(Wasn't it, Siffrin? Wasn't it worth remembering? They were your friends. They ARE your friends!)
(But their souls and yours are stuck in a spiral and you look at them and see only ghosts of the people you knew and you couldn't bear it, could you?)
(Turning to look at your companions and hearing only lines that you've already heard hundreds of times?)
(It was easier if you didn't have to remember their names, if you didn't have to think of them as the people you knew, wasn't it...?)
(But   they're your friends, aren't they...? Aren't they? Aren't they?! )
(WHY WOULDN'T YOU REMEMBER THEIR NAMES?!)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: The King is charging up... Something's coming!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Everyone, be on your guard...!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ooh, oooooh.....
(Aaaah...)
(You're frozen, you're scared, you can't do anything!)
(Any second now the King will have enough, and you will die! You will all die!)
(You don't want to go through this all over again! Not now, after you've seen something new!)
(Why is the King taking so long to kill you all? Why is he delaying the inevitable?)
(He should just kill you! Get it over with! You don’t want to fight anymore! You don’t want to hope anymore!!!)
(Please, please, please, please... )

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: No... No... NO!!!!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I cannot allow you to win!!! I can't!!! I won't!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: You poor, lost creatures... Why won't you listen to me? I only want what is best for you! For everyone!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: And if you won't listen...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: King
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: YOU HAVE NO PLACE IN MY WORLD!!!
(Ah, finally......)
(The King is preparing his last move... and looking right at you.)
(Not for the first time, you see his tearful, wrathful eyes.)
(He won't miss. He never does.)
(Finally...)
(Close your eyes.)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN?!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: SIF!!! MOVE!!!
(Isabeau protected you from the King's attack!!!)
(...ISABEAU!)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me, Sif!!! Just GO !!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Stand up, Siffrin!!! The King is weakened... This isn't over yet!!!
(Odile...!)
(Odile, Odile, how could you forget, Odile...)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Hey!!! Quick, take this Sour Tonic and GO!!!
(Bonnie...)
(Bonnie, Bonnie, sweet and caring Bonnie...)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!
(Mirabelle...)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Come and help me!!! Together, we can finish him off!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: This is our chance! Our chance to end everything once and for all !!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (...!) (MOVE...!)
(Something changed, finally, something changed!!!)
(Mirabelle powered you up...)
(This is it!!!)
(ATTACK!)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Did... did we do it?

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: ... He's gone...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We did it...???

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Sif, we did it! He's gone! The King is gone!!! Hahahaha!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (Isabeau, your friend, your comedy partner, your...) "Isa..."

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ho...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Holy CRAB THAT WAS SCARY!!! WE DID IT? WE DID IT!!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (The little sibling of the group, the one who kept you all going...) "Bonnie..."

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ha...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Haha... hahahahaha!!! Oh, it was close for a second there!!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (The woman who understands you the best, observant to a fault...) "Odile..."

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh, what a relief...!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: (The savior of Vaugarde, the reason you are all here...) "Mirabelle..."

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Sif, Sif, Siffrin!!! It's over! We won!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We won, Sif!!!!! The country's okay, everything's gonna be okay now!!!
(You won, you won, you won......... )
(You wipe your eyes.)

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: It'll be okay, Siffrin. We prevailed.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We'll all be able to go back home!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I can't wait to tell my old job friends that I've helped save the country!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I gotta go back home and see if my sister's okay!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Finally, I'll be able to go back to my research.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Hehehe!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: See, Siffrin? We'll all be fine now.

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: There's nothing to worry about anymo--
(You feel your heart being tugged.)
(No)
(No, no, not now)
(You reach out

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Ah, Siffrin!!!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Huh???

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Siffrin, were you... were you...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: TAKING A NAP ????!??!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: I... I suppose that's...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: Yes, you're right! I should follow your lead on this one!

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We'd better get some sleep while we can! Since tomorrow...

sasasap/kingfightsap.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/kingfightsap.html.dialogue: We'll have to fight against the King!

sasasap/knick-knacks.html.dialogue: A small ball of lint. Feels nice to the touch.
(You look at what's in the cupboard...)
(You put it inside your pocket along with your other Knick-Knacks.)
(You roll the ball of lint between your palms.)
Four out of five traveling companions can drink this.
(You put it inside your pocket along with your other Knick-Knacks.)

[KNICK KNACKS]
You can interact with Knick-Knacks by going through your Pockets in the menu.
Access the menu by pressing ESC or X or 0.
(The bottle of wine is still here.)
(As with everything else, you lost it when the loop occured.)
(It'd be a little weird to take a drink now...)
(You know what? Yeah, you need it.)
(The one good thing about the loops is that you never live long enough to feel the hangover.)
(You get the bottle out of your pocket and take a swig.)
(You offer her the half empty bottle.)
(You both drink. You feel  a little bit better.)
Smells a little bit like cantaloupe still. You'll miss it when it's gone...
"You were there all along, but still, you return home."
(You put it inside your pocket along with your other Knick-Knacks.)

"You were there all along,
but still, you return home."
(You love and hate this poem in equal measure.)
A smooth rock shaped like a triangle.
(You put it inside your pocket along with your other Knick-Knacks.)
(You drag your finger on the sides of this triangle shaped rock.)
A note found at the bottom of an empty barrel. "Sorry for eating all the nuts."
(You put the note in your pocket with your other Knick-Knacks.)
(You fold the note around  and make a tiny crane.)
(You'd forgotten about this, but one of the vials is broken...)
(You got a SHINY PIECE OF GLASS.)
(You put it inside your pocket along with your other Knick-Knacks.)
(The cut on your finger is gone, like it never existed.)
(The light of the frozen torches scatters through it.)
(She gently takes your hand and wraps a bandage around your finger.)
(So nice, even though she tries to pretend she is not.)
(Next to her, the kid carefully takes the glass shard from you...)

sasasap/knick-knacks.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/knick-knacks.html.dialogue: Why do you have sharp things like this in your pocket anyway???
Happened to be in your pocket before this all started, so you always start again with it.
(You roll the coin around in your pocket.)
(You grip the coin tightly between your fingers.)
(You flip the coin in the air a few times.)

sasasap/knick-knacks.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/knick-knacks.html.dialogue: You can just actually clap instead of saying "clap clap clap" out loud.
Someone taught you how to fold cranes a long time ago.

sasasap/knick-knacks.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/knick-knacks.html.dialogue: I didn't know you knew how to make those, Sif! Where did you learn?
(You cradle the crane between your hands.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: (Everyone is happily encouraging everyone else, giving each other potions, getting ready to save Vaugarde.)
(You've heard all this many, many, many times before.)
(They look so happy... So peaceful... And all you can do is stitch your smile permanently on, as you always have.)
(It's selfishness, not telling them they'll die in the very next room.)
(You don't want them to know. You don't want them to have to deal with this.)
(You don't want them to suffer like you do.)
(You wonder how everyone will die this time.)
(Will the King beat them with Craft until they are no more?)
(Will he freeze them in time, unable to move or breathe for all eternity?)
(In blood and stars maybe... In tears and time perhaps...)
(You've seen this so many times before.)
(What did you do last time that you didn't do this time...?)
(You've seen this before, you have, but...)
(You don't want to ignore things this time.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: (you have to talk to them, they might listen if it's you--)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: (i don't know what i would even say--)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Sif, we were talking, and we couldn't help but notice, that you're acting a little weird, and,
(No, you haven't heard this before. This is new. Focus. Focus. Focus.)
(This isn't new anymore. You listen anyway.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: We know this is a stressful time, and we were wondering if--

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: WE SAID WE WERE GONNA BUILD UP TO IT!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: You're acting weird! You're forgetting things, you know too much, you're super strong,

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...and you look sad and tired every time you think we're not looking!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: What she's saying is stop it.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: What she's saying is you're acting weird and it's BUMMING US OUT!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: WOAH WOAH WOAH, WHAT EVERYONE IS SAYING IS--

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: If you have something on your mind, you can talk to us!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: And if you keep being down, it'll affect our performance in battle.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: And we want to help you, and we love you!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: YEAH, THAT!!! WE WANT TO HELP YOU!!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: and we, uh-- we-- we l-love you... and stuff.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...and we want to help you, and we love you.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Siffrin, please tell us what's wrong.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: W-we can help, right? And if we can't, we can still listen...
(This never happened before. You don't know what to do. You don't know what to do you don't know what to do you don't know what to do.)
(This usually works, why isn't it working now???)
(Just say something, you can't let them figure it out--)
(This is already more than you've ever hope you'd ever see.)
(You don't want to risk it by changing the script.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: One thing. Just tell us one thing that bothers you.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: It doesn't have to be The Thing. Just one thing. What's bothering you right now?
(Nope! Too true. The words don't even escape your mouth.)
(The kid looks into their pocket which seems to contain a frankly impressive array of snacks.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: (it's a kind of flaky sweet pastry!)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: (A savory pastry, popular in coastal places like Bambouche.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Fish heads are yummy and the textures are different and good!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Okay...! Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!
(You used to eat those all the time, before...)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Yeah! Don't they always have potatoes in them???

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Okay...! Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!
(Anything that's a new, unusual experience... You'll take it, even if it's eating food that you hate.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Salmon's just the best tastiest fish ever!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Okay... Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!
(It's crunchy and, as always, good despite its appearance.)
(Someone you know... used to love them... so you tried to love them too.)
(It took you a long time to get used to the texture...)
(For some reason, you feel like crying...)
(How long has it been since you last ate something filling...?)
(How long has it been since something new happened?)
(This is perfect, this is more than you could've ever hoped for, but...)
(Is it  yet another prison? Are you still trapped?)
(Instead of your friends not realizing anything's wrong, now you have to relive this moment where they know something is wrong, but are powerless to stop it?)
(...But this is the right path. You're sure of it.)
(If only... You were strong enough to win against the King as things are now...)
(Even her hands  are covered in calluses, after all the battles she and all your friends fought in.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: We can head out when you're ready to go.
(How badly are you messing up that this happened?)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: --cool silver coin, ah! Sorry to be a mother--

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: --make sure you're doing okay, so we can go fight the King and win!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Awesome!!! Let's kick some kingly butt!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Ha, I know this is gonna be an awkward thing to ask, but I'm still gonna ask it!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...Can I hold your hand too...? For a little bit...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I-it's okay if you don't want me to!!! It's absolutely fine!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I... I really want to comfort you in some way right now.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: And   a hug might, like, be a little too much? I dunno?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: B-BUT I UNDERSTAND!!! NO WORRIES!!!! NO PRESSURE!!!!
(He hurriedly wipes his palms on his pants   and carefully cradles your hands.)
(His hands are still sweaty. The moisture is seeping through your gloves. It's, quite honestly, on the verge of being gross.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: my hands aren't sweaty are they

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I'M ANXIOUS, OKAY!!!! THIS IS A STRESSFUL AND IMPORTANT MOMENT!!!! I HAVE A SWEATY BODY ALL THE TIME!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I'M ANXIOUS, OKAY!!!! I'M HOLDING YOUR HAND!!!! I HAVE A SWEATY BODY ALL THE TIME!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...I... I feel like   I haven't seen you laugh   in a really long time.
(You don't remember the last time you truly laughed either.)
(Stars, you forgot how much you used to make each other laugh.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...You can talk to us. You know that, right?
(You put your hand in his, and hold hands for a little bit, swaying them lightly.)
("...do our best, against the King, and live...")

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: --happily, as soon as this is over!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Hehehe! I have a great feeling about this!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Phew... My heart is still beating super fast...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I'm no good at being confrontational...!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Don't tease me... It was hard...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Sif... Do you remember... Do you remember when we first met?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Um. You know... Back when we met, I thought you were... kind of a mean person?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: You always acted like you were above us... As if our worries and our quest were unimportant to you...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: N-Not in a malicious way!!! More like... Like a quest to save Vaugarde was on the same level as... doing laundry, or something.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Something you seemed confident we'd all succeed at and you weren't sure why we were even worried!
(Slowly, gently, she puts her hands on your cheeks.)
(Her fingers graze your left cheekbone, right below your scarred eye.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...but then... Then you got hurt... trying to protect one of us...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: So... So it was never true, was it? You care about us, don't you?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: So I feel like... If you're hiding something... It must be   because you don't want us to be hurt.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: It's fine if you can't tell us right now.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Just please remember... that the same way you want us protected and safe...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: We   want the same for you.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: So talk to us eventually, you STINKIN' CRAB!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Did I hear someone say "crab"? Siffrin, are you making our dear Housemaiden curse?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I'm allowed to say bad words!!! I'm a growncrab lady!!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Oh my. The King better watch out.
(You and the growncrab lady both laugh.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Let us know when you're ready, Siffrin! Let's kick some King butt!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I can't wait for the House to finally go back to normal...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: The Head Housemaiden will be so surprised to see how far I've come!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: You promised, remember? No take backs!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: --kick the King's butt for me, okay? Oh--

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: d-DO YOU WANT ANOTHER SNACK??? I HAVE, I HAVE A LOT LEFT!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I have apples and chouquettes and some radishes and oh I have a big mushroom I found and......

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...I dunno... what to do... I don't want you to feel bummed out...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I wanna see my sister again very, very much.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: But... I'm thinking about her so much... that I didn't realize you weren't okay...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Why   didn't I see   that you weren't okay...?
(How can you make them feel better?)
(The kid gives you a frankly massive handful of snacks.)
(You feel a little queasy just looking at it...)
(But the kid is looking at you so expectantly......!!!)
(...You give the kid a thumbs up.)

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Wow, snack duty really is an important job after all...!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Hurry uuuup! The King's up ahead!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Let me know if you want more snacks okay???

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: --slack off. Let's give it our all, Siffrin.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Yeah. Let's be ready for anything.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Perfect. I have no doubt we'll succeed.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...Give me another thing that bothers you.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...I know you kids like to act as if this is a field trip...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...but this is an extremely stressful situation to be in.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: It wouldn't be surprising for you to forget things.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Whatever it is, it'll definitely come back to you.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: No need to rush things. Okay?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Overwhelming... Is it the castle? The noise?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: You HAVE been spacing out during conversations lately...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Is it that? Should I tell the kids to talk less?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...Alright, alright, no need to look so panicked. I won't say anything.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: I imagine it must be hard... But try to stay in the moment.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Focus on what's around you. The views, the sounds, the smells...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Let's talk more about this when we're done. We'll figure it out. Okay?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Now go away. I've used up my nice quota for the day.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Leave me be. Go take a nap or something.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Well! You were acting a little weird when we were way closer to the Castle's entrance......

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: You weren't really listening to us, you were kinda smiling the way you do when you're actually not happy...

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: ...and you like, almost acted like you knew exactly where you were going?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: But clearly you're feeling better now! You're acting just like normal!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Pff, I told you they were fine... Siffrin would never be worried about anything!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Hehe! If Siffrin was worried, then we would have no chance, would we?

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: A Siffrin worried about things means the end of the world is nigh. But since they're back to normal, we will definitely win.

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: What are they, a good luck charm? Haha!!!

sasasap/lastroom.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/lastroom.html.dialogue: Anyway, let's go, let's go, let's go!!! We have a country to save!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: (Stars above, you've heard this before.)
("I have a...")

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: --good feeling. Soon--
("...this country will be free. You...")

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: --get that feeling too, right? But--
("...still, it's no reason to...")

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: --slack off. Let's give it our all, Siffrin.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: (...) "Absolutely!"

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Perfect. I have no doubt we'll succeed.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Whenever you're ready, Siffrin.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ready to go?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Awesome!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: ...I'm glad you're feeling better, though!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: (...?) "What do you mean...?"

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Oh!!! Um, you were...

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Well! You were acting a little weird when we were way closer to the Castle's entrance......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: You weren't really listening to us, you were kinda smiling the way you do when you're actually not happy...

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: ...and you like, almost acted like you knew exactly where you were going?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: But clearly you're feeling better now! You're acting just like normal!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Pff, I told you they were fine... Siffrin would never be worried about anything!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue:
Hehe!
                                        If Siffrin was worried, then we would have no chance, would we?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: A Siffrin worried about things means the end of the world is nigh. But since they're back to normal, we will definitely win.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: What are they, a good luck charm? Haha!!!
(You're acting... "normal"...?)
(But maybe this time...)

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Anyway, let's go, let's go, let's go!!! We have a country to save!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ah...... ah......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Oh...... Young ones...... Are you...... here to kill me......?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Oh...... Young lady...... You stand for Change Themselves, do you not......?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: ...I...

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: I... I just want the world to stay the way it is now...... To be frozen in eternal beauty.......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: A world of everlasting peace and rest.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Young housemaiden...... In a way... Isn't my wish a form of Change? Why aren't you on my side......?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ah...... Can't you feel it, young lady......?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: The Universe yearns for everyone's hopes to be encased in limitless ice......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Won't you allow your fate to be ended......?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Corrupting and ending people's lives? You call this a form of Change?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: You DARE compare your dreams of ice and stillness to Change themselves?!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: This is NOT true Change! This is just you, acting as a God would, for your own satisfaction!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Oh......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ha...... Spoken like a true Housemaiden of Change......

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ha...... I understand...... Seems like   there is only one end for you all.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Interestingly enough, the same as yours!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Death comes for everyone, including you.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: But yours will come first!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Hahaha...... Ooh...... Ooooh......!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ooooh, ooooooh, oooooh!!!! The Universe weeps...... The stars cry out in grief......!!!

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Oooh...... Oh...... Young ones...... If you won't obey...

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: I suppose I'll have to MAKE you obey.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: There's no reasoning with him, it seems.

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Everyone, get ready to fight. And--

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Ooooh.... Ooooooh....

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: I'm afraid   it won't be as easy as you think.
(This could've worked.)
(You acted perfectly normally, didn't you?)
(Nothing out of place, nothing weird, every line the same as it might've been the first time?)
(Ah... That was your mistake, wasn't it...?)
(Because... Didn't your very first time... end exactly like this?)
(The King throws the Housemaiden's body onto the floor again.)
(She hasn't said a word   or breathed   for a long time.)
(No one else   is making a sound.)
(You hope   this body of yours   expires soon.)
(You   decide to not do that again.)
(You   feel like throwing up.)

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Woah--Sif???

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Siffrin??? You look sick...

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Is everything okay?

sasasap/perfend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/perfend.html.dialogue: Did you eat something bad...?
(You smile.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You look really crabbing bad, so take this.
(The kid gave you a CANDY.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ooooooh , someone's taking this snack duty very seriously!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'm real proud of you, buddy!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Aw, yay, thanks.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey hey, I have something for you too!
(The kid gave him a frankly unimpressive rock.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Awww!!! Thank you!!! I'll treasure it forever!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: aww what

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: He's too nice for this, kiddo.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
