sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hehehe!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Urgh!!! You guys are so annoying!!!
(You look at the candy.)
(It looks the same as before.)
(It's small, and round, and a little bit sticky.)
(The wrapper makes a nice crinkly sound when you touch it.)
(You roll the candy in your hand for a little bit.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...I gave you the candy for a reason, y'know.
(Ah.)
(You slowly bring the candy to your mouth.)
(.........Tastes like  cantaloupe.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hm. Good.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Let's go then!
(Have you seen this before...?)
(You've seen this before, but still...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (pst pst pst)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (pst pst pst)
(They're both whispering to each other...)
(Did this happen before...?)
(You've seen this before, you have, but...)
(You don't want to ignore things this time.)
(Not for this.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (you have to talk to them, they might listen if it's you--)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (i don't know what i would even say--)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: A-ah! Um!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Sif, we were talking, and we couldn't help but notice, that you're acting a little weird, and,
(No, you haven't heard this before. This is new. Focus. Focus. Focus.)
(FOCUS!!!)
(This isn't new anymore. You listen anyway.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We know this is a stressful time, and we were wondering if--

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Tell us what's wrong!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh boy.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: WE SAID WE WERE GONNA BUILD UP TO IT!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: TELL US WHAT'S WRONG!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You're acting weird! You're forgetting things, you know too much, you're super strong,

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...and you look sad and tired every time you think we're not looking!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hahaha, what she's saying is--

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: What she's saying is stop it.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: UM, what she MEANS is--

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: What she's saying is you're acting weird and it's BUMMING US OUT!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: WOAH WOAH WOAH, WHAT EVERYONE IS SAYING IS--

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: If you have something on your mind, you can talk to us!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And if you keep being down, it'll affect our performance in battle.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh crab.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And we want to help you, and we love you!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: YEAH, THAT!!! WE WANT TO HELP YOU!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: and we, uh-- we-- we l-love you... and stuff.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ew...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I am not saying that.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (GLARE)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...and we want to

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...and we want to help you, and we love you.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Siffrin, please tell us what's wrong.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: W-we can help, right? And if we can't, we can still listen...
(uh)
(What's happening?)
(This never happened before. You don't know what to do. You don't know what to do you don't know what to do you don't know what to do.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (say something anything!!!)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: No problem!
(You look around.)
(This usually works, why isn't it working now???)
(Just say something, you can't let them figure it out--)
(This is already more than you've ever hope you'd ever see.)
(You don't want to risk it by changing the script.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (SIGH.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: One thing. Just tell us one thing that bothers you.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: It doesn't have to be The Thing. Just one thing. What's bothering you right now?
(Nope! Too true. The words don't even escape your mouth.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (say something else.) "...I'm hungry?"

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: My time  has come.
(The kid looks into their pocket which seems to contain a frankly impressive array of snacks.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Best snacks, best snacks...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: OKAY! I haaaaaave...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...some palmiers!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (What is that?)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (it's a kind of flaky sweet pastry!)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And I also have...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...a samoussa!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (what is that???)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (A savory pastry, popular in coastal places like Bambouche.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: It's our specialty!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And finally...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: A grilled fish head!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hm.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: WHAT?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: THE WHOLE HEAD???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Fish heads are yummy and the textures are different and good!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ARE THEY???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ARE THEY REALLY

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: THEY ARE!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (uh)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Okay...! Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (what...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (..."Compliments of the house"?)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Oh gems...)
(Palmier it is.)
(You bite into it...)
(Tastes sweet...)
(You used to eat those all the time, before...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Yeah! Don't they always have potatoes in them???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Actually...) "Not where I come from..."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: What... Weird...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Well they're better with potatoes!!!
(Ew, doubtful.)
(Sounds different though.)
(You could use different.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Okay...! Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (what...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (..."Compliments of the house"?)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Oh gems...)
(Weird potato samoussa it is.)
(You bite into it...)
(Tastes potato-y...)
(But you don't mind it.)
(Anything that's a new, unusual experience... You'll take it, even if it's eating food that you hate.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Salmon!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Does it change anything...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Salmon's just the best tastiest fish ever!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Okay... Wait, I have a really nice napkin somewhere...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: There!!! Sweet words of the residence!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (what...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (..."Compliments of the house"?)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Oh gems...)
(Fish head it is.)
(You bite into it...)
(It's crunchy and, as always, good despite its appearance.)
(Someone you know... used to love them... so you tried to love them too.)
(It took you a long time to get used to the texture...)
(For some reason, you feel like crying...)
(How long has it been since you last ate something filling...?)
(How long has it been since something new happened?)
(How long have you been lost?)
(This is perfect, this is more than you could've ever hoped for, but...)
(Is it  yet another prison? Are you still trapped?)
(Instead of your friends not realizing anything's wrong, now you have to relive this moment where they know something is wrong, but are powerless to stop it?)
(...But this is the right path. You're sure of it.)
(If only... You were strong enough to win against the King as things are now...)
(You swallow.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...D'you feel better...?
(You think about it.)
(You don't feel great, but...)
(You nod.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Okay.
(She takes your hand.)
(Ah, her hands...)
(Even her hands  are covered in calluses, after all the battles she and all your friends fought in.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Let's rest here for a bit.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We can head out when you're ready to go.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Okay?
(How badly are you messing up that this happened?)
(One more time, one more time...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey, uh...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ha, I know this is gonna be an awkward thing to ask, but I'm still gonna ask it!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Can I hold your hand too...? For a little bit...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I-it's okay if you don't want me to!!! It's absolutely fine!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I just...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I... I really want to comfort you in some way right now.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And   a hug might, like, be a little too much? I dunno?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: B-BUT I UNDERSTAND!!! NO WORRIES!!!! NO PRESSURE!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: O-Oh!!! Alright!!!!
(He hurriedly wipes his palms on his pants   and carefully cradles your hands.)
(His hands are still sweaty. The moisture is seeping through your gloves. It's, quite honestly, on the verge of being gross.)
(His grip   is so tight.)
(...It's   comforting.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: my hands aren't sweaty are they

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: aaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'M ANXIOUS, OKAY!!!! THIS IS A STRESSFUL AND IMPORTANT MOMENT!!!! I HAVE A SWEATY BODY ALL THE TIME!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: aaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'M ANXIOUS, OKAY!!!! I'M HOLDING YOUR HAND!!!! I HAVE A SWEATY BODY ALL THE TIME!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Heheheh, Sif, you're laughing!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...I... I feel like   I haven't seen you laugh   in a really long time.
(You don't remember the last time you truly laughed either.)
(Stars, you forgot how much you used to make each other laugh.)
(You remember, now.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...You can talk to us. You know that, right?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...I'll let you prepare.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Talk to you later, 'kay?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey!
(He's holding out his hand.)
(You put your hand in his, and hold hands for a little bit, swaying them lightly.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hehehe...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Phew... My heart is still beating super fast...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'm no good at being confrontational...!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Don't tease me... It was hard...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh... I'm... You're welcome.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Sif... Do you remember... Do you remember when we first met?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Um. You know... Back when we met, I thought you were... kind of a mean person?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You always acted like you were above us... As if our worries and our quest were unimportant to you...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: N-Not in a malicious way!!! More like... Like a quest to save Vaugarde was on the same level as... doing laundry, or something.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Something you seemed confident we'd all succeed at and you weren't sure why we were even worried!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: But then...
(Slowly, gently, she puts her hands on your cheeks.)
(Her fingers graze your left cheekbone, right below your scarred eye.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...but then... Then you got hurt... trying to protect one of us...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: So... So it was never true, was it? You care about us, don't you?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: So I feel like... If you're hiding something... It must be   because you don't want us to be hurt.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Am I wrong...?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (...) (Stay silent.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: It's fine if you can't tell us right now.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Just please remember... that the same way you want us protected and safe...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We   want the same for you.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: So talk to us eventually, you STINKIN' CRAB!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (...) "I promise."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Did I hear someone say "crab"? Siffrin, are you making our dear Housemaiden curse?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'm allowed to say bad words!!! I'm a growncrab lady!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh my. The King better watch out.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'll curse him to smithereens!!!
(You and the growncrab lady both laugh.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Alright!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Let us know when you're ready, Siffrin! Let's kick some King butt!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You promised, remember? No take backs!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: d-DO YOU WANT ANOTHER SNACK??? I HAVE, I HAVE A LOT LEFT!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I have apples and chouquettes and some radishes and oh I have a big mushroom I found and......

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...I dunno... what to do... I don't want you to feel bummed out...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Y'know, my sister, I...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I wanna see my sister again very, very much.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: But... I'm thinking about her so much... that I didn't realize you weren't okay...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Why   didn't I see   that you weren't okay...?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Mmm...
(It's not their fault...)
(How can you make them feel better?)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (...) "Do you still have snacks?"

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Sna--YEAH!!!
(The kid gives you a frankly massive handful of snacks.)
(You feel a little queasy just looking at it...)
(But the kid is looking at you so expectantly......!!!)
(Bravely, you eat them all.)
(...You give the kid a thumbs up.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Phew!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Wow, snack duty really is an important job after all...!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Let me know if you want more snacks okay???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Give me another thing that bothers you.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Don't think about it. GO.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...I know you kids like to act as if this is a field trip...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...but this is an extremely stressful situation to be in.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: It wouldn't be surprising for you to forget things.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Whatever it is, it'll definitely come back to you.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: No need to rush things. Okay?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Overwhelming... Is it the castle? The noise?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You HAVE been spacing out during conversations lately...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Is it that? Should I tell the kids to talk less?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Alright, alright, no need to look so panicked. I won't say anything.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I imagine it must be hard... But try to stay in the moment.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Focus on what's around you. The views, the sounds, the smells...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Let's talk more about this when we're done. We'll figure it out. Okay?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...You're... You're doing fine, Siffrin.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Now go away. I've used up my nice quota for the day.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Leave me be. Go take a nap or something.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...You probably need it.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ah...... ah......

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Stars...) "Let's just get right to it."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Yes!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Aw, and I had a whole speech prepared too!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Get ready, everyone.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: There's no reasoning with him, it seems.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Everyone, get ready to fight. And...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I'll be here for backup! Hit him hard!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We won't back down, not now! Too many people are counting on us!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We'll defeat you. For all the people you've hurt, for all the people you've killed...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: FOR THE SAFETY OF ALL OF VAUGARDE!!!
(You can feel everyone's love for you and Vangarde...)
(Everyone's stats went up!!!)
(You're back. The curtain opens once more.)
(Did you enjoy it? Was it enough? Are you satisfied?)
(You don't think this miracle will repeat.)
(And even if it did...)
(A miracle that happens twice   isn't much of a miracle, isn't it?)
(Somehow, though... You feel like... What happened during this last loop was somehow what you needed to do.)
(Sometimes   you just feel   so much   anger.)
(Why does no one remember? Why are you the only one living like this?)
(You're the only one living and knowing and experiencing your own death over and over again.)
(They only have to die once. You've died more times than you can count.)
(Why is it just you? Why doesn't everyone feel this pain?)
(Why should you be the only one suffering like this when you've done nothing wrong???)
(It's not fair! It's not fair, it's not fair, it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's not fair it's!!! not!!! fair!!!!!!)
(Caught between a sequence of death and life and death again, going through the motions until the next time your life is extinguished!!!)
(It's TORTURE!!! Every second of it!!!!!)
(Your friends, the whole country, the whole WORLD should know this pain!!!!!!!)
(THE WHOLE WORLD SHOULD SUFFER AS YOU HAVE SUFFERED!!!!!!!!)
(Sometimes   you understand the King more than you'd like to.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Siffrin? Is everything okay?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (you're okay yes you're okay yes you're doing SO GREAT ,)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You sure? You looked a little...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ...Eh, it was just my imagination! Let's get going then!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: A joke so bad it'd make even Siffrin themselves cringe...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: A forbidden joke...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You better keep it under lock and key. A joke like this could destroy the world.
(You want to scream, but the smile you have permanently taped on your face prevents you from doing so.)
(This is just the start. Your friends seem determined.)

(The Fighter.
The Housemaiden.
The Researcher.
The Kid.)
(These are your friends. You know, you know, you know.)
(But, as you fight by their side, against this undefeatable enemy, for the tenth, hundredth, thousandth time...)
(You are painfully aware of the fact   that   you don't remember   any   of their names.)
(Is it craft? Is it a curse?)
(Or   did you just   refuse   to remember?)
(If even your thoughts are repeating, there's no hope for you, is there?)
(The King sobs.)
(Tears appeared to help the King...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh.... ooooh.....

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Stop it, stop it, STOP IT!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: YOU CAN'T CRY, NOT IN FRONT OF US!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: YOU HURT SO MANY PEOPLE!!! WHO WON'T START MOVING EVER AGAIN!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: MY VILLAGE, MY FRIENDS, M-MY SISTER......

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: YOU DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT!!!!!!
(Something... Something to do with beauty?)
(An old sounding name?)
(Maybe... Maybe something fruity?)
(One of them is only known by their nickname, you know that...)
(So   you remember? You must have heard it. You've known them for weeks, months, years. They introduced themselves to you, even if you can't recall. Of course you remembered their names!)
(...No? You don't? You're too broken to remember?)
(You're a terrible friend, Siffrin. Terrible, terrible, terrible .)
(The torch in the infirmary? That's important!)
(The key in the book? Soooo important. )
(The names of your friends, that have been by your side throughout this entire adventure?)
(Not   worth   remembering.)
(Wasn't it, Siffrin? Wasn't it worth remembering? They were your friends. They ARE your friends!)
(But their souls and yours are stuck in a spiral and you look at them and see only ghosts of the people you knew and you couldn't bear it, could you?)
(Turning to look at your companions and hearing only lines that you've already heard hundreds of times?)
(It was easier if you didn't have to remember their names, if you didn't have to think of them as the people you knew, wasn't it...?)
(But   they're your friends, aren't they...? Aren't they? Aren't they?! )
(WHY WOULDN'T YOU REMEMBER THEIR NAMES?!)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: The King is charging up... Something's coming!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Everyone, be on your guard...!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ooh, oooooh.....
(Aaaah...)
(You're frozen, you're scared, you can't do anything!)
(Any second now the King will have enough, and you will die! You will all die!)
(You don't want to go through this all over again! Not now, after you've seen something new!)
(Why is the King taking so long to kill you all? Why is he delaying the inevitable?)
(He should just kill you! Get it over with! You don’t want to fight anymore! You don’t want to hope anymore!!!)
(Please, please, please, please... )

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: No... No... NO!!!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I cannot allow you to win!!! I can't!!! I won't!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: You poor, lost creatures... Why won't you listen to me? I only want what is best for you! For everyone!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: And if you won't listen...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: King
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: YOU HAVE NO PLACE IN MY WORLD!!!
(Ah, finally......)
(The King is preparing his last move... and looking right at you.)
(Not for the first time, you see his tearful, wrathful eyes.)
(He won't miss. He never does.)
(Finally...)
(Close your eyes.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN?!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: SIF!!! MOVE!!!
(Isabeau protected you from the King's attack!!!)
(...ISABEAU!)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Don't worry about me, Sif!!! Just GO !!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Stand up, Siffrin!!! The King is weakened... This isn't over yet!!!
(Odile...!)
(Odile, Odile, how could you forget, Odile...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hey!!! Quick, take this Sour Tonic and GO!!!
(Bonnie...)
(Bonnie, Bonnie, sweet and caring Bonnie...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: SIFFRIN!!!
(Mirabelle...)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Come and help me!!! Together, we can finish him off!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: This is our chance! Our chance to end everything once and for all !!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (...!) (MOVE...!)
(Something changed, finally, something changed!!!)
(Mirabelle powered you up...)
(This is it!!!)
(ATTACK!)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Did... did we do it?

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: ... He's gone...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We did it...???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Sif, we did it! He's gone! The King is gone!!! Hahahaha!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (Isabeau, your friend, your comedy partner, your...) "Isa..."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ho...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Holy CRAB THAT WAS SCARY!!! WE DID IT? WE DID IT!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (The little sibling of the group, the one who kept you all going...) "Bonnie..."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ha...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Haha... hahahahaha!!! Oh, it was close for a second there!!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (The woman who understands you the best, observant to a fault...) "Odile..."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh, what a relief...!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: (The savior of Vaugarde, the reason you are all here...) "Mirabelle..."

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Sif, Sif, Siffrin!!! It's over! We won!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We won, Sif!!!!! The country's okay, everything's gonna be okay now!!!
(You won, you won, you won......... )
(You wipe your eyes.)

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Oh, Siffrin...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: It'll be okay, Siffrin. We prevailed.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We'll all be able to go back home!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Isabeau
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I can't wait to tell my old job friends that I've helped save the country!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Bonnie
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I gotta go back home and see if my sister's okay!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Odile
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Finally, I'll be able to go back to my research.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Hehehe!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: See, Siffrin? We'll all be fine now.

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: There's nothing to worry about anymo--
(You feel your heart being tugged.)
(No)
(No, no, not now)
(You reach out

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Ah, Siffrin!!!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Huh???

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Siffrin, were you... were you...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: TAKING A NAP ????!??!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: I... I suppose that's...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: Yes, you're right! I should follow your lead on this one!

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We'd better get some sleep while we can! Since tomorrow...

sasasap/trueend.html.speaker: Mirabelle
sasasap/trueend.html.dialogue: We'll have to fight against the King!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: (You don't remember where the Star Crest is either.)
(You don't always make it this far...)
(You should look everywhere.)
(A craftonomy book.)
(A conversation is about to start.)
(Listen?)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Oooh, is this a craftology book?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Piercing Craft, Creative Craft... Where's the Protecting Craft chapt--

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: It's a craftONOMY book, not a craftOLOGY book.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: This one is about the study of Craft, not your fortune.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: heheheh

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Aww... I wanted to know my horoscope today...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: This place has been frozen for a few months now... I don't think it'd be up to date...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hehehe, you really like that sort of stuff, don't you?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Yes!!! It's really fun!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: The Protector Craft... People who use it are patient, honest, loyal...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ...and very gullible.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: That sure is me!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: heheheheheh

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Haha, you're laughing, but... Aren't you... also using Protector Craft?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Yes, I do seem to remember this being the case, kiddo.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: NO!!!!!!! IT'S NOT THE SAME!!!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Heheheheheh!!!
(Before this all happened, you'd never noticed how you could just stay silent and they'd all talk around you like nothing's wrong.)
(You    are Piercing Craft.)
(Determined. Brave. Honest.)
(Callous. Aimless. Manipulative.)
(A drawer.)
(It's filled to the brim with random papers and writing utensils.)
(Look closer?)
(You rummage around, hoping to find the last crest.)
(The point of a pen pierces through your glove   and pricks your finger.)
(Without even removing your hands from the drawer, you know that you're bleeding.)
(You take a deep breath in, and out.)
(You rummage around again.)
(You remove your hand from the drawer.)
(You look under the drawer...)
(You look under the drawer...)
(Oh.)
(As always, the Star Crest is stuck on the underside of the drawer.)
(Get the Star Crest?)
(You got the STAR CREST.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: What a WEIRD SPOT for a crest...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Have they almost all been in drawers... Someone needs to change things up.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: HUH?!?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: OKAY WHAT THE CRAB

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hm... Sif, my dear friend...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Did you find just the thing we need, on your FIRST TRY, AGAIN??!??

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Once is luck, twice is a coincidence, three times is a pattern...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Tell me, Siffrin... What does five times make?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: (Oops.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No, it's not!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No, no, this isn't how the House of Change works!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: It's not and has never been about luck!!! You bring about Change by acting!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: And right now, you are acting WEIRD!
(This didn't work...)
(You've messed up this time.)
(You smile     and wait for the storm to pass.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ... Siffrin...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No. We don't have time for this.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Let's keep going.
(You leave the drawer alone for now.)
(Just a drawer.)
(Some flyers advertising a festival.)
(According to the date on the flyer, the festival is taking place... ...)
(You can't tell how close or far that date is.)
(Maybe it'll come back to you next time...)
(Some flyers advertising a festival.)
(According to the date on the flyer, the festival is taking place... ...)
(You're     still not sure about today's date, so you can't tell.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: What? When does the festival take place?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hehe, I mean...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ...It's... today...? If the King didn't take over the House, it was supposed to take place today...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: We talked about it together earlier this morning...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: You guys hadn't been to Dormont's yet, so I was talking about how it's a shame I can't show it to everyone.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: You... don't remember...?
(You look away from the flyer.)
(A flyer for a festival that was supposed to take place today.)
(Whatever "today" means for you at this point.)
(How long have you been repeating the same few days, the same few hours, the same few minutes?)
(What does the date matter for when you've forgotten what the passage of seasons actually is like?)
(Why would today's date matter?)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Siffrin...?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Are you okay...? You've been looking at that flyer for a while...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Is something wrong...?
(A flyer for a festival that was supposed to take place today.)
(You find an anthology of horror stories.)
(On the cover, a handsome young man looks into the night fearfully but longingly.)
(You don't think the crest is in there...)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Oooh, looks like the kinda books you like, yeah?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Horror books... This one looks massive! What's this one ca--

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: THAT'S THE "HANDSOME YOUNG MEN FALLING INTO BEAUTIFUL HEARTBREAKING MADNESS" HORROR ANTHOLOGY!!!
(You breathe out silently.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: DID... DID SOMEONE IN THE HOUSE HAVE IT ALL THIS TIME?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Did someone keep it from you???

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: What is it, anyway?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: It’s a full anthology all about pure-hearted boys being subjected to awful monsters and horror situations!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Seeing them screaming in fright... I cannot help but root for them, and at the same time be happy I am not in their situation!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: There is something lovingly touching about those tales, something wonderfully hopeful!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: I cannot help but read them and pray for their survival!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: So... So do they usually survive? Or do the monsters catch them?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Well...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ...Fifty-fifty?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hm...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: B-but also...! The catharsis that fills my whole being when they get caught... There is something very wonderful about that, too!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: The schadenfreude?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: THE SCHADENFREUDE!!!!!!!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: It's just, its very good!!! Very moving!!!! Makes me feel like I went on a run!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: And also sometimes the heroes end up marrying the monsters, too...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: What???

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hm, I don't get it!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: I kind of do, actually... Any books you'd recommend?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Absolutely!!! I'll lend you some of my favorites once we...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Well... Once we finally escape a horror tale of our own, I suppose...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Haha... I'm looking forward to it.
(Your fault for looking at the book.)
(You don't want to think about handsome young men getting tortured by malevolent forces they can't see.)
(Not that you're a man, but it's hitting a little too close to home for you right now.)
((Are you still young?))
(Anyway, not that you're getting tortured.)
(And there is no unseen malevolent force.)
(There is just you, and the Universe.)
(The book just got closed shut.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: That really is a massive book...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Look, just closing the book made Sif jump from fright!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: That was a really high jump...
(You breathe out, and smile.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Sorry, sorry!!! Um, we can keep going...
(The horror anthology isn't on the shelves anymore.)
(As always, she took it with her.)
(No crest in sight.)
(Moving things around on the desk, you look for the key...)
(No key in sight.)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hey, what's this though? A poem?
(There's an unfinished poem on the desk.)
(Everyone looks at it over the big guy's shoulder...)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hey, what's this though? A poem?
(You know the crest isn't there.)
(Look anyway?)
(Everyone looks at the poem over the big guy's shoulder...)
(You think about fruity-sounding names.)
"Oranges     are nice."
"Oranges     are soft."
"Oranges     are frail."
"When you look at me     I feel     like one."
"Your fingernails     digs     into     my cheek."
"Peel an orange open..."
(The poem ends here...)

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Is this.........

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: A CLUE?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No, it's just someone's unfinished poem.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Let's finish it for them!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: We don't really have time right now--

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: "Peel an orange open.."

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ..."Orange juice comes out!!!"

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Bad.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Um, um!!! "Peel an orange open..."

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: The person who wrote this is the orange, right?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: One could assume so, yes.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Kid
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Okay, so... "I die."

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Hm, hm, very literal, very nice...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Blood oranges...? Something with that... Something bloody but poetic...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: I haven't heard a single good idea yet.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Teach, do you have something then?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No.

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Okay!!!!!!!!! Sif?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Siffrin
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ("Peel an orange open...")

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Ah, a question ending...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: In poetry, they call that a cliffhanger!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Researcher
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: No they don't!!!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Bloody AND poetic!!! I like it!

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Housemaiden
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: I just... didn't think this would be the type of writing you navigated towards, though?

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: Yeah, that's...

sasasap/writingroomsap.html.speaker: Fighter
sasasap/writingroomsap.html.dialogue: ...That's the power of writing for you!!!
(The poem lays here, unfinished.)
(Some papers.)
(You pick one at random...)

• (It's a poem about lovers on a bridge.)
  • (It's a poem about someone going to a grave.)
  • (It's a poem about a fox and a crow.)
